links_reviews_text: This dress had the perfect amount of pink, pineapples, and ruffles to make it feminine and fun. I wore it to a HUGE brunch on a cruise and because it was so loose it didn't get in the way of enjoying all I cared to eat. Bonus! It was lightweight on a hot day.

I always love a good Kate Spade dress. I just find occasionally sizing is not typical. That was the case here. The dress is very oversized. It's still beautiful and comfortable though. I'd rent again but size down.

Cute off the shoulder dress. Great for a summer evening out. I'm 5'10" and it wasn't too short. Plenty of room to move around and good twirl factor. Worked great with a strapless dress. Sort of a pain to iron
Because I have such broad shoulders, not many off the shoulder looks work but this one did! It didn't ride up at all. I loved the color and the baby-doll fit. Very fun!
Wore this at 23 weeks pregnant and it was so comfortable and I received so many compliments! Runs a little big but I cinched the waist a bit! So fun for spring/summer!
This dress is absolutely adorable in person. Also, very flattering and comfortable. I will rent it again. Highly recommend!

This dress was so cute! I wore it for a luncheon and it was perfect. Definitely runs big so size down! Stayed off my shoulder the whole time with no problems and wasn't see through at all. Would wear again!
Highly recommend this dress for spring/summer. Was very cute and fit well on an athletic body type.

links_reviews_title: This is not my style but I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for vacation in FL. I loved it! It fit great and I thought it was super flattering! I have a pear shaped body and I really liked how it fit on my waist. The off-the-shoulder slips up a bit but that happens with any off-the-shoulder outfit

This is such a fun dress. It's a little voluminous, which combined with the elastic waste and neckline make it very forgiving. I wouldn't say it runs large but if you want a more fitted feel then size down. Perfect for vacation date nights!
I really loved this dress... but my family said it was too short. I am 5'8". I would still rent again!
Fit great and it is so fun!

links_reviews_title: So cute! Great for a casual night out!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and wish I could buy it. It's the first off the shoulder dress I have worn that stayed in place!

I got this for a bridal shower and basically wore it as many times as possible before it was too wrinkled and I had nowhere left to wear it to. The pineapple design is so cute, and the fabric is light and breathable. It runs big, especially on top, but I still found it so flattering.
Fit well, top rode up a bit while walking. Overall satisfied.
I got the large because I'm normally a medium but I'm very very pregnant and this dress still looked HUGE! So much fabric, would suggest 2 sizes smaller.
Na

links_reviews_title: Cute and stays off the shoulder
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It's perfect for a Friday at work, light enough to wear in the summer and best of all the off the shoulder stayed put. Only thing to put it over the top...would be if it had pockets (it doesn't). Will definitely wear again

Wore this dress to a summer bbq and got tons of compliments on the cute pineapple print! I am 5'8 so felt like it ran a bit short and was worried about it most of the night, constantly pulling it down and fixing the top. Cute for a one-time wear
This dress is really adorable and comfortable! The shoulders didn't ride up at all although the top definitely runs large. The light pink and pineapples are so much fun. Would definitely rent again
Fun off the shoulder pineapple print in a pretty pink for tropical vacation. Loved the ruffles. Runs short.

I love this feminine by kate spade new york! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and and going down for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress, so you should wear strapless since the dress is off the shoulder. At 5'0", the length hit just above the knee on me. I love the small pineapples on the dress and it adds a little bit of fun to this Spring/Summer dress. Pair with cute sandals and a small purse accessory to complete your outfit!
Had such cute details and overall fit was good. Was a touch short on me so I threw thin shorts on underneath.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and casual for a vacation day or night.
links_reviews_text: did not end up wearing it because it was very large. I would recommend sizing down if you're in between sizes.

I probably should have ordered a size smaller, the XXL was way too big, but I find that this brand usually runs smaller, so I went with a larger size but it was falling off me. but I loved the print, it was cute and perfect for the beach or vacation night/day out.

Like many Kate Spade dresses, runs large. Stretchy at shoulders and waist so if in doubt size down. I'm only 5'3" and I usually like short dresses but this one was really pushing it. Pattern was just so-so; the stripes made it preppier than I expected. I actually changed into something else once I got the chance.
Fun summer outfit. Wore for a casual Saturday. Flattering and stays put.
Got lots of compliments - perfect summer dress

links_reviews_title: The color is just as seen on the picture. I wore to walk around Nassau.
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect it's not too baggy and it is lined at the bottom, so I wore it around town with sneakers. See it in my Bahamas highlights @lovegrether

A cute print; I was hoping to really like it, but it fit a bit large. Also, it was quite frilly with lots of ruffles and pink, and my husband thought it looked more like a dress for a little girl. I would recommend size down, too.

Cute, comfortable. Could have worn an XL. Wore to brunch, a winery, and out to dinner. Off the shoulder stayed put and it was breezy and comfortable in mid-June humidity. Waist is elasticized and comfortable! Would definitely rent again - or even buy!
Way too short for me at 5'7". My butt literally wasn't covered at all.
I didn't care for the fabric or fit on this dress. It arrived super wrinkled and just looked frumpy on me. Sent it back.
Did not pass this tall girl's fingertip test!!!

Pros: lightweight, great for summer, great length, loose so it will hide not-so-great areas Cons: runs very large- I suggest ordering a size or even 2 sizes smaller (I didn't wear it because it was just too huge on me)

I followed other reviews and ordered a size down. It definitely fit a bit oversized which I was fine with, the M was perfect in every way but the length. I'm on the taller side and I would have only felt comfortable wearing this to the pool. For a petite renter, this dress would probably be perfect.
This is a little short - I am 5'4" with curves and thought it was a bit too short.
I guess it is supposed to fit loose, but I didn't like the style of it on me. The bust was very loose and it sagged a lot.

As is the case with lots of "above the knee" dresses on RTR, this was WAY too short for my 5'10" frame. I thought I'd give it a try since it didn't seem too terrible high above the knee but it was comically short. My husband: "channeling your inner cheerleader?" Seriously though...this was maybe 2" below my bottom. Cute dress though! Just not for tall...
This dress was cute, but constantly adjusting the sleeves around my shoulders was a pain. It was a one and done sort of dress.

I rented this looking for a bag that could serve a dual purpose for a weekend away as an everyday bag and for a semi-formal evening bag. For that it was perfect. The extendable tote handles are a bit unusual (shown in pic) - while they add to the flexibility of the bag, if you are not using them as handles they make access to the bag a bit awkward, and also take up some of the usable space in the bag.
Slight spin on a classic bag! Great quality! Will rent again for special occasion. Not a great "every day" bag
Very sturdy, the top of the purse is funky, so I looked back on the models photos. She tied the funky, silk top of the bag. After that happened, the bag was a bit better!

I love this bag, and so many people have commented on it. The bag is sleek, comfortable, and it feels a lot in the bag. Its the perfect bag to carry around on the weekends, and it elevates any outfit.

Such a fan of Susan Alexandra's bags but the price tag never justified the spend for me. Was so excited to see it on RTR and give one a test drive. I wore it to a wedding and it was such a great statement piece. It was much sturdier than I thought it would be and fit a lot inside, my phone, wallet, charger, lipstick, card, etc. excited to see more Susan Alexandra pieces to rent.
Literally everyone I know (and didn't know) complimented this purse. If they saw, they needed to know where I got it.

The bag was so fun. I brought it on vacation and it was perfect. Dressy for nice dinners, but fun for every day. Not heavy. Great size. And good for beach as it has holes in between the beading. I added a zipper pouch just to keep everything together inside.
It's amazing. No pockets or anything but so fabulous.
She's a beauty
Perfect to leave untucked or tuck into high wasted jeans. Can be dressed up or down.

This is a great work top, the neckline is very high and super fun and different. The ruffles along the button line are much larger than they look in the photos. Boxier fit and seemed to run a little large. I would do a size small next time

links_reviews_title: Interesting shirt for a fresh vibe at the office.
links_reviews_text: I got some compliments on this shirt, but I honestly couldn't handle all the buttons and felt claustrophobic. That's just me, someone who is more "buttoned up" would probably luv it.
The collar is a bit uncomfortable and looked a bit too matronly for me. But I was able to remove the front panel and to pull together a polished look for an important client meeting.
Crisp work shirt with fun details, does not wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket, wish I would have rented a smaller size
links_reviews_text: I ordered a medium instead of the recommended small because I was worried it'd be too small. I would have bought this blazer if I had ordered it in the correct size. I wore it once and received compliments!

Didn't get to wear this for work due to quarantine. Only tried it on to be sent back. Tight in the biceps & elbow while wearing sleeveless top. Very snug if you work out & have muscle definition. Has difficulty bending arms. Will go up to sz small whenever I'm back out in the field.
Loved it so much I kept it! Chanel makes one that is super similar. Loved this beautiful tweed blazer. Perfect for winter - just be carful because it snags easy!

links_reviews_title: The perfect oversized modern plaid coat
links_reviews_text: Super warm and cozy

links_reviews_title: Loved this blazer for a work meeting. Comfortable and works both buttoned and unbuttoned.
links_reviews_text: The only con is the metal buttons on the sleeves. Every time I had to write notes, they clanged on the desk. Other than that, I should have bought it!
Ordered this with the skirt and I like the jacket for work but it really doesn't go well with the matching skirt. The skirt isn't work appropriate.
Loved the fit of this blazer, perfect on my smaller frame. Wore with jeans and with black suit pants. Looked great and got tons of compliments!
Wore this incredible set to a wine tasting event and I felt so chic and adorable. Cher would be totally proud, duh.

I loved this blazer! It wasn't the highest quality compared to other blazers I've rented but looked great, especially the buttons. I'm usually a medium/8 in tops but the large was all that was available in the store and I could have gotten away with the medium. Would recommend!
Loved how bold this plaid blazer is. The gold buttons were definitely a favorite and I received compliments from all my co-workers!

Such a cute plaid jacket. Wore it with all black to make it stand out. It had beautiful gold buttons. Unfortunately one was missing, so I didn't button it up. Wore it open all day. Perfect sleeve length for me which is rare. LOVE the tweed material too!

links_reviews_title: The perfect jacket for work to drinks!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this piece. There is a subtle silver sparkle interwoven in the tweed and the gold buttons are the perfect accent! So versatile and the cut is super flattering!
Used this for my work trip & I absolutely loved it! I wore it with with jeans and formal work pants as well. I probably could've gone a size down but I liked the extra room.

links_reviews_title: Looks more expensive than it is
links_reviews_text: Fun colors and warm

This fit surprisingly perfect. Sleeves on blazers are often too long on me, but this one fit really well. It looked polished for a winter work outfit. I wore with skinny black dress pants and a white scoop neck body suit.
Rented the full suit for work and I loved it so much I purchased. True to size and just adorable, got a TON of compliments.
I paired this with black ankle pants, heels and a white flowy tank. Would look great with jeans and heels too.
Comfortable slightly loose fit. Cute black and red tweed for winter.
Rented for work. Was super cute and got a lot of compliments but I wore less than half a day and one of the buttons fell off. Definitely not great quality.

Rented this for work and loved it! Disappointed that there was a small hole in the left arm most likely due to wear when I received it. Notified RTR but hopefully they can get a new one because this sweater looks amazing and provides a really slimming look. Wish I could have worn it but the hole was noticeable.

I wore the sweater twice, once with jeans on the weekend and once with navy slacks to the office. Absolutely loved the sweater. It was not itchy, it was thin but also warm, and extremely flattering. I normally don't wear turtlenecks because I get to itchy and claustrophobic, but had no issues with this one. Would absolutely recommend the sweater.
Wore tucked into high waisted pants (JOIE) and also wore out with jeans. Lightweight fabric with ruffle that can be dressed up or down. This sweater is a keeper!
Very soft material that kept me warm outside but not too hot inside. Paired with Club Monaco Sabrina Pants in Navy blue.
Love Victoria Beckham's knits because they are so high quality. Very thin, but warm and cozy. I expected the sweater to run small so I got a large, but this would have fit me better in a medium.
Very cute, nice quality. Lots of compliments on the frills. VB runs small. Size up
Loved the feel and look of this sweater! It's a great color and the ruffle with navy stripe gave this every-day sweater a unique flair.
Absolutely loved this top! Super flattering and fit perfectly! The bordeaux color with the pop of blue on the ruffle made a special unique touch!

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved, loved this sweater! It fit perfectly and was ruffle-y without being too girly.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. It was thin, so not too bulky, but lovely. Ruffles were in the perfect location to be feminine but not overboard.
Very soft and comfortable. Fits true to size.
This thin knit was very fitted on me, flattering. Beautiful color and the vertical ruffle was an interesting detail. Would rent again.
Amazing fit. Ruffle is really cool. I got tons of compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and fit of this sweater
links_reviews_text: Sweater is fitted and perfect color

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful color! And the ruffle down the side was amazing
links_reviews_text: Fit just right! Color was great fall color.

links_reviews_title: Tremendously flattering and makes any look more polished.
links_reviews_text: sleeves and length of shirt were the perfect fit. It hugs curves but has a little bit of room at the bottom to allow it to sit nicely on top of jeans without looking too tight.
This is a great piece. The ruffle detail is super cute! Great fit!

links_reviews_title: snug and fun. Ruffle adds just a touch of fun
links_reviews_text: Maroon and blue, nice fit. Small hole in sleeve but great customer service.
I loved this piece. It was so soft and comfortable and easy to wear. Paired it with jeans and then paired it with navy pants. Very flattering fit.
Ok sweater
Wore it to a wedding shower and to work. The print and colors are magnificent; so is the fit. Wore a size up to make sure it wasn't tight in the bust. Will definitely rent again.
Gorgeous feminine blouse that paired well with an edgier pant for a night out. Suggested size was 10 and I normally wear a 6, but the sizing on this brand made a 10 perfect.

My first Peter Pilotto rental and I loved wearing this from work into an evening event with skinny black pants. The sleeve details are unique and feminine and the print is artistic and rich. It's a lovely light weight silk, so wear with a neutral bra or a camisole.
Love the design and colors of this fantastic blouse. I really loved wearing it. Be sure to size up!

links_reviews_title: cute dressed up or with jeans
links_reviews_text: wore with jeans it was perfect

links_reviews_title: to print or not to print
links_reviews_text: I want to love creative prints like this, but --- Mehh. Slightly sheer tie blouse. Arms a little tight. Probably cuter on someone like the model.

This was such a fun shirt to wear and very different from my usual look. The details on the sleeves are feminine and add personality to an already beautiful blouse. Keep in mind it's sheer so perhaps a cami underneath or a nude bra.

links_reviews_title: Looks like a piece of art
links_reviews_text: This blouse was so comfortable and looks like a piece of art. It was also surprisingly versatile - I wore it for high casual and formal occasions. My favorite rental so far.

I really love bold prints and cuts. I'm known for them. But this shirt made me look like a one-man parade. The print was truly very pretty with rich colors. The problems came in with the cut and material. First, it looked cheap. It was gossamer-thin, requiring a cami or undershirt. The silhouette had no structure so it just hung all flaccid and fattening. The frills at the mid-arm put it over the top as just fussy and costumish. I sent it back the same day.
I'm usually an 8/medium and the 12 fit well. The fabric was really high quality and the pattern was gorgeous. Would recommend!

The detail in the print is the most gorgeous part of this blouse, but the little details all make it come together. I wore it untucked every time to show off the beautiful floral at the bottom of the shirt, but it also looks great tucked in. The ruffles are a nice touch, but the sleeve length is short enough that it doesn't get in the way. The fit was perfect for me - I have a long torso, and it hit right at the hip when untucked.

links_reviews_title: Luxurious shirt with a fun pattern
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this shirt. It is high-end and professional with a nice amount of flair. Would definitely rent again.
I got so many compliments! Great color. Very fashionable.
Great fit. I wear an American 6 So ordering a size 10 scared me but it was perfect. Beautiful colors. Eye catching
Better jeans for extra thin people than for me. You have to find the right shoes and too for these jeans. I think they would look best with heeled ankle boots or cute flats.
They were a little big on me but I am highly considering buying these jeans. I had so many compliments on them when I was out and they were very easy to style.
I usually wear a 28 but the algorithm said 29. That is what I got. They are perfect. Look great from the back and feel sweet and easy.
One of the best jeans i have worn to date. Flattering, stretchy, and super high waisted. Hits at my ankle - I'm 5'3" and still lengthens my legs.
Super cute jeans! Very trendy, high waisted, and perfect length
Great jeans to show off your back side, but made for taller ladies. I'm 5'3" and write with heels- but made me look like my jeans were just too short.
High waisted and stretchy and super comfortable
Great fit, lots of stretch. Very high waisted yet comfortable. Love the detail and slight flare cut!

I loved these pants - there is a lot more stretch than I expected and I could have worn a size down. These are cropped at the ankle, so I would not recommend for ladies under 5'4 because these will not look cropped on your frame. Will definitely wear again.
These are really well made, flattering jeans but they have more stretch than I expected and would rent true to size or a size down

links_reviews_title: Better than most RTR jeans I've tried
links_reviews_text: These are stretchy! So should be more forgiving in size differences. I sized up in fact cause I keep getting burned by all the stiff denim on the site. These aren't the most flattering, but fine enough for the weekend and work.
They look funny like high waters

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but get stretched out very quickly.
links_reviews_text: Gets too stretched out too quickly.
Didn't stretch too much. Super comfy!
These jeans are super flattering and comfortable. The material has some stretch to it. They are very high waisted.
Very, very flattering. Tons of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the jeans! very comfy and stylish.
links_reviews_text: they were a bit too big

These pants are super cute and stretchy, but hug EVERY curve in a way that is not flattering for people with some curves they'd rather have smoothed. So if you're not flat-bellied these probably aren't for you.

These pants were great for work or fun. High waisted, 70's style with just enough stretch to be comfortable. I thought about holding onto these but they made me want to try others by this brand. Will definitely rent again as we get into fall
Cute, funky, jeans. They were a little tight on me, but super cute!

I am 5'4" and rented my normal size which is a 28. They fit great around the waist but were an awkward length on my legs so wouldn't recommend for shorter gals! I didn't wear them because I couldn't find a shoe to make them look acceptable and you can't roll them either.
These pants can be dressed up or down. Right amount of stretch.
These were definitely true to size and super flattering. Considering buying them!

Love 3x1 denim! They make great pieces. This is a fun little retro piece, and is probably more flattering on taller people. I am pairing these jeans with wedges to give me some more length. I usually am a 29, but the 30 for fine with no major gapping. I would prefer to size down next time on these but they aren't noticeably too big, so you might want to size up. I have athletic thighs and a bubble butt paire with a small waist, so I was surprised I didn't get the dreaded waist gap in these jeans.

I wasn't sure about these jeans at first on my petite frame, but I ended up loving them! Wore them 5 times before sending back. They have a fun, hippie vibe and super comfortable high waist. They do stretch out a lot with wear. I probably could've sized down. Would definitely rent again or consider purchasing.
long if you're petite but still wearable

links_reviews_title: Super comfy but really just not flattering
links_reviews_text: I love 3x1 jeans because they are always ridiculously comfortable and a good fit. These were both... and I did wear them three times. But I really just didn't like how they made me look. I felt frumpy in them. Too "mom jean" even for this mom ;)

links_reviews_title: I love the stretchy material. Very flattering on my deformed body:)
links_reviews_text: Pros - Good fit, great material. No cons.
I love these! I should've ordered a 28, as these have more stretch than anticipated, but they're fantastic and received compliments galore! Highly recommend!
Too tight in the butt, just didn't look right.
Honestly, the most comfortable jeans to wear EVER and they looked great. I could dress them up or down. and got so many compliments. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Made me look and feel taller!
links_reviews_text: So glad to wear jeans that weren't ripped or "skinny"!

I am a size 31 or 32, depending on style. Other reviews said these ran big so I went with the 31, but they were too snug. High waist, so if you have a little paunch, might want to avoid. Even if they had fit well, I didn't love the style. Big seams down the front, and the length felt awkward to me in a wide leg pant.
Love these jeans so much and know it will be hard to part with them! They fit so well after multiple wears and are super flattering.

Slightly cropped and a bit of a wider leg, these jeans are a perfect way to branch out from your usual straight-leg/skinny-leg styles. Medium to dark wash and have some stretch. I wore these probably 5 times during my rental and found them to be super flattering with the seam down the middle. The high waist was also right on trend. Will rent again!
Fits perfectly- fitted in the arms, loose in the body but doesn't make you feel shapeless. Classy, wore for daytime and evening work events. Got lots of compliments on it!
This is a fantastic classic blazer! Wasn't too tight or too big and felt very high end and looked professional! Would 100% recommend!
This blazer is very flattering. Was tight on my arms but super cute and loved the gold details of the buttons.
Paired it with shorts for a date and got soooo many compliments! Super soft and comfy
Overall very nice jacket. Good quality and very comfortable!!
Due to my very muscular shoulders and arms, this blazer was a bit tight in the arms. But other than that it was a great, well made, classic blazer that I wore to work numerous times.
Loved this piece - great fit, material, and style. Loved the gold buttons too. Was perfect for work with slacks, but also paired well with jeans. Will definitely rent again!
It was okay. I was hoping to wear the blazer w a dress but it was a little longer than I'd hoped. Also felt a little but big.
It fits great in the shoulders! I wore it to work and received so many compliments. It is comfortable and completes a look.
Great fit and very versatile. I ended up wearing multiple days at a work conference. It was an excellent price to have for a cold conference room.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this blazer! I wore it with jeans and sneakers and it still looked good
links_reviews_text: Great fit, closes with a little button if you're so inclined.

I wore this to work even though I wasn't in love with the fit. I am pretty petite so if a jacket is a little boxy or oversized, it's not going to be very flattering on me. I made it work with a slim fitting sheath dress underneath, left the jacket unbuttoned and rolled up the sleeves.
Perfect fit.

A great quality and fit was good/true to size. It is a very basic jacket but it was a bit too boxy for me. I may try to size down next time. A great for fall/winter as the material is relatively heavy (but not too heavy).

This came just about the same time as I bought a black blazer, so I didn't wear it. I did try it on and it fit true to size and well. The length is good - not too short or long (I'm 5'7" with a long torso and arms). The gold buttons were nice and classy, not gaudy. My only slight disappointment was the fabric, which was wrinkled and would need steaming or a light iron before wearing.

Pros: fits like a glove, perfect black jacket for work Cons: the button felll off while I was waking right in front of a big corporate person. Could have been put together earlier. Early to get white fibers on it. Aside from that mishap I definitely recommend it!
Great fitting blazer. Very professional. Seriously considered purchasing this piece i loved it so much!

links_reviews_title: Nice blazer but slightly itchy fabric
links_reviews_text: Well cut and styled blazer but the fabric was a little itchy near the collar and back of neck. Since it's an expensive blazer, I definitely expected better quality fabric. It fits beautifully though. Would conside wearing it in the winter with a turtleneck. Just too itchy and heavy for summer.

links_reviews_title: This is a stylish wardrobe staple
links_reviews_text: Love everything about this classic and stylish blazer. I'm semi-petite so the sleeves are often long on me. This is perfect.
Fit great, perfect work option!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, nice material and looked very polished with the slim boxy style.
links_reviews_text: Perfect black blazer for work or play!!

links_reviews_title: Nice jacket. Too big for me
links_reviews_text: Very well made and pretty jacket. Didn't do me any favors as it was too big and boxy for my frame

links_reviews_title: Perfect for jeans or running errands.
links_reviews_text: I am petite woman who is 5'2" so the blazer was longer on me, but the cut was so great I liked how it hugged to me but went straight down. The sleeves were not too long and it hung more like a fitted coat than a work blazer. Perfect for jeans or a colored slack. The buttons are gold and flat so it gives a more modern feel.
This jacket is not for warm weather great quality heavier
Didn't even need to power pose with this blazer on!
Standard blazer, long in the boyfriend style but not boxy
A classic well made blazer, fits true to size, wore it nearly every week I had it.

This blazer is great--the cut is more modern and less fitted, but not oversize. It is a perfect length, and the fabric is so versatile in that it can be dressed up or dressed down. I have broad shoulders, so I think I might rent the next size up next time for more room and a more oversized fit. Otherwise, I consider this true to size. Also, the pockets are fully functional, despite what another reviewer said. They are the type that are stitched closed when purchased. Her blazer's pockets must not have been opened yet.
Perfect fit!
n/a
Fit was very nice. Definitely a more expensive and high quality jacket.
I needed a great looking blazer and this delivered. Great quality, material, and cut. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the look with the pants, very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and was stylish.
Totally fine black blazer that fits well. I'm not a fan of the length but hits below the hips as pictured, fake pockets are a major bummer. The material isn't great but not terrible
Perfect fit and the right details to make it more than just a black blazer!
Such a great blazer. Great cut, great fit, perfect for work. Will rent again!
Stunning blazers, perf for work or jeans.
Loved it so much I bought it. Perfect classic blazer for work or also with jeans
This is the chicest coat. I have never received so many compliments on a piece of clothing.
Lots of compliments- super cute and well tailored.

The truth is I just got 2 pair of sunshine yellow Manolo blahnik shoes and I was dying to find excuses to wear them. Enter this suit. I wore the jacket with big grey jeans and a funky structured yellow top along with my yellow suede oxfords and it was DELIGHTFUL. Then I went full suit with the matching skirt and welp... I grabbed the wrong shoes! But you know what? It still worked. I felt a little 80s and a little wasp, and a lot fashionable. Loved this coat.

links_reviews_title: Don't wear if you don't want to be noticed
links_reviews_text: Best coat, biggest regret was not getting the matching skirt. I wore this like 4 times and random people were stopping me on the street to say how cute it was. I definitely felt like some wealthy young socialite from the 90s strolling around LA. The fit was stellar, the buttons worked great and were easy, and it was pretty warm. I was wearing it in 40 degree weather and was not uncomfortable.

I have had this jacket for a month and a half and I CAN'T LET IT GO. By far my favorite rental.. can be dressed up or down and is expertly tailored. For some reason, men absolutely love this piece... It's kind of bizarre the amount of compliments you'll get from them when wearing it. Added bonus: it reminds me of Cher from Clueless!

I really wanted to love this jacket. I rented it with the matching skirt and am absolutely in love with the pattern. I saw reviews saying it ran small, so I got the medium instead of my typical small. It SWALLOWED me whole. The pattern was eye catching and unique enough to still get compliments, but it wasn't a flattering shape at all. I wish it had a more fitted waist, I think even the small wouldn't have been incredibly flattering. But if you like non-fitted coats, you'll probably like this.

links_reviews_title: Cute fit but snug on the shoulders and chest
links_reviews_text: I love anything with an elevated clueless vibe. Color and print is cute, material is nice. Also wish this fit properly to go with the skirt. I got a medium and it was a bit tight on the shoulders. I would only wear something thin underneath like a button up, tee or super thin knit. I'm debating if I'll wear it without the skirt since my size isn't available at the moment.

This jacket is EVERYTHING!! Gorgeous print and decadent fit. Fun and slimming. I paired it with heavily ripped jeans, a nude body suite, and nude sandals. Gave the perfect casual chic look. Tons of compliments. Considered buying
Sleeves are more like 3/4 length on long arms

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments. Attention grabbing but classic. Wore with a sweater for fall weather
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are a little short if you are tall. Sweater cuffs were peeking out. Looks better open than closed

links_reviews_title: Cute but long for short girls
links_reviews_text: Super cute but long for short girls. I rented this with the matching skirt and it was very cute but the jacket is long if you are on the shorter side. I'm 5'0 and this came down past my knee. I rocked it anyways!
Fit great on my petite frame. Sleeves were the right length, shoulders were the right size. Loved this paired with the matching miniskirt or with jeans.
This coat was an absolute autumnal LOOK, both with and without the matching skirt. The M was perfect on me (size 6). Hated having to send it back.
Sleeves are definitely short compared to body!

links_reviews_title: The size I needed was not available so it was too big
links_reviews_text: I should have waited for my correct size. It was too big

links_reviews_title: Stylish, on-brand jacket for my company
links_reviews_text: This jacket matches my company's brand colors, so I wore it to a conference. It was the talk of the town. It fit perfectly and was super cute with my work clothes. It was warm but also comfortable to wear inside. Very nice material.
Great length and placement of buttons.

links_reviews_title: Rent with caution-you you want to give it back
links_reviews_text: I have never received so many compliments on any piece of clothing I have ever worn. On m 5ft frame it has an oversized but not sloppy look. The sleeve are a good length.
I love this coat. It's perfect for Southern winters. The lining is a vibrant yellow. One of my favorite rentals!
Would maybe work as overcoat; overwhelmed skirt as shown in pics .. too heavy for indoors all day wear. Also big on me.

This dress is so flattering. Fits perfectly and the pleating at the bottom give the best amount of flare. Rented this just for work but I plan to keep it and wear a few more times before sending back..
I wasn't sure if this dress would be to form fitting for work but it's perfect!

Gotta love the stretch in this dress. Great for work. Lived the midi length in the sleeves. Looked tiny on the hanger but it has oodles of stretch to it. Thought it made my chest look bigger than I am, although I am not small by any means. Great basic wardrobe.
I wore this on a date and to exhibit at a convention. Very cute and versatile. I felt so comfortable and got many compliments.
I wore this to work and loved the fit and pattern. The material is lighter weight than it looks in picture. For anyone who has a wool allergy, this is a great alternative for fall and winter.

When I first got this, the waist looked frighteningly tiny! But when I put it on it was so flattering. I added a wide belt for a little more waist definition. I'm under 5 feet and it hit below my knee. Material is comfortable, I felt great in this dress all day! Will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Compliments from strangers in this dress
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, looked great with and without tights underneath. Wore it to work, wore it on date, wore it to weekend vacation in Portland. No spanx needed which is always a huge plus.

links_reviews_title: Effortless style- something a little different
links_reviews_text: Very nice weight - heavy enough to smooth any lumps or bulges - wore for work in Chicago during very cold weather - super flattering .

links_reviews_title: Form fitting dress in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Fit better than expected. I am petite and the length was good. Could have been shorter, but for work it was perfect. Material is very flattering
Don't be alarmed by how small this dress looks on the hanger! It stretches beautifully to hug/flatter whatever curves you may have. Great worn with tights for work.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and made me feel great!
links_reviews_text: The design is so flattering! I got complimented throughout the day! Great for work and I'd also wear it out on a date or dinner. The color on the stripes are more pink than it shows up in the model picture, but it still all looks great together.
I don't know if I can send this dress back, it's so comfortable, flattering and the material is luxurious. Fit in the bust - which is always a challenge for me!
Dress is nice. Comfortable. Stretchy. Great for more casual days at the office.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress- tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Probably my favorite RTR. Terrific dress, super comfortable- thick fabric that hides a multitude of sins. Hard to find a long sleeved dress for winter and this is it!! Length work-appropriate. Compliments all day. Normally a S but sized up bc I find the brand runs small.
This dress is so flattering and classy. I wore it for a work holiday party and received so many compliments. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Don't love it. Don't hate it.
links_reviews_text: I thought it would be heavier material but instead it's kind of thin, which does give it more movement. Not especially in love with it and the colors seemed brighter than in the photo. Overall it's decent for work but not sure it was worth renting.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress!!! Don't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: You would think stripes would make you look bigger but this dress accents you in all the right places. Material is very forgiving and stretchy. I've tried other Shoshanna dresses where I needed to where a large but this dress wasn't constricting in any way. If you are debating sizes, I would size down. I'm between sizes but closer to an 8 than 10 and still found the medium to be quite roomy.

I sized up in this dress based on other reviews & that was the right call. Despite how it looks on the hanger (seriously it was like 10" wide... major side-eye happening in my bedroom) it hangs on the body amazingly! (Full disclosure - wearing shaper tights today!) I'm so comfortable in this dress & I have received a bunch of compliments so far, so I think that's a win!

Why does this dress have to be so expensive!? I would have bought it in a heartbeat if it were half the price. Oh well! Seriously, I love the colors and the shape - the material is a decent heft and the pleating make for a very flattering silhouette. My picture is a little dark, but I wore with black tights and gray ankle boots. It's not too tight and the length is just right for work attire.

links_reviews_title: Omg this dress is the best
links_reviews_text: I have now worn this dress to work twice and used it to travel once since it's not a wrinkly fabric. The colors and stripes are so cute and fall-appropriate and I find the knit super flattering.

Runs true to size - The colors were a little dark and drab for me - the red is pink in real life too 3/4 sleeves good for a warm fall day not too thick Fabric was a little scratchy - my skin is super sensitive though Fits true to size maybe a tad small in bust but it stretched out throughout the day I wore with leggings but wasn't too short

links_reviews_title: Fall Stripes - stands out in a crowd
links_reviews_text: Rented for a school evening event and felt it really stood out over a sea of suits. Nice fall colors in stripes. Very comfortable. True to size.
Love the fit and flattering stripes of this dress. Perfect for work and after work drinks!
Flattering, comfortable, and professional. This would look good on a variety of body types. I worse this 3x this month and got tons of compliments.
This is a nice, thick knit. The stripes are fuchsia, not red.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! Loved wearing it to work
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. The fabric is so forgiving and fits to your curves in a smooth, flattering way. I am VERY pear shaped, so I loved that the hem of the dress fell straight down instead of continuing with the contours of my hips/thighs -- some sweater-type dresses do that and way OVER accentuate my shape, but this dress gave me a perfectly feminine form. The length was also great for my taller-than-average height. The only draw-back was that I felt the stripes hit at weird parts on my body, but this was a very minor con. I would definitely recommend this to any future renters!
I really like this dress. you can dress it up or down for work or out and about on the weekend. I have two small kids and it worked great with them and functioned well for buisness meetings too.

This dress is so comfortable! Great everyday dress. I wore it to work with white sneakers and got lots of compliments! It looked very small in the bag but it actually runs a little large since it has stretch. It would have also looked cute with black tights and boots. I am 5'5" and it almost hit my knee but was still cute. I will be renting again but in an XS.
Just like usual, this Shoshanna dress fit me perfectly! The stripes in the waist make you look skinny and I believe it would be a perfect piece for most body types. Will def rent again!
Very flattering, comfortable and eye catching dress. Looked super with black boots and double strand of pearls.
Nice but not soooo special
When it arrives it looks small, but when wearing it, it stretches and does NOT feel tight at all. I think I would do a medium next time.
Good work dress
Fit was perfect. I'm very curvy so this hugged them appropriately for work.

This dress is more interesting than a typical sweater dress. The vertical, wide ribs are unique and the slight ruffle in the hem adds interest. Wore this twice, once to present at a conference and felt confident and professional in it.
This was just okay. I wore a medium but probably should have sized down. It has a lot of stretchy to it and the medium was sort of baggy on me. Wouldn't rent again.
I went up a size for length and wish I hadnt. It was a loose but got tons of compliments. It's a heavy knit but kept it's shape. Would rent again.
I wouldn't have thought this dress would be flattering but I decided to trust the comments. They were so right! Awesome dress.
the fabric was itchy
Loved this dress - fit perfect and felt high quality. Colors unique and pretty
Runs super big. Very comfortable. Fun to rent Bc I would never buy something like it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to rent for the quarantine!
links_reviews_text: Very loose and baggy -- If I were wearing this in public I definitely would size down
I love oversized clothes, so I loved this dress! But be warned, it is a tent of a dress. The colors and print are beautiful
i sized down and glad i did. wanted to keep on unlimited, but knew it would sit in my closet for several weeks. will rent again when it's warmer. made for comfort! would be a great vacation piece.

When I tried on this dress for the first time, I was in love. It's an easy and breathable dress that doesn't make you feel like a potato sack. I wore it to the Frida Kahlo museum in Mexico City and it was perfect for such a colorful occasion. Rent this dress! It won't disappoint.

So sad I didn't get this dress until the very end of summer because I would have worn it all summer long. The fit is large because it's supposed to be which I enjoyed, the dress was very easy breezy and breathed in the NYC summer heat. Loved it! Hits mid calf so casual with flats and could be dressed up a little with heels.

This dress is such a winner. I wanted to keep her so badly but alas I don't have $500. This chic green dress is oversized and perfect in every way. Great for pretty much any occasion. Highly recommend!

This style really worked for me, and I never wanted to take it off. I'm between a 6-8, and 40 fit me well. A little snug in the chest (34C), but nice and flowy from the waist down. Colors and bright and beautiful. This could totally be dressed up or down. Don't wanna return this one.
This dress was so comfy but was so big! It was really well made but runs really big. I belted it and looked cute but it felt very much like a sack.
Another great oversize dress by Marni, very comfortable, unlined, breathable cotton, I'm 5'8 I was surprised by how long it was on me. I received various compliments.
The bright vibrant color of this dress highlights a terrific tan. The material is light weight and I was surprised I didn't look pregnant. Great everyday dress to throw on.
Too big! For reference I'm a size 4 and ordered a 38. Pretty huge
Great fit. Love the fabric - it is super light weight but holds its shape really well.

The size fit in the neck, length and arms and while this was supposed to be an oversized dress I felt it was too much. This reminded me of a grandmother's housedress. The colors were bold and fun and I liked the floral pattern but it did nothing for me. I belted it, added fun jewelry and shoes and nothing really worked for me. I still wore it and did get complemented but I did not feel my best.
Great for work
Runs super large, but wore a jacket over it to make it work for the office. Very voluminous, good for a hotter day.

links_reviews_title: LOVED, but not made to be flattering
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cool. I wore it multiple times and ways: To work, to an expensive dinner, out with friends. This dress is so cool. It will hang on you like a bag just like it does on the model. So, keep that in mind. Then, wear it anyway because it is so comfortable and fun to wear!

I wore this 36 weeks pregnant (size 40) and it was not super flattering. I maybe even could have gone down a size as it runs quite large. That said, the print is beautiful and I did receive several compliments. I will rent again when I'm not pregnant, and definitely in a 38.

Another oversized rental for me. Wore it anyway - got several compliments. Fabric and quality was nicer than photographed. Go down a size or two...or three depending on how you like your dresses to fit.

Loved this dress. Definitely an oversized fit but it's so wonderful for a Texas summer day! Wore it to brunch and a farmers market and was very happy! Can easily be dressed up or down. Print is vibrant and fun. Would recommend renting!
this dress is very pretty but it runs really big

Love! I've worn it a handful of times, and can't wait to keep wearing this summer. I've dubbed this "kindergarten teacher chic" - but in the best way possible! It's light and airy, and the pockets are amazing. The 48R is a bit big, but given the style it's easy to pull off. Might try for a size smaller next time!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it out of the house
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute, but felt really large, too much fabric for my height and frame. Didn't end up wearing out of the house.
My husband thinks it makes me look big, but I think it's supercute and comfy and have gotten compliments from other women.
Really really runs large. I ended up belting it which made the extra material not so bad
The fabric is beautiful, but the dress is so huge I wasn't able to wear it! Looks like a maternity dress.
Gorgeous dress. I've never received so many compliments from complete strangers. Unique silhouette and colorful print. Loved!
I got SO many compliments on this dress (I still haven't returned it either!) It can be for a day at the beach or a summer night out - Just with a change of shoes :) I absolutely adore this dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved the material and the print of the dress. Runs extremely large!
links_reviews_text: Runs super large!

links_reviews_title: This was so comfortable and chic for an afternoon sitting outside. I loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is cut oversized and runs large so size down. I got a 44 but could have worn a 40 or 42. I got a million compliments because it is light and breezy. Great if you are sitting outside all day or going for a big meal because it hides everything while still looking chic.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for vacation night out!!!
links_reviews_text: Rented this with unlimited (I was curious what a $1500 dress felt like :) it didn't disappoint... it is so beautifully made and feels expensive!! It's not a "flattering" dress, but perfect for beach night out, it has a soft, bohemian feel, loved the hood and fun strings. A camisole is definitely needed underneath, unless it is worn as a cover up- would also be perfect for a pool party!!! Loved!!!
From the photos, I was so excited to rent this. I was disappointed. It runs big and looks sloppy. Definitely have to wear something underneath the top half.
I rented this for a vacation and the dress was too heavy to wear to the beach. It is very sheer so i thought it was good for a cover up but too much material and strings it was pretty cumbersome

I love this dress but I ordered a size 6 because I thought I had gained some weight but maybe I will re-order it in a four I am thinking about buying it. It's a great beach/pool dress that looks really nice after if you want to grab a bite Or go somewhere public without looking too casual.. Both casual and dressy.

This dress is a great example of why I love RTR. It fits into my boho style, but at $1,000+ retail, is totally out of my price range. It was so much fun to wear and was perfect for a night out in SoCal. The top is 100% see-through, so a camisole is necessary.
Love this designer. Size down it runs big. Wore with a cami underneath. Special dress.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love this - nice dress, but not amazing
links_reviews_text: I had been eyeing this dress for quite some time, and was so excited when it became available. It's very beautiful, don't get me wrong, but not as great as I had anticipated. Because the style is oversized, the arms kept falling off my shoulder. The material just didn't feel as nice as I expected. I did end up wearing it twice (a day on the boat, and once to work with a white tank underneath). Great dress, just wasn't totally to expectations! If you're in between sizes, err on the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Too much fabric for petite frame
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 & petite/athletic and this just didn't work well on me. The fabric swallowed my frame. Looked great in my taller friend who tried it on though!
carefree and fun

links_reviews_title: Did not live up to my expections...
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a potential swim cover up for a family vacation to FL. The material was super thick. The fit was not flattering on my body, I decided to not even to use as a cover up. Would maybe look better with a white tank under as pictured on the model, but for me it wasn't worth keeping.
Too much fabric too complicated.

I wanted to love this, and in fact, ordered a 48 at first since it was the only size available and I wanted it so bad for vacation. When it arrived, it was ENORMOUS. I sent it back and was able to get a size 42. It fit perfectly, the only problem is, it's completely see through. You'll need a full slip or tank top and slip to wear it. Makes a perfect beach cover-up, but I intended to wear it out for dinner.
Loose and boho fit

links_reviews_title: Cute knot, high slit for work
links_reviews_text: I found the large too big, medium fit perfectly. I liked the subtle asymmetrical hem and knot. Slit caught the wind a little and showed more leg than planned

Loved this skirt on me as It was form fitting and hit the right places, although It did run a tad bit large , I had rented the large and XL as a backup and I honestly could have done M/L! It was great for a fun night out

I love the look of this skirt, but I couldn't believe how big this runs! I think a small would fit me perfectly, but I typically wear a 4 or 6 so I thought a medium would fit, but it is very large. I hope to re-order in a small.
Loved that it had a couture style but effortlessly easy material. Slips on and off. I didn't find the front too revealing for work. When I sat down it was a bit high but not too much.
I ended up buying this skirt because it was just so comfy. It runs a wee bit large, but that just meant it felt great for an everyday skirt that I could just feel nice it. Love it!

links_reviews_title: Could be nice for going out... not for work
links_reviews_text: The slit is way too short for work--may not seem like it at first but once you start walking around, it shows a lot of leg. I didn't listen to the sizing down recommendations in other reviews, because I have pretty curvy hips and thought hey, if it's a little loose that could make it more work appropriate. Wrong! I had to pin it at the waist because it was so loose, and the extra room around my legs made the slit situation worse as I walked. I could see myself renting this in a small instead of medium for a night out, but I would never wear this to work again.

links_reviews_title: So close, but still too tight
links_reviews_text: I have a bit of a tummy, so I was hoping the wrapping feature would hide it. Sadly, my hips were my downfall this time. So, while my tummy was hidden by the great wrap, my weird, pointy hips were on display. And I couldn't wear my Spanx because the slit was too high. But if you don't have those problems (pointy hips or the need to wear Spanx), then try this skirt!
Too big.
This skirt runs large and I'm large on the bottom. It has a split that opens too wide showing too much thigh for the workplace.

links_reviews_title: Waist was loose and falling down
links_reviews_text: Ran big. Would have liked it otherwise. Asymmetrical cut was fun.

links_reviews_title: it was too large to wear
links_reviews_text: Too large

Material is stretchy, and perhaps is supposed to be worn at the hips. I rented this thinking it would fit at the waist like a pencil skirt, but this was not the case. I'm 5'3 118# with a 24" waist. I was swimming in this. Had to return.

This is super cute if you are standing still. If you walk or sit at all, the tulip-like skirt will open wide. I wore it to work without tights, and I felt extremely uncomfortable all day. BUT, I kind of love it, so I'm going to wear it with opaque black tights, and I think it'll be much more appropriate then.

I tried on the Small in the store and felt like it was rather large, ordered it in and XS and was still way too big. I would size down twice if you could to be able to wear this dress. I never wore it because it was falling off my body :(
Feels like yoga pants material, I'm not ever smaller than a small but I'd definitely do XS next time

This is a fun skirt, the knotting and the slit make it special and also flattering. The slit is quite high, though, and I showed a bit too much leg for my comfort at work. The material and construction felt a bit cheap.
Too large waist.

Great skirt, liked it so much I bought it! Twist detail in the front is an interesting detail and very forgiving! Versatile, can see wearing it to a lot of different work events. I'm curvy, ran tts for me.

links_reviews_title: I hope to rent it another time in a smaller size.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear the skirt. It was too large for me. I'm a size 12. I didn't exchange it due to the stress of the holiday season ... too much going on. I would consider getting it in a smaller size in the future. It's super cute!

links_reviews_title: Should have read the other reviews
links_reviews_text: It fits pretty large. I'm returning it immediately for the medium and hoping that will help. I was going to wear it with a cute top for Christmas dinner, but I'll just have to figure something else out.
Skirt is so cute but runs large!

links_reviews_title: Simple black skirt with a twist
links_reviews_text: Skirt is cute fit is good through hips but the waist is a bit loose plan to use a belt to cinch it in some.
Nice design but the size was too large
Really large had to pin it

I love the design and the look. It is way too big though. I'm 5'2" with a 24 waist and this sat on my hips and went down to my mid calves. When I began to walk, the skirt would slide down from my hip. XS usually will fit me, but this one was just way too big. Too bad because the skirt is way cute.
Length was a bit long

links_reviews_title: Great black skirt with just enough interest to make it unique!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was a great piece to pair with your work wardrobe. I liked the asymmetrical hem, and the knot in front was particularly forgiving to some figure flaws (just be careful if you are not comfortable showing some leg--it does split when you walk/cross them). It did run a little large for me though.
Very cute on. Material is a little stretchy so very comfortable. Work appropriate but also good for going out after. Overall, a winner!
I love the style of this skirt, but way too big. Should have ordered a medium. Will try again!

links_reviews_title: I didnt end up wearing this because it was a big too large
links_reviews_text: Runs large. Normally a medium to large depending on designer and couldve used a small in this.
Waist was a bit big and kept falling down--but it is a very cute and sassy stable for work. Will likely rent again in a M.
Stylish. Somewhat thin fabric. Very figure accommodating. Stretchy fabric, flattering.
Runs big
overall a cute top but does run a little snug across the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Cute but you need an assistant to get on/off
links_reviews_text: I liked the color and overall look of the short, but you need someone to help with the buttons in back. I felt super claustrophobic that I couldn't get it off myself!

links_reviews_title: Pretty print, nice details, but shapeless
links_reviews_text: The fabric on this top is beautiful and it has really nice stitching and detail. Only issue is that it's a bit shapeless and wide on bottom. I definitely should have sized down but still I don't think this is a fitted top, although you could tuck it in to make it look that way. Overall it's meh but if the silhouette is a good one for you - go for it! I got it NWT and it's very nice quality.
Beautiful silk spring dress from DVF. Pretty floral pattern. Light, easy to wear. It shows cleavage on me, so I wore a camisole under it.
Loved this wrap dress! I can wear a 6 or 8 and was happy to have the 8 for a little extra room. Bright, fun prints on the dress.
This dress is super cute and fun. The print was too busy for me personally, but it didn't stop me from wearing it out couple of times. Good comfy weekend piece, nothing special.
It's a must rent! Perfect fit and flowy. Loved it!
Perfect for a summer wedding. Super comfortable and flattering with ladies with a little waist. Would recommend going braless with just pasties if you can swing it

links_reviews_title: HH lived the fit. As usual with DVF.
links_reviews_text: Loved loved it. Bought it

The pattern was amazingly beautiful. There are many things I loved about this dress. However I feel like with many true wrap dresses it always feels like it's about to burst open and I was constantly retying it. I also used tape but still felt like my bra was visible a lot.
I loved this dress! The wrap didn't expose leg so it was great for work. Did have to pin the cleavage though.

Absolutely loved this dress and will rent again. Flattering, fun, easy to throw on. Material is very light weight which makes the dress perfect for hot weather. Only complaint is when outside and windy the front blew up ... just like with any wrap dress - but especially because of the lightweight material.

On account of being a wrap-around dress, it is form fitting and flattering. It's colorful and perfect for hot summer days. Just don't stand near ventilation or you will have a Marylin scene. I ended up buying it - couldn't say goodbye :)
This is a great dress. Fits beautifully. Very pretty and would love to wear it again.
Great print and fit. What others say about it bring thin is true. I carried static guard in my purse. Fun dress.
Loved the dress and print, very cute, flattering and comfortable. However do NOT wear in an area with any wind, the dress floats up and out very easily. Otherwise loved wearing it

links_reviews_title: Super Fun but not for a windy day
links_reviews_text: I liked how fun the pattern and sleeves were. It is cut lower than the other DVF dresses in this style and on a windy day it took a lot of diligence to keep the top and bottom from flying off to the side.
Great wrap dress! Comfy and cute!

I have never received so many compliments on a dress before. The pattern was gorgeous and colorful. Highly recommend this dress. Only challenge is for big busts--had to work at keeping the top closed.

Wore this for a "tiki chic" themed rehearsal dinner and felt great! Very flattering wrap, can wear regular bra. Shoulders a bit fluttery for my style but got over it. Could have worn a 6 but was fine with the 5
I love this dress. The length of it, the pattern and the material. The only thing I wasn't impressed with was how low cut it is and I didn't love the butterfly sleeves

The fabric is Silky and light, the print is beautiful, very feminine. I'm 34D and it wrapped perfect around my chest, no need for undershirt. The waist line is a little bit high, I can see this a problem for tall girls. I'm only 5'1 so it was perfect. I would rent it again in the spring.
I liked the dress it was flowy and fun but nothing super special and I didn't think the pattern was all that flattering on me.
I really liked the stress. It was perfect for work, and felt really airy. One note that the large busted will need to wear a shirt under it, as with most dresses of this style.
I got SO many compliments on this dress! Super comfortable and easy to wear!! Can't wait to rent another one of hers!!!
Wore to work and the dress was super comfy. I only gave it 3 stars bc I just thought the colors were TOO bold. But it was a cute dress and I would recommend.

I'm a huge fan of the wrap dress and DVF is always a favorite. It's a beautiful lightweight (silk maybe) in the skirt and stretchy at the top. I love everything about this dress and may never send it back!
Wish I owned this. Perfection by DVF

This dress was so beautiful and flattering. I paired with another RTR Unlimited item, this red Rebecca Minkoff clutch for a date night with my husband. I loved this dress because I am typically a 6-8 in my waist but larger in my top. This dressed allowed me to cover up the girls but still create a nice silhouette to show off my figure.

This dress is comfortable and so fun to wear! Very highly recommended! The fit and flare style hit my waist at its smallest part and the sleeves were feminine while also covering my "not so young" upper arms.

Perfect for an outdoor wedding and dancing the night away. Minor gapping at bust but that's fixable. Overall I got compliments all night long and felt absolutely gorgeous in this. Would definitely rent this and other DVF styles again.
Na
Perfect fit , light and airy , perfect for work and dinner date after. Love this dress, so bright and cheery!
Such a fun summer dress
So many compliments on this versatile dress. Wore this for work-could easily have transitioned to after work drinks/dinner. The fabric and fit is amazing.

links_reviews_title: Not good for a breezy day!
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was great and was perfectly appropriate for work. Was comfortable and not too short. Only issue was it kept blowing up in the breeze at the slightest wind.
This dress is so universal you can dress it up or down!

Loved this dress. So comfortable and the wrap style made the fit versatile. A little low cut but it was fine and I didn't need to wear a bra. Really colorful and vibrant, got a lot of compliments, and was really fun to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Lighweight DVF wrap. Fits nicely and true to size. But too short-waisted for me.
links_reviews_text: This is a lightweight DVF wrap dress that fits true to size. Since I have a larger chest and wanted more coverage on top, I ordered one size up (size 12) from my usual RTR size of 10 (for reference, I am 5'8'; 156 lbs; 36C), which worked well. Otherwise, it fits true to size. This dress is 100% silk, with the skirt and the sleeves made out of woven silk with no stretch and the body made out of jersey silk with some stretch. No lining. The sleeves were surprisingly billowy. I ended up not wearing this dress because it was too short-waisted for me (e.g. the waist of the dress was higher than my natural waist) and I couldn't move the belt lower because the fabric changes from red to green at the waist seam.
Dress was true to size. Very cute and perfect fit.

Breezy, light dress that was perfect for work. I have a bit of a long torso so I felt the wrap tie was a little off compared to where the pattern changed, but other than that I loved it. Got a bunch of compliments and felt comfortable in it all day.

links_reviews_title: This dress is versatile, feminine and flattering!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfection. I wore it to a charity event, to church and to work. The print is beautiful and bold but doesn't wear you. The bodice is traditional DVF silk knit and the sleeves, skirt and belt are silk charmeuse like a Herms scarf. It's definitely a beautiful departure from the traditional DVF wrap dress, which is always a good fashion choice in its own right. This runs slightly larger than DVF wrap dresses, which run a full size small. I am a true 6 and got an 8 in this and could have worn a 6. That said, if I were larger chested the 8 would have been fine. I'd advise a skinny tank or nude spanx underneath simply because the white flowers are a bit sheer. I will definitely rent this one again!
I wore this to an important business meeting. Love the colors and fit. A bit low cut so a cami was a must.

Seriously contemplated buying these shorts, I wore them non stop the entire month. They're so cute, extremely comfortable and just perfect for hot Houston! I will be renting these again. Fit true to size! I can't believe I didn't take a better picture in them...
Comfortable shorts. Just the right length. Soft fabric.
These shorts are shorter than I'd normally wear but I feel like a million bucks in them. They're so comfortable and hella cute.
Some stretch- very comfortable and not too short.

links_reviews_title: Such a good pair of shorts and staple item that I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Loved these shorts and the fit. Highwaisted, short but not too short where you feel like you are hanging out. Will go with so many things this summer and excited to own them now!
I thought these shorts were super cute but sadly they went up as I walked, which prevented me from wearing it multiple times.

links_reviews_title: Love them so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually borderline 6 or 8 depending on the brand but the 29 fit PERFECTLY! There was a bit of give due to sizing up but it made them all the more comfortable to wear around Disney all day!

Decent shorts, not 100% there for me - but I'm still wearing them. I like the A-line shape of the shorts. Not too short - but do wish the length was a bit longer... I found they tend to ride up while walking, probably because of the combo of A-line & short-ish length
I wore them so much I just decided to buy them.

Flattering (I'm pretty picky about shorts) with a relaxed fit. They only had 31 (my usual is 29) so it's a bit big on me for what should be a higher-waisted short but I didn't mind the slouchy, loose fit. I didn't have black denim shorts and I live in denim shorts all summer so I snatched these up since they were pretty inexpensive. Great for lounging, running errands, hanging out on vacation. A little more put together than all the denim cutoffs I already have.
Fit comfortably. A little loser than I would have liked in the thighs but still liked them overall.
Loved these shorts, but they do run a tad bit large. They have a good bit of stretch as well, so I would suggest sizing down. I ordered a 26, but I feel that the 25 would have fit better.
Not too short and a relaxed fit!
amazing
Wasn't sure what size to order so I went up a size but they're a little too big. Love the style and fit i just should've gone with a size 29
This is such a comfy jumpsuit, and so cool! I got a million compliments
Paired with white converse and wore all day biking around town. Very comfy and different style. Wore to several Art Basel Miami shows and felt great about it.
Funky but fun jumpsuit! Liked that there were snaps on the side so you could adjust the waist.

links_reviews_title: Was nervous about this but came out great!
links_reviews_text: With wider hips and a fuller bust I was worried this would hit in all the wrong places. But with two buttons on the side you're able to adjust as needed! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because it wrinkles easily.

Is it the most flattering thing I ever rented? No. Is it so comfortable I spent all day in it? Yes! It's lightweight, breathable, and has two extra buttons on the sides, so you can adjust the waist. I normally wear L to XL, and I got the XL to be more roomy, and I'm happy I did. Go up a size for comfort, keep to your usual or go down one if you want it to hug you more.
Comfortable and exactly what you want it to be! Easy to get in and out of and the crotch isn't at your knees!
Loved this jumpsuit! So cute and comfy, and actually really flattering. I'm usually 10-12 so if you're in between sizes I would size up. Cute print

I think I got more compliments on this than anything I've ever rented from RTR. The fabric is super soft and lightweight, the length was perfect for my 5'5" frame. The waist has adjustable snaps to give you the right fit. Debating keeping this one forever!

Lightweight denim, flattering, true to size, easy to get on and off unlike alot of other jumpsuits, this is one of my favorite items so far. It does wrinkle, unfortunately but don't let that stop you.
Fits in all the right places. Wore it out for drinks with a pair of wedges. Soft and comfy, buttons adjustable on the side to make the fit more flattering
Didn't fit me well because it was so long in the crotch. However, my friend with a larger chest wore it and filled it out better so it didnt look like such a boxy unflattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Very chic, great fit (not too tight, not too baggy). #mechanicchic
links_reviews_text: Very chic, great fit (not too tight, not too baggy). #mechanicchic
Probably wore 10x.

I loved this jumpsuit! It was so easy to wear and looks so stylish and put together without any effort at all. I wore it with heels and a blazer for dinner, and sandals for a casual lunch. I would've kept it if it wasn't so expensive to buy.

Overall I really love this jumpsuit- I think it runs a little big but the bagginess is kind of what makes it cool. However, the crotch hangs pretty low which looked a little funny- but could be I need the Small or my torso is just short! Really great quality of fabric and great for the summer. Wrinkles realllly easily but great for a casual office look!
Loved the loose fit even though the inseam was a bit long. I rolled the sleeves and bottom hem.
Loved everything about this jumpsuit. I wore it with wedges for work and sandals for dinner. Very comfortable, easy to put on, and material is really soft. Highly recommend!
Fits true to size and is really comfortable. It's baggy so if you aren't into that look I wouldn't recommend it.
A great weekend pick

Such a bummer this didn't fit. The material and style are so cute, but the torso is too long and the belt doesn't adjust enough to make up for the extra material if you want to make the top portion billow out more.
This was a great rental. I thought I might look like an insane painter but it worked. Would rent again. Fits well, is supremely comfortable, has deep pockets.
This was fun and easy to wear. It was big all around but not too big where it looked silly. I rolled up the bottoms twice bc it hit my ankles. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is effortlessly chic. Wear with sneakers or as a coverup to the beach!
links_reviews_text: The site snaps definitely help make the jumpsuit take shape, if that is what you are looking for. Either way, it is a real dream of a jumpsuit!
I wore this for a daytime party in Miami. It was comfy and fun and I got lots of compliments. It has snaps on the side to cinch the waist, which I used in order to give some added shape. Loved it.

Jumpers are the best because you just throw them on and it's a whole dang outfit. I wore this jumper 4 times in a week and a half because I felt SO cool in it and it was so so easy to style. Very comfortable, and easy to get out of when you have to pee.

links_reviews_title: A romper you can groove in
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an outdoor concert and was able to bust all my dance moves very comfortably. I loved that there wasn't the usual romper diaper problem (too much sag) and it was ok for my short torso! I would rent again.
Got compliments, probably my best rental to date.
Cool outfit and super different for me. I really enjoyed wearing this piece

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because I looked ridiculous
links_reviews_text: The fit was off for my 5'4" frame with short legs. Probably better for taller, straighter bodies
Loved this jumpsuit. It's so comfy and super cute. Very friendly for long torsos.

Ultimate test: my 17 year old daughter, my 20 year old daughter and my husband all loved it. I am built with a long body and shorter legs, so when I read it was long in the torso, I actually got excited. And it is long in the torso, but has these cool snaps to cinch in the waist with 2 different settings. I wore an XLR because I am curvy and like the slightly baggier jump suit look with my curves giving it shape. This worked perfectly for that. The only challenge with long body short legs, is the leg length on this, which is awkward for 5'5" person. I rolled up, perf for summer, but I feel I look a bit out of proportion when I have them down at full length. Great rent!
The torso was waaaaay too long for me. Was swimming in it. Definitely a no-go for my 5'6", short-torso, pear body shape.
Great material. Boxy and unflattering fit
It's so cute and comfy but like it's not flattering. I have bigger boobs and it was right on my boobs and didn't fall on me correctly. The butt was saggy.

I thought this was going to be a sturdy flight suit, but it turns out the fabric is pretty thin and more like linen. I have a pear shape, so I'm a 6/8 pant size and a S/XS on top - which isn't a great combo for this since it was too tight in the hips/thighs and baggy in the top. The pattern/dye is interesting and overall a lot lighter color than I expected.

links_reviews_title: I wore it three times - once to a fundraiser I was hosting, once on a plane, and once for a day out
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and very easy to wear! I got so many compliments. I rented it on a whim as a backup for a cocktail fundraiser I was hosting, and decided to wear it in the end with heeled sandals. It was easy to dress up. Although in some photos I noticed not all angles were equally good, it was flattering and made me feel great! I then wore it to fly home, and the next day for a day out at Home Depot and a visit to the botanic gardens. Highly versatile, and probably good for almost anyone. I usually shy away from jumpsuits because I have a very small waist and large hips, but this was great!
I rolled the sleeves and cuffed the pants because they were both a little long, but super comfortable for a day on the go.
Great side detailing.
This top is just ok. Fit is good, I like the details on the side. Nothing special, but a good top for weekend wear.

I ordered a size down in this because I wanted a more fitted look and was happy with the fit. I have a long torso, and it was a little bit shorter than I prefer, so I work a top underneath. It's lightweight and comfortable. Nice color and cute detail on the side with the buttons.
I liked but didn't love this sweater. The colors are fantastic and it has a fun stripe and button detail down the side. Fabric is good quality and medium weight. Fits true to size. Worth a rent!

links_reviews_title: Cute and high quality, great for work S
links_reviews_text: TTS, no issues. Soft wool, not itchy at all. Love Tory!
Nice sweater for work. A little short. Buttons on side are cute. Kind of thin

I didn't realize there was a button detail on one side - really cute and I got tons of compliments on this sweater! Great for business casual and casual Fridays! Just enough pink to be girly, but not overly.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but nothing overly special about it.
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this top for an afternoon out and about. The quality was nice and the color was great for the fall.
Love it!! Fits great and received tons of compliments on it. Especially love the button detail on the side.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater but not right for me
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this sweater. It's really well made, and the colors are vibrant. The fabric is soft, and I loved the styling, especially the touch of the gold buttons up the side. However, I prefer wearing sweaters with a looser, more casual fit. If I rent this again, I'll try sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Nice detailing with buttons up one side, unusual color combo, many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Snug across the chest, the boxy fit was forgiving at waist. Excellent quality knit, warm but not thick. Brass Tory Burch buttons run up the left side from hem to armpit.

Fit great on my frame (petite, larger chest). Fitted without being tight or clingy. Great quality. Button detail on the side a nice touch. Not a dressy date night type shirt, more casual and low key. Only complaint is that it was a bit shorter than I'd prefer. Kept tugging it down, ended up wearing a black cami underneath which worked to make it the length that I prefer.
Nice quality. Button detail is cute. Long for me in the sleeves and arm holes. Wish there were petite options.
Loved the fit and the look. Not just a boring sweater. It is thin.

This is a fairly lightweight sweater that actually feels pretty warm. Because of the lightweight material, you can see through it a little, so mind the colors on your base layer.
