The buttons on the side buckled strangely, so the sweater didn't hang too well on me, but it wasn't bad either. I wore it with a shirt one day and over a button down/under a blazer another. The second was my preference. The sweater is a tad itchy.
This knit was lovely, colors are beautifully muted, and the side ribbon/buttons are a fun, sporty addition. I wish it was maybe 2-3 inches longer - then I would have rated it 5 stars
Really enjoyed this one. It was a bit on the thin side which was nice for early fall, and classic colors, which I always love. Super soft too.
Nice true to size fit. Slimming look.
Loved this sweater. great cut and colors. The stripe down the side with buttons adds a nice flair. Would rent this again and maybe even buy it. Fits true to size.
Super comfy with 3 button detail on one side.
fit was great, so many compliments
I loved the tie die look although I had a hard time picking a top. As you can see I went with a white sweater (yawn). In any case they were comfy jeans and I wore them all weekend long.

These weren't my fave rental but they worked out. The fit is snug in the waste and loose in the legs. They were almost impossible to get on at the beginning of the night and almost slipped off by the end of the night.
So flattering, definitely made my legs look slimmer and the coolest change up from my usual jeans and crop top going out outfit. Loved these. Almost bought them

Loved these jeans! They were really fun and comfortable to wear to a concert. I have hips and a butt so I am always nervous about jeans, but these fit me perfectly! I did size up, but I think a size down would of fit me as well.

These pants are amazing! They are definitely true to size and a straight leg - I'm just shy of 5'5 so they hit me right at my ankle which looks great w sandals or low top sneakers. I found them to be super comfortable and I got loads of compliments! Will be holding onto these for a while.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. I love the artsy look of these jeans. You can dress them up or down.
links_reviews_text: It was a perfect fit...although I probably could have gone one size smaller and still been okay.

links_reviews_title: I haven't returned these yet and I may definitely buy them.
links_reviews_text: Honestly these jeans are so much fun and very cool. I've never felt more on trend. I have. Very narrow waist and very wide hips and this size fit me perfectly for that slightly loose mom look. Got so many compliments!
Wore these on a random Friday and then to a birthday party. I got SO many compliments. Seriously considering buying these!

links_reviews_title: I NEVER WANT TO RETURN THESE!
links_reviews_text: Might be might favorite summer pair of jeans EVER! So flattering and comfy and so many compliments. I love the fit and love the tie dye!

links_reviews_title: Get ready to be a howered with compliments
links_reviews_text: Holy cow these jeans are as cute as they appear online. They are definitely a cropped jean, so as someone who is 5'7", the jeans didn't reach my ankles. Factor this in. Overall the fit and the look are dynamite. If they were a full-length Jean, I would defs buy.
Looks absolutely nothing like the stock photo. Stiff, so stretch and hideous. Very unflattering. If you're skinny, these MIGHT be cool.

I wore these to work and then all weekend around town, running errands and playing with my daughter. I felt very on trend when I walked into the office and a young hip designer was wearing a similar pair of jeans, so that made me feel great. These fit pretty well, however I'm a little thicker around my waist and the jeans were pretty snug in that regard without stretch. They also did a kind of weird crotch thing, but I think as I wore them more that went away.
I got my regular size but I would size up if you have thighs!
Great fit. Super comfortable and so on trend this spring.
Super comfy and lots of fun. Felt like a California girl in these tie dye jeans.

i wish i could've kept these forever - they are the coolest jeans i've ever worn. a bit baggy in the crotch, would consider sizing down as they stretching a bit after wearing. will rent again, love love love them

I LOVED these jeans. Would buy right now if I weren't pregnant and could still get them on. These jeans dress up and down and have a flattering high waisted cut. Dreaming of the day they'll fit again.
Nice jean fabric. Somewhat cropped regular waist but ran in the tight side due to no give in material. Ordering the next size up. Maybe baggy but more comfortable
Really cute jeans, but they were so small! I usually wear a 10/12 and I couldn't fit into either of them. Super cute but just beware.
While they were a little larger around the waist they were so comfortable. I loved these jeans. I received so many compliments and wore with a T-shirt and denim jacket

links_reviews_title: LOVE THESE PANTS, so fun and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fitted waist and boyfriend style baggie in the legs just as pictured. I loved these pants! I am a consistent Size 6 and the 44R was perfect.
Boxy fit but flattering
HUGE in the legs, TINY in the waist.

I LOVED these jeans but I just couldn't get them buttoned and I'm so bummed. They actually fit perfectly everywhere but the waist (once I wiggled them past my hips). If you don't have a small waist or hourglass figure, I would order a size or two up!

links_reviews_title: Did not fit right, made me very square
links_reviews_text: tight at the waist

I wore these to both work and a party, with different tops. Based on other reviews, I sized up. I would not recommend. They were very large. If I would have gone with my normal size, they would have been baggy cute, not baggy falling off.
IF you have and athletic body (no narrow waist) you should size up. the pants has some stretch on hips and rest of the pants but no on the waist

links_reviews_title: Fun easy to mix with solid top.
links_reviews_text: Baggy
I'm between sizes but these fit like they were a 4 sizes too small. I could get them up and on but there was no way they were going to get buttoned. Will maybe try another size another time
For loose in hips and thighs. Surprised it was tight in the waist-my smallest part!

These could be amazing but if you have any butt at all, beware of these creating a terrible cameltoe. Even when pulled below the natural waist, they ride up. Such a shame because they are cute everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Nice design, but there is no give for curves
links_reviews_text: I generally wear a size 10 pants, 8 dress. I sized up to a size 12 by the comments Suggestion and it still did not fit. So, I did not wear them. From the comments these might be true to size in the smaller sizes and run smaller in the larger sizes.
These cute button fly jeans run small.
Really cute, will rent again.
Roomy, comfortable high waisted jeans. Since I'm short, the length was like a regular pair of jeans.

These pants are definitely not the best if you have a longer torso. I rented my usual size, but unfortunately they were about an inch too short to reach my natural waist... it made buttoning the top button quite the challenge. Once they are on they are fine, except a slight wedgie when sitting. Overall, would not rent again.
Loved these pants, they do run big though. I could have definitely sized down to a 6.
Love them but they run SMALLLLL. great (but stiff) denim. No stretch. However- beautiful pattern and look. Def size up.

I wore this jacket to an out of town work conference, and I was in love! It is so warm, fits perfectly, and looks/feels very high quality. Navy & black is a fave color combo of mine, and the elbow patch and trim gives it a professional flare. I typically wear a 6 in blazers, but went with the 8 and it fit like a glove. Was definitely sad to return this beauty.
This was a really high quality blazer. It fit great and was perfect for a day in the office.
Veronica Beard jackets are great, and like others, this jacket does not disappoint. The brown buttons and ultra suede elbow patches are fun and different. Looks good open or closed.

This blazer, like all of Veronica Beard's blazers, is amazing! I wore it three times in two weeks -- once with a VB Dickey that I own, and twice without. It's gorgeous either way, and works with so many colors, since it's black, blue, and brown -- I loved it with mustard. Fits true to size and the attention to detail is awesome -- love the buttons and suede elbow patches/pocket trim. Rent this beauty!
I loved the fit of this blazer. I got so many compliments on it. In the future I would wear it with a turtle neck since the collar of the blazer was itchy.
Didnt fit

links_reviews_title: I am in LOVE with this jacket
links_reviews_text: It's going to be very hard to send this back. Fit was perfect. Like other reviews the sleeves were quite long on me - you can either push them up or fold up though. I've worn to a fancy country club cocktail party and to work. Lots of compliments. My husband is on board with me buying this - ha! If he knew the price tag!
Fit was flattering and not too bulky. The leather elbow patches add a nice sporty flair to the jacket.

links_reviews_title: Duh, it's veronica beard. it's perfect
links_reviews_text: Fit worked for even my large shoulders, could button or not with comfort. Just loved this piece.

links_reviews_title: Ordered it for work with dress pants but wore it weekend with jeans, too.
links_reviews_text: Arrived with tags on! Love that. Thick rich fabric, nice elbow patches. Sleeves were long on me but I rolled them.

links_reviews_title: A bit more constricting than other VB blazers
links_reviews_text: I rented this for every day and I felt it was too snug. It is wool and it is slightly scratchy so you definitely want to wear neck coverage underneath it and it was just too snug in the sleeves/back to be comfortable. I generally wear a size 4 in VB blazers but this was not roomy. I sent it back without wearing. It's very cute, I personally will size up if I rent again. And things don't generally irritate me but this felt itchy, but nothing a collar + sleeves would not take care of.
True to size and is a great style. Not too frilly but enough with the bow and drape at the back to make it interesting. I am 5.2 so midi is a little long on me but feel like this works.

I wore this to the horse races in Miami. A day centered in fashion- this dress was perfect. Colorful and whimsical. Only issue was that it came very wrinkled. I attempted to steam it. No one really noticed. I felt comfortable all day in it. Many compliments. Neck can be tied many ways. There is a slit in the chest area but was no issue for me

Fun dress. Looks better with pumps or heeled sandals than with boots. You can wear the bow in front or back. I maybe could have gone down to a 4 which might have been a bit more flattering since it's also long on me.

links_reviews_title: Prettier in person than in photos
links_reviews_text: This dress has a subtle lilac hue that really elevates the look. I don't think it photographs well. It is so much prettier in person. I wore it to a conference in Miami day into night. Incredibly comfortable.
Not going crazy over it, but it was good for an all day conference. A little tight around the waist.

Wore to a conference in Charleston, SC. Was perfect for 70 degree weather outside and still cute with a long cardigan inside. I had the neck bow tied in the back and pulled outside the cardigan. Lots of compliments from strangers and super comfortable.

I'm 29 weeks pregnant and rented this dress for work and date night. I got so many compliments! One thing I didn't know when I rented this dress that it zips up on the side. I thought it was a stretchy material I could pull up. The zip made it tight on my bust but the slit in the chest was modest so it was still okay for work and I wasn't showing to much cleavage/tits falling out. If I wasn't so busty then this dress would be perfect all around.

What a great dress. Super comfortable and easy to travel in. Added a sweater for OH weather. I would say it was slightly on the larger side, but not too big. Stick with your normal size and you should be good. Great quality
Super fun. Loved to twirl! So many compliments.
I loved this dress! It's comfortable and flowy but looks beautiful! It has an interesting necklace and back detail. Perfect for fall or spring with the bright lavender and brown/navy color schemes.

What a fun dress! It's flowy, has a great pattern with awesome colors and you can tie the tie in back or in front. I received so many compliments on this dress. Dress is lined and looked great on. As other renters mentioned, it is a little tight across the chest....and I am not big busted by any means. Would rent again and highly recommend.

My favorite RTR dress so far! I wore this work and received more compliments in the first hour than I have in the past year! The dress is a bit of a chore to get into but once it is on it's comfortable and fun to wear! I opted to wear the bow in the front and a cardigan to hide my arms. Love it! I will definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Love it. Has some holes in the bust area & rent the runway took care of it
links_reviews_text: Very nice fit If u are busty- bra might show on the bust

links_reviews_title: This Kate Spade NY is feminine with a trendy edge
links_reviews_text: Wore to work meetings during the day and it was a perfect transitional piece to flow through to my evening with the girls. The only surprise was the slit revealing cleavage that I hadnt noticed when ordering might not be suitable for all workplaces. Overall, a beautiful dress! 57 140lbs 36c Size 4R
The dress was flowy and very easy to wear. I got lots of compliments at work.
Interesting neckline and draping on the back. Unique pattern.

Dress runs true to size - bustier girls might find the top snug. A lot of fabric in the skirt makes for great movement. The high tie neck and long bow is a great detail and makes the sleeveless dress more work appropriate. Would be great for a derby party, garden party or bridal shower.

If the dress was easier to get into, I'd give it 5 stars. I loved the style and the material was luxurious. The colors and patterns were feminine and perfect to wear to an afternoon graduation party as well as to work. I liked the scarf neckline detail but chose to wear my hair down, thus not showing it off too much. The 14R fit well though getting into it wasn't easy. Doing a side zipper alone can be near impossible, so I actually opted to leave it zipped then gently ease it on over my head. This method required massive flattening of my breasts to fit it. However, once everything was in place, the dress looked great. This method of putting it on also negated the confusion about arm holes that some people noted in their reviews. I was very happy with the rental.
Fit great. Paired with a denim jacket.
There's so much fabric on this dress that you kind of get lost in it. It didn't give that flowy look I was hoping for and was too long to be flattering on an average height, curvy girl.

links_reviews_title: The movement of this dress is so die for!
links_reviews_text: It is pretty tight when zipping past the rib cage area but once you get it zipped you won't notice it, it's just getting the zipper up that can be tricky. I also wore this piece a couple of times because it was just too pretty and classy not to!

This dress ran small. The print is lovely and the back is interesting, but I felt the drapes and the tie were a bit much for everyday at the office. The waist was just a touch too high to be truly flattering. Overall, it was fine, but not my favorite Kate Spade.

The contrasting colors are really eye catching. It's a flattering and forgiving fit. I paired with a wide belt and camel wedge espadrilles. Wore several time for different occasions. Would rent again.
Dress fit perfectly. Wear a thin belt to style. Perfect for work or date night. Received lots of compliments.
I should have ordered the smaller size but wore it any way. I love the print! Great for work. Feminine and comfortable

Comfortable to wear, received several compliments. A bit tricky figuring out how to put it on (unzip, step in through the unzipped area, then pull the arm hole over you head and on). I also sat on the ties at one one point and that made me feel like I was choking, so watch out

I loved this dress! Got a million complements, even from strangers on the street. I wore the tie in the front because I wore this to work and wanted a blazer to make it a little less casual. The tie was weird in the back with the blazer on. But I think I like it better with the tie in the front anyway. I'm 5'9 and the hem hit me just slightly lower than on the model, so I'd your average/short this dress might be an awkward length for you. Then again, if you're really short it'll probably be a moxi. I love. Def want to rent this one again
The dress was super cute however it just didn't fit over my bust area. I probably could size up but it fits so well through the waist and hips.
The whole dress was a bit too big, but I was able to wear it to work with a blazer. Would definitely size down if I wore again.

links_reviews_title: Sadly not a good fit for me
links_reviews_text: So disappointed with this label. But the fabric quality is undeniable. Just can't find a dress that flatters me right now so sadly it went unworn.
Such a cute dress that I wore to work and received a lot of complements!! Tight in the chest area though so a little uncomfortable. Could've gone up a size to fit better in the chest
Great out, gorgeous pattern, got tons of compliments
There is a side zipper for this dress. I'm a DD & the large would not zip up. Couldn't wear it, but it was very pretty. Such a bummer #sigh
Tight around the bust but i am currently breastfeeding so my bust is larger than usual. The material helps to camouflage any body imperfects.

This dress fit perfectly. I wore it for a work and a post-work event. It was perfect, the right mix of casual and conservative for both. The dress is light and handled 80 degree weather and didn't wrinkle when I threw a rain jacket over it. I got lots of compliments and felt very pretty and sophisticated all day long!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it as it was just too much for my frame
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but it was just too much for me

links_reviews_title: lots of compliments. paired it w navy blazer for work
links_reviews_text: little tight
Nothing spectacular.
Did not wear. Too much fabric and way too long for my height. Made me look frumpy
It fit perfectly and I got a TON of compliments anytime I work it. It was fun to make more casual with white sneakers or dress up with heels.

I love the graphic on this sweatshirt. I'm glad I read the reviews though bc it runs extremely small. I have a t-shirt from this brand in an extra small that fits perfectly, but even in a medium, this was a bit small. Luckily it was fairly thin, so I wore it with a denim jacket over and it was cute styled that way. Didn't love how it looked by itself as it crops at an awkward spot on my waist.

links_reviews_title: Wear for the message not the comfort
links_reviews_text: More of a stiff sweatshirt, but not uncomfortable. I usually wear a S/M and ordered an XL which fit perfectly.
Read everyone's reviews and saw it runs TINY. Normally I'm medium and went with the XXL. Very happy with the fit. (I like a loose fit in general)

links_reviews_title: I was able to hold my cousins twins the day they were born, positive they are full of girl power!
links_reviews_text: I could've worn is an extra large easily but the Large was OK
It's almost a joke how small this runs. I'm usually a small and the large was still a little small for my liking. I actually took it out of the bag and laughed. Cute, but definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fun for running around.
links_reviews_text: Slender in the shoulders and great for a short person.

Very cute shirt, but ran a bit small and pretty cropped. It would've been ok except that the Grl Pwr lettering was all above my boobs, not centered which would've looked better. Just not the right fit for me. Will try to get a large as it's a cute shirt!
Such a fun sweatshirt but ORDER A SIZE OR TWO UP!

I rented this sweatshirt to wear to the DC Women's March. I paired it with a pink puffer coat (also from RTR) and it was perfect the event! I'm only giving it 4 stars because it runs very small (think Asian sizing), was thin and very stiff, like a garment that's been washed too many times. It would not have been warm enough without a layer on underneath.
I like my sweatshirts loose. I am normally a small but rented a XL and was very happy- runs small.

links_reviews_title: I tried not to get any girl power on it!
links_reviews_text: Had a free rental so I figured why not something fun. I had to wear two sizes up- think Asian sizing. A little short waisted for me, too.
Y'all when reviewers say this runs small, believe them! I loved this comfy cozy casual sweatshirt and kept it for a bit, but was surprised when the XL just barely fit perfectly!

Great message, but super small designer sizing. So glad I read prior reviews before ordering (here and otherwise) bc Im 51 and ordered the XXL. Otherwise this would have been a bust, since it just barely hit my hips. Comfy and fun.
Everyday glam

links_reviews_title: Just wanted a cute comfy sweatshirt
links_reviews_text: It was cute but WAY too small. I normally wear an XS and got a small in hopes it would be oversized. I could barely even get it on me it was so small. DEFINITELY size up maybe two sizes
runs crazy small but fir me perfectly.
I wanted to love it, but it was so starchy and so small that I couldn't really even be comfy.

Like the other reviewers mentioned, this runs so incredibly small. I am a size small and have virtually no breasts, and extra large was even a bit more snug than I would like for a sweatshirt. So strange.
This was child-sized. I am usually an XS, got a S to be safe and there's no way I could have gotten this on. I would have needed a large.
This sweater is cute but it's very small and also a crop

links_reviews_title: Going to the gym, the park, and work was more fun in this sweatshirt.
links_reviews_text: It was definitely snug and ran small, but I loved it and even considered buying it.

This is tiny. Like, really tiny. I got the XL because I knew it ran small, but I never expected that it ran quite this small. The fit is a little strange, similar to what putting on a child's size would be.

This is super-cute and I received lots of compliments from young and old alike the two times I wore this. Like other reviewers have remarked, it definitely fits more cropped than your standard sweatshirt.
Love the design
Really cute sweater but the XS was pretty tight in the arms and shoulders which isn't ideal for a sweatshirt. I still wore it but would want a small in the future.
Seemed to be a little on the smaller side. Expected the length to be a little longer. Liked the printed design and color.
This was too small on me so I didn't wear it. Next time I will get a small
Overall I enjoyed the aesthetic of this one, but it was a little bit snug for me in the arms (you couldn't tell by looking thankfully). I enjoyed wearing it out with friends for one day.
Rented the XL based on reviews and it was still too short in the torso. Not sure who exactly this was designed for.

Really cute and casual, wore with high waisted black jeans. A bit cropped but not crazy. I'm like an M/L and had to get the XXL...? Not sure what Rebecca Minkoff is thinking with their size runs but ok.

links_reviews_title: Loved the design of this sweatshirt
links_reviews_text: Runs super small. I'm almost 40 and definitely can't be wearing sweatshirts that don't extend to my waistline.

links_reviews_title: Graphic is more vintage than shown.
links_reviews_text: I actually didn't end up wearing this because I didn't love the colors once seen in person. It's more faded than appears online.
So cute but runs very small and almost fit like a crop top.
Cute but ran small. I'm usually an XS/S and ordered a medium knowing this brand tends to run small and didn't wear it Bc the sleeves were kinda short. Wasn't wowed.
I should have paid attention to other reviews.. this shirt is TINY.
Looked cute, and I ordered a size up from normal. It definitely runs small- as the medium felt somewhat tight and still quite cropped. Cute style, but a little more worn than I expected.
So cute love the message but this was TEENY TINY. I'm 5,8, 140 lbs and it was like a baby sweater. But, still wearing it bc it's adorable
I am a size 4/6 and the M was literally sized for a toddler
Runs small, I would order 1-2 sizes up. It's also short.

links_reviews_title: Wayyyyy smaller than I was expecting!
links_reviews_text: It is a super cute sweater but much much smaller than I thought. Definitely size up!

I could have worn the small or medium, but went with the small since I was wearing high waisted button fly jeans. It was super cute and warm to wear. I wore it to work on casual Friday and received lots of complements. I also wore it out to wineries that weekend.
I sized up in this sweater after reading reviews and glad I did. I think the large would have been too short for my height. Beautiful sweater! But beware of static!

links_reviews_title: Finally, a "chunky" sweater that doesn't make you LOOK chunky!
links_reviews_text: "Chunky", "cozy", and "snuggly" sweaters typically swallow me but this one is absolutely perfect. There is something about the sleeve length and where it hits at the hips that keeps it from being unflattering. Pic shows a more casual look but I also wore it out at night with leather leggings and over the knee boots. I hope I don't regret not buying this.

I loved every second of this sweater. I wore it so many different ways and for different occasions. With jeans and over the knees boots at night, or colored cropped slacks at work! Would totally rent again. Super soft. I technically dozed down, which I thought gave my figure the perfect accent.

Extremely warm. Very heavy knit. Boxy and flowy, oversized arms. Not a "suffocating" turtleneck which is nice. Very classy look with skinny jeans and black boots. This is leopard you can even pull off at work (I did!)
Wore to work event, thanksgiving and birthday party. Great sweater, for anything really. It does shed but I got over it because it was so perfect. Considering purchasing it.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for Thanksgiving day. Very thick and sized a little small. The medium still worked.
links_reviews_text: If you want it to fit like the model I would size up one. I wore this with black cigarette pants and heeled booties for Thanksgiving and it looked great. I will probably wear it one or two more times to work and church with a high waisted A-line black leather skirt and heels. It is a little boxy, but still looked nice.

This sweater is so cozy and comfortable for a cold winter day. I paired with black skinnys and knee high boots. The material is a little itchy and shaggy, but wouldn't deter me from renting again. Leopard print can get real cheesy, but this one is very classy, tasteful and professional looking.

I didn't notice the shedding like many say here but I found it super itchy. I wore a long sleeve under it and it was bearable but I was eager to take it off. I also think it made my arms look bigger than usual and the crop either needed to be shorter or longer. Overall it was cute and good for a once or twice wear
Absolutely loved this sweater! I wore it to work during the week then out for drinks over the weekend! I would beware that the sweater does shed bit but it's not that bad.

links_reviews_title: Cute, Different, but not for Tall Ladies
links_reviews_text: I was able to make this sweater work by wearing it to work with a high waisted skirt. I really liked the idea of wearing with jeans but it was too short and bulky to make it work in that way for a tall gal like myself. It also sheds some. It's definitely unique and very cool....just a little off to make it great.

Very fun animal print sweater I love the slightly boxy fit and three-quarter length sleeves it has a mock turtle neck collar it's very easy to wear I only gave it four stars because it is a bit itchy so beware. Very cute for running around with black fitted pants or jeans I think it runs big I normally wear a large I got a medium in this and it fit well.

Fit was perfect. Very soft, cozy and comfortable. (However, it is a chunky sweater, so not slimming). Does shed A Lot! I wore with faux leather leggings so no problems, but if I had been in any other fabric I would have looked like I was rolling around with my dog.

I liked this a lot but will order a medium or large next time for an oversized look. The sweater is thick and warm but I ended up having to wear a thin shirt under it because the material itched my bare skin.
Probably could have worn a Medium and I wish the sleeves were longer, but overall this is super cozy and comfy. I wore it to work and got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Cute travel sweater, but fuzzies everywhere!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for travel over the holidays. It is a very cute sweater. All that was avalible was a L but wish I had gotten a M. The sweater is cute the only issue was these fuzzies that were coming off it. And there were a ton. The shirt I wore under the sweater was covered to the point where is was unwearable. I wish this was not the case and because of it I only wore it twice in the couple weeks I had it.

links_reviews_title: I wore it, then let my stylish abuela rock it at Christmas dinner.
links_reviews_text: The colors were beautiful and really easy to wear length, collar and sleeve. I lent it to my 86 yr old grandma bc she loved it on me the day before. It was awesome seeing her so excited and feeling beautiful about herself.

Overall, I loved this sweater. It is soft, the neckline is flattering, and the leopard print is beautiful (its tasteful - not obnoxious or tacky cheetah print). My only complaint is that I would have liked the sweater to be a little longer in length. Just as a personal preference, I prefer longer blouses & sweaters. Granted I am 5'8 and have a long torso (and pear shaped), so I think extra length would have made it a little more flattering and less boxy.
Loved this sweater! Versatile for work or play. Great pattern and fit.
Comfortable cute sweater, but the cut is nothing special. I wish it was a bit more fitted so it could have been tucked in.
Very cute sweater, but had to wear a shirt underneath because it was so uncomfortable.

I was worried this sweater would end up making me look bigger because it's loose fitting and chunky but I love it! It fits just right and it very comfortable. I wore it to dinner with friends and to work the next day!

I wore the sweater to work and liked it! The sleeves were a little shorter than I thought (came below my elbow but not as long as they look in the pic) and it was kinda itchy. But overall I'm happy I rented it.
This is a fun way to change things up! I loved the large animal print, but love even more that the sweater material gave it a soft look.
Bulky

links_reviews_title: Cozy, easy to dress up or down. Loved it and wore many times!
links_reviews_text: Cozy, easy to dress up or down. Loved it and wore many times!

links_reviews_title: Wore several times in chilly weather vacation
links_reviews_text: I'd been waiting to try this sweater for a while. Loved it! It's quite warm and ended up great for layering. Wore it several times on vacation in Europe when weather was chillier than expected. Looks great with every color jeans - black, blue, khaki green. Was sad to send it back and probably would have bought if not for the price.
Cute winter sweater but needs to be paired with high waisted pants or wear tank underneath. Slightly itchy but didn't keep me from wearing it

links_reviews_title: ehh, I thought it was just okay.
links_reviews_text: The fit was okay, it was slightly worn with pills and I think it had been shrunken a little. It didn't hang as far down on me as it did on the model in the picture. Due to my size I opted for the small but could of gone smaller. It runs a tad bit big so ladies with a chest this is one to consider. It is very soft and only slightly itchy. I really didn't notice the itchiness until I got warm.
super cute, but reaaaally short. need to go up a size or it hits the torso in an unflattering way
Didn't hit the mark for me. A little too stiff, too short, and itchy. Hoped it would fit a little bit looser but it's actually quite structured and not comfortable.
Too itchy did not wear
A boxy fit that's great with a mini skirt or tucked in the front into leather leggings or high waisted jeans! Sheds a bit.
all good

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this. Very warm and cozy.
links_reviews_text: It does shed a bit so have a lint roller on hand, but that didn't discourage me from wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Love this 60's retro vibe. Classic with a fun twist.
links_reviews_text: I'm large busted gal and this fit perfectly.

This is super cute accept I couldn't stand the itching of the material. I was dying from the minute i put it on. I'm also tall and it was awkwardly short, a M would have been better. Sadly, it went right back. :(
love it
This is a super cute sweater but it's very itchy. If you can handle the fabric then this is a great piece!
this was much shorter than the photo and quite itchy but looked great!
Loved the loose fit but the waist was still tapered enough to make it stylish.

links_reviews_title: If you're contemplating these size down like 3 sizes (trust me)
links_reviews_text: So I took a chance with these pants after reading the reviews. These are possible the most oversized pants I've ever encountered, BUT, if you size down they are great (with some flaws). I'm usually a 27 or 28 depending on the designer and on a whim ordered a 25 and they FIT! I've never had to size down that much in my life. Still, even though they fit I'm unsure I'd rent them again. The crotch area on these is entirely too baggy so they puff up when you sit. Verdict is out on these but SIZE DOWN

I almost always wear a size 6 so I ordered 28R. You can see in the picture they are a little bunchy but I think that's the look! Didn't bother me but might want to size down if this isn't what you're going for. High waisted which I love, the color is great. Would definitely rent again or considering buying!

links_reviews_title: True Olive Jeans - Size Down 1 or 2
links_reviews_text: Super cute pants but ran large. I'm a 27/28 pending the jean company, and these 28 were swimming on me. I re-rented a 27 and these were still an inch too large on the waist. Be prepared for a baggy/loose fit, but that's just the style of the jeans.
I have curvy hips and I couldn't get the pants past my hips! I know that if I could size up they would fit. Really well made and cute, I wish I could have worn them. Perfect with boots and a sweater
I was so heartbroken to not love these were pants. Although the color was absolutely on point, the fit was definitely not. Listen to the reviews as they do run big

links_reviews_title: A little tight in the waist but otherwise perfect.
links_reviews_text: Loved these pants! Perfect for work. Also, not nearly as short as they look in the picture (although, to be fair, I am 5'4"). They are a bit tight in the waist, so beware!

links_reviews_title: Great pants!! Will be sad when I have to return them.
links_reviews_text: These pants are a great size and material. I love the color, rise, and the slightly baggy look. I dressed this up with a blazer and tall boots for work, and dressed them down with sneakers and a graphic tee. Very versatile!

These were relaxed and comfortable for me to want to wear it to every lunch/dinner/errand - while not looking like a bum! The color is very suitable for the fall weather. I needed a belt to wear them, but I didn't mind since they looked cuter with a belt.

These jeans are an interesting, funky fit. They're high waisted, true to size and flattering to wear with a tucked in shirt but there's a lot of fabric in the crotch area, almost like harem pants. I wasn't sure if I could pull them off but I got compliments throughout the day and they were comfortable. Definitely a look and fun for a day.

Love the pattern on this and the loose comfortable style. I knocked it a star only because I didn't think it was the most flattering shirt because it was SO oversized. But it's a perfect casual shirt to run errands and still feel cute.

links_reviews_title: Kept getting compliments on the shirt while out shopping with friends!
links_reviews_text: Definitely an oversized fit, but I wore it tied up in the front to give it a bit more structure.
love anything and everything kate spade - however this shirt runs very large all around. baggy and long, but easy enough to tuck. lots of compliments throughout the day
Adorable shirt just very oversized.

Love the print on this shirt, so cute! It was really comfortable too. I know it is the "boyfriend" style so it is supposed to be oversized but I did feel like I was swimming in it sometimes. Perhaps if I had done a small instead of a medium that would've been better.
I sized down thanks to the other reviews and LOVE this top. It is boxy but if you style it by rolling sleeves/ tying bottom, it feels very feminine and cute. Would recommend.
Lovely button up. Runs VERY large. I usually wear a medium, but ordered an XS. Oversized and boxy. Great for a day out and about.

This shirt is waaaaay big. Like I felt like I was wearing my husbands work shirt. I tried to tie it up and make it look cute but even the shoulders and arms are too big. I am usually a size 12 in Kate Spade so I ordered the large, but I could easily wear a small, it was just soo massive. The only positive is the print, very cute candy striper look.

links_reviews_title: Way to big but so cute!
links_reviews_text: I am going to return this for two sizes smaller. It's way oversized!

Some felt this was just too huge but it fell perfectly on me and is such a happy color and print! Oversized but cuffs have double buttons so rolling up kept sleeves in place. My quarantine mood boost!

links_reviews_title: Cute for Valentine's day. Oversize fit.
links_reviews_text: Oversize fit
Cute oversized top for causal day. I tied it in the front and wore with white jeans. It runs big. I got a small and would have been swallowed in a medium.
Shirt runs super big. I wear a large and I ordered a medium based on others feedback. It was still on the larger size.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this shirt. The pattern is so cute and I got so many compliments on it at work. I also wore it with jean shorts to run weekend errands. It's soft and comfortable. Runs large but works for a "boyfriend look." Would consider buying!
Cool, crisp cotton.

links_reviews_title: Shirt was more like a dress. Seemed 2 sizes too big. Did not wear.

links_reviews_text: Sized down and could have gone down two more sizes!!
Fit is oversized. Super cute. Lots of compliments.
This ran really big - so glad I sized down, but might have even sized down again. It was pretty, but ended up not being appropriate.
It's oversized. Go with it! Just zhuzh. Skinny jeans, cuff the sleeves, tie or half tuck the front, etc.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments. This shirt is so chic and effortless. :)
links_reviews_text: Oversized long button up. Not fitted.

links_reviews_title: I wore this around the house and for running neighborhood errands
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately this button up runs VERY LARGE. I ordered an XS hoping it would look a little oversized but it looked baggy/sloppy.

Definitely runs large, but in a good way. Looks great with leggings (especially if you want your butt covered), skinny jeans, etc. It's long enough that you can tie the shirt in a knot as well. Pattern is adorable and material is really nice.

links_reviews_title: So cute...I work it with jeans and flip flops to work and got compliments throughout the entire day.
links_reviews_text: It's a little big so may want to size down.

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments on this classic button down oxford with adorable heart print.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great but you have to expect that it is an over-sized button down oxford.
Cute idea, great print but much too big to wear
Shirt was too boxy and loose in all areas
I loved the fit, but it is oversized.

links_reviews_title: Very cute! Wore it with white jeans and pink/red stripe sandals - very fun and got lots of complimen
links_reviews_text: . It is long enough you can easily tie it in the front and it not be too short. (It runs large! I normally wear an XL in kate spade - and this fit like an XXL or larger!)
This shirt is WAY too big

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this shirt, so huge.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear this shirt, so huge. I can't imagine anyone looks good in this. I'm 20 weeks pregnant and still was a no go.
Way too big
Runs large but I wore it anyway. I'm normally a 14 or L, this was an XL. I'll get another in a large and probably keep it;)
This blouse was huge!
Oversized look without being sloppy!

links_reviews_title: Unable to wear as it ran too large
links_reviews_text: It is darling. Very long length. Crisp and new looking. Tiny hearts . Unfortunately the shirt was just too large. I'm a 38c but the top and the shoulders just hung. I'm sending back hoping for a medium
Runs large, a little shapeless

I imagined this based on other reviews to be "boyfriend" big. This is nightgown big. I would order 2 sizes smaller than normal and it will probably still swim on you. Sad, because the material is super cute and really nice. To salvage it I wore a large sweater over it with some pearls and still got compliments on my look.
Not for me, the pink is stronger than I anticipated

links_reviews_title: Oversized doesn't even begin to cover this
links_reviews_text: I'm an M/L and 5'2". Read the reviews and got the small ... unless you're at least 5'10" and order down 3 sizes I can't see this working for people. Print and quality are great.
Love this skirt! Fits true to size, but does run short. If you don't want a short skirt (I.e. it's hard to sit down with the whole skirt covering your butt), choose a different skirt.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt, perfect for day or night!
links_reviews_text: This skirt looks super cute with a crop top. It's a little on the shorter side, but nothing too crazy. It fit really nicely as well.

Usual size in bottoms is 12, RTR recommended a 31 in this but I thought that must be crazy talk since my waist measures 33 around. So I sized up to a 33, but it hung off me and felt much too loose. I should have gotten the recommended size! I think this may work best for hourglass shapes, people with small waists relative to their hips. Not so ideal for pear folks with bigger waists.
Great skirt!! I probably wore this 5 times before I sent it back. Fits a little high-waisted with little to no stretch. The length was great on me but I'm only 5'2". Definitely recommend!
I love this jean skirt! I think I will actually end up buying it because it is such a staple for any summer wardrobe. Love the buttons up the front and a good length.
The denim doesn't stretch whatsoever. Wasn't able to wear it even though I sized up. Also would've been too short regardless. Not flattering at all for a curvier/thicker body

links_reviews_title: Super cute skirt. I wore it to a concert, it fit me great.
links_reviews_text: It's a little short in the back, definitely did not want to bend over in it otherwise you would have seen my butt. the cut is really slimming though. Kinda want to buy it.

links_reviews_title: The fit is amazing for my hourglass shape.
links_reviews_text: Great for hourglass shape. Does run short.
I am about 5'8 and could not even wear this. It was so short but cute if it was longer

It's been a while since I've worn a jean skirt. I had gained some weight and recently lost it so I was curious to see how a jean skirt would fit me. The skirt itself is well made and very fashionable. It was a perfect fit if you don't mind it being very short, which I don't. It also has some stretch to it. I received a couple of compliments and I was very comfortable wearing it.
Fellow ladies with wide hips, beware. The waist size (I ordered a 30) fit fine, but the physical skirt part was too tight around the hips and made it entirely too short to wear.
Very short, did not wear
I'm 5'0" and still couldn't wear this skirt. The fabric in the back was rolling up.
kinda to wide on the waist and cuz the bottom was so flared it was a little too risky to wear it high-waisted.

I really wanted to like this skirt but it was very large in the waist and very short on me. I am only 5'3 so I can't imagine how short it would be on most people who are taller than myself. Just didn't fit me correctly so I could not wear it out.
I usually love Levi's jeans but this skirt was way too short and rode up. The denim was also very stiff and the buttons were hard to fasten and unfasten.
This skirt is ridiculous. I'm 5'6'' and it is so short; I have no idea who it would fit appropriately. It also runs extremely small and I typically order a size or two up. Stiff & uncomfortable.
This denim skirt has little to no stretch. It should probably sit high-waisted, but with it being so short, I wore it at my hips. I wore this a few times before returning it!
Fit fine, but it is really short and flairs out at the back which can be very revealing.
This skirt was so short! I loved it, but it barely covered me up. My torso isn't that long, so not sure what the issue was.
Sadly the other reviews are correct, this is too short to wear. Would be so cute if it had a few extra inches to it!
Nice jean skirt, long enough if 5 10
It's the perfect denim skirt. Not too long, not too short. Love the button detail and fringe bottom. Will likely buy this skirt and make it a staple in my closet
Way way too short and I am only 5'4". Cute style but returning!
Fun WFH fashion item. Comfy but has a pop of color for all those zoom meetings.
Fit great - could've done a small, too but medium was the only option left. Colors are so bright and fun and it is extremely warm. So many compliments from strangers on this piece!

Ended up loving this so much more than anticipated! I'm broad in the shoulders but it had a slouchy fit that hung really well. I got multiple compliments and I think the neon color was unexpected for this style so I loved it. Great for the office and for a casual dinner out!
Loved this sweater! Super long duster, at 4'11 this was almost floor length. Very cozy. I wore with all black under but in some light I couldn't tell if the stripe was black or navy.
Easy to wear and fun pop of color
So comfy and perfect transition piece. Got many compliments!! Perfect for work to dress up or more casual with jeans.
Cozy and cute!
I loved this cardigan for my trip to Martha's Vineyard. It was perfect for the cool nights, and the style fit the Vineyard Vibe.

Who knew a cardigan would be so fun to wear? The long fit with color detailing and the sleek, tighter fit made this such a fun fall staple. I wore it over plan t-shirts or tank tops and jeans. I'd suggest sizing up as it is a snug fit but in a really great way.
The weather turned right as I rented this so I would have worn more. Would def rent again. Soft fabric and no issue with it drowning out a petite frame.
Great sweater. Pockets! Warm. Very stylish. Tons of complements. Def could have worn a large.
I loved the length

This is an adorable sweater! Wore it with jeans and a tank top and it was able to dress up the outfit a little. I got 5 compliments on this within the first day of wearing it! It is a little thicker, so it was perfect for the rainy cooler spring day. The stripes are a deep navy blue, peach, and highlighter orange- very bright! It was just different enough, yet simple and cute! Great length too- can were with leggings and not feel exposed as it went clear down to my calves, and I'm 5'6''! Would love to rent again in fall!

links_reviews_title: Awesome for a chilly spring day!
links_reviews_text: Super fun and unique sweater. Got a ton of compliments. Will rent again !
I've honestly worn this sweater about four times so far and I love it I'm even considering buying it! Runs large so I sized down and being that I'm 5'2" it was the perfect length.
Loved this piece. Only ended up wearing it once, but could see myself wearing it everyday if I owned it.

links_reviews_title: Super Cozy, Great Colors and Pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Love renting a long sweater for fun, with Unlimited!! This one did not disappoint, I wore it several times with different layers, it is very warm and can be worn in cooler temps with a thicker scarf. I love the pockets and fun bright neon colors. Note; it is very boxy and does not show any shape, size down if in doubt!!

I love the slouchy style. It's longer than my usual cardis but thats why I love RTR so far - a great way to try new things. The orange neon stripes are so whimsical and make a normal sweater feel fun and young. I think I'll be keeping this for a few weeks!
This sweater was the perfect pop of color. Super comfy and flattering, would definitely rent again!
Baggy fit but I received so many compliments. Wore with all black, faux glasses, and a messy hair bun. I loved the look.

This sweater is on the longer side. Light heather gray with a not-too-bright-neon orange and blush pink stripes. Perfect for throwing on for warmth and to elevate jeans and a T. Adds color to a zoom meeting too :)
Unique piece! Could have also worn a large.
Loved loved loved! Wore it on vacation and it was perfect

I rented this for a couple different occasions work, a kids birthday party and just to run around in on a Friday. I wore this a couple different ways always with jeans changing up the shirt underneath and alternating shoes. It works with black,white, pink,gray,white jeans, black jeans - just so versatile yet a nice pop of color in the gloomy winter.

I'm normally a small in RTR items, but I should have gone with an XS. Nonetheless, I still wore this about 4 times!! It's so great and cool! I paired with distressed jeans, tshirt, layered necklaces, and boots or sneakers. I highly recommend this!
The pockets are separate from the sweater and add a weird bulk. If you can get past that it's a cute item.
fit well
Received so many compliments. Fabric is a touch itchy, nonetheless, cute.
Super comfortable! Great for work, with pants, dresses, leggings. I wore it while five months pregnant and it was a great layering piece. Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: LOVE! Try it you won't regret it! :)
links_reviews_text: A little big, but a huge hit. I received a ton of compliments.
Really cute cardigan but the weight of it was too heavy for the current weather so I sent it back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to were with skinny jeans a tee and flats during transitional weather.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" and his hit me a little above my ankles, and the sleeves were right at my knuckles, so I added rings and it was such a pretty match! The material was a little scratchy so a long sleeve would have been more comfortable underneath. But it was perfect for a casual day out and is very easily paired with anything in your closet.
Great colors
Arms were a bit long.
I got compliments all day on this one! Cozy sweater but the pop of orange made it fun. Definitely runs big; my mom borrowed it and she's a few sizes bigger than me.
It was true to size and very comfortable.

This was comfortable and chic, and the colors were awesome. It felt pretty long- maybe too long?- and it hides your body a bit, which I am not used to, but I really liked trying something new. I would rent it again.
This was such a fun pop of color to jazz up my workwear

I wasn't feeling how oversized this was. I'm already chubby and throwing that on didn't flatter me. Next time I would try the medium. The cardigan itself is nice. Love S&S no complaints in the design department

links_reviews_title: Loved this and would have bought. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Cozy. Pockets are a bit boxy but still very useful,
This dress is everything! I ordered the L at first and returned it for the M. I'm an 8 so maybe runs a little large if you want a tighter fit. Material was soft and so flattering!
This dress fit very comfortably with an appropriate length.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and am so happy that I was able to buy it. It's on sale for cheaper than the RTR price at all saints right now! I love being able to try things before buying them. :)

links_reviews_title: This sparked joy- I decided to keep it
links_reviews_text: Hit just below my knees, roomy to not feel self conscious. I'm between a 4 (on top) and a 6 (on bottom) so I opted for the M so it wouldn't look to tight on my hips. It's soft, it's sexy, it's warm, it has amazing stretch. I ended up keeping it bc I imagine it will be a piece I wear almost weekly throughout the winter
I am a true size Small, but would size down to an XS next time for a snugger first. Was cute and love the zipper neck detail. Kept me warm in NYC winter with neck zipped. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Rented for everyday and could wear it everyday. Casual perfection.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfy. Can be dressed up or down. I wore it with wedge sneakers, low adidas sneakers, these boots. So versatile. TTS with stretch.

One of my favorite rentals yet! This dress was super stretchy and form fitting in all the right places. Wore to dinner + broadway show and was comfortable the whole night, while the dress kept its shape. Also wore to work and got tons of compliments. WILL RENT AGAIN
Got this for a NYE concert and it was very comfortable and flattering. Will say it does run a tad large!

Although I wore a M (because that's what was available) instead of my usual S, I'd say this runs TTS because the M was a little long & bunched up at the bottom of my back. The fabric is stretchy without being too clingy & love the zip neckline.

Love this one! It's warm and hugs curves without accentuating insecurities. I will absolutely rent it again. The ribbed sweater material kept its shape and didn't stretch out. I did have shapewear underneath. I'm a size 2, 5'2" and rented size S.

As soon as I tried it on, I knew it was perfect. I try to steer away from looking like everyone else and wearing black in the winter but this was worth it and will definitely be a repeat. It has excellent stretch and give for us curvier girls. It's also long enough for the taller girls. It kept me warm with its material and I'm so glad I got it.
I ordered this dress to wear for a private mass in honor of a wonderful, amazing woman. And I wanted to be saintly, sexy and beautiful, which this dress embodies all the mentioned
This dress was very tight and since I'm 5'2" a bit long for me. I wore it to work from home but if I were going in to work in it I probably would have preferred to size up. I didn't love it.

links_reviews_title: I liked the thick material. It looked nice on my imperfections.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to work, looked professional.
Thinking about buying this one! The zipper shows just enough cleavage, the dress has a nice stretch to it also. Breathable material, definitely one of my favorites.

Great material. Not too thick or thin. The zipper make it a little more casual but still ok for work. Length was a little long on me, but didn't make it unwearable. I think I'd size down if you think you're between sizes as it's very stretchy but doesn't cling. Would definitely rent it again.

This dress was so comfortable and chic. I love the sporty zipper neckline with the elegance of a longer-length black dress. I wore this beauty twice before I sent it back. Once I paired it with black leopard print stockings and black booties and the other time with white boots and a fur coat...amazing! Nearly kept it, and would definitely recommend to others looking for an easy, stylish outfit.
Love it, would have bought it if it were more than 10% off
This is a very flattering sweater dress, the material is thin but warm and shapes well to the body. Got a lot of compliments on it.
Very fitted. Excellent material. Will rent again.
This was cute but I would size down as the fabric stretched out a bit by the end of the day!

Great cardigan for fall, can't really wear a jacket on top due to the oversized sleeves and belt. But it's very cute for throwing over a tank and jeans! Love be extra detailing of the black knit down the sleeve. Great quality and soft.

I wanted to love this because it really is just the comfiest coziest sweater. Unfortunately the fit is a little bulky which is difficult to pull off on my larger frame. Was hoping the cinched in waist would create a nicer silhouette but it hit me a little too low on the torso which was awkward. Still, it's a really beautiful and well made piece
I really enjoyed this sweater! Great design and fit! It was a bit oversized but looked great with black pants. Would rent again.
Sized down due to reviews and glad I did. Fit perfectly but could've done my regular size for a more oversized look. Cute and comfortable for a casual workplace.

As a girl who lives where it's cold, I'm always on the hunt for sweaters that are anything but routine. This is it! Dressy enough for work, easy to dress down for weekends. It's warm and cozy without too much bulk. The detail on the arms ups the quality level and makes it feel expensive.
Runs a little big, I wore a medium but had planned to wear it on a casual weekend so it was perfect for laying low with leggings. The material is super soft and comfy!

I decided it was bad karma to not post pictures because I find them so helpful. Loved this sweater, perfect fit for jeans or leggings. Soft, thick (but you can still get a jacket over it) runs big size down, does NOT itch at all.
I received many compliments and the sweater is super comfortable. I sized down and the extra small fit perfectly. Great to dress up or down sweater.
rented for thanksgiving, and ended up wearing multiple times while I had it. With black jeans, and boots was so cute. This sweater was so incredibly comfy and soft, as well as warm!
Loved this sweater. So so soft! I wore it with black leggings for thanksgiving with my family. It was so soft and hung nicely over my butt.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and stylish sweater for work
links_reviews_text: Soft, thick and not itchy. All good for a cold winter office day. The cinched waist was flattering and it fit true to size

So soft and so cozy. Not at all itchy! I love the way the waist is cinched and the buttons are super cute. The length is perfect - hits just below the biggest part of my thighs. I'm 5'4 for reference!

I rented this for work & wore with basic black leggings, a black turtleneck & black booties. At first it seemed a little big, but once you put it all together, button all buttons & cinch the waist, pulling it up higher on waist, it's perfect. The sweater even arrived with the tags. I would love to have this staple in my closet all season long!
Well made sweater. I sized down one size and still had plenty of room.
Very chic and made my waist look small. Really enjoyed it!
I loved this top and wore it multiple time. You can dress it up or down. The fit is flattering and quality is great.
Soft sweater, easy to wear over a tank for fall and not bee too hot or cool. Only negative is it stretches out a bit after a couple wears. May rent again when it gets even colder.

links_reviews_title: Cozy but not quite as cute on as in the model photo!
links_reviews_text: A bit frumpy but that's kind of the idea.
Comfy,cute. Looked goosed with black leggings and jeans.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater to wear casually or dress up!

links_reviews_text: It's always cold in my office,this was great! I'm expecting so the tie front was perfect.
I would buy this sweater if I could! Wore it more than any other item I got. Cozy and oversized the way I like my work sweaters. Looked good open and tied. Highly recommend!
Was going to wear this with black pants but it was way too large.

This was the most worn piece in my rental for this month! I probably wore it twice a week throughout the month to work Church out with friends dance class with my kids, all sorts of things. Although I don't feel it's the most flattering as far as making you look thin, it definitely is a beautiful piece and I got lots of compliments on it.
Boring and bulky
Love everything about sweater. I have big hips, would have looked better if I were 10 lbs lighter
Nice sweater - warm, came down to low hip. Nice that the waist can be cinched in.
If it was a little more affordable I'd keep it! Great dressed up with fitting black pants or with jeans and boots
Great quality and detail on the sweater. I would certainly size down for the best fit.
Super cozy and warm. Sleeves a little short and I am short so. Definitely would size up next time to give a more loose feel like in the photos.
I'm a 34D usually large but the medium fit nicely and fell right on my hips. Pretty sweater!
Unique sweater and cute style. It runs large but doesn't look bad as its a sweater.
So many compliments!! Loved this with jeans and black boots great rent!
I loved the casual, yet tailored look doesn't work it the size is off. Runs large material is heavy and hangs a bit.
It was a looser fit but comfy.

The fit is not great for women like me who have a more pear type shape, not the sweater's fault, I just have bigger midsection and it did not sit well on it. Otherwise, it is really lovely and a great quality sweater.
It's a little frumpy, but has great quality and style. I wore this over and over. Sad to send it back...

links_reviews_title: Wish I could wear it every day
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater and wish I could wear it every day. It's comfortable, warm, and stylish! It does run a bit large though, so I had to get the XS when I am usually a S.
Medium was too big, especially in arms. Looks good with skinny jeans.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Super cute and comfy.
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly large, but still wouldn't have sized down.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this one
links_reviews_text: Very drape-y neck, wore this w/out a bra but recommend double sided tape!
Wore this to a party and absolutely loved the look! Tried to wear it to work one day and even with the straps on the tightest setting, it was still a little too booby.

I recommend sizing down one size with this top. It's also much longer than I expected, but it was fine when I tucked it into my jeans. Overall, super cute top that pairs well with black jeans and a leather jacket for a night out!

Love the cowl neck style, the cut would be very flattering but it simply runs too large throughout. I'm a true size 2, b cup, and was swimming in the XS. Sent straight back. Would probably look alright tucked in. Does have adjustable straps.
Awesome little cami to wear out for a night with girlfriends. It wasn't low cut at all, but the cowl neck makes it different and sexy. Awesome silky material too.
Perfect trendy top. Super flattering. Adjustable straps allow you to make it as low cut as you'd like. I'm in between a small and medium and the small was perfect.
front very drapy, if straps not adjusted enough may reveal a bit more of the girls then planned....
I was actually worried when this shirt arrived and was a size small but it actually fits perfectly and I absolutely love it! I am buying it!

Really nice, silky material. I loved the fit - true to size, drapes nicely at the front, great for wearing under a blazer to work. Only watch out is that it needs to be tucked in. It would be too long to hang out. I would have purchased it if it wasn't so pricey!

links_reviews_title: Extra clothes at a cheaper price!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous material. Super soft and feminine. Unfortunately this XS was way too big on me. Had gaps underneath underarms and not too tight around chest area. The bow helped me tighten it a bit around waist. Would recommend to RTR to include XXS

links_reviews_title: modern take on a crisp white shirt
links_reviews_text: This was flattering and professional. I normally hate bows so I figured out a way to tie it without a bow. It was great to be able to cinch in the waist. Kind of regretting that I didn't keep it.
Crisp and cool

links_reviews_title: Cute & Casual for Friday at Work
links_reviews_text: The blouse runs large for Club Monaco. I am a 14-16 with a large bust, and it fits me comfortably. The material is very soft, but it does wrinkle.
Nice fit and material. Very pretty top.

This is one of those shirts I would have been hesitant to buy because it's a cotton-y material, prone to makeup stains. So, it's the perfect rental. I work it to work and it was simple, yet different. Others have suggested a nude bra or an undershirt. I did not find sheerness to be a problem for me, so it may depend on your skin tone. I have light olive skin.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is comfortable and chic. Remained crisp throughout the workday.
links_reviews_text: The fit is a little boxy, but I liked how it hit on my hips (I am 5' 2"). The material feels well-made and comfortable. It lasted a 12-hour workday, which is a huge win.

links_reviews_title: flattering and cute. great every day or work shirt
links_reviews_text: loose fitting with a cute tie to give it shape. looked great with navy blue fitted jeans
Not a flattering top and falls kind of weird. Also, it is see through and you should wear a shirt underneath.

I really loved this shirt! Definitely considering buying it. This top is adorable and I got a lot of compliments. My best outfit was wearing it partially tucked in with high waisted jeans and mules. Wear a nude bra though.
Fabric was a little more sheer than I wished but otherwise great.
Nice top; does wrinkle easily, but has a casual vibe to it already, so it wasn't a big deal. Fit TTS.

This fit as expected, not too loose or small. It felt like a basic white tee, but the tie detail gave it an extra touch so it wasn't super casual. I wore with both dress pants and jeans. I should note that it's fairly wrinkle resistant- I packed this on a business trip and was amazed that it held up well after spending 15+ hours in a suitcase.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous material, armholes too big for me
links_reviews_text: I loved the material and look of this top. Ended up not wearing it though because the armholes were cut but too large for me (and I do not have thin arms) - could see into to my bra anytime my arms were not strait at my sides. Wasn't comfortable wearing it to work like that.
Cute white structured top. Perfect for work, happy hour, date, or daytime. The material is thin and slightly sheer but fine with a nude bra.
Standard fit. Simple but cute. Really fun to wear with pop color shoes
Loved this!! Great for work, casual dinner plans or day drinking. Super flattering, even with a larger chest! Will absolutely rent again
Lovely purse and design. Comes with a cross body strap, which I left off.
This bag is so stylish especially with a lot of black clothing. It was just a bit too small to hold everything I wanted.
Omg SIZE DOWNNNN.

I ordered this for a mountain trip this weekend, but ended up wearing it like everyday leading up to it. It's so comfy and cozy. If you're looking for a stylish big sweatshirt, go for it! Would order again!

I loved this! Was tempted to purchase it. I would say it runs true to size, but is (obviously) the over-sized look. Sizing down to make it look less over-sized wouldn't have worked. Also, VERY warm and fuzzy, great for colder climates.
Feels like a blanket and is super soft but the sleeves are really short! I would size up to have regular sized sleeves

links_reviews_title: I've always wanted pants with the stripe down the side. Absolutely love these!!
links_reviews_text: Love this look you can dress it up or dress it down. I used these pants for work!
Comfortable, forgiving fit, and very nice fabric. Loved wearing these pants!
These pants are perfect for a night out! The gold stripe isn't too crazy but adds a little flair! Wore with a leopard blouse & booties & felt fabulous!
Too small in hips and thighs, too big in waist. Not flattering.
Fit was pretty good. A little small but they have a lot of give. The gold stripe is fun & they are good pants for work.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, but would size down.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable for a long day at work; loved the gold strip!

links_reviews_title: The high waist felt surprisingly comfortable
links_reviews_text: It pairs well with a solid black top and gold jewelry
I was wondering if this is a bit snazzy for work but I work it with another black and tan top and it was great. The sizing is great. Really enjoyed wearing these pants; felt put together.

links_reviews_title: Nice switch from wearing a dress & Heels. I wore these pants for my Holiday Party.
links_reviews_text: Loves these pants, great fit, and beautiful gold detail along the side of the pants. Made is nice to dress up for a Minnesota winter Holiday Party.

links_reviews_title: A little too big but cute
links_reviews_text: These were a little too big for me as I am normally a 00, but they were super cute! I would say they are true to size
Rented these for my office Christmas party and they were a hit. Professional but fun and festive.
Nice pants. Fit well, comfortable. But they attracted every bit of lint I even came close to.
These were great. Nice fit. Little bit of sparkle. Wore to a Christmas party with a black T-shirt tucked in and heels. It was perfect!
These are just as expected. Very stretchy and comfortable. I wore them walking around all day. Also wore them while traveling.
Perfect fit with a little stretch.
Was a little big around waist so I'm getting a 26. Normally imna 27.

We decided to get fancy for our WFH meetings last week, and I've been dying to rent this one for ages, so went for it! Fits perfectly, and hugs all of the right spots to make you look slim. I am extremely pale, but the color is cream enough to not wash you out, either. Would totally rent this again!

Work this for a baptism, and first time meeting my husbands university friends. It was perfect for the occasion. Could've worn to work or on a date night as well. Thick material and slimming. Very tight on the ribs, so go with your normal size - for me I always size down on dresses, not this one - a 0 wouldn't have zipped. Great length for me at 5'8". Would rent again!

Wanted to love this dress. The color is more cream than white and it runs very small. I sized up 2 sizes. The material wrinkled easily, but the v neck and tie was cute. Overall just not as flattering as I had hoped. But, it's what I packed for this work trip, so made it work.

I wore this dress to work and it was a huge hit! It's a very comfortable material, but it is definitely snug in the top, so for anyone between sizes, or with a fuller bust, size up for more space in the torso. I have a very small chest and typically wear a 4 (in tops) and the size 6 was snug. The shape of the skirt is full, so if you need more space in the hip/ butt area, this would still be a great option. I would even go as far as saying this dress would be appropriate in a business professional work setting because it's stylish but very appropriate. I will definitely rent this again!

I absolutely loved this dress. Amazing structure and fabric. Fabric was thick enough to not see through but light enough to not be too hot. The neck tie was cute and fashionable, but my knot kept falling out so I had to keep an eye on it. Tighter and flattering around my chest, there is a strange way the fabric lays on the chest, but it didn't end up bothering me. Really loved this dress!
The fit was great! This outfit was thick and soft! I had no problem wearing it all day! I felt really classy and elegant for work.
This dress is so flattering. Hugs tight in the bodice and flares out. I was told I had Marilyn Monroe style. This dress made me fee confident. Will Rent again.

links_reviews_title: My favorite! So flattering. Wish I could wear everyday!
links_reviews_text: Out of stock in my usual size (12), so ordered the 16 just because I loved the silhouette so much. Would buy in my size if I could!! Pockets are fun and love the way it lays. I have the extra fabric clipped back in the photo I shared.
Cute and very tight on the chest.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, but worked with a jacket.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, nice heavy fabric the hung well. Had to wear with a jacket since the back wouldn't zip all the way. Not sure a larger size would have helped, I think it's just the style of the dress.

Weird fit for curvy women. It was tight in back/waist area and created a weird pocket in the chest that looked like a side nipple ... Sad. It's gorgeous and comfy. Otherwise fits well. Long hem. I'm 5'2", almost to my ankles.
I loved it so much i bought it. 1950s glam with a modern edge. Very fitted on top which translated to no bra needed for me (bonus).
Lovely, classy piece, tailored nicely. High quality material.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress! Comfortable and has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Great dress. If it were available I would have gone for the 0. The 2 was just a little big.
This was a pretty dress. The fabric was beautiful and the length was good. Hit right mid calf and I'm 5'6". Wore to the office for our big quarterly meeting

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Plaster linen type fabric. Small chest!
links_reviews_text: Like other people mentioned, the chest is very small! Didn't wear a bra so I could zip up, but was thick enough fabric could still wear to work. Got tons of compliments! Beautiful movement
Heavy classic fabric with nice draping and pockets

AMAZING! Absolutely loved this look. I felt like Olivia Pope - a complete regal boss! I wore this to work and afterwards to a gala. The length, fit and color were superb. Another RTR fave that Ill have to rent again.
Fits a little tight across the middle so size up if this is a problem for you! Otherwise, fun dress for work!
Flattering fit. Fabric is thick so it's not great for summer, perfect for a cool day.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small, perfect for tall hourglass figures!!
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress! The material was a bit thicker than I'd anticipated and not very breathable--probably best for a spring or early fall day (especially with the neck tie!). The pockets were perfect and I felt like it was super flattering for my hourglass figure (I'm usually between a 12 and 14 and the larger size was perfect).

This dress is perfect for work. Flattering and feminine. I am size 6 usually but with this dress I went a size up and I am so glad that I did! I will definitely be trying more dresses from this label. Oh-it does wrinkle a LOT but I was sitting down for most of the day.
Perfect professional summer dress. A very light peach/beige color. Great fit.

This dress was absolutely stunning. It fit me like a glove and was true to size. The 16 fit as well I ended up going with the 18 to allow for more wiggle room in my rib cage. I ordered this dress after the first dress I rented didn't fit. Thankfully a stylist helped me find this dress and had it shipped to me the next day. I got all kinds of compliments. It was the perfect length for my bridal shower. I didn't have to worry about my dress being too short. My only concern was the dress isn't lined and you can see through it a bit. I would suggest Spanx or a slip under the dress.

I'm in love with this dress. It's very Kate Middleton! Fits perfectly, including for those who have a bigger chest! It's a perfect tea-length cut on me (I'm 5'4). Only thing I don't love is that the keyhole is a little low cut for work. The bow covers it decently well, so not a huge problem.

Love, love, love this dress! This is a new item and mine still had the tags on! I am partial to bow collars and this did not disappoint. Fitted torso and flared skirt that falls below the knees...works so well at the office...classy, and little sassy! Can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Want to look like a stylish boss? Rent this dress. I would described it as "You, elevated."
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect. I wore it to work and felt like I was floating through meetings, presentations, hallways. Just floating above and through it all. The fit is amazing - the middle hits right above the natural waist in a way that flatters most women. I loved the flowy skirt and the material is sumptuous and feels rich. Finally, the tie around the neck gives it an elegance that you don't normally find in functional work-type dresses. I would have purchased it if I could but it is always unavailable and so hard to get your hand on! If you do, then snatch it up. you won't regret it.
Glamorous, unusual and scored lots of compliments!
Wore this in my first trimester several times. Very flattering!

Like all Black Halo dresses, you definitely need to size up at least 1 size and 2 wouldn't hurt. The color is more tan almost bordering on khaki than ivory but really nice either way. Love that it has pockets.

links_reviews_title: Awesome and Classy. One of my favorite RTR rentals ever! Will eventually buy!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Great fabric. Looks rich!
Wore this dress so much! Looked great even after traveling on a plane!! So pretty and great quality. Will rent again. Wore so much while I had it.
many compliments
I usually wear a 14, this was a 16. Glad RTR recommended I size up! It fit well. It was quite basic, but it did have pockets!
Great dress

The waist hit more like an empire. I'm 5'8" and short-waisted. I suspect this dress requires someone long-waisted and under 5'6". I couldn't zip up the back because of the proportions. Dress is a nice weight, but is not lined. You'll need nude to you undergarments, but not a slip.

I loved this dress, but it was so tight in the chest (36C) that I didn't end up wearing it. I wouldn't need a bra--it was that tight, but it was also very uncomfortable. The rest of the dress is great but I did need my husband to help zipping the back up--the back zip is in a very odd location.
Love the color .. I didn't wear it because it was to tight in the chest area. I might try and rent again but size up.
Length is perfect for more conservative events, though I wish the material didn't wrinkle as easily.

links_reviews_title: Planned to wear this to work.
links_reviews_text: The color is a light tan color, which was very unflattering with my skin tone. Was expecting more of an off-white color. Sent it back.

links_reviews_title: Adore this glorious cloud of warmth!
links_reviews_text: I got a size 12 because that was all there was. I wear a 10 or 8. But it was super cute as a huge wrap, functioned perfectly in snowy New York City on my vacation. Kept me warm and dry and cozy. LOVED this jacket. It's so soft, so light and so warm. My 20 something daughters had huge envy.

I am OBSESSED with this coat!
