The color is so beautiful (a brick burnt orange color with a slight metallic shine), the material is so soft and comfortable, it's WARM (go lululemon!), the fit is so flattering and it covers the butt :) which I love! I really am considering buying this coat, I love it so much.

Rented this to go home to NYC for the Holidays. I live in the desert so I don't really own a jacket anymore. It was warm and did the job. Jacket is very puffy which is why I gave it 4 stars so makes you look a little bigger but definitely delivered in the warmth category so it was okay!

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take this jacket off.
links_reviews_text: So warm and cozy. Was like being in a fuzzy blanket.

Love the unique sort of "shiny brick" color of this jacket. Real down fill, nothing else will keep you this warm (trust me, I work outside a lot!) Not too short, which is great because it is puffy. The fabric is smooth & not stiff, very luxurious. Wish I could buy this.
This was the perfect casual everyday jacket for cool to cold weather. It was lightweight but warm. The color was unique and beautiful. It was great quality. Wish I could buy it!
Great jacket, runs a little big. Fun color and warm.

This jacket is almost perfect except for one thing: it is tight across the shoulder/chest for me, limiting range of motion a bit, and roomy/perfect everywhere else. I did get a 2 instead of my usual 4 in Lululemon. Would like to try the 4 at some point. Love the cuffed sleeve to keep out cold, the thicker-than-normal insulation (I think it'll be solid for 20F days), the lovely shimmer to the fabric, and great pockets.

links_reviews_title: Like wearing a duvet (in a good way!)
links_reviews_text: This is the comfiest, coziest coat I've ever put on, and the color is to die for. Definitely oversized, especially for Lululemon. I rented my true size for outerwear and could have sized down.
I wore this coat for a weekend in Portland, ME and couldn't get over how warm it kept me !
Wore this puffer for two months straight so warm and cozy and adorable on!
Can't stress how much I love this coat enough- comfortable, versatile, cute color and sooo warm. Dreading returning it and may end up keeping!

I'm usually a 6 at Lulu and got this in a 4 and it's great. Very warm. Shipped it to my parent's house over the holidays so I didn't have to pack a winter coat. Color is very nice in person. Stopping myself from buying it.
This felt way too tight to not be a fitted sweater. Really wish I had sized up at least 2 sizes. The material was also a bit itchy and the sweater was pilling a bit.
Warm without being too heavy

I wore this to work on a casual Friday. The sweater was very short so I wore a white tank under it. I think the tank would have been necessary even without the length issue because the braid of the two colors was see-thru. It was a cute sweater, but nothing super special.
Great casual sweater
Love this sweater- note that the stitching doesn't have a lining underneath it. So there's a chance you can see your bra but very little. Super comfortable and very true to size.

I was really excited to wear this cozy sweater, but there is no lining under the stitching so it was easy to see through the gaps in the stitching to my bra. Maybe this wouldn't be a problem for someone smaller on top, or it might have been avoided if I had sized up (not an option here). I was still able to wear this, but I had to be on alert all day to make sure the sweater was adjusted just right so the stitching wasn't opening up.
Very cute and easy to just throw on with jeans

links_reviews_title: Cute but not a great shape
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments on this sweater but did feel like it didn't have a ton of shape, rather boxy. I wore it over a white button down for work and black skinny jeans which helped give it a little more shape. Overall, it was cozy and warm and not itchy which was great.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater but a little snug
links_reviews_text: Really cute sweater! Love the two colors and the braiding design. I am a true medium in almost everything an felt that this sweater was a just a little bit snug - unsure if it just runs a little small or perhaps the one I rented was washed/dry cleaned and shrunk a little bit. Was definitely still wearable, but as the braiding makes it a bit see through, I had intended on wearing a camisole underneath and was not able to do so because it was a bit tight and short. I will note that the sweater was NOT itchy at allll without anything underneath, which was a huge plus and luckily the see-through-ness from the braiding was hardly noticeable. Would rent again, but would probably go for a size up as I tend to like my sweaters a bit looser (like how it looked like it fit on the model).

links_reviews_title: Love this unique and very wearable sweater
links_reviews_text: Wore this at least 6 times between work, vacation and weekend-tempted to buy it. Great piece.
really cute, fits well, warm but not heavy.....loved it and it feels great on
This is a pretty color and interesting knit however it felt as though it was washed and dried...totally shrunken.

Like mentioned in other reviews, the link between the colors is a bit see through, just wore a cami underneath it and it's perfect - this actually worked too since it was a bit shorter than I prefer. Overall a nice everyday sweater, really soft.

This sweater was comfortable and warm. The stitched detailing added some interest to an otherwise typical sweater. You definitely have to wear a cami under it though because the stitching pulls apart slightly on the bust.
Easy to wear and comfortable but lacks the wow factor
Really thick fabric and a very loose fit. Good for a lazy day
Great sweater, however the "stitched" area can expand and expose whatever is (or isn't) underneath, so recommend wearing a cami or nude bra
too seethrough at the stitch. Have to wear something underneath
Nice quality. Cute, boxy cut that hits at hip. Pretty heavy wool. The stitch where the colors meet is a bit gappy so I wore a T-shirt underneath
Very pretty and comfortable sweater with a unique design. The sweater was beginning to pill on the arms
I'm usually a medium/6 but this sweater didn't not fit well. It was tight around my arms and since I have a long torso, short on my body.
The gray and pink color contrast was cute but the braiding detail was too easy to see through in some parts.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but not for a large chest and long torsos
links_reviews_text: Loved the design of the sweater. But I am slightly long torso and the sweater was just too short. I also have a large chest and the stitching showed my bra. Cute color combination would wear if it was larger.
This water runs a little big. You will have to wear something underneath of it in case the leasing gaps. It was very cute.
Fit well and was perfect for a weekend

This sweater has a very interesting diagonal braid detail and although the size was perfect, when I moved my right arm, it would stretch the detail across my chest, so I had to wear a tank top underneath. That just made it a little strange.
Braiding very unique and fun. Soft

I tend to have trouble getting the oversized sweater look without sleeves that look ridiculously long but this sweater was perfect! Very warm and comfy and I just wore a nude tank top underneath because you can definitely see through the stitching where the pink and grey meet.
The fit is loose but comfortable for a sweater. Sleeve length was good and the thickness is very warm and cozy.
Loved the two tone and the way they were stitched together. Got lots of compliments about how unique and cool it was.

Cute sweater but it is extremely warm. I think too warm even for dinner or a movie. It would be perfect to wear to an outside event in the winter -- something like a football game. It also runs big so order one size down.
Great fit - adorable sweater
Did not wear this - as soon as I received I knew it would not fit the bill. It fits small, is super short and the weaving has gaps making it unflattering.

This sweater is cute but for some reason wasn't my fave. Thicker than expected, a very heavy knit. A boxy fit. More casual than I expected, probably best suited with jeans. Overall fine, good, but not great!
Perfect for casual warmth. May keep for the season. I love this sweater
Fun sweater, very warm, loved the stitch detail. A little on the big side and not super flattering.
Arrived NWT. Really beautiful sweater with high quality yarn. I just rented it too early -- it's way to hot to wear yet. I will rent it again.
I loved this sweater. The ruffles and color were even better in person.

links_reviews_title: The crop style is definitely out of my comfort zone, but I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I would suggest sizing up!
The material is top quality, the color is beautiful, received compliments..fanciest sweater I've ever worn
Cute sweater. Not the most flattering but super comfortable. Not itchy at all. Very warm- Didn't need my winter coat outside!

links_reviews_title: This is what sweater dreams are made of!
links_reviews_text: Color and fit are perfect! Thinking about purchasing.
The statement sleeves are cute. The hemline is hi-low, and cropped in front. I have a short torso and the front of the sweater hits right at my waist.

This sweater is cropped, so you'll need to pair it with high-waisted pants if you're wearing it to work. The color is rich and playful and the frills are feminine without being too young. I loved this sweater and may buy it down the line!

Got this sweater for a fun wardrobe piece for the weekend. Very warm and cozy. Fit me slightly weird with the long back and short front but I wore it twice in the span of 3 days and definitely liked how it looked!
Not a very soft sweater but not itchy. I love the sleeve length and details for a cozy work option.
Gorgeous cobalt sweater. Very warm so don't wear unless it's pretty cold out or you can easily overheat. Super cute and comfy - would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: I felt like wearing something I usually don't and I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It wasnt as soft I expected it as a sweater, but it was good fit. It was a beautiful royal blue and I loved the ruffles.
Cute fit through the body and I really liked the hi-lo of the front and back. Sleeves were a tad bigger than I'd like but still so cute

links_reviews_title: High waisted jeans a must if over 5'8"!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful sweater but very cropped in the front! (Much longer in back) Very nice long sleeves but you will want high waisted jeans/pants if you are tall!
Wasn't sure about the ruffly sleeves but this sweater was a pleasure to wear, compliments all day. High-low cut was subtle and flattering. Warm without being itchy, wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_title: The color and sleeve makes this garment oh so much more than a sweater.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color with great details on the dropped shoulder and sleeve. I wore this for everything from a casual NYE party, to work, and everything in between. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to step up their knit game during sweater weather.
The sleeves are pretty long but easy to fold up. Not itchy either.
Plenty of compliments- great color- one that I don't have in my closet- can be dressed up or down!
Thick sweater and fun detail on sleeves and front. Loved the bright blue color

links_reviews_title: Love the color and how soft it is!
links_reviews_text: Great color, the puffy sleeves are fun but they can make your body frame bigger. It's surprisingly warm. Because the fabric is quick thick, it would only look good when your bottom material is thick as well. I tried the top with my yoga pants it just looked weird. I am usually pretty picky about sweater 's materiel, this sweater doesn't make me itch.

links_reviews_title: Would order up a size. Great color!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color. I found it a bit short, so I might order up a size next. Heavy material. Good for winter. I imagine it would be hot in summer as it's a thick knit. Good quality.
You guys. The color is even more beautiful in person. It's a heavy sweater.. and a little short in the front, so the fit is kinda weird. But the color makes up for it.
Gorgeous sweater! If you want an oversized look definitely size up
Cute sweater. Sleeves a tad long but I rolled them up to be regular length. Would recommend! Wore a medium and am usually a small or medium and size 4.
This sweater has interesting detailing with an unexpectedly high neck. I wore it with a black slip midi skirt for Sunday with the family.

links_reviews_title: Too short for a long torso person!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful sweater, but was way to short for my long torso! Fit was not good.

Absolutely loved wearing this piece and received so many compliments. It does run a bit small - especially in the waist/torso. If you have a longer torso (and don't want this to become a crop), I would size up.
Great color, ruffles aren't overpowering. Nicely tapered around waste. Longer in back so you don't have to worry about showing off your lower back when sitting. Just love it.

links_reviews_title: Not for broad shoulders but cute
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and weight of this knit but if you have slightly broad shoulders this will make them look HUGE.
Loved everything about it. Some commented too short - I'm very tall and found it hit perfect with high waist jeans. Sleeve length was amazing and rare!
Great color and extremely comfortable. Very thick and warm.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this. Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The color and the sleeves make this so fun to wear!
Great fabric! Sooo warm!

This was another piece I wish I could keep and would but for the price. The color is a gorgeous cobalt, and it's a nice thick material. The ruffles on the sleeves and the shape of the sleeves and the torso of the sweater make it really cute and really stylish. Only complaint is the sleeves are REALLY long. Like weirdly really long. I folded them under/into the sleeve which didn't bother me.
Great, very warm sweater. Wish I could keep!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and ruffles , but very, very heavy. It truly is a winter sweater.
links_reviews_text: Only thing I regret was trying to wear it in August. I thought it were a . light sweater, but is a winter, heavy sweater. It was beautiful though.
I loved the color & cut of this sweater so much. I received so many compliments and can't wait for sweater weather to rent it again.
SUPER CUTE! Longer in arms but you cam cuff once & it is still cute. loved the neck line

Color is beautiful. I really wanted to wear this, but it was SO much shorter on me in front than pictured on the model. I am 5'6 with a long torso, normally an XS or S. I chose the S and it was above my navel. I tried a tank underneath but that was weird too. It went back.

links_reviews_title: So cute! I got compliments every time I wore this.
links_reviews_text: Nice drape in the back and gives an overall put-together look.
Fit well and was very stylish. Could wear with jeans but I paired it with a faux leather skirt.

Received many compliments. Perfect for fall in Florida where real sweaters aren't an option. The strapped stretched out a little throughout the day but not too bad. Would definitely consider buying this!
It's just so cute. I love the heart. RL for Ralph Lauren of course, but to me, it's RL stands for Real Love!

links_reviews_title: If you're between two sizes go down
links_reviews_text: Hi. I'm a 34d and in between medium and large usually because I'm a bit chubby sometimes but the large was too big in the armpit area, my bra was showing so I re-rented in a medium and the fit was perfect. Medium is pictured. I loved this top. It's so casual but screams expensive at the same time. Idk, it's definitely a look!

links_reviews_title: Husband loved this thing for some reason
links_reviews_text: Cute!
Felt amazing and so many mentions from people! Awesome night! Awesome top!
Super cute for everyday!
This sweater tank was perfect because I could dress it up or down and look sporty or preppy.
Cute sweater to throw on with jeans!

Super soft with a relaxed fit. Quality fabric with a little bit of weight. However, I wore it on a summer night and I wasn't too warm. Probably could've worn an XS for more of a form fitting look, but the S worked well. Didn't need to wear a bra.

Loved this little sweater top! The material was really soft and light. I was worried this might be too warm to wear in the summer but it was perfect for mid-70s in New York. I paired it with high waisted jeans. I rented a S and am usually an XS in tops. It was a little roomy so I would say this runs true to size.
I found this to be small and stiff with little to no stretch. It looked shrunken on. No way I would wear it in public. Maybe it is all the dry cleaning?
Perfect for fall weather in Southern California when it's hot in the day and chilly at night. Very flattering
I freaking love this top! Thinking about buying it. It's comfy cozy and the straps don't slip down. I love the RL heart on the front i think it's a cute little details.
Totally adorable. Loved the idea of a cable knit tank and it did not disappoint. Would be super cute under the right blazer

links_reviews_title: This is a very cute top but tough to layer. Perfect with jeans and sandals. I would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Arms are a bit big so I user fashion tape to make sure the edges of my bra didn't peak.
nice fit

links_reviews_title: Low cut but somehow work appropriate?
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, felt sexy and preppy at the same time. The knit is super heavy, so glad I took a chance on this top. It's off white, just FYI for people who are weary of that

I absolutely love the way this dress swings and love the pleats! So easy to wear. Unfortunately I ended up wearing a jacket over because the weather turned cold but I am going to find another opportunity to wear before it has to go back. You can dress up or down.
Great fit, classy dress

This dress looked incredibly frumpy on me. For reference, I usually go between a 2 and 4 but the 2 didn't do anything for me. I should also mention that I'm on the shorter side. Maybe this would look better on a tall frame
Wore with a belt and flats. Runs a little large so went with the smaller size. Would definitely rent again
I wasn't overwhelmingly impressed with this dress but I received TONS of compliments. It fit comfortably, traveled well, and I was able to dress it up with sandals and down with sneakers.
Perfect coat for a chilly early spring weekend in NYC. Great fit and color is very vibrant. Would be great for fall as well
Loved this!!! Such a cool look, went with everything end the feel was SOOOOO COZY!!!! My hubby is sad to see this one go.
I would definitely give this 5 stars if it didn't shed. I have a tendency to wear a lot of black so I may just wear this once and send it back. If you can handle the shedding, it's adorable.
I'll keep this jacket (with my unlimited plan) so long as it's cold out! It's the perfect tan color, so cozy and perfect!
Really liked it, very comfortable. HOWEVER, fuzz everywhere

links_reviews_title: Liked this coat, but short sleeves
links_reviews_text: I liked this coat, it was warm and comfortable and good for everyday wear, but the sleeves were short on me and I don't have long arms. Also the buckles on the sides kept coming unbuckled.

links_reviews_title: Warm, soft and comfy. The best!
links_reviews_text: Loved it so much. Almost bought it

So this piece was cute and warmer then you'd think but there was something odd with the zipper. It was stuck in a twisted position I don't know if it was just this one or all of them but otherwise it was fun to wear for a bit
This is a great cost that goes with anything. Casual yet very stylish and thick enough for the cold. I will definitely be keeping this is my closet for a while!
I can't stop touching this coat. I love it.
VERY soft on the inside.
It is really warm- too warm for the climate I live in.
Cute coat but sheds like crazy. Fuzz got all over me.. and my boyfriend!
Fit is awesome and comfy. Perfect length for booties. Love.

I had high hopes for these but I didn't love them. They are tighter around the legs than expected but not that flattering. Quite flared/bell bottom looking. The buttons are a nice touch and the length does work for petite. Pretty comfortable. Just didn't love

So I normally wear a 12 dress/31 jeans and got the XL-R. Being 5'2", they were regular full length on me which was preferable. I found them to be very comfortable. They had a full elastic waistband that wasn't too tight. I easily curled up in a comfy office chair.
typically a size 10-12 and was happy to love the fit of the M (so maybe they run large!?)

links_reviews_title: Nice weight; works for work and after work
links_reviews_text: comfortable and pretty with a nice little flare

links_reviews_title: Eye-catching buttons at the hem of each leg.
links_reviews_text: Tighter fit than expected.

Loved the pants. Was worried about the length but they were perfect. I'm 5'6". The style was very cute. Love the buttons. The material is form fitting but thick so it's forgiving. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Cute pants just a little too tight
links_reviews_text: The LR doesn't work for a size 12 bottom/hips. But cute pants, would have been comfortable if larger
Nice

I didn't realize these were elastic waist - so I'm not crazy about that. The button detail and slight kick crop are cute and the pants are comfortable. That said I have muscular legs and found the quad,calf area a big snug, but the bum and waist were too loose. I wore a long top, so it wasn't awful - but the top of the pants were just too puffy.
comfortable, fit me like leggings.
Liked the fabric. Seemed a bit short and tight from the knee up but I liked the look. Would rent again.
Nice design and fabric, but too small, couldn't wear

links_reviews_title: For a Size 10 ML is too small
Cute pull on elastic waist pants
links_reviews_text: Flattering but I didn't wear bc they looked a little cheaply made. I probably could have taken an xs

links_reviews_title: Super cute but not for shorter ladies!
links_reviews_text: Flattering and comfortable and very cute but a terrible length for my 5'4" frame. To short to be long and too long to be cropped. If I were taller and could wear these at a cropped length, I would buy bc them!

links_reviews_title: everyday great look for day into evening!
links_reviews_text: it has no zipper and good stretch that holds you in. super comfortable. Pulled bottom down to make them a bit longer. dress up or down
Runs slightly big, but comfortable. Elastic pull on waist. Can dress up or down. Love button detailing.
I LOVE this sweater! The quality is AMAZING, nice weight to it, with the ability to dress up or down.
Material was thick but comfy. Received a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this Bold Colorful Cropped Sweater
links_reviews_text: Wish I could have purchased this! High quality, high fashion, statement making, vibrant and the perfect crop. I wore it casual with jeans and black boots during the day and dressed it up with white skinnies and red booties for night. Very versatile and comfy. Cropped fit is great for petites. Perfect standout piece!

I never rent twice but I LOVE this. So cool/chic. And can be worn so many ways. Definitely need a high waist pant otherwise your midriff shows (unless you want that!) otherwise it's perfect for tucking in. Last time I rented it I wore with a white skirt. Just so cute & cozy
This sweater is super comfortable and versatile. Wore it with jeans as well as a skirt, tights and boots. Would definitely rent it again.
So fun to wear - beautiful fabric (thick yet comfortable) - slightly cropped - cool colors. Would buy it if it was less expensive as it's so easy to mix & match!
Great sweater. Love the quality and print. Just super cropped so you need high waisted pants or skirt to pair with it.

This was slightly more cropped than I had hoped - but I made it work and got so many compliments. It was warm and a very high quality knit and it had a boxy feel to it which I really liked. The colours were vibrant and really popped in a sea of winter grey and black. Recommend.
I wore this to a concert and loved it!
Super comfy and stylish graphic sweater - do many compliments!! Albeit a bit short so best with high waisted jeans and skirts.

Loved it, funky retro print, wore over a black dress and Nike sneakers for a dressed down night at the waterfront. Thick material, will keep you warm. I sized up for a loose fit and it is cropped, hits at about my waist. Im typically size 12, 38DD, 52 height to give you a frame of reference and I ordered an XL
Loved the cut of the sweater. And the material was comfortable yet heavy enough for a cool day.
I loved this sweater! I wore it many times in many ways! From out with a skirt to walking around NYC with leggings and sneakers! Its very cozy and looks chic and sophisticated with everything!

links_reviews_title: Love it!! Vibrant and a great cut!
links_reviews_text: This top is great for cold weather. I wore it in Iceland and loved it! The material is thick and keeps you warm. I'm usually a M but the S fit great, even with layers underneath. Everyone kept saying it looked high quality and expensive. Will rent again!
Great for cooler days when you don't want bulky sweaters. Very warm and stylish. Quite short but great with something high waisted. Lovely soft and thick fabric.

links_reviews_title: Casual chic with interesting cut and colors.
links_reviews_text: Cozy and warm, but not bulky like typical sweaters. Got lots of compliments.
Loved the material on this sweater. Perfect for the fall.
Who doesn't love a fun crop top sweater with a print?
Such a fun sweater for a fun night out in New York! Structured and gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Adorably cute, comfy and well made sweater. Fun colors and great for my event in Boulder, Colorado
links_reviews_text: Cropped so needed to wear high waisted leggings but really fun look.

I wore this a handful of times - to work, a friend's birthday brunch and to Vegas - it was perfect for every occasion and each time I received compliments. Fabric is luxurious and has a nice weight. Taking off one star because it was too cropped for my long torso. I made it work by wearing a black tank underneath but didn't feel completely comfortable.
Rented this for a weekend in upstate New York and absolutely loved it! Paired with a high waisted Jean, the cut is incredibly flattering. Very fashion forward and chic
Sweater is cropped to waist. It's a nice heavy double knit and very warm. The mix of colors work well together and provide versatility for pairing. I received several compliments on this sweater.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't stop wearing this sweater!
links_reviews_text: I wore it 4x it is the perfect cropped length and weight. Loved this sweater!!

Loved how the color popped on this crop sweater! It was cute for a date night at the museum! I could have easily worn the small as well. Fit was great on both, I just put the medium on and kept it on after trying on the small.
Wore this to my birthday brunch and received tons of compliments! Super soft and you can feel the quality. Would rent again!
The XS fit perfect. Really well made sweater. Looked great with white boots and high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Warm and super trendy for everyday
links_reviews_text: Definitely cropped, I wore a T underneath for work but going out would prob just leave it! Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Better in person than in the photos.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and style. Was impressed with the weight, fabric and fit. A little more cropped than expected but flattering with high-waisted leggins and sneakers.
I wore this several times - true to size, great quality, and perfect with high-waisted jeans or leggings. It's fun and different but not too wild.

This one takes the cake for comfortable designer sweaters. I wore this when I wanted to be casual for work and I got so many compliments. I chose to wear it with denim and a black turtleneck underneath(it was cold) with some sneakers. It's so chic and easy to wear. I'm bummed I didn't get to take a photo in it.
Wore this to work, out at a brewery, and with leggings after a workout. Got so many compliments, everyone thought it was such a cool sweater. It pained me to return this!!!
Cute casual sweater - has a boxy fit and cropped. Nice design and quality. However, after wearing a few hours, I noticed a BO smell coming from it that wasn't me. Gross.

links_reviews_title: Probably my favorite piece I've rented!
links_reviews_text: Cozy, warm, thick material, feels sturdy and high quality. Fit true to size.
Fun, nicely cropped (fits petite!), vibrant and tasteful colors. Will be hard to part with this!

Really enjoyed wearing this fun bold cut. it's very thick and warm but is obviously cropped so your belly can be exposed. I decided to wear it with higher waisted jeans and loved the look for casual weekend vibes. tried it with a tank underneath and it looked frumpy so wasn't able to pull it off again.

I loved this sweater. It was thick and cozy. It is definitely really cropped. If you don't want any skin exposed wear something high waisted. Hoping I can find another chance to rent and wear this before winter arrives

links_reviews_title: Style, color and boxy fit was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater! Wore it several times (with jeans, dress, and pants). Colors are vibrant and work with lots of styles. Super cute!
Loose body sweater with really cool chic design! Wore it twice and wish I could afford to buy it!
It's short but totally cool and can be dressed up or down. Lots of compliments
Was too big but ordering smaller, loved it
As others said it does run small, I'm 5'1 130 lbs and the large fit me perfectly - I'm typically a medium/size 6
Loved the style of this. The denim dressed it down but with it being a dress it looked much nicer. Comfortable soft but sturdy high quality denim material.
Wore this to a work beach party and it was perfect! Light weight and may run a little large, i normally wear a medium and wore a small in this dress. One of my favorites yet!

Fun piece for summer, or layering over a sweater for fall. It did run really small. Reminded me of something i would have worn as a little kid. Easy to dress up with wedges or down with a tee shirt and sneakers.

High of 88 in Manhattan today.  This @showmeyourmumu stretch denim Ruthie Ruffle Dress is perfect for fighting off #pumpkinspicelatte warriors... with sunshine and softball games.  Worn with an @etsy dupe of the @Nordstrom Blake Lariat Necklace @fourtyish always wears and @bcbgeneration wedges I bought at a thrift store.  Check out more #real reviews @renttherunwayreal
Love the fit, XL is just the perfect length and not tight at all. Considering buying!

Loved this dress! I wore this to a birthday party. It runs a bit small. The size large was short. The XL fit great! A bit longer in length and fit more of the loose style bs tight. The only con are the sleeves, they kept falling down.

I originally ordered the large and it fit but wasn't flattering. I had to size up for this dress (I should have listened to the other reviews from the start) and it fit much better! As others mentioned, from sizing up the straps get a little loose but it was still a great dress for the day!

Absolutely loved this dress! The ruffled shoulder straps were the best part. I am 5' 2" and usually wear size small/size 2, but ordered a medium in this dress, which ended up being the perfect fit. Slightly stretchy, but still fitted. Highly recommend!
The straps were a bit big and feel a few times but the overall fit was pretty true to size. It was comfortable too!

Form fitting denim dress is perfect for summer daytime and easy date night! I strolled around the farmers market with this little number! Was a bit hard to get over my butt since the dress does not give at all due to the material, but once I was in I was obsessed.
I'm a true size 4 and had to size up. The medium was slightly long in the straps but the length and the extra stretch was necessary at the next size up
Obsessed with this dress - so easy and comfortable for a festival look. It's one of my favorite rentals ever.

Love this! I'm 28 with some donuts around my midsection and I was a little concerned this would look cheap and skanky and too young for me. NOT THE CASE YALL. The material is nice and thick and cut in a way that makes it so flattering. It is a mini dress so I'm not about to wear it to work but not too short that I'd be self conscious around my parents in it. If you think this is cute, go for it. Getting sisterhood of the traveling pants vibes from this piece (aka it will look good on many body types).
Wore for a bachelorette party and loved! the straps were a little big but not so much that it bothered me. the material is stretchy and not super thick, which I liked.

I absolutely loved this dress! The length and fit were perfect and it is extremely flattering on and very trendy and cute. Unfortunately, it needs a clasp in the back. Once on, the zipper does not stay up/ closed. I am only a B cup and tried this on without a bra, so don't think it would work on anyone unless you are flat chested. Bummer since I really wanted to wear this and it would have been perfect for the event I rented it for.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a 90s themed party/concert
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting and tight on the upper half of the dress. A bit short for someone who is 5'6".
Very cute! Worn for a country concert. Worked great for the event! A bit small (shorter) than expected looked adorable with boots
perfect for a summer day!
I absolutely loved this dress. Super cute and easy to wear casually, which is what I did. I paired it was some comme de garon high top converse for a really cute casual look. Would rent again

I'm usually between a 4/6 but I went with the small, which I thought was the perfect fit- until I sat down! It's very short which I don't normally mind but I did find this a bit challenging to manage. Overall it's comfortable and absolutely adorable but might be better suited for someone 5'5" or shorter unless you want something short. I'd consider renting again in a medium but I think the straps might be too long as the ones on the small were borderline.
Loved the fit!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress - stick to your size
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. Can be dressed up w/ heels for a fun night out or be worn more casual during the day. I sized up based on other reviews but should have rented my size. I'm a 4, and M was a bit too big on me. Still worked okay, but would have been more flattering in S. Would consider renting again.

Fits like a dream, no need for a bra. Great length, just enough stretch that it holds you in without being TOO tight. Cute for daytime, can easily dress it up a touch for a summer night out. Would've bought it had I rented it at the beginning of summer.

links_reviews_title: was nervous because i did not size up like other reviews recommended, but..
links_reviews_text: I would have to say it fit very well. Unlike the model picture it did fit more snug around my bottom half than the a-line it suggests, but it still looked great! May re-rent in a size up in the future just to see if it would be a looser and better looking fit..

links_reviews_title: a little tight for a medium
links_reviews_text: I'm a pretty true medium and this dress was just a little tighter than I would've liked. I think the large would have been too big! Really cute otherwise.
SO cute and fit perfectly.
Dress was adorable and such a cute fit but will have to size up in order to wear
Perfect for a weekend in Nashville. I sized up and found that I didn't need to.
Unfortunately could not wear this because the straps were too long but I wish I could've because it was so cute!!

links_reviews_title: Fun take on the denim trend
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of the dress, but the straps were a little too long on me and would slip down every so often.

links_reviews_title: A lot of fun in a little denim dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was on point. I agree with other reviews - I think it's just one of those pieces that will look good on any body type. Fitted but still comfy and the ruffle straps added to the fun. If anything they were maybe a little too long but nothing that bothered me. Length was perfect too -- mid thigh or so, so I never felt like it was too short. I wore for a Saturday that started out with sneakers roaming around Chicago and with a quick change of shoes in my bag went straight into a date night with cocktails, dinner and a night of dancing. You'll have a lot of fun wearing this - just do it!
True to size, fits like a glove. Such great quality, I love it!
Though the material was forgiving, this dress was VERY short. The straps were also a bit longer than necessary. I did not end up wearing this because I felt it was too short/tight to be comfortable.

links_reviews_title: will order a bigger size, love the dress
links_reviews_text: did not wear, to small
I def need to size up on this one. It is a nice stretchy material and the fit is so cute! Will be returning for a bigger size. Can't wait to wear it!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was comfortable and very chic.
links_reviews_text: I'm a little shorter, so throughout the day, the fabric stretched a little and the straps on the dress kept falling down.
Ran too small. Couldn't wear.

I am between a 4 and 6, but since other reviewers said it ran small I went with the small. I was able to get it on as the material is super stretchy BUT every time I took a breath the zipper started to unzip itself! Walking around my apartment the dress came fully unzipped! I would try again in a medium because the dress itself is so cute. I would suggest sticking to your true size or even up one size to ensure the zipper stays in place.

Fit was great. I love the length of this and the cut. I wore to work with black slacks and a tank because of cleavage but I also wore during the day with jeans and flats and out at night with heels. Very versatile flattering tip. Puffy sleeves give it a very chic look
This top felt like a thick cut linen. The v neck was really deep but didn't feel too over exposed. You can wear the sleeves scrunched up or all the way down to create two different looks.

links_reviews_title: Never want to send this back!!!
links_reviews_text: Super flattering. I'm not a statement sleeve gal but this top was so classy. Medium fit perfectly. Would love to buy this piece. Wore so many times on many different occasions. Almost bought it... might still buy it!
Great top, loved the puff sleeves. It did wrinkle through out the day and it was a little low cut on me for work.

links_reviews_title: I felt very much like royalty
links_reviews_text: The zipper is difficult to reach
This shirt captures femininity in the simplest way. It has puffed sleeves (very trendy for this summer) and a deep v neckline that totally elongates the skillet.

The silhouette (flattering deep-v neckline and billowy sleeves...so good together!) and fabric of this shirt are an absolute dream in my opinion. I wore it a couple of times, with jeans on both occasions, and it felt so easy but super luxe. Khaite has such a ladylike aire to so many of its pieces, and this one is no exception. I honestly had a hard time sending this top back!
LOVE THIS
I loved the sleeves! To die for! Lots of compliments. Low cut for work but a shirt underneath it then take it off for a quick day to night switch.
It's a gorgeous top. It was too large unfortunately with the deep V it felt too exposed to wear loose.

Pros: Gorgeous fabric, tons of compliments, felt fantastic against my skin. The sleeves are adorable. My husband called it the "secretary-cum-CEO" 80s power top. Cons: Tight across chest, loose through waist, not a great fit for hourglass Recommend for: Small bust, very trim/straight frame and/or athletic build Pretty piece! If it were more reasonably priced, I would buy, size up and have the waist taken in to flatter my figure.

links_reviews_title: Love the idea, didn't work as well on.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit big, might have suited someone that was taller

This is a beautiful top - I wore a white tank underneath because I wore it to work and loved the look. Planned on wearing it out (and tank-less) but didn't have the chance. I rented the Medium because of someone's review/note regarding it pulling at the hips, but probably could have gone with a Small. Very classic, elegant top.

links_reviews_title: I felt elegant and feminine wearing white linen to work.
links_reviews_text: The sleeve cuffs kept rolling up my arms and I had to keep adjusting them all day.

Very chic blouse! I received many compliments on it and really loved the look of it. It is quite a deep v and a bit fitted around the hips (I have slightly wider hips than waist) which made pants underneath it a big awkward because the zipper And waistband showed through the shirt. Otherwise would recommend or try sizing up if this doesn't bother you!
Rented this for everyday work wear. Normally wear a 0 but the 0 looked very baggy, shapeless, and matronly. Sadly this one was a bust.

I wore this for a speaking engagement at work. Loved it! It's definitely a formal, profressional fit. I got compliments on the royal blue color. My only complaint is the silk lining rode up and bunched up a bit.
I rented this for a awards banquet for work. It was fitted but not tight . Loved the fit, length and subtle details. Will rent again!

Length was good. I found the lining got twisted up I moved around and I had to go to bathroom to make adjustments. I'm glad dress has the lining for coverage so I didn't mind the twisting too much. The sleeves got caught on my watch and bracelets due to the slightly shorter sleeve length. Would maybe rent again since I only wore dress once.

I rented this dress with a bunch of others as candidates for a speaking engagement. This dress was a bit too short to make the cut, but I still really liked it. Stunning color. A little short for me at 5'9" and needed tights for business. Dress was comfy and flattering. Blousy sleeves give some added shape and flair. The bottom of the dress is slightly tapered. Worked for me but wouldn't want it any smaller. Thought about buying, will keep in rental rotation!

links_reviews_title: Cute, but large and not flattering
links_reviews_text: Nice dress. Good quality. Runs large See picture, my right hand is holding you he excess material

This was a beauty. Color is a true, vivid royal blue. But, it just didn't look great due to being bulky. I usually do wear an 8. There was lots of room between bust and shoulders, no shape to the body. I will try this in a 6 when it is available.

links_reviews_title: Liked it! But more formal than I thought
links_reviews_text: A bit more formal than I thought. But i wore it w boots and tried and made it more fun.
I loved this dress! I loved how big the sleeves were. Such a fun and flattering dress.
This dress is perfect, great color and fit. I recommend it.
Beautiful rich color. Loved the tapered sleeve

Overall, this is a very pretty, basic work dress. Shade of blue is stunning and fits conservatively for an office environment. I think I probably could've sized one down and it would've fit a little less boxy, but it wasn't bad- definitely still wearable and tbh not totally sure the shoulders would've fit if I had sized down.
Loved this dress. Cute sleeves. Received tons of compliments. Paired with pumps and a chunky pearl necklace. Would rent again.
The dress was definitely on the heavier side and Uber conservative. I didn't end up wearing because the temperature was in the mid 80's. Way too hot!
A little large in the sleeves
Loved this dress!!! I enjoyed the sleeves and the color. I was able to wear it during the day and night. I will definitely be wearing this one again.
Love the bright blue color. I could have probably worn a 6, but the 8 was very comfortable. Crepe-like material and relaxed fit.
The color of this dress is amazing. I got a lot of compliments and it is the perfect length for work. It was true to size.
It hung like a sack on my frame but with a belt, it became wearable. I will definitely rent a size down if I decide to rent this again.
A little large, but a really comfortable and professional dress.
The color is great and the material is nice, it was a little big for my frame so I had to belt it and that worked fine.
I loved this dress! The sleeves added a fun touch to a simple, elegant dress in a beautiful color

Love the color. The neck is wider than anticipated and can show bra straps easily. Everything fit well, but I have larger thighs so the waist down was a slimmer fit than desired and led to ridding up.

Wore this to work several times for important presentations and got tons of compliments. I loved the sleeve detail. It was a little tight in the hips, but otherwise very accommodating for my 4-5 month pregnant bump. Great dress for many body types and maternity friendly.
The color couldn't be more stunning- the dress runs large. I should have sized down more than I did. If I got a size down i would've loved it. I still wore it to work once though.
Hung really well, cool details on the sleeves. Was happy to wear this in the winter with tights... at 5'8" it might have felt a little short for work without them
Beautiful color, very formal and perfect for work

links_reviews_title: great color - definitely a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: dress fits slim in the body, but the oversized sleeves make it very classy.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to wear to work but felt it was too tight.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful and I liked the sleeve length. Im an athletic build and the dress was right around my thighs and bum.
Like this one! Lined, comfortable, nice fabric.
Overall nice dress. Should have gotten the 6 as the 4 was just a little tight in the hips.

links_reviews_title: Good work dress, professional and beautiful blue
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress, not tight and I would even say, slightly loose. Professional for work and I dressed it down with white sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves too long and overall runs large
links_reviews_text: Looks like a potato sack dress according to my husband. Hes right and I did not wear.
Fits odd. Hips fit True to size but top was too large. Did not like the fit. Almost like top was two sizes bigger than hip area.

links_reviews_title: Part of a great suit combo
links_reviews_text: Cute pants and love the combo with matching blazer. The pants run large, however, particularly in the waist.
I am a solid size 2 on Derek Lam, but these ran big. I exchanged them for a 0 and they fit perfectly. Colors are white, grey, black, ocre, lilac.
Love

These pants, and the coordinating jacket, are suit heaven! The colors are fantastic and the little pop of lilac/pink transition the suit into the spring. I wore it with my own burgundy Tory Burch sweater and added a cute bow belt. Love it so much and will definitely rent again...tempted to purchase! I am a small waisted, larger bottomed gal with shorter legs (so not cropped on me) and these fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Mad for Plaid and these Pants
links_reviews_text: Love the plaid even though I didn't realize there's lavender in it. Other reviewers were right about sizing. I normally wear a size 4 but wasn't sure because of my short, hourglass stature. These pants are high waisted and fit like a glove in the waist, hips and thighs. Of course, they were long on me, hitting the top of my foot but looked great anyway. I wore them with and without the matching blazer and various shoes. They're a very versatile pair of pants and I got a ton of compliments.

I love the fabric for these pants. The plaid is both brash (lavender and maroon?!?) and conservative. The waistband is lined making them comfy and the fabric has some give. I'm afraid they are a little tight through the hips but fit my waist well.
Got some compliments on how different these pants were. Ran a bit on the large size. Looks best with a belt and heels.
Loved this suiting! Wore to work and then a charity gala. I'm usually a 6 but the 4 actually worked well.

links_reviews_title: I liked them!!! I needed some fun plaid in my life! They fit me just fine. True to size for me.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, looked good. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Slightly flavored work pant, big in hips, long on 5'4" me
links_reviews_text: These pants look a little big on my hips, which is surprising bc of my curvy shape. Also, the pants are a little long on me (5'4) and fall awkwardly between ankle pants and regular pants.
The pants are high-waisted so on trend. The print is versatile- can pair with black, white or burgundy. They fit like a glove.
Fit my legs perfectly, needed to take in at least an inch on the waist, belt and jacket helped!

links_reviews_title: I wish I would have sized down
links_reviews_text: These pants would have gotten 5 stars if I would have sized down to a 2 and they would have fit better. Unfortunately when I rented them there were no reviews and I didn't know! But overall beautiful and fun statement pant for work (or play!)
Found the pants and jacket to be very flattering. I wore to work events and received compliments all night. Wore with white tennis shoe during the day and pointed toe pumps at night.
Comfortable and gorgeous. Length was a bit off-- too long for ankle, too short for full, but looked great anyway
Lots of compliments at work. Fits real well and true to size.
Loved the plaid! The pants were comfortable and not tight! I paired it with the jacket and received many compliments. If you want to mix up your everyday solid suits try this fun ensemble!

links_reviews_title: Pants fit great. Very comfortable material.
links_reviews_text: May want to go up a size. They fit a little snug.
The zipper is hard to get up and is "rough" to zip up instead of a smooth zip, if that makes sense. Other than that, pants were fine

links_reviews_title: The fit is so comfy and they are super fun. casual with tennis shoes & fun for going out
links_reviews_text: heavy wool feel. super comfy and warm
The recommended size was too small. Would need at least one size up.
the plants are flattering but quite cropped

I rented these pants ina 4 and a 6, and ended up sizing up to the 6. They fit a little too loose in the waist, but the hips and booty fit a lot better in the larger size. They came down to just about my ankle.
Great pants

links_reviews_title: Hard to fit for a short person.
links_reviews_text: Gapped at the waist. Hard to fit for my short legs and body.
nice weight. high quality. unexpected burgundy/pink colors work well with basic gray and black.
The length was spot on so I can have the option of wearing with heels or flats. Def will rent again.

I could not believe they didn't fit and I was so excited about them! I could not even get close to buttoning and I'm a definitely a size 10. So I'm the odd one out but these pants ran extremely small. I will try again and size up when they are available.

links_reviews_title: Love these pants great for work!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and great for work

Loved these pants. The fabric is wonderful. Warm, but not too warm. I sized down because of other reviews. I'm normally a 6 and went to a 4. It was snug, but worked out fine. The fabric has enough give that I was comfortable and looked good. I would definitely rent these again, but I'd stick to my normal size - 6.

I ordered the pants a size bigger to make sure they would fit but they are true to size. Take your normal size. They were perfect for fall: I loved the colors and the material was very comfortable. I wore the pants with boots because they would have been a little bit too short for me if worn with shoes.
Nice material. Goes with a lot of tops.

links_reviews_title: Very high quality and the perfect amount of stretch
links_reviews_text: Very high quality and the perfect amount of stretch. I got a size smaller than I would normally (because of reviews) but it was a bit tighter than I had hoped. Still love this pair of pants!
I wanted to love these pants but they were too big in the waist. I may rent again but go down a size.
I was excited about these pants, but they were definitely disappointing and way too big on me. I would suggest sizing down. The pattern is really cute.

At the end of the day I would rent these again so obviously none of the small discrepancies are enough to prevent me from reordering. I ordered a size 2 R. Maybe it's just my build, but I thought they were loose in the waist while being pretty snug in the thighs/butt. I would be curious to see how a size 0 would work out for me, and if I rent them again that's probably what I'll get. If the 2 were the only size available I'd still get them!

links_reviews_title: Switching Up the Classic Black Suit
links_reviews_text: I wore these pants to a couple interviews this week. I am tired of the black basic suit, so I rented these pants to switch it up a little bit. I am usually a 6, but I rented the 8 for more of a conservative interview fit and added a belt at the waist. Super cute pants, I got a ton of compliments!
I wore with the jacket to get the full effect. It was very cool and professional looking. Kind of a retro vibe with a modern cut. really liked the fit and the colors

links_reviews_title: Great piece for a casual work day or weekend outing.
links_reviews_text: This was so cute and perfect for a casual work day. 4 stars only because the fit is a little weird. I had to keep pulling it down throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Super Fun twist on buffalo plaid trend
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a busy day running errands and working. Layered with a tank because it was a bit low cut but happy that even with my long waist it fit great.

links_reviews_title: Too low cut for my everyday life
links_reviews_text: The blouse fit true to size, with plenty of room in the sleeves for movement and comfort. The neckline, however, was too low for my comfort. I ended up returning it without wearing it.

Fit large in the chest and showed a lot more cleavage than I had expected, but worked well with a bralette. My boyfriend loved this on me! The details up front made it much more feminine than you're typical flannel. Would definitely rent again!
The shirt is big in the bust and dips a little low but overall its the perfect pairing to a pair of black jeans. Ready for my family holiday photo!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute flattering top! almost shows skin at waist but just right!
Love the fabric, but tight across chest
links_reviews_text: The sleeves and peplum are great on this- fit awesome. It is very low cut. Even with a tank under, I felt weird wearing it to work. The buttons were very stretched out over my chest. It would have been fine, but the extra fabric under the buttons kept folding over so you could see the gaping. Great idea, but way too tight for my chest.
Loved the print and feel of fabric. It is short, and I wasn't able to wear a bra given how low cut it is. Wore petals, but still I used fashion tape too. That is the only negative.

I truly love this shirt! It's such a classy and girlie twist to flannel Friday. The material is buttery soft and the sleeves are so Devine. I would totally rent again. The only thing to note is that the size runs a large so if you normally wear a medium then get a small. Even the larger size was still unnoticeable and very beautiful all day.
Cute but a little grumpy and boxy. Size down and have an undershirt prepared.
Very cute and very flattering! Perfect for everyday, or a casual office setting. Dips a little low in the front, otherwise a great find!
Another reviewer mentioned the low cut of this blouse which was okay, but - it has too much material around the middle and just looked sloppy on me.

links_reviews_title: Everything the comments said, were true.
links_reviews_text: A little low cut, but work a tank under at work and took off for evening activities. It's also a bit shorter on the mid section, but it's not crop by any means. I'd rent again.
Blouse is just ok, nothing special and didn't do much for me.

links_reviews_title: I liked the print, but the blouse felt short and not very special.
links_reviews_text: Not as heavy as I expected and better for mid to warm weather than anything cool. Blouse was fine, but not as special or high quality as I expect from RTR.
This style may not be viable if you're not tall (+5'6"?) with a long torso.

Super cute and flattering, but I found I couldn't wear to work because it was too low cut (I wear 34B). I wore it out to dinner and loved it! Just didn't want to keep pulling up the top while in the office.
didn't realize this was a crop top, a little too low cut.
Love the shirt! Wearing a cami or tank underneath is a must. The sleeves are a little long but it was ok. I received several comments on how cute the blouse was!
If you have a long torso this is probably not for you.
Perfect fit
Cute shirt for a day date. Perfect amount of skin shows, not too much, not too little.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual Christmas party at my best friend's house! Perfect holiday flannel flair!
links_reviews_text: RTR suggested an XXL in this designer and I usually wear an XL...it fit at the waist (elastic) and the sleeves were loose but it was LOW cut and I wish I had worn a tank underneath instead of pulling it up all night. However, it was so soft and so comfy and I LOVED the pattern. I'd definitely rent it again but in a smaller size!
I rented it for Thanksgiving wknd, this was too low cut for family events so did not wear, might be better to size down.

Love this top. I have an hour glass shape and a large chest so I was nervous it would be too big in some places and too small in others but it fit perfectly ! For reference I typically wear size 6 jeans, and a 36DD.
The shirt is a shorter fit. I didn't like the sleeves or fit. Loved the fall plaid though.
It was extremely low cut so I had to wear something under it, but it's cute and a great color.

links_reviews_title: Cute blouse, unique design. Wore to work and to date.
links_reviews_text: I was more comfortable wearing an undershirt underneath
Very comfy shirt, plenty of room for large bust and curves. Would rent/buy!

Really cute and fit nicely but a bit too warm for hot weather we are having in Georgia this year. Great UGA colors too (red and black). Would definitely need a cami - not quite sure who could wear it without one, even tho photo looks like the model doesn't have one.

I ordered a S instead of an XS based off the comments. It was too large so I wore a white shirt underneath and that seemed fine. Sleeves were a little too long. Overall a cute top but I should have ordered an XS.
I'm pretty much always a M but the M was way too big to wear. Would definitely have needed a S. Size down!
Was a little itchy. Wore a large because it's all they had. It was big and long sleeves, but still looked good.

I wore the sweater to meet up with some girlfriends and run some errands, got plenty of compliments, plus it was easy to wear and style. It is oversized and comfy. It is wool, so for those for sensitive skin know that it's a bit itchy.
I could have worn the next size down, but I actually liked the oversized look of this.

I really enjoyed this rental. It's definitely an oversized sweater. I was unsure what size to order, so I sized up. If you looking for something not as bulky, you may want to size down. I wore this sweater multiple times as it was comfortable and a great transition into October.

Now that I am working from home for who knows how long, I have been renting lots of sweaters and lounge wear. This one is so cute, though it definitely runs big - I wish I had sized down. Its warm without being scratchy, and pairs well with either leggings or jeans. The pattern is even prettier in person - it really elevates an otherwise basic wardrobe staple.

Larger than expected, sleeves were very long, bottom belled out some, I couldn't tell if that was the intended style or if it was stretched out. Looked like a sweater I pulled out of the back of my closet so I returned it to rent something more fun.
Good basic everyday sweater. Flattering and comfy. I'll probably rent it again.
Nice enough, good everyday

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the pattern but the fit was way off. It was ok through the arms, but then really boxy and awkward through the chest and waist.

links_reviews_title: Very soft and comfortable to pair with jeans or black leggings.
links_reviews_text: Baggie sweater that worked great with skinny jeans and black leggings. Material is very soft. Overall fit was perfect.
Love this sweater! Super cute and comfy although a little scratchy on the arms. Perfect for every day.
I love a good everyday sweater and this fit the bill perfectly!
Arms were way too loose and long, overall too big.
Fit was loose. Nice knit. The texture of the pattern is nice. This is a great comfortable sweater, perfect for just hanging out.
I'll rent it again. High quality and perfect for Spring
Nice colour (not irritating), pretty warm & easy to match other clothing. Really worth a try
This sweater was nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy but nothing special
links_reviews_text: This sweater was great for casual weekend events, but isn't a standout or anything like that. It is cozy and a nice soft fabric.
Love this sweater! Wore my regular size and the fit was boxy and big in the arms, but the style worked. Could have easily sized down. Considering buying, could see this as a staple even in spring.
Too boxy, not for a petite woman like me
Wanted to love this sweater, but it was very boxy and thick so not flattering at all.
As a first monthly rental I chose a 'safe option' in this sweater. It was easy everyday wear, true to size, good quality. I would rent this again next winter.
Great fit and beautiful knit

links_reviews_title: Was fin to wear for work
links_reviews_text: I am full busted and it looked a bit boxy on me. I wore one time to work but was fine sending back after one wear. I think if you are more petite it would like nicer.

links_reviews_title: Cute oversized sweater, little awkward around the bottom.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is cute from the neckline down to the bottom of the weave pattern. Below that, it has kind of an awkward bell shape around the belly that I didn't totally love. I did a french tuck in the front and made it work. The color and weave pattern are pretty and cozy. I also had to fold up the sleeves a little so they weren't too long. It's an oversized style though so I didn't mind. Cute for a casual outfit but nothing I would wear to work/an event.
I really liked the comfy fit of this sweater. I do wish I had sized down because the arms were very long, but aside from that, the sweater was cute and had a nice casual look.

I love this sweater so much. I love the super-long sleeve cuffs, the textures of the knits, and the way the body hangs boxy and loose. It's medium-weight, soft and perfect for layering. Although it looks casual on me, its luxury feel gives me a warm sense of well-being. If you're not into the oversized look, try it in a size or two smaller than your usual sizeand be sure to check it out in swanky black, too.
When you want to be warm and cozy but you still want to look chic.
This was an alright basic sweater. The fabric was a little itchy and it doesn't seem as high quality as a lot of other options on this site. It fit me well and was in good condition though.
na
Pretty itchy but very warm! Perfect for cold winter days!
Nice everyday sweater that looks nice, keeps you warm, and is very comfortable.

I had hoped to wear this for family pictures, but it arrived late (holidays, it happens). It was definitely big, so I wouldn't have been able to wear it for the pictures anyway, as it wasn't a flattering look. But it was nice for a rainy, cold Texas day for general wear. I really love the diamond pattern, but the cuffs were very loose.
Fit was nice (a little wide around the neckline). Very comfortable and flattering for an everyday-type sweater.

Wore on a Friday dress-down day at work. Cute sweater, definitely wouldn't have paid full price for it though. I had to roll the sleeves up twice (I purposely ordered one size up), but I tend to do that regardless with sweaters. Material was nice, not itchy or uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: beautiful knit, but you have to want this shape
links_reviews_text: Beautiful knit pattern and wool. Not too itchy; quite warm. I cuffed the sleeves and they look good that way. The loose drape-y fit below the bust will cover a middle bulge, but I didn't find it that flattering.
This sweater was great for my trip to London in Dec - was very cozy and kept me warm! It's a bit on the baggier side, but that's the look I prefer so was great for me.
Loose/large fit and overall very comfy. It is good for a casual work environment or everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: Super big and boxy, yet cozy
links_reviews_text: Great color and style, but quite large and boxy. Definitely order down a size or two. Very cozy for winter days. Wouldn't order again though.

This was perfect for day to day and formal events. Good size, it's small but fit way more than I expected - a wallet, sunglasses, water bottle, planner, and small makeup bag. Leather is high quality and I love the pop of red on the inside!

links_reviews_title: Such a simple bag, but it also makes a statement.
links_reviews_text: Love the bag, it's honestly the perfect size for day to day. not too big but not too small. I tend to throw a million things that I don't need in my tote, but this bag was perfect! Fit my wallet, sunglasses case, makeup perfectly.
Absolutely love this little bag. The red interior adds something sexy and it is the perfect size for a phone, big wallet, lipsticks and even a water bottle! Wish I could afford to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern and bottom flair of this skirt!
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear for my birthday dinner. I paired it with a black leather jacket and big earrings to play up the pattern but you could also dress this down. No give on the waist and very thin material.
I wasn't expecting this to fit well but it is very high waisted and fit great. Lots of compliments and I love the print!
Beautiful pattern and color. Plus it doesn't wrinkle!! Only downside is the waist has zero stretch. I would recommend sizing up if you want to be more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It jazzes up any simple top. The print and color are fantastic!
links_reviews_text: It is a thin material so I wore tights underneath

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt, runs small size up one
links_reviews_text: Wore for work function very tight in the waist& hips- if curvy may want to size up. I was still able to wear it and looked great but was a bit uncomfortable for 8 hours of work.

The Fifth Label consistently runs small, so I ordered up 2 sizes. I typically wear a 8/10, but rented the XL because I knew this brand runs small. The XL was a little too big to wear super high with a crop top so I had to use a safety pin. I wore it a second time a little lower around my hips with an oversized sweater and it worked perfectly. The skirt itself is thin, doesn't wrinkle and has a rich, vibrant orange/red and black pattern.
The XL definitely fits like a US 10. The waist line has zero stretch. Would have loved to wear but it just was too snug.
Loved wearing this! It was a great fit and great fabric

The fabric and pattern are so, so gorgeous but I definitely recommend sizing up! I'm a pretty true 4 and the small was uncomfortably tight in the waist. Sending back and hoping the medium will be available so I can try that!
Fabric is lightweight but an outstanding fall piece. Lots of compliments. I wore for work but easily could be paired with accessories to dress up or dress down.
This skirt is is pretty and run small. Would rent again in a larger size.
The fabric is pretty thin, so you will need to be careful about panty lines. I wore it with a black turtleneck bodysuit and it was very cute.
Runs large so I sized down. I like that it is long enough for me as a tall girl to still wear to work and feel appropriate. Will rent again.
Good for fall. Too thin for winter. Fabric a little scratchy but forgiving fit.
I really liked this dress. I wore it with and without tights. The color and material is so nice and print is very classy. It does run a little big

I'm 5'6"--it hit right above my knee. There's so much fabric that it felt longer. It's a very conservative dress. Has pockets. Cinches at the waist & can be tightened to your preference. Color is gorgeous & the pattern was a lot of fun--got several compliments. While I loved it for a day at work, I wouldn't rent again. Sleeves were too long--had to fold the cuff up for it to look good. The fabric gapped at the buttons at times (and I'm very small chested).

I wore this twice for a September weekend walking around NY and picnicking in Central Park. It was comfy, did not wrinkle, and even looked cute with Converse sneakers. The print is fun and whimsical. A little long for my petite frame, but not frumpy.

links_reviews_title: Lovely blue color, and fun giraffe print
links_reviews_text: I loved the color blue of this dress, and wearing it was easy and effortless. Still, I thought the giraffe print was a bit too dispersed and would have preferred for there to be more giraffes in the print. The waist has an adjustable tie, which was great for me since I'm a bit straight and narrow, and could always use a good conch at the waist.

links_reviews_title: Fun print - easy to wear fabric
links_reviews_text: I was worried that this was going to be a little clingy but it actually laid very nicely. I apologize for the unhelpful picture but I'm 511 and the length was work appropriate.
This was a professional dress with such a fun twist with the giraffe print. Got so many compliments on this.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but slightly overwhelming bc it runs large
links_reviews_text: This felt pretty big and lots of fabric but I liked the pattern and it was too comfy to not wear. Work appropriate length. Def recommend but size down.

I love this print and the dress itself. I rented a medium because of Slate and Willow's inconsistent sizing but I should have rented the small. It is big--too wide and wide at the waist- and not super flattering but I still love it. The fabric is comfortable and it would work with tights in the cooler. I think it could go with any footwear. I wish I ordered the right size because I would have kept it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Giraffe print - Perfect for Work or Everyday, with Pockets!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress that I wore a few times, to a meeting and out to a Broadway play. It's a soft sort of clingy material, and it has pockets! It's certainly work appropriate, although I do wear most dresses with tights, so it might be a tad short for some. I love the print and will definitely rent again!

This dress fit just as expected. I wore it with the sleeves rolled up and there is a button to keep them up. The inside of the fabric is not colored blue, so it does show the inside of the dress when rolled. Great everyday dress with a fun pattern.
Fit amazing and was super comfortable yet classy for work.
This is a thinner material than I thought, but a cute print. I think a medium would have fit better, but I was able to cinch it in with the drawstring.

links_reviews_title: So cute, but way too big
links_reviews_text: I should have read other reviews more carefully. Very cute, but very big. I'm 5'4", 125 lb. and the S was swimming on me. Will try to rent in Ca
I got a few compliments on the print of this dress. I'm large chested and it fit very comfortably. Runs true to size.

I really enjoyed this dress and the fun print--the material is very lightweight which makes it great for travel and warm weather (I live in AZ). My only complaint is that since it's a button up, I had to make sure that my bra wasn't being exposed if the fabric pulled apart between buttons. You may want to wear a camisole underneath. Overall, I was really happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: It was cute and lightweight. Good for early fall transition.
links_reviews_text: I liked the pattern and the adjustable waist drawstring. What I didn't like is the dress wrinkled easily and got clingy from static easily too.

links_reviews_title: It is a lovely dress that goes well with everyday.
links_reviews_text: the fabric is light and sturdy. I am very happy with it.

Very comfortable and versatile dress. True to size- the dress appears large (especially waist and hips) when you first take it out of the garment bag, but once you tie it, it fits perfectly and the skirt flares out nicely. Nice fabric and fun giraffe print :-) Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was just a little too big on me so I didin't love the fit. Loved the print.
links_reviews_text: Too big.

I loved this dress, the print is great and the material is comfy. It runs big and I could have sized down to an XS, though the drawstring waist made the S work. I received many compliments on this one! It was about knee length on me (I'm 5') with the drawstring tied.

This dress is good option for a comfy look - i'm typically a 0/2 and the XS fit large - but the drawstring helps give it shape. When I first walked into work my coworker said - giraffes fun! ha. It was nothing to write home about

So this dress was enormous on me (so much extra fabric on the back) but small in the chest at the same time (???) where the buttons were popping open. Not sure how that's possible. It comes with a little drawstring waist making it easy to finch down and make it look not so huge. Fun print.

Loved this rental. I wore this dress for work and it was comfortable, stylish and I got tons of compliments. Easy to wear and it didn't wrinkle, which I always appreciate in a work dress! Will definitely rent this again.
Got several compliments at work. Fun print and comfortable. Does not breathe very well and it was big on the shoulders and arms.

links_reviews_title: Don't Listen to RTR Size Suggestion
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress and great quality and would have loved to wear it. However I went with RTR size suggestion and ordered the XL since there were no reviews yet. It was giant - should have gone with the Large and not listened to RTR.
The giraffe print is adorable. The dress is super comfortable and flattering! Total win and will definitely be renting again
I rented this for my bridal shower and received compliments all day! 10/10 recommend. It was a little lose on me and I am usually a 10.

links_reviews_title: High quality material, great for for petites

links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bridal shower and it was a hit. I'm a zero pretty much all the time and the fit was perfect. It was a teensy bit long on me (I'm 5'2") but I wore super tall heels and it didn't matter too much. From the description I thought it was going to be a really light linen-y fabric but it's actually quite sturdy, almost like a canvas or denim. Which is great because it didn't wrinkle too badly!
Dresses up or down, great for a summer wedding, thick fabric but feels high quality
Received lots of compliments. It's very flattering and great quality.

This is such a lovely outfit. Took it on vacation and wore it for my birthday dinner. It does run small on the hip so I went a size up and I'm so glad I did. The material is like a denim material so a bit think but very comfortable and it wasn't too hot. Would definitely rent again!

Rented this for my wedding shower and could not have been more pleased with it. The material is nice and stretchy but still substantial, it was so comfortable and I got so many compliments. I think I definitely could have worn a 10, but a 12 was all that was available at the time and I'm happy with the fit. I strongly recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable, casual bridal event or weekend look.
Got tons of compliments. Beautiful fit and scalloped details. Loved it so much!

Dress it up or dress it down, this jumper is adorable! I wore a strapless bra, as the straps were a little long for me and I didn't want to see my bra. The fabric does wrinkle easily. This is super comfortable -- I want to own it!

links_reviews_title: I wish I owned this jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect jumpsuit for my bridal shower! So comfortable and classy - I loved wearing it.

I actually loved this! I wasn't sure at first but wore it for my bridal shower. It was extremely comfortable and wasn't too tight. I ended up wearing the 6, instead of the 8. Didn't even need to wear a bra which is very rare for me! Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. Got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. A tad long on me, but ok.
Fit like a glove. Straps are adjustable if needed. Considered buying this one because I loved it so much.

Loved wearing this jumper, I am tall so it's pretty hard for me to find a jumper that fits me. I am a pretty curvy woman and I had to wear spandex shorts on the bottom of this to push in my butt because of the light color. It looks great and was pretty true to size, I would love to actually own this.

links_reviews_title: Perfect look for a mod bride - loved this fun jumpsuit for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Very cute fit, ran a little big. Sturdy fabric, loved the scalloped edges - would recommend to any bride!

links_reviews_title: Perfect color, perfect fabric, perfect fit
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was everything I had hoped for! I wore it to the horse races and a vineyard and was super comfortable the whole time. The only downside was a torn button that was attached when I left for the day but quickly slipped off leaving one strap unattached. No worries though, undid the other strap and wore it was a strapless jumpsuit -- problem solved and still pretty cute!

links_reviews_title: Sort of need a chest to fill this out
links_reviews_text: This is pretty long, even at 5'8" with a heel it is still a little long. I wanted it to be a little shorter. It's also really big up top. I don't have a big chest and feel like it would have made the top stick out a little more abs look like a little cute crop if I had a bigger chest. I think it's cute, but not gushing over it.

links_reviews_title: Great spring look for a Sunday Funday
links_reviews_text: So many compliments! I'm 5'7" and the pants were a little long so I'd recommend a small heel.

Rented to wear at night on vacation. The straps are adjustable to two different lengths, which I have rarely if ever seen on a jumpsuit so I suspect this would look good on long and short torsos alike. I am a 36D and usually the tiered tops can make me look too top heavy but felt like this was actually flattering. Fun to pair with bold bag, earrings and lipstick
