It was a little too garden party for a basketball game so I added cropped boots and a biker jacket. It's comfortable and long enough in the torso for tall women!

links_reviews_title: Fun for engagement photos or just general cuteness
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my engagement photos and loved the funky/sweet scalloped seams. Plus the pockets are ideal for someone who never has any idea what to do with their hands in pictures. (Does anyone have some mugs I can hold?) It fit great and was super comfy. Highly recommend!
I'm 5 foot and with 3 inch heels this was a perfect fit it was nicely fitted around the waist and butt area I was worried the size 2 would be too small but it was perfect
Decided not to wear the jumpsuit

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, so many compliments, convenient pockets, loved it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 6 and a size 8, ended up wearing the 8 because the 6 was not long enough through the body. The fit of the 8 was perfect. The material is more casual than it looks online - heavier canvas-type material, which was perfect for our more casual rehearsal dinner venue. I got a ton of compliments and was comfortable all night. Wrinkled a bit but still looked great. Wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Scallops made this a fun wear, especially the placement of scallops along the pockets - so cute!
links_reviews_text: Fit: I ordered the 4 and 6, wore the 6. The bum felt a bit tight, the bust a bit loose. Even when adjusted to the tightest button that connects on the interior at back, the straps were just a bit too long. Color: The jumpsuit looked almost pale pink, but still came across white, likely because I wore a black linen cardigan with it since we had unexpectedly cool weather. However, I had intentionally ordered a white item for rehearsal dinner. Likely, the one I receive was just dingy from previous wears and washes. Fabric: Heavier than expected - had the weight and feel of canvas. I would not have worn this fabric with metallic heels, as it is styled in the RTR images. I wore with a low-heeled suede sandal, which was more suitable. Condition: There were a couple light gray spots that almost looked like the silver zipper had rubbed color onto the fabric.
So it definitely runs small and the linen doesn't iron well. I ended up not wearing it.
It's beautiful and you can dress up or down, looks good for any occasion, confortable, would definitely rent again

This runs REALLY small in the hips and bottom. If you are curvy beware. I wound up not wearing this because the pulling of the fabric at the crotch was just too obvious and the jumpsuit wasn't all that comfortable as result.
This romper is one of the most perfect things I've ever worn! Comfy, cute, and honestly so flattering. Non stop compliments all day.
the fit on this was really weird. the pockets started high up, i thought it would hit around my hips. it just was not flattering on a curvy girl. I did love the scalloped edge design though.

This jumpsuit is absolutely adorable! It was too big on the top for me so unfortunately I couldn't wear it. I will try to rent again in a smaller size! The color is not a stark white; a little softer white. The scallops are adorable and it is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Its just so darn cute with the scalloped edges, great support up top and wide legs!
links_reviews_text: Perfect all around for a shorter full figure!
It's an adorable cut and easy to wear and very comfortable but definitely runs large!

This is THE MOST Flattering jumpsuit i've ever worn! Very thick canvas-type material, which i found forgiving. Not too tight around the waist, which is my least fav area. I feel so confident in this and get TONS of Compliments! The scallop details are gorgeous! Rent this!!
Wonderful jumpsuit! Works nicely with a pearl necklace. #day-to-night #graduation
I loved the top of this jumpsuit, but the overall look made me look like a house painter. The fabric is a bit denim-like, so I felt like I was wearing overalls. Sadly not as cute as I expected.
This was super cute but is very large! I recommend sizing down at least 1 size, if not 2.

links_reviews_title: Wore to one of my engagement parties! Was fun and feminine!
links_reviews_text: Straps were adjustable with 2 options which was super nice!
Easy to dress up or down. Material sturdy (ok to go braless in my opinion). Adjustable straps so worked for my longer torso. It was a fun one to wear!
I usually have a hard time with jumpsuits, but this one fitted like a glove. It's beautiful. My curves look great, and it's very comfy. Perfect for a night out!

This dress was beautiful to wear to work on St Patrick's Day. It is high quality material but seems to run a bit bigger than most 4s. It was loose all over on me (I might be between a 2 and a 4) but is a very flattering cut with a more narrow waist.

I probably could have worn a 14! So comfy! Didn't need to add a sweater or blazer to this as the sleeve length was a perfect balance. Pretty dark green that goes with either nude or black shoes. Length was great! Would definitely get again!

links_reviews_title: Fit well. Very comfortable for work!
links_reviews_text: I loved this for work. It was a great weight for a fall or winter day. It came just to my knees, which is a little shorter than I usually wear, but is looked good. I loved the seaming on the bodice. It really made the fit excellent. A simple dress, but can be dressed up or down so easily. Would rent it again or buy.

I loved this dress! Beautiful, rich color! The cut and fit of this dress made it appropriate for a work holiday party, while still having personality! Not too tight, but still gave a nice waist. Not too short for 5'10" with heels!

I love this dress and am kicking myself for not keeping it. The cut is perfect for curves. The fabric is a gorgeous winter, forest green. It's the perfect weight for colder climates and overall just very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take this dress off!
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my backup but I'm SO glad the first one didn't work out because I LOVE this dress! So comfy and flattering! Wore it for a work Christmas party. Perfect Christmas green color! Will definitely rent again!!!!
Nothing special but if are looking for a classic work dress look no further. Beautiful green color is the highlight. Fit well.
This dress is very form flattering, professional, and a great color. I love how it lays. I rented a size 4, slightly big but a size 2 would be uncomfortable. Beautiful and I hope to buy!
Super comfortable and sleek. great for work or a modest holiday event

links_reviews_title: Pretty but size down two sizes!
links_reviews_text: Runs very large but pretty color and comfortable material
Unfortunately didn't get to wear because the size 2 was way too big. Will consider renting again in a 0.

links_reviews_title: Overall nice dress but waist was too big.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this dress, but the waist of the dress was too big and made me look like I was pregnant. This was also the smaller of the two sizes I ordered of this style...

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and flattering. I recommend sizing up when ordering.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a great dark color and a mid-weight garment. I recommend going up because I have been recently wearing size 14 dresses and decided to order the 18 in this one. I'm glad I did because it was only slightly loose.
I loved the fit and the feel of this dress. Wore it for my Christmas party.

links_reviews_title: Classic silhouette; fits better than other A-line dresses, but not perfect
links_reviews_text: I received a few compliments on this one. It's a nice deep dark green color and a feminine silhouette, but still felt baggy in the chest and shoulders while tighter in the waist and arms.

links_reviews_title: Perfect pick for a daytime baby shower, just fancy enough.
links_reviews_text: I thought the fit was great, I felt really comfortable. Fabric has some stretch, but is thick enough that it didn't feel flimsy and was nicely structured. Had to wear some shapeware for the midsection, but didn't have to wear anything heavy duty to smooth everything out. Paired with some great jewelry this dress was a great confidence booster. The emerald/ darker green color was very flattering, received several compliments on it.
I got compliments all day.
Great color and fit
Dress was appropriate length and thickness for professional office setting. Cute and classy enough to dress for dinner out or date night.
Danced the night away and didn't have to worry about my neckline or hemline showing more than I was comfortable with!
Gorgeous green color, very work appropriate. Was loose in the waist for me. I normally am a 16 but I feel I could have sized down.
This dress was not unique, but was a pretty color and simple for work. It ran very large.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and a great shade of green
links_reviews_text: Seems to run big but overall a pretty dress and I would rent this again

links_reviews_title: On the fancier side for work
links_reviews_text: Runs large but not too large. Is flattering. On the more conservative side.
I love the deep green color and thick fabric on this RL dress. It fit fine in the top but the waist was way loose.

links_reviews_title: Fit wasn't good enough to wear out of the house
links_reviews_text: Just didn't sit very well across shoulders and bust, and was too short-waisted for me. Also wide short skirt didn't feel right for my age (50). Not my favorite green - too much towards teal/jade.
This fit perfectly and was very flattering. It was perfect for work.

This dress is cute, structured, and completely comfortable. I am usually between a 4 and a 6 and the 6 was definitely a bit baggy on me. If I rented it again, I would go for a 4. Otherwise, love this wardrobe staple.

Great piece! I wore it to work. Easily transitioned with fun earrings to after work and even a shower, rehearsal dinner, etc. Slimming and comfortable! Will absolutely rent again. Thought about buying!
This is a classic RL dress. The material is thick, but not heavy. It is perfect for fall. It is very comfortable and flattering. Fits hour glass shape great.
Beautiful dress. Many compliments.
This dress is beautiful -- perfect for fall and winter. It was lovely for work with a pair of pumps but could also be dressed up for a holiday party. Ran true to size.
Beautiful top, perfect with jeans in warm weather.
Excellent shirt for everyday. I wasn't sure what the print was...strawberries. So I wore it on a hot autumn day. Material is nice...soft

If you are looking for a fun, casual button-down, this is your pick! The dainty, strawberry print and light material makes it perfect for summer. Half tucked into a pair of jeans makes it work appropriate, but simply tie it up and you are ready for a girl's night out.
Loose fit and very comfortable, smooth and light fabric. Slightly transparent. Tends to wrinkle, so not great for traveling.

Rented this for casual Friday to wear into the weekend, really cute blouse and really soft / comfortable fabric! Would definitely recommend this too because it's easy and fun for summer but still work appropriate so can easily transition to weekend!
This is a comfortable top that isn't too boxy but loose fitting. The print is cute and it can actually be worn dressed up or down and casual. I also liked that it wasn't super sheer .
I love the soft flowy fabric and adorable berries. Great for business casual or casual Fridays.
Great blouse! The fabric is lightweight so it's good for early fall or spring. The print is really cute. Great fit

Got this for work. I got a large because a medium was not available. It was quite big on me so I would say it's true to size. Even though it was large I was able to cuff the sleeves and wear with some slim pants or pencil skirt. Nice fabric but did wrinkle easily.
Nice easy top.
So comfy! I wore it w jeans, Jean shorts and even a skirt, everyone loved the little strawberries. Perfect summer shirt.
I rented this for business casual days in the office. The fabric is very comfortable, though wrinkles fairly easily. Easy transition from work to evening. The print is very cute!

links_reviews_title: It was light and comfortable for humid days in Asia.
links_reviews_text: I took this for a work trip to Asia and it was very hot and humid. I didn't want to always be sleeveless so this was a nice lightweight option, but it was a little big on me and easily wrinkled. It felt good though!

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. It's cute and sharp. Got a ton of compliments on the strawberry print!
links_reviews_text: I wore this tucked in, tied at the waist and out. Loved it each way!
Very comfortable. Sleeves quite long for me but it's so easy to just roll it up.
Perfect summer work shirt
It is just too warm for summer and too casual for the office. I wanted to see if it could work for an office environment, but not quite.
Wore this to work! It's really cute and light! Only thing is that it runs a bit big I normally wear a M or L and the M was too big! I suggest sizing down.
Very comfortable and matches with many bottoms. Runs a little big but really liked it overall.

links_reviews_title: A Wee Short for Tall Girls
links_reviews_text: I was hoping this would be a longer sweatshirt so I could wear it with leggings, but it hit me right above my hipbone. I do have a long torso, and perhaps I should've gotten a larger size. Cute fun celestial design, though. Regular sweatshirt material.

Just super fun and cute. Was afraid it would be sort of cropped like most sweatshirts these days so sized up but it's a nice low hip length and super comfy. Love it and might buy but will probably swap down to a large first.

I loved this. It was the perfect thing to throw on with jeans and sneakers for a rainy, lazy day. The little bit of shine to the stars/moon made me still feel a little pulled together. It does run big, but I didn't mind it. I might try to size down next time but I was fine with it being a little oversized.
Wildfox runs large imo, and true to form i sized down from my normal S to XS. I did NOT want to give this back, i kept it for a month!! Such a cute, stylish sweatshirt. Highly recommend!
Great fabric. Super comfortable sweatshirt.

At work it was Camo day and this was a fun top to wear. I received so many compliments on this top. It's one of my favorite pieces because it's a comfy light sweatshirt. It's a versatile top - paired with leggings, denim and slacks.
I loved this! My family hated it. I got an xl bc that was available but a L would have prob been better. Cute little sweatshirt!
I wore this 3 times in a week. Very easy to throw on!
I thought it was a little bit stiff feeling, but the cute puffy sleeves and the pattern make up for it. Multiple compliments.

Very warm sweatshirt but a dressy take on an every day look. Got three separate compliments when I wore it even from my boyfriend who has less than zero fashion sense. If you want it a little roomier definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Made a quarantine stay at home a little brighter.
links_reviews_text: Great color and pattern, and sleeves were fun!

This was a stylish take on a comfy sweatshirt. I loved the puffy sleeves. The only thing for me is that you found it w bit short in the torso and I Have a short torso so it could be almost a crop top on some.

I rented this for some fun weekend/workout wear. It didnt disappoint. When I wore to my safely spaced spin studio I got all the compliments. Comfortable and cute for non workouts too. As a work from home outfit I styled with jeans and neon yellow valentino pumps (yeah, because I was feeling myself even though I was home alone).

links_reviews_title: Rent this! Such a cute shirt, flattering style and on trend. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is comfortable, it's a flattering cut, tapers slightly at the waist. I loved the spin on camo and the color. I received so many compliments.
One of a kind
love it
Great fitting sweatshirt that is medium weight. Wore it a couple times and got multiple compliments on it.
Loved this! got tons of compliments and is a fun twist on the camo trend...It runs a tad big so will size down next time
Wore four times - twice to work, once out with friends, and once out with family. Super easy to wear and a lot of compliments.

Rented this to wear to work (we are jeans casual typically) and it was so cute! The shape of the sleeve and pop of bright yellow made it a standout piece. Seriously considered purchasing it. Highly recommend!
The sleeves gave it a fun detail. But it wasn't really my style.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. Too "special" to own and a perfect rental! Styled it exactly as the picture shows.
links_reviews_text: More structured in that it isn't super soft but nonetheless looks great and is comfortable.

Such a cute dress! I liked this so much more than I expected to. When I first ordered it I thought it would simply be a work dress but it was actually so cute and versatile. Good for work, everyday, dinner, and etc. definitely add a belt if you have one that'll match. Only bad thing is the material doesn't breath so if you sweat easily...you'll sweat A LOT in this

Fit perfectly and even had shape with figure flattering print/pattern in the right place despite being a very loose fitting dress. The silk has a few wrinkles on the back when i got it so if that stuff bothers you, be wary, but it's silk so i expected it and didn't mind at all! I may buy this piece since i can't bear to send it back!
Beautiful print from Tory Burch. So many compliments on this dress! On the shorter side, but I am 5'10".
This is just beautiful! I loved the length and fit. Paired with a long structured blazer it was perfect for work.
I'm 5'8 and yes the dress is a bit short. I wore it for work with navy tights and boots, it was a hit, the dress is quite lose but it does not make you look fat, all the opposite
I enjoyed sweating this dress as the pattern is fun and the fabric is light and silky. It need a belt otherwise it looks a bit baggy.

I rented this for work, but it turned out to be too short (and the bottom came WAY up when I moved my arms) for my job as a high school teacher. This was a bummer, but I did end up wearing this as a dress to dinner out with friends (hence the selection of it as an "everyday" piece instead). It felt a little shapeless and sloppy on its own, but I made it work with a long vest and scarf. I also wore this to work tucked in to a skirt, and I think it would work well for a more casual day over leggings. The print is cute and the fabric is nice, but I would have liked it more if it had been suitable for work as a dress.

Love how lightweight this dress is and the silky texture is very nice. The pattern is so fun! It gives the dress an almost edgy chic vibe. Great for everyday, but I would not recommend wearing this on a windy day!

links_reviews_title: This dress makes me feel like a million bucks! It is so comfortable and fashionable.

links_reviews_text: This is true size to other Tory Burch items. Overall Tory Burch runs big in my opinion. I'm normally a 4 in other designers and sometimes a 6. However, in Tory Burch I'm a 2. I love this dress/shirt. I opted to wear it as a shirt bc I thought it looked cuter. Great material and quality. I'd wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Better as a top than dress
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this tucked into jeans rather than as a dress. I'm pretty tall and it was way too short to wear to work as a dress. That said I loved the look with white jeans! Note the fabric does wrinkle easily so wouldn't recommend if you're traveling.
Just a fun comfy dress. Got lots of compliments. Only thing to be wary of is the buttons if you're a busty girl (I had some issues but nothing I couldn't deal with) just needed to be alert

links_reviews_title: Would have been 5 stars if it didn't wrinkle
links_reviews_text: I loved this print, material (100% silk), and the dress overall. I will likely rent this again. I wore it with a belt because it looked better that way in the morning and I received a lot of compliments in the morning. The print looked a bit Versace and the material made me feel expensive. The compliments started to die down later on when the fabric started to crease around the belt and from sitting at the office. It's 2019 - I just don't understand why we can have self-lacing shoes, but not make clothes that don't wrinkle? Like, yes, it's 100% silk, but if my $25 sale Gap Softspun dress doesn't wrinkle, I frankly expect more from a $500 Tory Burch. Other than the wrinkling, I absolutely loved it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress with great pattern. Runs large
links_reviews_text: I am usually between an 8 and a 10, and ordered a size 6. I could have probably gone down to a 4. It was lovely fabric, flowed so nicely, and was perfect for a warm/hot summer day that cooled down in the evenings. Sleeves were a bit long, but I just rolled them up. I thought about wearing a belt but it just never looked right. The one downside is that the fabric is almost see-through in the butt area, so I had to wear nude underwear. The long white tank top I wore underneath could be seen.

This runs true to size, is versatile as styling can give it a little edge or a conservative but fun work appropriate item. The silk has a nice weight that allows it to breathe in the Florida heat and humidity, but I could layer this item with boots and tights for cold weather. I recommend this dress highly and have worn it a few times because of its ease and fun print.

links_reviews_title: So pretty and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: It didn't look baggy . Warning it's slightly see through

I wanted to size down but my normal size was the only one available. I definitely could've gone down one size or even two. Very cute but I needed to belt it to give myself some shape. Might rent again in a much smaller size.
This is definitely one of my favorite dresses I've rented. So easy to wear but looks so well put together.
Very light and comfortable material and roomy enough for baby bump. Would definitely rent again

This dress is technically a long shirt. However I loved it with black leggings. Note that it's shorter than appears. Wears well and very comfortable and lightweight. Patter is eye catching pairs well with gray, light pink and black blazers/ pants

links_reviews_title: The perfect transition to spring dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with this dress! I've worn it twice already, and since I still have it with my Update shipment, I plan to wear it again (and again)! The dress does run large, and thankfully after reading other reviews, I sized down to a size 4. It's really flowy, but the length is still appropriate for work (just not on a windy day). The pattern and colors are absolutely amazing, and I received so many compliments both times I've worn it. It's also super comfy- it feels like you're wearing a nightshirt. The only thing I could find wrong (and I had to look hard) was that it wrinkles pretty easily.
What a fun shifty dress. So many colors in the print, it goes with black, navy, blush and tan. Luxe fabric that transitions great from day to night. Loved it!
Great for work fit well! Slightly clingy with tights but still cute
Rented this for a work trip and loved the unique pattern. Packed easily and didn't wrinkle. Great dress!
Adorable pattern, but like other reviews it was staticky. With the weather I had to wear leggings unfortunately. Still loved it though!

This dress is so cute! I received so many compliments at work even from the guys on my team re the print! When i got it it felt pretty light and thin but wasnt see through at all when i put on. Absolutely love it! It does wrinkle a little in the arms.

links_reviews_title: Lovely print and very easy breezy
links_reviews_text: Thought it was quite bold and looked cute but I guess it actually made me look like a bit of a blob as no one really commented and my husband was quite PC and said it's not the best thing I've rented. I would definitely size down one or two sizes

I love this dress. It's such a beautiful print, and it's lightweight without being see through. I teamed it with a shearling vest and black tights and boots, but I can see it working great for summer too. The dress does come up big though - I'm 21 weeks pregnant and a 6 is still pretty roomy on me, so I'd recommend sizing down.
Nice dress, no shape but pretty print. Very, very staticky with leggings or tights.

Adore this tunic. The print and colors are stunning. Can easily be work with black or white pants. It is on the baggier side. However, I'm pregnant so I love the fit with skinny leggings or peaking out of a coat.
It was great, comfy, light weight. Tory is usually small but this fit great.

links_reviews_title: Fun everyday dress - love the colors
links_reviews_text: With tights it's a little staticky - but such a cute dress for work. Good length, super cute would rent again

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and fabric but billows out.
links_reviews_text: Loved the print and fabric but the tent like features made the dress quite unflattering. Long duster, tights and boots salvaged the outfit for work. I think a skinny belt would also help if long duster is not available.

PROS 100% silk, gorgeous feel and fab pattern. CONS no pockets, sleeves a bit snug and not long enough for me but not in a chic way (6' tall), neck too tight to button all the way up, dress slightly too short + too much static to risk wearing to work if it clung to my butt or something. So I wore it as a top. Luckily had a skirt that matched! A bit shapeless too but I feel like this style is supposed to be a tailored fit? Would not recommend for larger busts as it's a true button-up and would gap... luckily mine arrived with 2 safety pins in the perfect places so wasn't an issue at all for me! WOULD BE PERFECT FOR: Someone 5'3 to 5'9" with a wirey frame or someone with a pear shape if you add a belt? Idk the material is lovely.

Very nice dress it just a bit too long, I was wearing this with long over the knee boots and the dress was coving my boots. Aside from that this dress is very nice and looks gorgeous on! I would go down a size

links_reviews_title: Rented as part of unlimited plan and wore to work.
links_reviews_text: I was worried about this dress being too short. I wore it with tights and it was short, but it was ok, even for a 56 year old. Such a cute and modern feeling dress. Loved the pattern.
Paired this with thick leggings, a belt and booties. Very pretty and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work as well as to a few other casual functions. Super cute and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable I wore it with black tights and boots for winter.
Wore this for work on an unseasonably warm, 82* December day here in Florida. It fit well, was comfy, and I got several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Flowy and nice. It was perfect for work, in Florida. As the material was thin and not hot!
links_reviews_text: Flowy and nice. It was perfect for work, in Florida. As the material was thin and not hot!
Fit is on the smaller side, I am usually a small and ordered and xs and it fit nicely. It's soft, comfortable and cute!
Love this sweater. Very high quality and flattering to wear. Wore all day teaching and stayed comfortable and cool. Not itchy at all. Would love to own it!

links_reviews_title: High quality, warm but not bulky
links_reviews_text: This sweater was warm and the material felt very high quality. I wore it to work a few times (I have a very casual work environment). Cute, but probably won't rent again.
Runs large, size down. Sweater is thick. The color of this sweater is a lighter beige than I expected.
Great sweater. Unique details and super comfy.
I liked this a lot. It fits well, and is a good length for ladies with longer torsos.

links_reviews_title: Soft sweater with nice shoulder detail
links_reviews_text: This sweater is of high quality, soft yet not easily wrinkled. The detailing in the shoulders makes it a little special.

This sweater is just lovely. Albeit a bit itchy, the fit makes up for it! It fits in all the right places and the length is great. I wore it three times and love the look! Would rent again, if not buy!

This sweater fits amazing! The model doesn't do it any justice! The sleeves are long enough for me, which seems to be hard to find these days! The color is also really nice with my skintone. It doesn't wash me out. I love the detailing on the shoulders. It adds a fun aspect to an otherwise normal sweater. The fabric is pretty thick, which I like! It's been perfect for the mid-50s weather we have been having!

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater. Shoulder details make it different!
links_reviews_text: Wore for everyday. Does run a bit short in the length, but wasn't cropped. Hit a little below my high waisted jeans.
Great neutral sweater, wore a few times with jeans of various washes. Shoulder detail added fun element to otherwise very simple, classic sweater. Would rent again.
I love the soft medium brown color, but it was not flattering on my large bust. Otherwise a well made sweater.

links_reviews_title: This sweater feels soft and luxurious.
links_reviews_text: I love the idea of the cuff around the shoulders but with my shape it just looked bulky. The color is a very pretty taupe shade of brown. It wasn't a great match for my skin color, but I am glad I tried it! Would be great for work or a casual but put-together look.
Fit great, not itchy and received lots of compliments!

Nothing really negative to say about this sweater. The shoulders have the playful puff but it's not distracting or overwhelming or makes you feel like you're on Startrek. It's an easy sweater to dress up with dress pants or dress down with jeans. I'd definitely rent again.
This was a nice sweater to wear. After a few hours, I started to get a little itchy but was comfortable most of the time.
Loved this chic but cozy sweater. Very soft and non pilled sweater that looks good with everything

Super cute sweater! There's nothing special about this sweater but was something different to wear out on a cold night or even to a kids birthday party. I am extremely short and petite, the XS was perfect without any bulk.

links_reviews_title: So warm and cozy. An unexpected great find!
links_reviews_text: I tried this on, on a whim and loved it! I usually wear a M or S, so definitely consider sizing up.
Great fit, not too tight, shoulders give it a fun look
Fit was nice, but makes you look broad in the shoulder. Definitely has some warmth to it, so it was nice on a colder day.
Really wanted to love this sweater - the color is beautiful. However, the top runs small, is very short and boxy. Even with high waist jeans I found it unattractive.
Cozy and sweet

links_reviews_title: Great color, just a bit itchy
links_reviews_text: The fit on this sweater is great! It's fitted but not overly tight. The wool irritated my skin so I didn't wear it tons otherwise I would have kept it longer.
Fits well, very warm, got compliments

links_reviews_title: Cozy, cute, great all around sweater.
links_reviews_text: Love this. Great fit. Cozy. I've worn this two days in a row and plan to wear more before sending back.

links_reviews_title: Large sleeves, tight in the trunk
links_reviews_text: It was everything I thought it would be apart from the tightness around my middle. If I were more physically fit, I would've worn this. But, I'm not and I found the fit unflattering.
The quality was excellent and made for a super cute sweater to wear with skinny jeans and booties! i received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater for work and weekend
links_reviews_text: Very cute sweater for casual work and weekend! Nice taupe brown good quality fabric. The shoulder detail is cute and unique and is very subtle. Fits very true to size, more of a fitted look although not tight by any means. Would rent again!
I wore this cute sweater for just a weekend date night. The fit is so cute. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Church dress to make everyone green
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit
Perfect fit. Fabric felt amazing. Looks great on hourglass shape. Color was fantastic!

Loved the vibrant green color. It is very comfortable with lots of stretch for a full day of work. The sleeves added a nice detail to a normal wrap dress. A great wrap dress for those of us with larger bra sizes.
Great fit and style. I was presenting all day and felt very put together in this dress. It is fully lined but I wore shape-wear to keep everything smooth.

I enjoyed this dress, it has a fun print and love the slight puff of the sleeves towards the cuff! A must rent. For me the fabric did ride up slightly exposing the lining but it wasn't a big issue for me.
I wished I could have bought this dress because it would be perfect for just about any occasion! Work, work party.

Got a ton of compliments with this - the cut is really flattering, sits above the knee, fabric is comfortable and I didn't worry with the dress being out of place (as happens with other wrap dressed). Would rent it again!

Fab for work! Can be dressed up or down. Shows a bit of clevage but not too much! Wore with black booties and bare legs but would literally be worn a million different ways! Sleeves are a bit short but not bothersome.

Really loved this one. I wore it to work and received a lot of compliments on the color, pattern and for. The fabric was heavier than i thought but not too heavy, it would be a great transitional piece between seasons thanks to the long sleeves. Sometimes I have to worry about wrap dresses gapping at the chest but this one fit just right.
I rented this for my baby shower at 31 weeks and it fit perfectly! Highly recommend!
Nice color. A tiny bit bold for work but not inappropriate. This dress accentuated my curves and was fun to wear. It's a little hot for summer.
I'm 5'8" 145 and the size 6 fit perfectly. Looks great alone or with a navy blazer. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Stretchy material makes it comfortable but it still looks sophisticated
links_reviews_text: Love the fit, color, material and style

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Light but with coverage where you need it.
links_reviews_text: I'm typically an 8 but being 15 weeks pregnant I sized up to a 10 and it was perfect. The arms are perhaps a little long but with the tighter cuffs it can be scrunched up. I feel super comfortable rocking the bump and could probably wear this dress well into week 20 or so. I'd think by the third trimester it would be a little tight but I also started showing really early. The dress has a nice thicker layer in the mid section and bust but the arms are only one flowy layer so it's very cool even on this crazy summer day. Love!
No need to worry when you bend, or a down the shirt shot. Wore to work. Simple to put on and off. I'd suggest sizing down.
I wore this to work and it was ok. The green is nice and bright, and it fit well. Not anything to write home about but still a solid rental.

links_reviews_title: Nice color; bright for a change, but so-so fit
links_reviews_text: This was nice for a change of pace, but a little frumpy maybe. I think I could have sized down one size. I'm 5'3" and 120 lbs. Probably could have worn the 4.

I almost bought it, but it was brand new, so I'm going to wait and rent it again when the price drops! I loved the cut and the color was unusual for me and fun! This is a stretchy, comfortable, professional looking dress.
Great dress for work. Very springy and flattering.
Great dress for work. Very comfortable. I received so many compliments. My belly showed more than I prefer, but it still looked nice. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome work dress! Tight in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the cleavage factor, but everything stayed together. The green is a beautiful pop!
The dress was a beautiful color and I loved the sleeves. It accentuated my mid-section a little more than I would like though--I wore it once.
Super comfortable and everyone I saw complimented me on it! Thinking about buying it. :)
Really flattering dress and well made. Loved the sleeves and color! Got compliments all day.

This was a great dress for work, but it was definitely heavier fabric, so a good option for a colder spring or fall day. Maybe even winter if you have tights on. I'd definitely rent again! I wore this to a meeting on Capitol Hill, but had to safety pin the top closed more since it was a bit more revealing in the chest than I wanted for that kind of meeting.
#work

I can't say one bad thing about this dress. The green is beautiful, and for once the sleeves were the right length for me. I wore a cami underneath, but it wasn't necessary. Perfect for work! I wore it with black tights since it is still a little chilly in the morning, but it would look great with nude pumps.

Dress fit is true to size. Beautiful green color w unique sleeves. My only issue was that occasionally I would catch the v neck sliding open a bit but nothing that a safety pin can't fix. Coworkers were very complimentary about the dress.
Wore this dress for a wedding. It fit well and was easy to dance in

I had so many compliments on the vivid emerald green dress, so pretty and feminine. The stretch was great and it is definitely work appropriate. I would have preferred it a little longer, but it was fine. The lines of this dress are flattering and I love the long sleeves with the gathering at the wrist. It is form fitting so be aware if you're body conscious and possibly wear shape wear, but I did wear a normal bra. This is a good one ladies!
Love the color

Weight of the fabric was heavier than I expected, but felt wonderful! The print was beautiful, and the color was perfect. Wore this for mass, and realized a little late that it was a little revealing, but if you're not as busty there shouldn't be any issue. It's a textbook wrap dress, but more fitted on the bottom. I have wide hips and didn't feel like it made me any larger!
This dress feels great and has stretch to it. I enjoyed wearing it and found it very comfortable. The color is beautiful as well. Will rent it again!

The dress is beautiful and fits very well. The sleeves have a nice cuff which gives the sleeves some flare and movement. I rented for St. Patty's Day but didn't go to work so returned. I will rent this again in the spring.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, high quality material. I wore it to work and to a gala in the evening

links_reviews_text: Great for. Loved the print. Lots of compliments. Could almost wear any season!
Wonderful color and pattern, flattering shape and comfy and comfy as can be. I am considering buying this to have forever
Color was great and the sleeves are nice. Didn't reveal too much like most wrap dresses. It made me look a bit wide in the hips but nothing too bad. Overall, cute work dress
Perfect for a working mom. I'm 4 months postpartum and not back to my usual size, this was great
Next time I will size down. Would have been perfect

This dress was really comfortable and I liked I could just throw it on with a pair of tights and booties and I looked really put together. This is a perfect work dress especially during the cold months l. My only complaint is it's a little short and the sleeves were really short for my long arms. I'm 5'7 and was probably 5'10 with heels on and the dress was just above my knees.

links_reviews_title: I feel great in this dress
links_reviews_text: But I'm wearing a lot of shape wear. It's a 400 clingy knit dress. So keep that in mind!
Fit great, very comfortable and just the right length.
Comfortable and conservative work dress. Plain so dressed up with necklaces and high black boots. Love the Tory Burch logo buttons on the shoulder
Fits well, flattering, comfy. Only thing missing was pockets, but I was ok without them honestly! Super cute and cozy.
Great dress. Incredibly comfortable, fun details, great movement and flow.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but a bit short for taller people.
links_reviews_text: Flattering and comfortable, just wish a tad longer.
Found the dress to be very clingy through my midsection and not that flattering. Nice material also, not itchy. I did not wear.

Cozy sweater dress that is pretty basic. The sleeves add a touch of much-needed detail and the shape is flattering. TB always seems to run roomy. This also stretched out over the course of the day. I almost wish I had sized down one more to a M to have more of a tighter fit.

links_reviews_title: Disappointing quality for Tory Burch. Shorter than advertised. M = 8-12
links_reviews_text: I love anything Tory Burch, but this navy dress is a disappointment. The material is a thin, flimsy ribbed knit and the length is shorter than advertised. At 5'8", I would not feel comfortable wearing this dress to work. In terms of sizing, it runs large, but as advertised. The Medium is advertised to fit 8-10. Given how much stretch there is in the knit, I would say the Medium would fit 8-12. For reference, I am 5'8", 155 lbs, 36C and I rented the Medium which fit with extra room to spare.
Pros nice fabric for winter well cut flattering Con sleeves too long
Loved this dress! It was perfect for Thanksgiving

I'm usually a size 4, but given my experience with other Tory Burch dresses, I sized down to an XS. Glad I did! It fit like a glove. Dress is comfortable but not too baggy. Felt like it showed off my figured well.
Very cute dress with flattering sleeves.
Fits very nicely - sweater material isn't always flattering but this isn't too snug.
Loved this dress, true to size, slimming, nice embellishments, would rent again if available when it becomes cold here!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress felt a little casual for the office
Received so many compliments!! The flared sleeves are great. Wore with tights and heels.
links_reviews_text: It does run a smidge large and does stretch out during the day. I would consider wearing shapewear under the dress and size down.
Tons of compliments! Love the bell sleeves and the fit. It does not hug your body like you think a sweater dress will. Very comfy!

links_reviews_title: Versatile dress, would consider it again.
links_reviews_text: A bit short for my office environment, but otherwise a great dress. Loved the fabric weight, drape and cut

This ribbed sweater material stretched out a ton across the waist and back. The neck, cuffs and button details were nice. But overall I didn't find the dress flattering, especially from the side because it failed to skim my shape and just hung. Very mediocre on my body shape.

links_reviews_title: Perfect sweater dress for my conservative, private school parent reception.
links_reviews_text: Dress was super comfortable. Flair at the wrist and buttons aside the neckline add a stylish flair to a conservative dress. Great combination of style and comfort.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is thick in a structured way not hot. 3 months post partum, and I felt great in it!
links_reviews_text: As a petite person the length was perfect at my knees; the sleeves were even a great length when normally things run long on me. I really liked this dress!

links_reviews_title: This is such a classy, well fitted outfit! I didn't want to return it back :(
links_reviews_text: Pros: classy, thick material, elegant cut for everyday wear, can be dressed up with jewelry or a scarf Cons: rented

Wonderful weight to the fabric, cozy and cute sleeves, not much else going with it, if I bought this I would have it tailored for the extra interest it needs, if it fit a little closer around the torso I think I would have loved it
Really cute and comfy. A little short but I'm tall.

links_reviews_title: I tried it on and it just didn't do it for me.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Nicely made Cons: not my style
Fits like a glove and is amazing. It is my second time renting it.

links_reviews_title: too tight in the mid section for me. Was not flattering n my body type.
links_reviews_text: Too tight in the mid section for me. Was not flattering n my body type.

links_reviews_title: great!!! excellent quality, keeps its shape - witch is rare in a sweater dress!
links_reviews_text: love it - perfect length, sleeves are fun, the shoulder button detail is cute...hard to tell that it is navy - I would have thought black if I did not read the description.

Elegant silhouette and detailing, especially with the buttons and sleeves. Fabric is a light sweater material and was a bit clingy in the mid section but wore with spanx tights and felt perfectly acceptable at work. Color is somewhere between black and navy blue. Received many compliments throughout the day. Great fall outfit.
Fit was good, great quality fabric

links_reviews_title: Casual Night out Dress - "Good," but not "awesome."
links_reviews_text: Pros: dark stretchy material, runs to right above my knees (5'4, 3 inch heels) Cons: Runs large, I wish I had the small (I'm normally a medium to large due to chest size) Wasn't form fitting, was very loose- even wide across the shoulders. Definitely get 1-2 sizes smaller.
Love the length and look for a bridal shower. Loved that it was navy and not black. This felt like the perfect sweater dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work and weekend!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Perfect for work, drinks and date night! Flattering.
Comfortable except sleeves a bit too long

links_reviews_title: Everyone at work asked about where I got it.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and the length was exactly what I was looking for.
Just perfect for work. Love the detail on the sleeves. I'm a 6-8 and medium was a little loose. Would have liked to try a small for contrast. I'd keep this for everyday work wear. Classy

links_reviews_title: Very comfy, great material, perfect for work!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
Tighter than expected but managed to squeeze my butt into them! Really loved them, just would order a size up next time. Very little stretch.

These pants are everything I'd say they run a tad small- they were tight in the leg part and calves felt like leggings with a jean fabric Waist fit great It eventually stretched out They are so stylish and soft Wore with low booties bc they came above my ankle at 5'6

LOVE these pants. They don't fit too tight either. I would say fit true to size but are slightly cropped if you're tall. I'm 5'10 for reference and couldn't wear booties with them without it looking weird
These were way more comfortable than I expected! Almost felt like I was wearing leggings! Wore them to work and on the weekend. TTS.
The jeans were so comfortable and made an outfit! Great daytime to evening look. Got a ton of compliments, I wanted to wear them over and over again. Wish I bought them!
These are great! The jeans are comfortable, cool, and stretchy.
These jeans are effortlessly sexy. The print and cut are perfect. Dress them up with a silk tank and heels or down with an oversized hoodie and flats. I loved them! #jeans #snakeskin #easilysexy

links_reviews_title: Wish they made these for tall people
links_reviews_text: These are really cute, but they're not for tall people. I was able to pull them off when wearing knee-high boots, but they look dumb with ankle boots and don't work with tennis shoes. Would love a pair that actually go to my ankles.
I usually prefer jeans a bit higher rise, but overall they're pretty comfortable and the fabric is really fun.
They were comfortable, fairly stretchy . Got lots of compliments.

I'm obsessed with these jeans. The quality is great. Fit is true to size and super flattering. I've gotten compliments on them every time I wear them. Great for work, going out or just everyday wear. They are super lightweight, but still feel really supportive - they aren't overly constricting or overly stretchy. I'm just under 5'5 and the hem hits right at my ankle so they're great to wear with boots. I couldn't stop wearing them, so I ended up buying my rental to keep!
Though the picture does not do these pants justice (bc of the way too big sweater)- I loved them! They flattered my shape and butt, which is saying a lot. I may keep them- still contemplating...
These pants are perfect for a work event or night out that is on the casual side. They are comfy and cute; so I bought 'em!
These are fun jeans. I'm short, so they fit length-wise perfectly. If you're taller than 5'5, they're probably crops. Super trendy and a great rent!

links_reviews_title: Nicely fitted pants that go easily from work to evening
links_reviews_text: Would rent again for sure. Pants were sliming and very comfortable to wear.

Fun to rent snake print Jeans. Felt very stylish. Jeans are very fitted but have a lot of stretch so very comfortable. Wore them several times and felt great wearing them. Definitely going on my rent again list.
I liked them a lot and considered buying because they worked really well with a sweater I own. Sent them back in the end but it was a tough call

links_reviews_title: Loved these pants as a neutral with everything in my closet!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect with just the right amount of weight and stretch.

links_reviews_title: Fun print to add flair to your everyday look
links_reviews_text: My only con with this is the material is stiff, not stretchy so it's hard to move in.
I consistently have gotten size 26 in other brands but these seemed to run a bit tight up top and just didn't fit. They're cute, otherwise. Legs fit fine.

links_reviews_title: liked them and got a compliment
links_reviews_text: like that it was a little different

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and super trendy. I am thinking about purchasing
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and I can dress up or dress down.
This is my favorite rental from RTR so far. They are sliming, look expensive and are the type of pants I would never buy but enjoyed wearing 4 times the 2 weeks I rented them

links_reviews_title: Wore these to work many times as well as a contemporary ballet concert.
links_reviews_text: These fit like a dream, and I received compliments on them from women young enough to be my daughter. :-) If I didn't think they'd look dated sooner rather than later, I'd definitely buy them.

links_reviews_title: Love this pattern and the fabric is so soft and comfy..
links_reviews_text: I wore these to a concert and they were so comfortable! Just enough stretch and they fit great! Another one I am considering buying.. LOVE them!
LOVE these - I am a petite and was perfect "regular" length! Good way to funk up ordinary Jean look.
Loved! TTS
The print went with so much. I was so tempted to keep. Material is really soft.
These are super fun jeans. They are very soft and comfortable. They do stretch out throughout the day so I'd recommend sizing down.
I got so many compliments on these pants. Such a statement piece. True to size with some stretch. Will absolutely rent again. Would probably rent a smaller size but the 27 still fit
These are great pants that spruce up any wardrobe. I paired them with a loose fitting black sweater and black sneaker slides.
Just didn't like the fit in these. They also weren't nearly as comfy as most of the BlankNYC denim, but the print is cute!
I'm short, so the crop was not really cropped on me, but the perfect length. Flattering.

I'm usually a 31 but the 30 fit perfectly . I am Very curvy so finding the right pant that holds me in and gives me shape is tough . This is theeee perfect pant ! The fit and flex of the material is great! The waist isn't high waisted but comes just under your belly button leaving no room for overhang !

I don't wear shorts a lot but I like to have them when I am on vacation. These shorts are long enough to cover my upper thighs and short enough to get the look I am going for. I almost bought them because it is so hard to find the right length shorts. In the end I decided to rent them when I need them.
Great jeans shorts but for those of us with larger thighs, they run a little tight. Waist fit well and fits a larger booty.
Was nervous about the color but it looked great in person and I got tons of compliments. It's a heavier material so don't wear if it's too warm out. I would definitely rent again or even buy

I liked that these shorts were not extremely short. I was on a trip to South America with some coworkers and didn't want to have anything that rode up too high (as most of my shorts do) so these were perfect.
Perfect fit, soft denim, perfectly frayed.

A great pair of medium light wash denim shorts from Paige. Inseam is a bit longer with a frayed hem that is cuffed upward. I didn't have a problem with the shorts riding up and they fit comfortably throughout the day. Experienced a bit of stretch after multiple wears, but that's to be expected. The hem is turned up so you get the frayed look without the strings hitting your legs and looking too casual. Deep pockets that you can actually put something in (a lot of shorts lack for front pockets!). I rented these for a vacation in hot weather and wore multiple times. Would definitely rent again!
great fitting shorts. Not too short ad super comfortable. Great rental!
I loved these shorts. Great length and fit. I want to buy a pair.

Cute shorts, a great length. I'm a pretty solid size 8 and if I was buying these would have preferred the 30. I rented the 29 and they were fine but too tight to wear with a swim suit or other tight top. It worked fine with a blousy top though so I still got to wear them.

links_reviews_title: loved these great for florida not too short
links_reviews_text: loved it bought them!
Standard Paige shorts. Great quality. Hold up well throughout the day. Actually cover your butt properly.
Fits true to size, great for everyday casual wear. Not too short.
Nice and comfortable, not tight for those with curvier thighs
Very cute shorts. A little stretch but they hold their shape. Great modest length but still very stylish. Love the color. A little lighter than the pictures. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Appropriate length and so comfy. Thinking about buying them for the season
links_reviews_text: Good fit. Usually denim shorts are cut so high but these are a perfect length

links_reviews_title: Sit below the natural waist and between the hips. Stretch A LOT with wear.
links_reviews_text: These were meh. They sit below my belly button so if a shirt was over them I looked really poochy but tucking in looked weird too. They stretch out a lot after wearing so size down.
These fit perfectly, held up without stretching out over multiple wears, and were the best denim shorts ever. I just wish they weren't so expensive or I would have bought them.

I wear a size 8 and ordered a medium. This was a little big through the shoulders and I had to cuff the sleeves, but otherwise I loved it. It did come with a couple small snags, so it didn't look new.

My 7 year old daughter loved this sweater! I ordered it to wear on Thanksgiving Day and when it was delivered I was shocked! I think it must have been mishandled and shrunk. However, whoever packaged it didn't seem to notice that it would not fit almost any adult. It looked great on my kid and she felt so fashionable. She loved it!!!

Nice color, cute fit. Not too long on me and I'm petite so could see being a bit cropped on a tall person. Pretty comfortable. Material was a tiny bit worn but still looked nice. Neckline makes it a bit pretty and special
Great addition to outfits -- fun jolt of color. Pills easily do a great rental but may not be high enough quality to own
I maybe could have sized up to have longer sleeves
I really liked this sweater. It was a little shorter than I would have wanted but the bright color and fit were great.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but nothing special otherwise
links_reviews_text: The color of this sweater is absolutely gorgeous! I got a ton of compliments on the color. The style of the sweater is nothing special. It runs large so order down at least one size.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments at work and at my daughters game.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very flattering and the color popped! I loved the sleeves which bell slightly before the cuff. Looked great with khaki dress slacks and heels at work and with jeans and booties at my daughters basketball game that same evening.

Love this vibrant, high quality, flattering sweater. Soft and warm, slimming and has interesting sleeves without being too trendy and statementy. Would totally buy this and wear much of the year if it weren't so expensive. Would look equally great with pencil skirt and heels or white jeans and wedges.
Not tight, not too thick. Great for ski vacation to add a pop of color.
I usually wear a small or medium and the large doesn't look that big on me. Good looking sweater. Would look good for work.
It's almost as if this sweater have been shrunk. Does not run true to size.
Love this sweater, it's 100% merino wool and was perfect for cool nights by the water in Florida!
Like the color but it's too short in the torso.

links_reviews_title: Soft and comfortable fit, went well with everything. Not really a deep red which is nice.

links_reviews_text: I filtered my search results to bump friendly - this is NOT. Too short. For any pregnant woman with a bump, this is inappropriately short. Beautiful, but really needs to be taken off of maternity filter.
Love the button detailing on this.
I normally wear a XS or S and went with the XS. Worked great!
Beautiful color, nice fit and awesome quality
Nice warm sweater to transition from spring into summer or summer into fall. The color is unique which I love. Some reviews said the sleeves were short but I felt they were perfect length.

links_reviews_title: Cute every day sweater, great color
links_reviews_text: This is a great casual sweater in an eye catching color

This is a great sweater. The color is lovely - vibrant, but not TOO bright. The fabric is soft, not itchy, and warm but not too warm (a perfect spring/fall sweater). The cut is has a vibe that's a touch boxy, but not so boxy as to be shapeless and unflattering. I'll rent this again.

links_reviews_title: ADORABLE. I have never considered buying anything from RTR until this.
links_reviews_text: So flattering, so comfy, easy to wear, beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS! Wore it three times and will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Great boat neck with stylish button details. Comfortable fit and beautiful color.
Very cute sweater. Runs lil small, esp for bigger busts. Im usually size 12-14 top and xxl fit perfectly, little big but hung nicely. Beautiful material and color. Received many compliments.
Didn't wear. I knew the large might be a little big but it was huge. Such a pretty spring color though.
I loved this sweater! The red is so vibrant and the gold buttons on the shoulders are a fun detail. I'll definitely rent again.
got compliments at work

This sweater is very versatile, perfect for three seasons. The color is vibrant; the material is soft, but still a sturdy Merino wool; and the details like the top bottoms and slightly larger sleeves are fun. I wore this sweater a few times and received several compliments.
Comfy just ordinary though

The sweater fits great - I currently weigh 135 and have an hourglass to straight figure. While the medium would have fit as well, the large looks great. I've worn this 6 times already to a variety of events.

It runs really small. I'm between in small and medium in most tops and would have preferred a large in this sweater. It's very short and arrived with a lot of pilling, I cleaned them off and it presented well. Wouldn't rent again though.

links_reviews_title: so soft and warm without being bulky
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater. It is so soft. The fit is perfect. I have a small chest, so bulky sweaters flatten me out even more. This sweater is warm without being bulky, so I still have some shape. The color is bright and perfect for spring. It is showing some wear, otherwise I would have kept it.
True fit , luxurious sweater feel , works with jeans or dress pants .
Felt more form fitting than the pictured on model.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, just not my style
links_reviews_text: Nice color sweater; it had gold buttons on the shoulder that I didn't notice in the picture. I am more into the minimal / boxy look right now so I didn't wear more than once, but I could see how others might like this.
Super cute sweater. Color has a lot of pop. Only complaint is the sleeves were a bit short for a gal with long limbs.
This sweater was a beautiful shade of coral and fit nicely. My only complaints would be a small snag in the material upon arrival and how staticky it was.
Fits short, so if you want to hide the midriff, this is not the sweater for that, but it's still fun and bright.
So cozy AND stylish! Compliments everywhere I wore it.
Comfy and flattering dress! Was a little too short in the back for work so needed to wear tights. Would rent again and could pair with sneakers for a weekend look.

The dress is very soft and comfortable, and I always appreciate pockets! I am not crazy about the baseball jersey material on the collar and sleeves, just a bit too sporty for a work dress. Also wrinkles easily.
I rented this for a vacation and it was so fun to wear! I thought it was flattering and different. I will rent again!
This dress is hip and it is also comfy as hell. 5 stars.
I love a dress I can wear with sneakers! Athleisure/Tomboy without looking lazy. Lightweight material. I'm a fan!

Great easy dress for running around and could be dressed up a bit for work. I fabric surprised me in that it is rayon-I had thought it was cotton! The cut is very flattering and bonus-pockets!! I could have easily bought this dress-great colors-fun print and love the sporty stripes!! Go for it!!

links_reviews_title: The style of the dress was so cool with the vintage varsity style neckline and arm cuff.
links_reviews_text: The arm cuffs were my main concern, and they actually had a great stretch to them. The tightest part for me was the boob area, it flattened one of them out a bit because I chose not to wear a bra underneath. I loved how light the fabric was and it went perfect with my silver pumps. Would definitely rent again!

Grateful for the multiple reviews to size up. Chest would have been way too tight in my regular size. It was a comfy piece for a sunny day at a music festival, but it has some wear/pilling on the front of the dress.
Loved this dress! It fit me perfectly around my waist in just the right spots. Very flattering and lightweight!

links_reviews_title: Such a unique dress. I felt really sassy!
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress. The fabric was a little thinner than Im used to so it had some static, but not too terrible. The pockets weren't necessary as I thought they accentuated my hips a bit too much. But the style, pattern and neckline/armhole detail is simply adorable. I felt stylish all day.
I would rent this again. Very comfortable and easy.

I am usually a 6 but based on reviews sizes up for an 8. It fit very comfortably and skimmed my frame with a pretty flattering silhouette. I didn't find the material of the dress to be as nice as it could be. Maybe it had just laundered too many times. Also, it was prone to wrinkling throughout the day when sitting. All things considered it was unique and I got a couple of wears out of it before returning.

A little short, might have rented a size up for work-level comfort-- especially with such bulky pockets. That said, super flattering and tons of compliments! Day-to-night, casual-to-dressy, week-to-weekend.
Loved this dress. It was light-weight and pockets were a nice touch. It paired really well with my Adidas sneakers and a leather jacket. I got tons of compliments on this casual, cool look.
Love this dress, would rent it again. It's comfortable, flattering, and a cool retro look.
I really liked the cut of this dress. The fabric is nice and look great with tights and ankle boots for a casual day outfit or for work. I also wore with white platform tennis shoes.

links_reviews_title: Short but worked with baby belly
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a skirt underneath so it wasn't scandalous for work. The sleeves and neck are very cute and I sized up bc the material has no stretch.
Very soft fabric. I loved the neck line. But it is a little tight in the chest and arms
Hugs the waist! I love that! After I took this off I did notice the bottom back and waist were very wrinkled.
Fun pattern & details - pickets made the hips fit a little stranger, but overall love it. Wore to work, dinner & a party. Got compliments at each!
It didn't fit. Was very small. I ordered a 14 and I'm more of a 12. The bust and waist was very small

links_reviews_title: Overall, okay dress. Silkier material than I expected.
links_reviews_text: Wasn't too crazy about the dress. The material was different from what I expected, it was more silky and the pockets felt very misaligned and sat more at the sides of the hips rather than the front of the thighs.
I got lots of compliments on this fun dress. I plan to rent it again when the weather is warmer.
I love the pattern, love the colors but the sleeves are a little boxy at the shoulders so I kept having to pull them down.

links_reviews_title: Love the contrast. Easy fit and easy to wear

links_reviews_text: Cute dress. Liked the detail around the neck and sleeves.
This dress is adorable and different. Pockets are a plus! I will say if you have muscular arms the sleeves may be tight on you.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful constructed for work or play
links_reviews_text: I am size 10 in this brand, but I would need to size up to rent this one again. Fabric doesn't allow for much stretch, so I found it a bit on the snug size in my rib cage. I found it to be a little short too (at 5'11"). But overall it's quite a beauty. Even my husband complimented it.
Cute dress, but minimal give, especially in the chest. Could not wear.
Cute dress esp with black tights

This dress is super cute and I got a ton of compliments. I could dress it up enough for the office or going out, but also casual enough to wear with sneakers on the weekend. And it has pockets! My only problem was that the waist hit a little high on me.
Obsessed with this - I received so many compliments and wore it multiple times. Fits true to size and is very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a casual party
links_reviews_text: Rented this with my unlimited for a casual afternoon party. Loved the varsity striping and got lots of compliments on this dress. Fabric was not was I expecting - was silky and a little shiny so it wrinkled a lot when I sat down. I am a 0/2 and always need to go up to the 2 in Slate and Willow. This one fit perfectly in the 2. I am only 5'2" and v necks are a big problem for me. This one was just high enough to work.

links_reviews_title: I'm a 34A and this was small in the chest! Definitely size up.
links_reviews_text: I'm a 34A and this was small in the chest! Definitely size up.

Received many compliments on the dress/pattern. It was great for everyday wear form the office to happy hour. The one complaint is that the pockets made me appear wider as they did not sit flat on the hips, rather jolted put a bit.

links_reviews_title: Didnt wear. Too small for a big chest
links_reviews_text: Pretty

links_reviews_title: could've sized up and probably would've been happier
links_reviews_text: was a little tight in the shoulders and rose up too much when I lifted my arms, but cute pattern

links_reviews_title: If you're between sizes, size up on this one
links_reviews_text: I'm between sizes and I got my usual size but it was too small. Size up on this one. Really nice fabric and cute dress though
I love anything that is comfortable and kicks up casual at the same time. Great paired with sneakers.

This dress is a fun casual piece. I wore it very pregnant so had to wear it like a tunic over pants because it looked too short. I say runs small bc even though I'm expecting, the 10 looks small for a 10 even before putting it on. The collar and sleeve details are what make the style for me.
I rented this for a ski trip that got cancelled, but still found a way to style it for every day. It runs a little small, so I'm glad I sized up. Very fun and the bright red definitely pops!

links_reviews_title: Bright bright bright! So much fun.
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater, the red is so bright and fun. It's thick material too, great for winter. I wore this for a casual Christmas party and to work the next week. So many compliments.

The sweater wasn't itchy! That is important to mention! The XS fit perfectly and doesn't pull in any spots, isn't hard to get over my head, and isn't too tight in the collar. The only thing I can say that is additionally helpful: if you layer a tank top underneath, it should be a lighter, plain one to avoid any words/emblems from showing through. I'd definitely rent this again.
This was too small - shirt and tight.

links_reviews_title: This was a comfy sweater, not itchy. And I got several compliments..
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect
Look so cute with jeans. Wore for skiing one day and was warm and fun.
Pretty sweater but just not my style. Runs big but overly. Didn't wear
I really enjoyed wearing this coat, although it wasn't quite as warm as I expected and the fur color was removable so it fit a little awkwardly. That said, it was perfect for our weekend getaway.

This coat runs large. I sized down based of people's reviews but I could probably go down an additional size, very big. It is moderately warm, wore when weather was in the 40/50s. Received lots of comments, it's a very stylish coat!

links_reviews_title: LOVE love love! So stylish. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore without the fur collar. Comfy coat. Beautiful colors. Very classy. Wore with dresses, with jeans, with everything. Runs large, but I appreciated the extra room.

I'm typically a 0 or 2, and I went for the smallest size available here (which was a 2), and it felt quite large. It's easy to see from the photo that the coat looks a little frumpy on me in terms of fit. That said, I really love the burgundy and teal in this tweed - it's a fun color play on a very classic style and fabric, and it is pretty warm. The detachable collar is also lovely, but I wore this more casually so I left it off. I really like this, but the 2 was definitely large for me.
As someone who is always cold... this was warm even on a chilly night in New England! It also made me feel super elegant and fancy. No cons!

It runs a bit big so wish i could have got the smaller size , but i got so many compliments from women and men alike even kids . This is definitely a very good piece , You an remove the fur as well to tone it down Great for every outfit
Fun neckline that is removable

Really liked but didn't love this jacket. It is hard to tell from the photo but it is mostly ivory, maroon, somewhat brown, with flecks of teal. The color is maroon with brown mixed in. It did read more purple from far away, which was what I was going for. It was warmer than expected but still thin and easy to move in.

With the fur, this coat is a stand out. I wore it for about 4 days - to work without the detachable fur and for date night and a wedding with it. Based on reviews, I sized down. It's not a form hugging coat - the waist area was still roomy even though the bust fit was perfect.

What a great coat! I wore it everywhere for two or three weeks and got compliments daily. The coat itself is fairly thin but the amazing fur collar keeps you toasty against the wind. I'm pretty much between sizes, but if I were to rent this again I would probably go down a size. Love!!
Great fit. Wore in 40 degree weather. Fun fur and loved the colors. Would rent again. Wish it had deeper pockets

links_reviews_title: Loved the fur on this coat
links_reviews_text: Although this coat was cute, it wasn't very warm & the buttons didn't lay properly

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, glamour is heavy coat. Perfect for business trip to DC in Feb!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big. Would have gone one size smaller.

links_reviews_title: Pretty warm and the right balance of drama
links_reviews_text: This was a good ease into the fur trend for me. Everyone thought it was vintage which was fun and I definitely had a Stark Family vibe walking around the city... which who doesn't love that.

It was too big, missing the top button, and I didn't care. The coat was so great that I wore it anyway, several times per week for my update subscription. Women were stopping me on the street to tell me how great the coat looked. Rent this!
Im usually a 4 but it was too big for me, very warm and comfy tho!
This coat runs about one size bigger, but so nice when layering clothing. The quality is amazing and wears so well. So glad I have unlimited so I could keep it for a few weeks!
This jacket is so beautiful and warm. It's definitely not light weight, but you don't notice the weight when it's on. I wore it on a winters day in DC and it was so perfect! Got lots of compliments!

Love this coat! It runs big.. Im a size 8-10, and would normally go with a 10 for coats because I have a large chest.. I rented the 8 and should have rented a 6. So size down 1 or 2 sizes! This coat is super cute, but I dont think the quality is that of a $300+ coat. The buttons seem like they could fall off at any minute.. but its definitely worth renting for a few weeks!! Love the fur! Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved this coat and the fur was so fun and detachable!
links_reviews_text: Jacket was so fun to wear and warm in 30 degree temps while in DC for work. The fur is detachable which could be nice to change it up but why be burning and remove it?! Runs a tad big, I'm 5'7 145 and rented the 6 which was perfect with a sweater and a few layers underneath.

Fun fall into winter coat. The faux fur comes off, but why? The coat was bland without it. I'm between a 12 and 14 in most coats/dresses, and this 12 has room for a sweater underneath. Sadly, one of the buttons already came off, so the quality doesn't seem to be the greatest. I'll see it back on for the next person. ;-)
I'm usually a 12 in coats, but this 10 was HUGE, although the sleeves were good length. The material also felt kinda flimsy and cheap.
This coat was perfect for the day and night time. It was very warm and wasn't bulky or heavy. I am usually a 6, but only the 8 was available. I would rent this coat again in either a 6 or 8.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat for the fur collar!
links_reviews_text: I'm in love with the coat & plan to keep it for a while! The fur collar with the different hues is my fave.
Great everyday cost, even with the fur... missing a button
Considering purchasing. Love this coat! Great fit. True to size

A button was missing and in its place was a bent safety pin. The removable collar had loops that were also broken and so it couldn't be attached. RTR replaced it with no hassle but it was disappointing.

Loved the removable (faux) fur cuff. I wore it without it as a fairly conservative jacket for the office, and added the fur for weekends and nights out. Received some compliments from strangers with the fur! It's starting to look a little tired, not anything that bothered me, just like something that I'd had in rotation for a year or so rather than new new.

links_reviews_title: Stylish winter coat but runs large!
links_reviews_text: Just like all the reviews have said, this coat does run large. The sizing for NVLT coats tend to vary. I'm a size 6 in the Charcoal Flat Boucle but size 2 in this coat. This coat appears to be on the lighter/thinner side so it would probably be best for 40-50 degree weather for fall/beginning of winter. The fur collar came separate from the coat so I had to put it on but it is nice that it is removable. The coat is BIG overall - very loose in the hip/waist (and I have wider hips) and you can also tell based on the shoulder pads coming a little farther than my shoulders. It looks like it's just tan/white and red in the pictures but there are specks of blue which is nice and unexpected. Would rent again but in one size smaller!

links_reviews_title: Great look but too bulky for me
links_reviews_text: This jacket was unfortunately too bulky for me, I prefer a more tailored jacket but I do love the weight and the pattern.

links_reviews_title: Pretty But Not As Good Quality As It Looks Online
links_reviews_text: I wanted a burgundy long coat and this one has pretty teal accent woven through it. The fur collar adds a bit of dressiness the coat needs because without it, it is a very, very plain. However, the fur was just too much bulk for me and the quality overall was lacking and noticeable in person.

links_reviews_title: Collar loops were busted so it kept falling off.
links_reviews_text: Not very happy with this as I received it damaged. The loops that hold the fur collar to the lapel were busted on one side. And it was very large. If it came in good condition I would recommend sizing down. FYI...the link to "Contact Us" when you rate fewer than three stars is busted also.

I read some reviews that said this ran large, but figured I'd be fine with a large sweater underneath. I was wrong. I swam in this coat and it looked laughably big. It's not as thick as most of my dress coats. I would have worn it anyway on a cold Midwest day, but it feels more like fall weight to me.

Fun and warm coat if you put the collar on. I was able to wear it without a scarf on a pretty cold nyc day. Great details as some of the piping in the pattern is blue (you can really tell from the pictures). Like everyone says it does run large.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Warm and versatile
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a trip to Seattle. It ended up being in the 50s when I went and I was a little warm in the coat but to me that means it does the job. Love that I can remove the fur part. I had the fur off for the plane but put it on for walking around. So many compliments! Glad I sized down per reviews. I'm busty and it still buttoned fine.

The coat fabric and colors look really nice. But the cut is not for smaller people and the sizing seems way off. I rented size 2. Usually I wear 0-2. The shoulders were way too wide, and overall the coat was huge, I could almost fit another me in there. I am not even petite. I am 5'7 and 115 pound, for reference. Hope it helps someone with the sizing. My guess is you can size down 2-3 sizes to make this coat work, which just won't work for people who usually wear xs.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! Does run large. Order a size smaller.
links_reviews_text: Very high quality Con: Runs large order a size smaller than you usually wear.

I am only 5'2" so this ran a little long on me but with heels, it didn't look like I was playing dress up. The colors and the fur are eye catching in a great way. I received tons of compliments and felt fashionable and out together. Really a great pick!
My work from home outfit. Made things a little brighter in these dark times.
Loved this fun, bright blazer. I felt like spring personified -- or a giant Easter egg! -- and didn't mind. Fit great, nice medium weight.
