links_reviews_text: Super cute, totally work worthy and would be a great day to date dress. I did have to wear a little tank underneath as otherwise it's a bit too revealing of the dcolletage :). Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Good dress just a little fussy
links_reviews_text: I say good dress because I loved the fabric- it could be adapted to any season and was a very high quality. I didn't get compliments all day long but I'm not going for that all the time (wink;))) I am not saying fussy because I needed a white sports tee underneath for a more conservative cleavage look but instead because the hole for the belt loop kept exposing my skin despite a few reties at restroom breaks throughout the day. You may know the magic tie trick - if you think so - rent this one as a good balance to a great week of fabulous RTR outfit rotations

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress three times and received many compliments each time.
links_reviews_text: The dress is both forgiving and flattering.
Dress held its shape very well; a little bit heavier of fabric so I would not recommend necessarily on a hot summer day, but good for an indoor work environment.

This top is fun and flowy. I love the French Etoile pattern. The primness of the pattern is set off by the cropped cut and the striped cuffs. Wore a white camisole underneath as I didn't want to flash my stomach at my coworkers. This works with higher waisted skinny jeans or a pencil skirt to balance out the billowing top.
I received tons of compliments on this shirt. The material and sleeves are great. Top is slightly cropped so I wore it with high waisted white jeans.
Def cropped so high wasted shorts or pants work best. Fun sleeve detail but was hard to see in photos.
This is such a fun top! The fabric is soft and light so it's great for warmer weather. I will definitely rent this top again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric! Work and weekend appropriate
links_reviews_text: Love this top so much! It does run a bit short, so I sized up to an 8 (I have a large chest). The fabric is beautiful and silky, even though it looks like cotton in pictures. The only thing that I didn't love were the sleeves. They are green, yellow and blue elastic with a sparkly fabric. I felt like it cheapened the top.
I am obsessed with this shirt!!!! I got so many compliments on it and I love it! If it wasn't so expensive I'd buy it!!! Beautiful print silky high quality material.

Fit was awesome - you could use the button on top for a high neck feel, or leave it open. I wear high waisted pants all the time, so it was a great option to add some variety and fun into my wardrobe. The arms are a bit billowy, but again, a good match for spring.
Loved this with high waisted jeans, I wore multiple times...different fades of jeans, this styled well with all of them. Would rent again! Well made.
I typically size up in tops but the 4 worked out great. Flowy, great with something high waisted bc it's cropped
Lovely material. Thicker, but not too thick. Crop top worked with high waisted pants for work. I did wear a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Loved this fun and unique top!
links_reviews_text: Top was beautiful, light weight with flowey arms, which tapered at wrist to help keep out of the way. It is a shorter top so I wore with a nice tank underneath but overall so fun to wear and a really stylish and well made piece.
Was a little more cropped than expected for a size 2
Fits like a crop- wear with high waisted pants or pencil skirt. Print is so cute!

I loved this top and found that it could be worn as pictured or turned around with the button at the back of the neck. It is a little cropped, so it paired well with high-waisted pants. Perfect for a day date or other weekend event.
needs to be longer

This blouse was perfect for work events in hot, but conservative, environments. It is loose-fitting and flowy, and the casual cuffs add just the right amount of sass. Note that it is quite short, so if you are at all worried about your midriff showing, you have to wear something underneath.

The design was interesting, I felt like I kept finding random images and it felt very NYC. I was very excited to wear it... it fit in the arms and neck, but I guess is not meant for someone with a large chest, it felt like it just hit below my chest and even with high waisted jeans I was showing midriff... even with it unbuttoned.
The fabric, cut, and bands at the sleeves provide a sporty vibe with a lot of flair. The top is cropped and swingy. The toile is great. It's comfy and smart.
Fun top however a little wild for work! Hard to tell but the sleeves have some glitz which isn't my style but overall fun piece
Cute top but suppper cropped. Wanted to wear to a bridal shower with white spanx jeans but just was a little too croppy! Cute for a girls weekend, but not so much for a shower!

I am usually a 0 or 2 and went with the 4 after seeing how cropped this top looked in the review photos and I am very glad I did! I don't feel like sizing up made the top look too big and I think blouses like this look good over sized. I wore with super high waisted jeans and it *barely* reached them. So there is no butt coverage here. Still very cute though!
So many compliments. Cute shirt

This print is very pretty and the cuffs are fun! I ordered a size 4 based on other reviews of it being cropped and that helped on the length. I did not end up wearing because of weather- too hot. Would have loved this back in March or April!

links_reviews_title: Wore this multiple times and got compliments from strangers!
links_reviews_text: Such a fun blouse! Beautiful fabric and incredibly comfortable. It was a bit short on me, so I had to wear a tank top underneath, although someone with less muffin-top than me may feel comfortable without an under-layer :)
Such a versitile and lightweight top. I sized up to a 6 as it was the only size available but it worked out just fine! So cute!

links_reviews_title: No for anyone with a long torso
links_reviews_text: I sized up to a six due to the comments from other reviewers that this ran sort of short. But it was a disaster. It was way too short even with high waisted pants and sizing up just made it more billowy so it was too big and too small all at once. Beautiful fabric and cool sleeves but definitely would not recommend for any tall girls. Sorry.
Even though I'm tall, fit me well

links_reviews_title: Great top with an interesting pattern
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! As others have noted, it is fairly cropped but that doesn't bother me. I wore it tucked in with high-waisted jeans to work. The pattern is really interesting - looks like a regular toile from a distance, but has cool details when you look closer.
I saw this on someone else a few days after I sent it back and it looked great on them, but it was voluminous and unflattering on me. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Lovely on a Sunny Spring Day
links_reviews_text: So lovely. Requires a french tuck for a more defined look. A bit too billowy for the big chested gals.
it is a short top
This shirt is just darling! I wore it with high wasted jeans and was obsessed with the print and the fit. I will definitely be renting this again later in the summer.
This top was really cute if you have an extremely short torso. It was like a belly shirt on me, needless to say I did not wear it, I am 5'8 and do have a long torso for what its worth.

I love Tibi, and think her designs are always a little ahead of the trends. I actually have the same shirt in a darker color, so I knew how it would fit. It is very cropped, and looks amazing with high waisted denim boot cut or flared jeans.
I absolutely loved this top. On my petite frame it sat perfectly and it was incredibly unique. I highly recommend it
A bit short but fabric was very nice.
I got so many compliments on this shirt. It was a bit short. The details on the wrist and unique cut and fabric made it special.

The pattern, the material, the style of this was excellent. Flowy and springtime-appropriate but with March weather arms! The crop was quite short, so even with high-wasted jeans, I had to be careful not to overexpose my core. Paired with big earrings, wide leg jeans and white booties. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Crop-like, not great for women with bust
links_reviews_text: This item is cut like a crop top length, but is very billowy in the sleeves and body. It was very unflattering (i have a large chest--maybe smaller chests would not have this issue) and the end of the sleeves were capped with cheap feeling sparkle material at the wrist. I did love the print.

links_reviews_title: Flattering work shirt, made a bit more interesting
links_reviews_text: The peplum at the bottom hides a lot of flaws. I enjoyed this top and it was very comfortable to wear

links_reviews_title: Great work too especially while traveling
links_reviews_text: This top was so great. I was skeptical at first, but it's a great length to wear with leggings and still feel very polished! Also the material is hella comfortable. Will re-rent for sure.
Rented this for work - wore with black trousers. Like the style a lot. Would def rent again
Great patterned top that made getting ready for work simple!
I didn't like the color. It was more of. Blend than a distinct blue shades. I like stretchy fabric made it comfortable and it was a thick fabric, good for fall.

If you are trying to hypothetically, wear leggings to work, I highly recommend this top. The hi-lo peplum covers the entire "seat" area. Plus it's longer than a regular top in the front. It looks fancy without being over the top. The fabric is comfortable and doesn't wrinkle. I will say the tail got caught in a couple chairs but overall I really liked it.
I have a long torso, but even this wasn't flattering on me. it hangs way too low on the backside. I felt like my love handles were popping out. I never did wear it.
This is really well made and flattering! I wore a shaper underneath to smooth my waist. It was pretty with leggings.

links_reviews_title: Endless complements by co-workers and clients
links_reviews_text: Fit so great. Comfortable fit, could've been a little more snug, but very appropriate and flattering for a work setting.
Fit well and really cute with a black sweater or short jacket over it.

Has some stretch in fabric which made it fit perfectly. I wore a thin black mock neck t underneath to add warmth and modesty for office. Layered a black moto over this. Felt confident and polished. Was tempted to purchase but am on weight loss journey so not buying anything currently!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Worn for a presentation at work. Perfect fit and looks soo sharp with a blazer!

links_reviews_text: I loved it! Very comfortable, wore sleeveless and with a blouse. Received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: cute but not sure what I think
links_reviews_text: I am short and this seems really long on me. also I am busty and this top accentuates it more than I expected
Gorgeous and flattering fit, excellent quality!

links_reviews_title: Much cuter on the hanger then on
links_reviews_text: I was really excited for this top. The back is really flattering but the peplum in front hits in a weird spot. I never actually wore it.
Super high-quality piece. RTR suggested I rent a Large, and I don't know how but I wound up with a Medium that hugged me like a hungry boa constrictor. Listen to RTR!

links_reviews_title: Loved the comfort and the style
links_reviews_text: Loved the shape and style. Would have been better in the earlier fall as bare arms this time of year are tough. But the thicker fabric made it doable.
Great quality and shape to a workplace uniform. I wore under a Moto jacket but could also be worn solo or even a wrap. I'm in between L and XL and went with the XL. Still feels TTS.

I rented this top to pair with a couple of pairs of work pants thinking it was a more structured, white collared work shirt. It's actually much more of a breezy, summertime fabric, which I couldn't tell from the model's pictures. Unfortunately, it gaped open and exposed my skin and bra and was overall just too big. I wouldn't recommend this for work.

I'm obsessed with this shirt. I wore it 4 times and got compliments every time. I will likely size down from what RTR recommended this time, but I never felt exposed as I do with most button downs. I love this and am definitely thinking about buying. Will DEFINITELY rent again

links_reviews_title: A must have.. A Staple... the perfect white top!
links_reviews_text: I love... love... love this piece. It is so classy and adorable on. Many complements. The arm bands are a little snug but manageable. This top goes with anything

links_reviews_title: Fun top for a country concert
links_reviews_text: Cute top for going out to a country concert. The extra small fit fine except the sleeves were a little right on me (but looked fine).
This was too small in the arms and the material looked worn and like a strange mix of linen perhaps. It was also very easily wrinkled.
The fit was awkward. It has to be adjusted constantly.
I liked this blouse, but it was a bit too loose at the top. My boyfriend liked that, but it made me a bit self-conscious.

Very flattering staple piece with interesting details...the buttons on the sleeves and the side tie. The fabric is very soft, almost gauzy, but very comfortable (does wrinkle easily so be warned!). There is a snap closure where the wrap crosses which is brilliant to prevent showing off more than you intend and keeping the shirt in place. Fit very loose so I'd size down next time, but will definitely rent again!
The fit is flowy and the middle opens up if you lean over so your bra shows. It also wrinkles really easily. Cute and stylish but not ideal.

So comfortable! I work with kids and I didn't have to worry about it at all. I have broad shoulders and it wasn't tight at all in the shoulder area. I did safety pin the finest (even though there's a clasp) to ensure it didn't pop open. Would strongly consider renting this again or buying!
wore it with a skirt to work. fit fine, nice snap closure on chest. like the tie feature. wrinkles easily. not very exciting
Fun, comfortable and relaxed. Great causal shirt that could also be worn to the office with a nice statement necklace.
Fit well but the shirt there's only one snap in the middle of the shirt so could gape if leaning over etc.
My waist is really little and it was too big I couldn't get the form of the shirt right. Love material and everything else though. They do have a small snap for extra coverage over boobs

links_reviews_title: Great top for a summer day!
links_reviews_text: Great, light top that would be perfect for brunch! The fabric was a bit thin for work but was great for happy hour and oysters after!
This cut was just not flattering on me

I chose this because I'm always looking for unique white blouses to try. The large was the recommended size but I felt it was a little too billowy. Every time I wore it, I had to iron it, it wrinkled a lot. I liked it but but not enough to buy it.
This top didn't do it for me. There was a lot of material overall and the sleeves were a weird length. I didn't end up wearing.
Loose and thin
Lovely fabric too.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear.. tended to wrinkle, not packable
links_reviews_text: TOO LARGE OVERALL
This ended up being too big and I didn't wear it. The first wrap section didn't go far enough across so it gaped in the front
Perhaps I ordered too big (I wear a 6 in tops and got a M). The shirt was just limp and didnt lay well. It needed some starch or something. I sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Nice blouse, but not in love with it.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the lighter fabric and the details - buttons on arms and secure buttons at waist to keep the wrap in place. I think this is a fun top, but the style was just not for me. I have a full bust and the fuller top did not work for me. The top would have worked better if I had sized down, but then the button closure at the waist would have been too tight/unflattering for this hippy, hourglass girl. I wore it on causal Friday with jeans and a statement necklace. Overall, it was ok. Would not rent again since the style / size did not compliment me, but it is a nice piece for the right body.
I rented a large. It's a generous but ran true to size. Wore it with straight legs pants and got a lot of complements!
Great material. Well made. Not flattering on me. I rented the XXL. I might have been able to rent the XL, but i don't think it would have looked any better.

Paired with the matching Rag & Bone Stratten pants. Reminds me of a flight attendant uniform...a very fashionable, cool flight attendant, who lets you sneak into first class and brings you free drinks even though you aren't supposed to be there! Heavyweight knit. Great for a cool day, not for warm weather. Would look great with white pants or skirt. Would be great for travel. Throw on a white tee and you're done! The only con, the fabric rubbed a little at my elbows.
The fit is tailored and the fabric is a heavy synthetic. Loved it both with a white linen skirt and with jeans and a crisp white tank.
Fits well, fabric holds it shape and does not wrinkle, piping is a nice touch. I will wear this a few more times before returning!

links_reviews_title: great fabric. I receiv lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Can be dressed up or down. I wore it with the matching pants. Once with heeled navy blue boots another with tennis shoes.

Loved this blazer with the matching pants. I wore with a white tee, white Reebok shoes, and thin gold necklaces. Got TONS of compliments. Also, highly recommended if you're having to travel for work because the fabric doesn't wrinkle and is stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Very fashionable and comfy- Loved but its heavy knit with no breathe- I was sweltering!
links_reviews_text: Very fashionable and comfy- Loved but its heavy knit with no breathe- I was sweltering!

links_reviews_title: A knitted blazer that is almost a cardigan but much nicer.
links_reviews_text: I am a 12/14 and this fit me well in the 12. A true navy color and a classic style, but the knit fabric and piping make it that much more fun.
fits great. easy to wear and dress up down. not lined but that doesn't matter so much

Rented this blazer along with the matching pants. Compliments galore! I felt very professional yet cool in this this. I rented the blazer twice, once in a 2 and once in a 4. Both fit though the size 2 gave me a more polished, tailored look and the size 4 a more boho look. Would buy !

Sizing was weird but a 3 i would say is basically a large. I rented this just in case the 2 didn't fit over my chest. I sort of wish I got a 2 to make it more of a cropped look, but it still looked cute!! Colors are beautiful! Material super thin and great for going out in warmer weather temps! Considered buying! This would be a staple piece in my closet
I wore this on vacation in the West Indies. Loved the lightweight fabric, the colors, the ruffle and how versatile it was. I dressed it up and down.
Super cute and the colors are the perfect amount of bright. Would definitely rent it again with the matching skirt.
Slip on and be comfortable. Done
Dressy and casual at the same time. Loved the color combo and style
This was the location my boyfriend chose to take a photo in front of lol. It's a good top. I like it and would buy it if it weren't $300
Cite flows shirt. Nice casual
This top was very cute, I recommend renting with the matching skirt for the best look.
Cute cropped tank top! Fit very well, I'm small chested and was able to get away with not wearing a bra which is always a bonus!
I loved the fabric on this top but the shape did nothing for me. I wore it with white jeans and thought it just ok.
Super cute and comfortable- material is thin, colors are great for summer

At first I thought this top seemed boring and not worth a rental, but after wearing it I changed my mind. It made me feel great and I received lots of compliments. I wore it to a concert. It was comfortable and stayed put all night.
Looked like a dress! Was so comfy and everyone gave compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and easy. Paired with jeans for a BBQ and work - received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit and can wear a regular bra which is always a plus!
Also great for breastfeeding!
I loved the pattern and the ruffle! I was worried it might be a little short, but it stayed well tucked into the shirt throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect pop of color for a night out with friends
links_reviews_text: Paired it with high waisted jeans for a great look
Will definitely rent again! Very cute top, only wish the weather was warmer when I rented it - so I wouldn't have had to cover it with a sweater
I love the crop top style. this one was very flattering!
I love comfy clothes. I paired this coat with a hoodie and leggings for a Sunday bike ride. Super fun and easy! Fits TTS.
Love

links_reviews_title: Really warm layering Option with great print!
Great to thrown on over anything! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I've been looking for a blanket or flannel type jacket forever and finally found one! I've worn it so many times. It's warmer than expected and I liked the oversized fit as a warm sweater or thin sweater and vest can be worn underneath. It is very large - particularly in the arm length though. But I bought it anyways!

links_reviews_title: I wore this a few times a week in the month I had it.
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this sweater-coat. It is oversized, so you can easily put a light sweater underneath. It is a thick structured wool, but not too warm to wear inside. I would absolutely rent this again!
Oversized and really warm. Itchy so wear a long sleeve underneath.

links_reviews_title: It's warm, but runs large. It's also very itchy.
links_reviews_text: It looks a lot like a men's jacket due to the boxy fit. Cool pattern, but most comments are that it's a bit big and manly.
Very comfortable work top; though with the spacing of buttons, your choice of neckline is between slightly low cut or tight around the neck.

links_reviews_title: Very cozy but very big in the wrong places for me
links_reviews_text: It was very cozy and looked great. It was a little bit for me liking and made me look a little bulky

Awesome top but runs large like most Vince pieces do. Still I thought it looked fine with sleeves rolled up and tucked in. The material is nice and soft, and suitable for cold or transitional weather. It pairs easily, has good drape, and packs well- I had it folded in a suitcase but was able to wear without ironing.
Cute and comfortable top. Loved how it looked with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Simple but cute everyday top. Easily paired with jeans and booties.
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose. I had to pin the neckline a tad to avoid flashing when I bend over or move around.
Cute fit, the small was good for me (125lb, 5'4"). Good for everyday, but this had been worn a lot. Prob great when newer.
Fits oversize but looks so cute! And it's insanely comfortable!
Loved this shirt, super versatile. Could dress it up or down. Got so many compliments

Very comfortable material, cozy in the AC but cool in the summer sun. I paired this with some high waisted pants for work. I highly recommend a French tuck otherwise it's mostly shapeless. Nice shirt but probably wouldn't rent again since it wasn't anything special.

links_reviews_title: The shirt style allows ease of movement.
links_reviews_text: Fit just right and comfortable shirt. Fabric weight is such that can be worn on warmer days. I am large busted and the cut/style made that less revealing which I like~
Fits as a bag would if you cut a weird deep v shape onto the front. Last time I'll be renting from this brand as the sizing seems to be very inconsistent.

links_reviews_title: Ran a little big but I am very petite in frame.
links_reviews_text: No cons. loved it considered buying it.
This was just too big and boxy for me. It was super comfortable, but looked a little sloppy.
a little heavier fabric thank I thought. better for 70 degree weather (not 80!). I wore it with shorts with the sleeves rolled up.

links_reviews_title: so comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: This top was so effortless and looked perfect for everyday. It runs big, but that's the style and intention of the shirt.

Ran a little large, I could have sized down but didn't mind the comfiness of the medium. Material is soft, I wore this as a more casual look at work with the front half tucked into light denim jeans and a pair of mules, and then threw on sandals and jean shorts with it for the weekend. If you size down so it's more fitted, you could definitely dress this up a little. Overall, a nice easy to wear shirt - I enjoyed wearing it a few different times before sending it back.
Good shirt. Nothing that special. But a good solid shirt
Definitely size down 1-2 sizes in this top as it is very oversized and Vince runs large anyway. I love the pattern and think it's both masculine and sexy! A great wardrobe basic!
I was sure this was a full button down shirt but it's only half way, I got this to use post surgery where I cannot wear a non buttoned up shirt, and couldn't wear it.
liked the shirt and the way the material feels
Comfortable fabric, but very low cut. Definitely not appropriate for work. Also somewhat see-through.
Cute shirt and soft but also very big. Did not feel like trying to style it and try to make it work.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable button up (even for broad shoulders) suitable for work or play
links_reviews_text: Nice thick, substantial fabric. The houndstooth print was cute with the red stars. I love a "built in" scarf tie on a nice blouse and this one was a good length. I was actually surprised how comfortable my broad shoulders felt in this shirt - I was worried that getting a size small (which fits the rest of my body) in a non-stretchy material might mean I have alligator arms all day, but low and behold, I can totally reach up, out and around with not restriction/constriction! I will definitely rent again. The shirt was not very new - upon very close inspection, it appears to have been dry cleaned a lot; HOWEVER, because of the thick fabric, it seems to have worn well - in fact, I would contemplate buying the shirt.
True to size, nice pattern and detail, formal enough for working professional
Loved the fabric (feel and pattern)--my coworkers, not so much. The pattern made their heads spin. It's a bit billowy, so I'd tuck this one in.
Fit well. I liked the bow.
Ran big. Material is a bit heavy. But was a good workday staple.
Solid equipment work blouse. Actually little stars that make up the houndstooth.
Gorgeous pattern. Fit perfectly. Some blouses are too boxy on me but this was perfect. Can be very conservative or a little sexy depending how you do the buttons and tie the bow

links_reviews_title: Lovely shirt, too bad it came with leftover body odor.
links_reviews_text: I loved the design and fit of this shirt. Feminine and flattering cut. It pairs perfectly with work pants. Unfortunately it came with the body odor so I won't be able to keep it. Material is heavier than it looks on the photo so I don't recommend this in 80+ degree weather but it would've been perfect for spring weather. I'm usually medium but small fit perfectly. Bottom was just long enough, hit my hip so hid my pooch.
I loved this top for work. Fun pattern & a good fit. The material is a bit on the thicker side. Fits true to size.
Quality of top is quite nice and the best thing about it. I'd wear for work but not much else. It was fine and classic but nothing super special about this top.
I really loved this top. The fit, the drape, the pattern, the bow - what's not to like?
Nice fabric, feels great

I thought this shirt was houndstooth, but it's actually stars...not my style at all. The fabric was also polyester feeling, meh! To top it off, it was tight in the hips and I couldn't button the bottom button (why I tucked it in).
I wore this to work. I liked the weight of the fabric and unique pattern. I would prefer no neck tie- I wasn't sure how to style. I wore it half tucked in the front with black slacks.
This shirt is not my typical style, with the long tie but tucked into high waisted black denim, it was gorgeous. Equipment blouses do not disappoint. The material is so nice, heavy but soft.
This was interesting, unusual, enjoyable to wear. Sleeves were a little short on my long arms.
Looks good, professional and it is comfortable for a day at the office.
Love the fit and over all look. Perfect blouse to wear for work. Love it!!!!

links_reviews_title: Great for work in daytime and evening
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt. Great quality fabric and style
Really nice blouse but more navy/pink than I thought it would be. The back of the shirt isn't as long as it seems
Fits well
Would rent again!
Cute pattern. Material thicker than expected.
Fit was a little tight around the chest but good everywhere else, one button was off on the sleeve but still in great condition and could be worn with or without a jacket

links_reviews_title: easy to wear with many items I owned.
links_reviews_text: great fit, not too tight or too loose.
This shirt is a heavier fabric. I did wear it in summer, but would be perfect for fall/ winter months as well.
I like the style, perfect for my business casual office. I wore a camisole under it.
Fit flowy but kept shape well! Would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Great professional work top. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Material is heavy so don't wear in hot weather. I didn't feel like wearing it to dinner, but was great for work.
Fit, fabric, and pattern were perfect for work. Comfortable thanks to a bit of a weightier fabric. Super soft and sharp looking.

links_reviews_title: Flattering Work Top with a Fun Pattern
links_reviews_text: This top is perfect for work. I was very disappointed that it arrived smelling badly or I would have really enjoyed wearing this top to the office.
The pattern is nice, but the cut is a little baggy and I wasn't expecting the fabric to be so heavy. I've gotten used to the very light Equipment silk in the other shirts.
The top is comfortable. I wore it twice. Once with black slacks and the other with jeans. The tie portion is long so there are options on how you would like to tie it.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but I never know what to do with a neck tie
links_reviews_text: I liked this shirt but didn't love it. The cut is flattering and the print is nice. But I wasn't sure how to tie the neck tie and it felt somewhat awkward

links_reviews_title: Fit great. A great way to add color to my everyday.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Nice structure.
Great fit, loved the tie. My mom said I looked like Mary Tyler Moore which I took as a compliment! :)
I ended up not being a huge fan of the pattern, but the shirt fit well and was work-appropriate. It's made of thicker material, which I liked.
Very flattering. Wore it on the weekend with jeans and to work with a black skirt. It was super!

links_reviews_title: The fit is a little conservative and the tie hangs weirdly... I will way it was very comfy tho.
links_reviews_text: This shirt will not wow. However, it's certainly not a bad basic top.
For great and was super cute with black pants for work.
Can be dressed up or dressed down, which is what I really liked about this skirt. Cute pattern. Cons - the material is not breathable & the fit around the waist was tight (ran a bit small).
Runs a little small so one size up is good. Cute print, easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was adds the cherry on top of the look
links_reviews_text: Love love love it! Want to see more skirts like this in the RTR selection
Great, easy transitional piece! So many ways to wear and can be dressed up or down, love it.
Fit me well but I would say a little on the smaller size in the waist. Fabric was light but not see through.
Very comfortable, super cute, easy to style for different occasions.
Great silky skirt with a fun cherry print pattern. The midi length was perfect and fun for a casual look. I'm sure it could be dressed up or down easily!
Cute skirt but doesn't stretch. Also seems to wrinkle pretty easily. But it is lightweight and a cute pattern, good for summer.
Light, silky soft and perfect fit!
it's so cute and so comfy

Fun upgrade to an everyday skirt. It's silk, so does wrinkle easily. I'm typically a 4 in the hips, but a 0/2 in the waist, so rented the 2 (had to slip skirt over my head to get it on) and it was perfect.

My waist is closer to a size 2 and my hips are closer to a size 6 and so I typically always choose a size 4. A size 4 wasn't available and I decided to go with the 6. Although the 6 was slightly big in the waist at first (I really like my bottoms fitted) I'm glad I went with a 6 and not a size 2. When you sit down, there is no stretch. So I would say this item runs small.
I loved that I could dress this skirt up or down. I wore it to work with some tennis shoes and I also wore it to a conference with heeled mules. Very versatile.
This is such a cute skirt that fit perfectly. Wish RTR carried more from this brand!

Work this skirt with a red abort sleeve top from RTR with black tights and knee boots bc the weather made a hard turn to cold after i selected my unlimited picks. It is a thin silk(?) skirt wrinkles easily but not too noticeable due to print and dark color. Fit at my natural waist (high). Will likely rent again for warmer weather
Love the fit and the fabric, really nice and versatile!
There's absolutely no stretch to this, so I should've sized up.
Classy skirt that can be dressed up or down. Great for hot weather.

This was so small I barely could zip it up. I probably should have sized up but based on reading other peoples weight/height, I ordered what I thought was the right size. Definitely size up! Honestly, i would probably size up twice. Looks super cute though. Thin material but cute pattern and good length
Beautiful silk fabric. Fun print. Flattering cut and length. You can def. dress it up or down. Will rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Cute print but the static is so much!!
links_reviews_text: Why hasn't anyone pointed out the static issue with this skirt??? No doubt the dress is silky, lightweight and cute. BUT it's so easy to catch static and sticks to the legs. Maybe it's just me oh well.
Loved this skirt. Great length. Light weight material but can still pull off during fall weather. Received lots of compliments!
At 5'7" it it's just below the knee for me. While it's thin, it wasn't sheer at all. And it doesn't require special undergarment to wear either, despite having no slip.
Unfortunately this was just not gonna work for me. Either I am bloated or this runs super small. Size up, or two.

This is a really cute print and actually a refreshing length, everything else I've been renting has been longer. I would say it runs small in the fact that I wear a 4 in almost all brands, but pretty reliably wear a 6 in HVN, so it fits the way I would expect a 6 to fit. The waistband is just a piece of wide ribbon and rolls i.e. doesn't lay terribly flat, but I wore a shirt tied at the waist, so it didn't matter.

I am 5,3 and 190 pounds. I ordered the large. This was super comfortable and the color was great! The front is very flattering. My only issue with it is the back. The material is kind of thin so it leaves nothing to the imagination. You could see every crease of my underwear ( and every cellulite bump). It was perfect for a casual day.

links_reviews_title: Perfect vacation day to night outfit!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my birthday trip to Key West. The jumpsuit was a very comfortable cotton and was a dream to wear all day. During the day I paired it with sandals and at night threw on some heels for a slightly more dressed up look. The neckline is a lower scoop neck. My strapless bra was fine most of the time, but would become visible depending on the angel/how I was sitting.
Loved this jumpsuit so much I wore it multiple times on our vacay! The fabric was cotton-like but kept me cooler than I was expecting in the humid jungle. Did stretch out pretty quickly.
Wore for Thanksgiving and it was perfect! Plenty of room to stretch :) Didn't find the straps to be too long but I have a long upper body.
I usually have problems with jumpsuits not fitting my torso but this one was perfect. I wore it to a day trip with my friends and it was super comfy for the ride

links_reviews_title: Wore wedding dress shopping - cute and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Straps were way too long and not adjustable. Attached them in the back to make it a Razorback and it looked much better. May have had better luck if I had sized to a medium
Very comfortable. I am 4/6 and the XS fit perfectly! Wrote this for a day out in LA.
Almost bought and will rent again!
Surprisingly this fit very well. I am 5'4" and most pants are too long. I was pleasantly surprised. All around good fit. Fabric is a nice weight. Love the earthy green color.
This is the most comfortable jumpsuit ever. The fabric is so soft and flattering. If you have a bigger chest it might not be right, but if you're on the smaller side it's perfect.
Definitely size down, I'm typically a medium and the small fit perfectly. Very comfortable and cute effortless look. Unforgiving fabric though, will show every panty line or anything worn underneath.

The fabric is so soft and luxurious, it felt like a dream to wear. But I wore it over a long sleeved shirt to make it work in wintertime, and it showed every crease underneath. Would suggest a bodysuit or other undergarment to smooth it out. But if I was able to wear it in warmer weather, I think it'd be perfect!

I am 5'2" and typically wear a size medium in most clothes. This jumpsuit is definitely meant for someone with a longer frame. The straps cannot be adjusted so my boobs/bra was always showing. I had to pull it up and push the straps back (which then expose my bra strap in the back) but it never stayed. Also went down to my ankles so had to wear with platforms/wedges. Maybe if I had gotten a small it would have worked..?

Wore this on vacation as a cover up and travel outfit. Can definitely be dressed up or down! Fit true to size, slightly low but not overly revealing - I wore a bralette and it was perfect. Was also happy with length as a tall girl.
It was a little too big for me, but was really cute and comfy.
Comfortable, cute. Perfect for walking around Vegas while hungover the day after my wedding lol. Very flattering and slimming.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear. It was too big.
links_reviews_text: I recommend sizing down for this one. Very cute but I couldn't wear it out.

I love the length of the pants on this romper. The color is great for fall and a nice neutral that can be paired with almost any light jacket. My complaint is that the straps and bust were more like an extra large than large. If I would have sized down, the straps may have fit, but the body would have been snug. I wore a shirt under which went along with my casual look and the straps were a nonissue. Will rent again to see if sizing down could work better for me.
I wore this to a few casual events over the weekend and loved it. I think I would have preferred a medium, but I was still able to wear the small.

I really enjoyed this jumper and wore it several times in the month I had it. It is really soft and almost like loungewear. The only minor drawback was that it was a little too big for my frame. I am 5'3" - flat chested and a little angular in terms of shape. The top kind of hung on my torso and if I bent over it was a full show. I had to wear a cami underneath, which was too bad since it looked better without it. Even so, I worthwhile rental.
I want to live in this jumpsuit. The color is lovely and the fabric is so soft. Throw it on for anything

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy, compliment worthy, but be weary of panty lines
links_reviews_text: So soft and comfy for everyday. The super soft material hangs on every inch, so panty lines are inevitable unless you have a really high waisted thong. Just go free - so cute! Also, wish it had pockets.

links_reviews_title: This was far too large for me, but it was still really cute and I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I'll plan to re-order in another size because the cut and style is really nice. Definitely a re-order!
Straps were a little long for me so ended up with more cleavage than it shows on the model.
Fit is good, except the straps being too long which makes it a bit too low cut. Material really makes it more of a casual comfy type look, harder to dress up.

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit but not for me
links_reviews_text: Very cute but the material is tough - it shows EVERYTHING and it's very flattering. Also - I ordered a large which fit my bottom half but gaping on my top half. That's usually the case because I have a slimmer torso and small boobs and bigger bottom half. Would be super cute on someone that is the same size all over!

this jumpsuit is super comfortable! i usually would get a medium but the large was the only size available. it was a little bit, but still worked. the top is a little more low cut than depicted. the fabric is super soft and the tie at the middle hides a tummy.

The other reviews definitely do this justice. Super soft, pretty color. The straps are not adjustable, so I ended up wearing a bralette under it knowing it would be seen. Waist tie is adjustable and the waistband is stretchy, so this is a good jumpsuit for someone with a curvy bottom half. Wore on vacation to the beach and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Runs large on top, and fabric shows everything
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" 138 pounds. I have a small waist and 32DD bust. The straps on this were too long, and the neckline sagged. The waist and pants fit, but the fabric showed all of my bumps and lumps. Won't be keeping this one.
I loved this jumpsuit. The top is cut pretty low though.
This could have been VERY cute because of the waist tie detail BUT the crotch hangs soooo low! I probably should have sized down.

It was so comfy and fit true to size. I got compliments all day long at work. I would definitely rent again. If you're a little bustier, you may not be comfortable with this look in a work/formal setting as it showed off the girls a little more than I normally do for work.

links_reviews_title: It was SO comfortable! Too long
links_reviews_text: It was extremely comfortable- but as others have stated, if you are short (i'm 5'3" and got a Large), it was too long, I used some fabric tape to make the straps shorter but it fell off. I would love it if the straps could be adjusted.
Pros: Great, lightweight cotton material. Cons: Thin material reveals butt cellulite. But the cut and is very flattering otherwise! Would give it 5 stars if it had thicker coverage in back.

links_reviews_title: True to size, but cut too low for me to wear.
links_reviews_text: Cut too low for me to wear. Would have been weird to wear a tank underneath.

This was perfect for the baby shower I attended with my toddler. It fit very well, looked great, was extremely comfortable, and made it a lot easier to wrangle the little guy than if I'd been wearing a dress. I will definitely come back to this one! (A quick note: I wore the medium, but the large would have worked just as well, though it was a teensy bit bigger in the chest. Keep that in mind if you're bustier.)
I loved this jumpsuit. The material and fit made it super comfortable. I highly recommend it.
This jumpsuit is sooo comfy and very cute. Only complaint is straps are a touch too long so I had to make sure it didn't become too low cut but that's an easy fix. Would definitely recommend renting!
This would have been really cute, as the fit was perfect, but the material was a bit thin. any dimples or lines show especially since thin and light colored. Did not end up wearing.
Practical layer to go with suits -- high quality.

links_reviews_title: Great top! Dresses up a casual outfit.
links_reviews_text: I got this to teach some part time classes, and it was perfect! (Never mind that I am awful at taking selfies.) it has a nice drape to it, and you could easily dress it up or down. I love tops that give just a little something "extra" to a business-casual outfit, and this shirt was perfect. I wore a small, which fit nicely. But if you want more of a drape look, size up once.
Would have kept and worn again if I hadn't gotten deodorant streaks on it when taking it off
The fabric, the drape, the simplicity. Perfection. I think I'll buy this one.

This is a nice, professional top for spring and summer. The draping of the neckline is elegant. The bottom of the top is a bit fitted, which I thought was slightly awkward. If I want to rent this one again, I'll see if a medium looks better on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: This shirt paired nicely with my pants I rented and goes well with many items.
links_reviews_text: My bra straps still showed, the boat neck was a little too large. Otherwise, this shirt is very comfortable and versatile.

This is a beautiful top, I wore it under a blazer and it provided for a nice neckline. If it was warm and not the polar vortex outside, it would be wonderful to wear without a blazer to really be able to see the beautiful tailoring of the top. I think it runs a little snug in the stomach area. It is not too long.

links_reviews_title: Loved the neckline but the shirt was too tight.
links_reviews_text: Shirt was great quality, great color, great fabric (but not super stretchy). The neckline was fantastic and classic. But it was too tight around my midsection and was too short for my long torso. I was looking for something a little more flowy than skin tight.
I sized down but should have went with the small. It was snug and short.
Beautiful , great for work or night out
good fit, very versatile.

This top fit perfectly and was super classy and comfortable. I work a job that requires physical exertion while looking professional and this fit both categories. So many compliments. Would buy it if it were less expensive.
Nice material, fit was slimming

Color and material is great, but the neckline was weird and didn't stay put. Not sure what kind of bra to wear with this to make it sit better... Also a necklace doesn't work because of the cowl neck.

links_reviews_title: Runs large at the top, small through the waist
links_reviews_text: The boat neck is too large and was falling off at times. Although I should note my shoulders are pretty narrow and I have problems with bra straps falling off too. However the waist area was very fitted and almost too small if I was any bigger. Not sure I would re rent but the material is nice.
The fit is flattering and elegant. Would go with many other pieces.
Fits perfectly, not too long or too short, and has a very petty draped neckline

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - was a weird length
links_reviews_text: Much more cropped than appeared in photo.
Fit very well, and good quality.
Loved this top but I wore it off the shoulder rather than center. It made it a bit more fun and sexy. Loved it this way. When the top was centered I found the neck too open and too much fabric.

links_reviews_title: Decided not to wear but it is cute
links_reviews_text: Pretty blue color
Flattering
Fits well, very basic, but it's what I wanted. A great basic.
Loved the way this top fit and the detail around the neck. Nice navy color. Comfortable.
I didn't wear this as the neck line wasn't flattering on me. It fit well and I could see it looking great on the right person, but that person wasn't me.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work twice. Pairs well with just about anything!
links_reviews_text: Drapes beautifully.
The top of this blouse was large and the bottom did not fit over my hips.
I need the medium but I love this and will get again.
The bust area wasn't too tight and the waist was tailored, very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Versatile and could wear over and over
links_reviews_text: This a great everyday dressy top or top for work. It fit great and was flattering. Would wear over and over or rent again. Worth it
The fit and fabric was nice. I just didn't end up having the right thing to wear with it at the time. I didn't end up wearing but might rent again for the right outfit

This shirt is gorgeous, but it runs way small. I am between a small and medium normally. I sized up but the medium is still too small. I could have worn it, but it was definitely too fitted. I would definitely rent again in a large.
Great top to pair with my black Theory blazer for work.
Looked very nice, hung well on my shoulders.

I wore this twice, as a dress for work and as more of a cardigan on the weekend. I loved both looks! The only downside as with most wrap dresses is that you really need a camisole underneath or it is too low in the front.

This dress is a lot shinier/sparklier than the pictures convey. Also, the way the wrap fits, there is no way not to flash the entire restaurant, so wear leggings or thick tights. I try not to wear camis with wrap dresses but it was unavoidable in this situation.
I loved everything about this dress! The only negative is the metallic threads were a bit itchy
Loved this dress. Worn to work and got lots of compliments! Absolutely beautiful. But agree with other reviews...the tight knit material made the dress want to come "unwrapped" several times

True to the DVF wrap dress rep this was an easy dress to wear and look fabulous on all your curves. The material is knit and needed to stretch out a bit. I had to pin the bottom closed the first time I wore it. But the chest fit fine over my larger bust. By the second time it closed without the pin or revealing too much. The knit is heavy so it was a great winter dress. I wore it with tights and knee high boots for holiday pix and the touch of sparkle in the grey showed up great.
Fit was true to size. A bit low cut if you're modest. Thankfully I'm not!

This is my first DVF and I love it. I rented it for holiday parties this season. When I first tried it on I thought it was way too clingy but I adjusted lol. Hubby eyes popped out of his head. Wrap dresses really do look amazing on curvy figures and DVF is the wrap dress queen. I had to use a safety pin to close the top a bit. Size 12 and large is perfect.

Wow I loved this dress. It just hugs the body in all the right places and I got so many compliments from coworkers saying how great it looked. It made my guy say "wow" and a few people commented that it would make a great holiday party dress. May need to rent again!
Should have ordered a medium.
This dress was very comfortable. As you can see from photo I added a cami and tights to make it work appropriate.

Nice dress in a fun metallic material. The fit in the skirt is a little on the narrow side, so it made my shoulders look a little broader than normal (which is already broad). The neck on DVF wrap dresses always runs pretty deep, and this dress was no different. I definitely needed a camisole. Because I got a small, the fit was a little in the snug side, but beware that the bottom wrap can also come open.
Fit was a little too snug around boobs and hips

links_reviews_title: Good as a sweater, questionable as a dress
links_reviews_text: Like a few other renters, I opted to wear this dress as more of a cardigan layer than the originally intended dress shape. I think it would have been a little too risqu on me for work otherwise, but loved it as a sweater.

It have metal thread in medium grey line- camera don't catch it- so its more dressy then u think, texture- is amazing( not a plain knit ), sleeve longer then standard- but folding - don't affect the look & will be good for those who need extra length. The only problem: go size UP, fabric is spring-back- so wraps get open all the way to waist easily- i had black like leggings tights & thanks to it didn't flash underwear, may be wearing it like a cardigan with leggings more open would be stylish, anyway go size bigger- so enough fabric to do the wrap , other wise its gorgeous ( just to make it easer 36 B-29"-39")

I usually don't have an issue with DVF wrap dresses but this one was much smaller than I'm used to. The opening was right in front and would not stay closed. I opted to wear it as a "sweater" over pants and button down to be work appropriate.

True to size but low cut, as DVF wraps tend to be (I wore with a black tank underneath for work). Also, the slit showed a ton of leg when sitting (I was glad to be wearing tights in a business setting). It has quite a bit of sparkle so on its own, great for date or party; I wore with a short grey jacket for work. Very heavy knit so it was forgiving, but you may like it better with shapewear.

Nice dress, high quality and flattering cut. I didn't love the fabric, it felt too shiny for work, yet I wouldn't wear to a formal event. So it feels a little awkward.....still enjoyed wearing, but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Well sadly it was a funeral service, however the dress was very warm. It was so cold outside.
links_reviews_text: I probably could have worn the medium but since it was a funeral, I felt it best not to wear something too body hugging. The large was a little loose in the chest area but I used fashion tape . The dress was super warm, classy yet not flashy. Great choice.

links_reviews_title: More of a duster than dress
links_reviews_text: I would say this is more of a duster than a dress- it's super low so had to wear bandeau underneath and pin shut Also wide slit in front and gates open so I wore with leggings Shiny metallic color comfy stretch fits true to size Arms are long which I appreciated bc I have long arms Cute sweater duster cardigan I'd call it ;) Not thick or itchy win!
Comfortable, fits well, many compliments

links_reviews_title: The dress fit find, but since is was a wrap dress when you sat down the dress open to your crotch
links_reviews_text: The dress fit nice, the dress is made for standing because when you sat down the dress didn't cover your thighs and opened to the crotch.

links_reviews_title: A little sparkle for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: I selected true to size, but that's because I don't think it was overall small or large, but the fit was a little odd, with the sleeves and top being looser and needing to tug the wrap skirt back in place a bit. The sleeves on this dress are oddly long, and I usually have the opposite problem. I tucked the cuffs under and it worked okay. I pinned the top for peace of mind.

Lovely sweater dress that can take you from work to holiday party. The fabric has a bit of sparkle in it to help dress it up a bit. The cut is flattering, although I always wish her dresses had a touch more fabric to them in order to wrap just a bit more. It's always tricky to sit down at your desk in these.

links_reviews_title: Remembered I don't like wrap around
links_reviews_text: Wrap around, like any DVF dresss. If you like that style then you'll like this...great fabric that is forgiving. But for me, just shows all my curves and too tight and wrap around means I can't sit down without giving a view.
Feels like a sweater dress, nice fabric. Super flattering. Stays tied no problem. Neck line a bit low but just wore with big necklace and was fine for work.

I needed a camisole to "mind the gap" as I am broad shouldered but not particularly busty. People liked it on me more than I like it but based on the number of compliments I received, I gave it 5 stars. Would definitely wear again.

This is a lovely, classic wrap dress in a thicker more textured knit than the usual DVF sweater dress. I didn't realize from the description that the dark grey stripes are metallic/shimmery. It felt more festive than necessary for a regular work day, but I wore it anyway and found it was comfortable, flattering, and professional. Only imperfection is that the sleeves were a bit too long. But overall I really liked this and will likely rent again.
This dress ran large in my opinion. The sleeves were long and it kind of bunches up. I'm not really a small girl, and I'm busty. I feel like I could have gotten away with a small.
Really liked this dress. Not too low cut - don't wear a push-up and you'll be fine.

links_reviews_title: nice dress but very low cut
links_reviews_text: dress was nice, heavy fabric. somewhat shiny material. the fit was good in the shoulders/length, but was extremely low cut as you can see in the photo. very unflattering!

Another great wrap dress from DVF. The material holds together at the neck's V better than some. At times, I've had to wear a tank under these, but didn't with this one. It is a heavy, but not hot, material with the metallic thread. I did have to really watch how I stood or sat, as the material slides past each other very easily and sitting down, could have easily had it fall open to my waist if I didn't hold it! But was aware, so was careful and got a lot of compliments on this. Will be a great one for casual holiday parties too.

links_reviews_title: Best for late Nov and Dec in the phila area
links_reviews_text: Warm sweater material. Too warm for Oct in the Phila area. Also, it's sparkly so it feels better for holiday time. But, not warm enough for snowy weather. Bunches in the back. Super stretchy. Pinned the bottom part to keep the two pieces together and avoid embarrassing fashion slips at work..... totally possible with this wrap dress! True to size. Might rent again in Dec

I knew this dress would be perfect for valentine's date night out with my husband. I did find it ran small and while I usually wear a size 2 in dresses, I'm glad I rented a small. I still had to wear a camisole as it was a bit too revealing. Size up on this one.

links_reviews_title: The best fabric- stretchy and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Was not too low cut like most DVF dresses. I didn't take a picture but it was low key sexy. Wore to work and then to dinner. This could be a holiday dress if you wanted something more simple... has almost a silver tensile in the fabric. Really liked how the dress felt.

Wore this to drinks with friends and dinner with my boyfriend. The material is thick and soft, and the fit was so flattering. I liked that it fit my chest well too, didn't need a cami underneath (though I would have if I wore it to work). I felt really sexy wearing this - would definitely rent again!
Super comfy, wrap dress that stays closed. Wore to work with a cami underneath and leggings. Great for 2nd trimester! Would rent again.

Love a wrap dress for the flattering cut and this one did not disappoint. Was a bit low cut, so I just wore a black cami underneath. Sleeves were also a bit long, but I was able to cuff them without an issue.

As other reviews say, its a deep V. With the correct plunge bra, and in Miami, it was fine. Im an athletic size 2, 32D, almost 55 and the S fit better, not pulling around my hips or thighs. I was mindful of the wrap slit getting in and out of the car.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful wrap dress but wear leggings
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this wrap dress multiple times. It has some sparkle to it and was very versatile and appropriate for lots of occasions- office, dinner out, theater. But, there is no way I could have worn this without a camisole and opaque black leggings or tights underneath. If I hadn't I would have been flashing my underwear.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is festive and great quality.
links_reviews_text: The design of the dress could fit a lot of different shapes; I felt like it was very becoming on me.

links_reviews_title: All dressed up with no where to go!
links_reviews_text: Loved this blouse. Wore it to work from home in the middle of quarantine. Had to share photo as not many people will see it. Love Derek Lam and would rent this again. Great quality fabric. Great design. Fun sleeves.
I liked the concept but the fit was so oversized I couldn't wear it.
It's a nice quality shirt but size WAY down. I sized down and it was still too big.

links_reviews_title: Really cute top - but sleeves are sometimes in the way
links_reviews_text: Everything is as expected. Super cute top, but sleeves get in the way when working.
Just makes you feel like a million!
Way too big so it fit super boxy. Should've sized on the smaller side.
Flowey and easily worn dressy or with jeans. Nice fabric
It looked great. But felt huge. Thou I wore it all day on errands and lunch with some people. Everyone wait it looked great. I loved long flappy sleeves. Was fun to wear

Loved it! Wore with embroidered jeans for a casual party and with cropped black straight trousers and booties to work. Fits my 38D with no issue. Sleeves are gorgeous but watch if you are eating because that could be messy. Perfectly suited for spring or air conditioned environments. Could be a tad too warm for summer climates.
Material was rich, overall fit was large, sleeves extremely long. Clean minimalistic look.

links_reviews_title: Its a nice top, judt too flowy and large.
links_reviews_text: Maybe this style just is not for me, but I really didn't have a good experience with this top. The stark white is a lot. Don't wear this if you're clumsy, it gets dirty so easily. The fit is just off. It doesn't synch in the right places. Its not form fitting at all. The sleeves just got in the way all day.
Paired it with a belt and it seem to work out just fine.
I like the clean look but the sizing runs big. The bell sleeves look nice.

I went outside my comfort zone on this one. Fit was true to size. It is made to be worn as a tunic but i found it made me look frumpy. I ended up wearing high waisted jeans and tucked it in. Loved the sleeves but they do get in the way.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and high quality but runs very large!
links_reviews_text: Loved the shirt and would definitely rent again but in a small instead of medium. The shirt is very long/ large, but I wore it anyway. Very high quality!
Love the fit and it's perfect for a New Year's Eve dinner with friends
Don't just size down once....size down twice. This was too big in every way, so I didn't wear it.
Very pretty but it was so big it looked frumpy on me
True to size. Bell sleeves were a bit long and got in the way. Cute to wear but not convenient for work.

links_reviews_title: great shape, nice detail re: coloring
links_reviews_text: overall runs a bit big, item has been worn much might be about at the end of its lifespan

This is a beautiful blouse. The cut is very flattering. The fabric is soft but very sturdy. Can be worn casually with jeans or dressed up in a number of ways. A nice neckline that falls at just the right spot.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy but maybe could have sized down
links_reviews_text: Classy and classic. Loved this

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top but runs VERY LARGE
links_reviews_text: Order at least two sizes smaller than you think. This was HUGE

links_reviews_title: Fun and nice quality but long
links_reviews_text: I really liked the fit through the torso and the sleeves were really fun. Great quality shirt but the length is awkward. Too long to wear untucked but too much material to tuck in without looking bulky. Wanted to love it but just couldn't figure out how to wear it to look stylish.
You look like you should be in Vogue and feel like you are!

links_reviews_title: Pretty top, large and relatively shapeless.
links_reviews_text: I'm really petit up top - not a whole lot in the shouder department. I liked the sleeves on this shirt, but I felt like I was drowning a bit. I'm not sure the smaller size would help, but it is a beautiful top if you're not worried about drowning!
Elegant and true to size

links_reviews_title: not practical for my work, the sleeves got in the way
links_reviews_text: sleeves were too long, got in the way of performing work
The fabric was wrinkly...as shown in the photos...and the sleeves were way too long for me. I didn't wear it.
Combination maternity and flying nun. Huge. Went right back.
Nice quality fabric, but it didn't look elegant on me like it does on the model here, instead it made me look like a cult leader and therefore I could not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Worn to work. Easy , comfortable and polished piece.
links_reviews_text: Pros can match easily with slacks.

links_reviews_title: fun unique blouse but runs big
links_reviews_text: This blouse has some fun, unique elements but is definitely for a taller person, I think. The blouse itself is voluminous and then runs big. I needed a belt to bring it in a bit. The sleeves can get a bit in the way biut I loved them.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Way too big
links_reviews_text: Too big. Size down at least 2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little large but so cute!!
links_reviews_text: Yes this runs large so I'd recommend ordering a size smaller than you usually wear. But overall such a cute top and I got lots of compliments on this!

links_reviews_title: I do not like the length of the arms.
links_reviews_text: the overall fit was ok but the arms were way too long

links_reviews_title: Way too big. Makes you look like a sack of potatoes.
links_reviews_text: Huge
I didn't wear it because the sleeves were too long and unwieldy.

links_reviews_title: Shine like a star in this sweater!
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater, rented for a concert. The stars are glittery silver hard to tell from the pic. The sleeves are poofy and fun. I'm petite so sweater fit me really well but it def runs small.
I loved everything about this sweater. I am short waisted so...
Great addition for an 80's dress up!
Print is cute, fabric is nice I wish it were a tiny bit looser for comfort.

This sweater was lovely but the sleeves are so short and it runs a bit small. I am usually a small and I ordered a medium and it was a bit too tight. But, the design was cute and the sweater was well made. Would rent again in a large. Also note the stars are silver and not white.

links_reviews_title: Fun, different print that can be worn several ways
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater. I tend to buy boring solid colors so I can wear them again and again, so throwing this fun pattern into the mix really changed up my wardrobe. It is a snug material so I could see bustier ladies potentially wanting to go up a size, but the small fit me perfectly and even allowed room for a collared shirt underneath.
Fit was great, loved the sleeves.
The sweater fit well and was comfortable. The sleeves were a little puffy, so I pushed them up to hide this.

A super fun and easy sweater! I loved this Parker star sweater. Running true to size, I recommend sizing up for a backup size for a looser fit. The S I wore was great for tucking in - but for a more casual fit I would size up. The stars on this sweater were eye catching and gave the sweater a cool vibe. The fabric stretched and gave in necessary areas (i.e the bust & hips). The sleeves had a little volume when sitting properly which gave the top another interesting element! I think this is a great sweater for everyday wear but can also easily be dressed up.

I kept this for a few weeks over the holidays and it was perfect for several informal occasions, delivering just a little bit of a festive vibe. The stars are knit with some metallic thread for a subtle shine, and the sleeves provide an interesting but wearable silhouette. Only downside, the fabric is a tiny bit stiff. But that does mean the sleeves keep their shape, rather than drooping as some oft-worn rentals seem to do. Fit-wise, it was a tad short on me and I would maybe have preferred more length in the sleeves, but I have a long torso. Overall a fun everyday piece.
Rented this for everyday. It elevated my current wardbrobe to a stand out piece. (Even I just wore it to work the enrichment fair. :))

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater, perfect amount of sparkle!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater and wish I could buy it! I'm really into stars this season and thought this print was super fun, I worked it to a wine tasting with high waisted black jeans. The stars are the tiniest bit sparkly but not too flashy at all. The material is a little different for a sweater, it's kinda slinky, makes it a little more dressy. I loved the loose sleeves and also the waist is a little fitted I think giving an overall slimming look for a sweater. I wore in 3 days out of the 5 I had it and will probably rent again!!
Cute, nice quality. Liked the touch of shiny stars. Ran a bit small and the sleeves were almost 3/4 length.

Loved this sweater! Just a little sparkle without being too much. Fun & unique bell sleeves, but they're cropped so you don't have to worry about getting them in your food or anything if you're out to eat, which I was. I'm tall, so the sleeves were about 3/4 length on me. I have a long torso, and it hit below my belly button. Rented this to wear for Valentine's Day out with a couple other couples. I felt really cute in it! Material isn't as soft as I expected, but it wasn't an issue at all. Paired it with black jeans and black boots on a very cold night, wore an undershirt, and a long warm coat. I'm usually a Small, but that wasn't available. Glad I actually got the Medium, it was on the smaller side of Medium, which was a nice and comfy fit. Nice fitted fit, but without being tight, worked well. I don't like bulky sweaters, and that wasn't an issue with this at all. It wasn't too thin either. Right in the middle. Wanted to buy! Will prob. rent again, loved it :)

links_reviews_title: Wore out and about, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Typically wear a xs or s...wish I had gotten the small but xs was still a cute fit. Sleeves are a big shorter, they don't come all the way down to wrists. Cute top.
This sweater had cute details of sparkle and a fuller sleeve but easy to wear and looked great!

Sweater is a nice lighter material, and has a slight shimmer... overall loved it but it was just too small. I normally wear a 10 top and got a Large and it was too small to wear it! Size up and it should work!

Seems to run a little small. Maybe my arms are a bit longer, because I wasn't able to wear it like the photo shows, but rather I pushed it up my arms just below the elbow, and that gave a bit of a balloon sleeve appearance, which looked nice. Stars on the sleeves are silver sparkly, on the torso, they are just white
Super cute but really short.

links_reviews_title: Cute but wish I ordered up
links_reviews_text: While the material is stretchy and the design is fantastic it is definitely a bit of a thicker/hard material to the touch. Great for a skirt or a legging, but not sure I love it for a sweater. This was more of a fitted sweater than a loose one, and the sleeves were about 4 inches too short. All in all it ended up looking puffy on me so won't be wearing.

I would order up one size if you want it snug, two sizes if you want it to fit loosely like in the photo. I ordered my normal size and it was skin tight and way too short in length and in the sleeves. Looked like I put on a little girl's sweater. Also, it is kind of scratchy, so I would want to wear something underneath.

links_reviews_title: I liked it but a little boxy
links_reviews_text: cute design
Super fun print to wear for day to day or dress up for a night out. I loved the cropped sleeves. The fabric does not give much but i still found this very comfortable. Wore several times!
This was my first rent the runway item and it was great! Everyone at work loved this sweater- fit was perfect and the quality was amazing. I highly recommend this sweater!!
enjoyed this piece.
Very fun sweater to dress up everyday wear. Not the comfiest- material was a bit itchy.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this piece
links_reviews_text: This sweater runs super tight and is itchy, but it's so cute!

the glitter in the stars makes this extra fun. I rented the small and fit fine in the body, but was a little short in the arms. given it's a tight knit stretch material (not cotton/wool), the sleeves shrunk up my arms a bit and did not sit at the wrists. It was still cute though and made the sleeves a bit poofy-er. wear with a tank top underneath b/c a bit itchy otherwise.
This sweater was soft and the stars were a fun touch. The body was a little snug. As others mentioned, the sleeves are a little short, so I pulled them up a little bit to make them puffier.
I read reviews and ordered a M rather than my normal size of xs And very glad I did! Looked great with red coat and jeans!
Didn't love it.
Strangely short, short sleeves. Really odd fit.

links_reviews_title: Super cute sweater with fun detail.
links_reviews_text: Cute style but too snug, even in the large, for the busty among us.
this sweater is adorable. the perfect way to look more dressed up during the day!

links_reviews_title: cute but way too small in the bust
links_reviews_text: did not fit my boobs! got a large, i'm a 34C and it would not fit at all.
This is such a cute sweatshirt! I almost bought it. I wore it numerous times. It for perfect. I loved that it was casual with a bit of fancy with the sparkly stars.
I was very disappointed with this sweater. I usually love everything Parker. The sleeves were to short didn't even reach my wrists and the length was short.

I really enjoyed this cute and unique sweater. The stars have a little bit of sparkle, but not too much that it becomes work inappropriate. The sleeves are about three-quarter length with a tiny poof, adding interest. The fit was good and I wore an undershirt to avoid scratchiness. I would rent again.
Great fit, medium was perfect but felt more like a small/medium more than medium/large. If that makes sense. It's super cute and fitted
Sweater was cute but the M was too small so I didn't wear. I liked that it was a bit sparkly and the sleeves were super cute too!
I feel like a giant baby in this and I LOVE IT So spring, so comfy, so so so so cute I purchased

links_reviews_title: I never want to take this off
links_reviews_text: Perfect oversized, cotton, comfortable jumpsuit for lazy days. Can easily be dressed up for a bit of a more formal look. Love it! Bought it.

I am obsessed with this jumper!! It is so colorful and comfortable.. you will want to stay in it all day! I have even considered buying it because I love it so much. And the compliments you will receive are endless!!

links_reviews_title: Could be good for the right season and occasion!
links_reviews_text: Hmm, this is a tough one for me to review. Although I didn't love it in Chicago October, I do think this could be appropriate for warmer weather, a tropical vacation, or something like that. I ended up wearing it to a day of casual meetings at work, and I think it would be too casual for my actual job as a high school teacher unless I dressed it up well. I got a few compliments, but it did remind me of the scrubs my mom wears in her job as a pediatric nurse. That said, this jumpsuit was SUPER comfy and relatively flattering. I'm 5'4", so the length was a little awkward (just a tiny bit cropped). All in all, I would consider renting this again for a more appropriate occasion/weather.
Super cute, slightly oversized fit but loved the voluminous sleeves and the length was perfect. I liked the print but found the green a tough color to pair with other things.
I want to live in this (minus the inconvenience of the buttons). It's definitely bold but so fun and comfortable. I'm contemplating buying it.

links_reviews_title: This unique comfortable piece was perfect for a sunday brunch!
links_reviews_text: Love literally everything about this! The material was soft and flexible, the sleeves were super adorable, there was enough room in the butt/hips. The lenegh was perfect for my short legs!
Cute, comfortable and fun! I tucked the sleeves in to make it a little less poufy-90s.
This jumpsuit is SO FUN! Definitely got a bit wrinkled after 1 wear but it was great for that wear

links_reviews_title: Total crowd pleaser... with the right accessories !
links_reviews_text: So this piece is great if you have the accessories to jazz it up. I paired it with a green free people bralette (color matched exactly) and gold chain bcbg belt. It does look a little bit hospital scrub-y without the accessories, but I got non stop compliments all night. Overall super comfortable and different !! Highly recommend
I absolutely loved everything about this but it ran a little large. Super comfortable, has pockets, great print. I tried to dress it up but it leans heavily on the casual side.
I love a good jumpsuit. I ordered in a medium and small based on reviews. I'm usually a medium but ended up wearing the small. LOVE IT.

links_reviews_title: Would wear every day if I could!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a party on a hot summer day. I am obsessed with this jumpsuit! It was so comfortable, a bit loose in the middle but the look was so unique that it didn't bother me. I'd rent again!
Boxy roomy fit. The short sleeves are a bit too long/big i ended up folding them a couple times. But overall cool jumpsuit
This could have been cute but just did not work for me. At 5'4, the length was too long to be cute. Also it was big and baggy and didn't do anything for me. Gorg pattern, wish it could have worked!
The pattern and fabric are beautiful, but it runs really large. Probably not the best choice for petites. I felt like a small child wearing really comfortable, oversized pajamas.

links_reviews_title: A jumpsuit that girls will love and men will hate.
links_reviews_text: Even though I found this jumpsuit shapeless I loved the print and how comfortable it was. I actually received a lot of compliments on it. If you are looking for something to show off your body this is not it. It does wrinkle after all day wear. Was perfect length on my 5'2 height. Could've worn flats with it. Was perfect for a bloated day !
Fun jumpsuit-- nicely oversized. I got so many compliments.
LOVE this jumpsuit! The color/pattern was fun and cheerful, but most importantly, this jumpsuit is complimentary to curvy figures!
So so cute. The puffy sleeves are awesome, the length of the jumpsuit is absolutely perfect. Light, airy material.

links_reviews_title: Amazing one of a kind piece!
links_reviews_text: I looooooved this jumper! I wore it to a summer party and also walking around town. I would recommend being on the taller side to wear this - the fit is a bit baggy and the legs are cropped. You could easily get lost in this! I wore it with some Birkenstock's and got a ton of compliments each time I wore it.
Fits a bit more oversized. Got lots of compliments though.
This romper is not cute. Thought it would be comfy for work, but it looks ridiculous on.

links_reviews_title: Wore this about 6-7 times during the rental month!
links_reviews_text: Fit is looser but there's some structure in the construction around the waist that helps it not feel too baggy! Got so many compliments every single time I wore it.
Loved the fit. Loose but flattering.
Runs big but was super comfy!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments wish I could keep
links_reviews_text: Needed wide belt and high heels cause I'm short.
