links_reviews_title: Would be perfect for early/mid second trimester. Not for 27 weeks pregnant though
links_reviews_text: I'm 27 weeks and just a tad to round for it now-- would have been a great rental a month ago. Very loose around the middle, I sized up and it almost fit. Even though my husband thought it was really cute standing up, I noticed it pulled at the buttons around my belly when I sat down so I'm returning without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, if you are considering this jumpsuit just do it.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVE this jumpsuit. I received so many compliments. I wore three times and was debating purchasing it. The colors are beautiful and it is incredibly comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love this jumpsuit! Comfortable and light.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit. It was comfortable, light, and easy to get on and off, which made peeing less of a stressful event :P It runs large, but I didn't mind. Would buy it except it's still pricey even with a discount!

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS pattern. Makes you stand out!
links_reviews_text: Fit was large. I'm a size 10 so I opted for the XL. I would have been fine in the L (8). They ended up being more like full length pants on me, not cropped, but it was still a super cute look! I got so many compliments :D

Totally outside my usual style, but that's why I love RTR. Beautiful piece that I wore a few times, each time getting more and more confident in the bold print. I especially loved the sleeves - blousy without emphasizing anything.

links_reviews_title: Interesting outfit but worked for a statement piece
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friends graduation. The outfit was different, fun and unique. It's light and airy so perfect for a hot day too! I thought it was adorable but it definitely wasn't my favorite piece I've ever rented. Also, it really needs a belt of you look like a sack of potatoes.
So cute, but not great for a petite/short figure. Incredibly long.
Could not figure out how to style this without making it look like a toddler's outfit.

links_reviews_title: It's a fun piece but the fit is a little off
links_reviews_text: Its a very cute pattern. It's a thinner material than what I was expecting so it would be good for late spring/summer. My only complaint is where the waist started and torso ended. I am tall and have a long torso but the torso on this jumpsuit was too long! It unfortunately fit at an awkward place. Had it been my own I would have to have it altered in order to feel confident in it. I ended up wearing it for a few hours to go to target so all was not lost. Just had high hopes for this jumpsuit and the length of the torso let me down

links_reviews_title: the colors are adorable and it's super light and comfortable - perfect for summer
links_reviews_text: LOVED it - was just missing a button!
This looked cute in the photos but it was too big for me when I tried it on. Very wide and oversized and not in a cool way.

The quality of the material was paper-like, and I didn't feel like the pattern really matched what was in the photos I saw on the site. Not a good fit, and the pockets made a pouch-like area around the waist which looked really unflattering.
Very baggy
Loved the camo and oversized look. Not too crazy about the neck which kept flopping and looked flat. Heavy sweater also great for cool weather!

links_reviews_title: Comfy sweater & got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_text: Such a great casual sweater. The turtleneck wouldn't stay up like in model photo so I folded it down. Back is very long as others pointed out but makes it great to wear with leggings
I got a ton of compliments on this sweater. Nice and cozy, and definitely kept me warm.

Super cozy/comfy and will be great all winter long. Got several compliments on this and will def be purchasing. Love that the back hangs low and covers my butt so could definitely be worn with leggings. Great staple sweater!
I paired this sweater with some dark wash jeans and a pair of simple black booties and felt it was perfect for a Veterans Day party honoring those who serve. Would rent again.
Got a lot of compliments on this. Would rent again.
I love, love, love this sweater. It looks so expensive... I thought it retailed at $400+. WRONG. It retails at $78. Now I have to buy it because I love it so much. <3

This was an awesome sweater. The cotton is soft but not heavy. The fit was perfect. It was cozy and warm but not bulky. It was light enough to be worn indoors at work but loose and warm enough where you could wear a long sleeve shirt under it with a vest over and be comfortable outside in 50 weather. I wore it with jeans for casual wear and brown wide leg pants and boots in the office. Will definitely rent again.
Super soft and comfortable. Medium thick that you can wear outdoor without a jacket in transitional season. Really like the color and pattern: not a typical camo!

This sweater was super stretched out all over. The next didn't look like the picture. More like a little smaller than a cowl. I would not recommend the size large. If you want to try it go for medium.
Perhaps the sweater was just stretched out...but this had a terrible neck on it. It was not a cowl neck, but not a turtle neck. Somewhere in the middle and just laid very weird. I did not wear it.
Would rent again
Loose collar around the neck but otherwise comfortable!
I loved this so much that I almost bought it! It was so comfortable and easy. I loved that it was a different play on the camouflage trend
this sweater is different, warm and comfortable. my only complaint is that the arm holes are small so you can't bunch them up or push them back
Straightforward - looks like the pictures. This was a little looser / longer than I was expecting, but no complaints! Easy to throw on with leggings or jeans.
This sweater is amazing. It's chunky and has weight, but it's cotton so it's not too warm, not scratchy, and very soft. It drapes nicely and was incredibly comfortable.
I wanted to love this! It was so large I could have gotten away with a small. I tucked the front into jeans to make it work.
I got so many compliments. Mostly from men which was surprising. Almost purchased! Small was the perfect size for me 130 lbs.
Such a fun sweater, got tons of compliments on it. Soft and perfect for winter.
Obsessed, so cute and comfy
Easy everyday sweater...perfect for winter. Didn't feel like it ran large, but it is a boxy cut.
Previous person that rented this probably created small pulls on the front. There were like 5 or 6. It is very warm and cozy though. Was too hot for Florida when I first rented it
Next time I would get the medium. It ran big but still looked nice. Will bring out green eyes!
Nice fall sweater to wear with leggings or jeans, love it!
This sweater might be the perfect piece for a casual look this Fall/Winter. Excellent fit and hot just a little below my waist - perfect.
Its a great jumper. Soft, comfortable, no itchiness and looks good. Just have to be careful of jewelry and things which might hook the stitches up.

links_reviews_title: Fun design might right slightly large
links_reviews_text: Prone to little pulls in this thick knit sweater but fun design and colors. Not itchy but a thick cotton sweater. Slightly longer in back, with a cowl neck. Great item to rent for a ski vacation for chilling in the lodge or ski house!

This is definitely an "oversized' style with thick, heavy knitting. This won't fit comfortably under a coat unless it's a big, roomy winter one. It's meant for actually cold weather, I was slightly uncomfortable in it in San Francisco fall. Other than secretly perspiring in my tshirt under this, I received lots of compliments and it's a cute sweater with fun, vibrant camo colors.
This sweater was comfortable and warm without feeling stuffy. Tons of compliments all day :-)

I love this sweater! It is oversized and the longer length would be perfect for pairing with leggings. Size down if you're between sizes or on the petite side. The material is soft and very warm. I ended up wearing it to work today with jeans and taupe color thigh high boots. I've gotten several compliments. Might not be sending this beauty back!

Really like this sweater. Perfect for a FREEZING day. It's super warm and cozy. But definitely runs large. I'm on the bustier side of small and even this swallowed me. Kind of boxy too, but I like that aspect of it.
It fits as an oversized sweater, great for cooler temperatures.
A great fall sweater. Tons of compliments. The neck was a little itchy.
Loved these glasses-didn't want to return. Great shape great fit
LOVED these! They weren't yet stretched out (like a few RTR pairs I've rented in the past). They were missing the small plastic bit that sits on your nose, but I barely noticed a difference!

I really like these glasses. They're definitely oversized, but I personally like that look. The shape is very unique and they are comfortable on the face. I'll definitely rent again after a few cold winter months!
I wore these everyday! They look expensive and unique. Absolutely love and will probably rent again.

I generally only wear aviators and gravitated toward these because of the geometric frame feature. They remind me of Janis Joplin and I am wearing them this week and them will send them back and try for the pink ones. I like that they are not heavy on my nose and the green aviation tint on the lense is very macho.

I almost returned these without wearing but decided to give them a try. I struggled at first because they are a mix of the aviator type / casual look and statement oversized sunglasses. After a couple of wears, I ended up liking them for the exact same reasons. Great material and very unique.
These were absolutely massive, so cute but I couldn't wear without looking like a bug.

links_reviews_title: Everywhere I go people say they love my shades
links_reviews_text: #moviestar looks. I would purchase if they were not so expensive. It's the first accessory I have ever rented and I will be trying more

links_reviews_title: Fun, updated style for any Aviator lover!
links_reviews_text: These glasses are SO good! The best updated take on aviators! Would rent again and again!!
I mean these are huge so if you have a small face probably not ideal for you. I can wear most large sunglasses and these were almost to big. But, these were very fun and I had several compliments
Wayyyy too wide for my face and I feel like I have a pretty wide face (ha). Would be really cute if they were smaller.
Fun earrings! They are a little on the heavy side. I wore these to glam up a t-shirt and jeans, and with a magenta dress for date night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful earrings, but larger than I expected, and they are heavy.
links_reviews_text: Heavier than most earrings I wear, and b/c of that, I didn't wear them for a long period of time.

links_reviews_title: Great to wear with a white shirt and jeans.....also looks great with a cocktail dress.
links_reviews_text: Perhaps a little heavier than I like my earrings for pierced ears.

links_reviews_title: They are beautiful but too heavy for me.
links_reviews_text: Heavy - yet stunning
Really just so beautiful!! A little heavy, but definitely wearable for a few hours/ one night. Rent these!! You will feel like a star :)

links_reviews_title: I was looking forward to wearing these on vacation. They are super cute just impossible to wear.
links_reviews_text: These were way to heavy for my ears to handle. Wish I had rented something else. I couldnt even last one minute in them. Maybe some people are used to it and can handle it but it was way too painful.

links_reviews_title: Took a risk and loved them!
links_reviews_text: These were much bigger than expected (RTR should always have a picture of the item on a model for scale), but I took a risk and ended up loving them!
Cute and so flattering!
M fit great, it wasn't too tight. I'm 5'9 and the dress was short, but worked for vacation.

This dress definitely runs large (ordered a size down than I usually do and it fit perfectly). Love the cut of the front with the ties. Was a fitted silhouette but didn't show everything, so I found it super flattering. The sleeves fell down a bit but it looked cute off the shoulder. Got a ton of compliments it's a perfect LRD- little red dress.

Wore this for 1 night of a bachelorette party. Soooo comfortable and really cute, only issue is that it really creeps up especially when dancing a lot. I had to adjust the inner lining and keep pulling it down all night!

Wore this dress for a family 4th of July party and it was PERFECT! I'm usually between a small /medium but opted for the medium and glad I did! Super easy to throw on and style with either simple sandals, or wedges pending the event! Rent this!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect splash of color with a comfy fit
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed the textured cotton of this dress , it was flowy but structured in all the right spots. Definitely is size accurate, I ordered a size up to medium in case it was too small and in fact it was a little large especially in the straps. Order your usual size on this one

links_reviews_title: great for a cute dinner out
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and fit well!

links_reviews_title: Gotta love a little red number!

links_reviews_text: This dress is so easy! It's comfortable and simple. The fit definitely runs big, I wish I would have gotten a size, maybe two down. I got so many compliments on this dress, I wish I would have gotten more wears out of it this summer!
Comfortable and relaxed fit
So comfy and cute. Great for top heavy gals.

links_reviews_title: Not the most flattering for large chested gals
links_reviews_text: I was so excited for this dress to wear on my birthday weekend, but just didn't find it flattering for my body type. I wanted something more fitted and this wasn't around the chest.
Rented this for the forth of July! Clorox was amazing and the highlight of the dress is definitely the back. Little tight in the stomach area, but not noticeable
Love love love! Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my vacation to Belize. Comfortable and fun for warm weather.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and the material was light weight and very comfortable. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Didn't make it in my selection for vacay
links_reviews_text: It's cute but nothing special and fits a bit loose around the chest / shoulder area. I didn't end up packing this one for Mexico in favor of other pieces I had.

I wore this to steakhouse in Puerto Rico with some sandals. It was comfortable and I was able to wear a strapless bra with it. It was kind of short, but not embarrassingly so, just be aware of it when bending over. Nice and loose fit and light material. Would rent again.
cute comfortable and stylish , great vacation dress

Super cute dress and cut but, I wish the frill on the shoulder went the entire length of the strap. Because it leaves a gap it literally highlights that little bit of fat you have at the front of your armpit.
Fit perfectly true to size one of my favorites

links_reviews_title: Super cute but straps don't adjust.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute! I wore it to a Pier concert date. I only wish the straps would have adjusted as the only available size was one size bigger. I liked the fit that way other than I had to pin the straps to my bra.

The fit was close to true to size, maybe a tad on the small size. I'd say get your normal size and one up. The color I didn't think was as deep red as the photo, more like tomato orange/red, but still super pretty. Dress is lined and bust fit tight enough to not need a bra. It is short! I'm 5'3" and it felt short on me, so be careful tall girls! Little cut out is cute, not at all revealing or anything. Sadly, my trip was cancelled due to the hurricane and I didn't actually get to wear the dress. :( Woulda been cute w little tennis shoes, sandals/flip flops, or wedges.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a weekend day out with my friends and got a ton of compliments on the color
links_reviews_text: I am usually an L but only the XL was available so I winged it - it ended up fitting perfectly and left a little room since I don't like super tight dresses
RTR only had a medium left and, while it was cute, it was too big and small would definitely need to be a small to be perfect. The chest and shoulders were huge on me.

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern on oversized sweater, fits like a hug
links_reviews_text: Unique pattern, really warm. As other reviews say the slits in the arms are a bit odd, but if layered over a black shirt allows you to breathe. Pair with leggings or dark jeans.
this sweater is one of my all time favorite winter rentals and i loved it with leggings
I got a lot of complements on this sweater. I wasn't expecting the slits in the sleeves but I ended up loving them. Great sweater for casual events
This would have been PERFECT but it has super weird slits on the inside of the sleeves...
I definitely would like to buy it at some point

I included a photo of the arm slits as the previous reviews mention it but there are no photos. They are slightly strange but I live in a very cold area so I layered with a long sleeve black shirt, which I would have done anyways as the fabric was slightly scratchy. I loved the color and pattern of this top and loved that it went below my bum (I am 5'3 for reference) and was able to wear leggings with it. The part I didn't like was that the neckline was constricting and because of the fabric, it annoyed and itched me all day.

I really loved this oversized sweater - perfect for winter. As some people cal out the sleeves have a big slit facing inward, which is why I shared a picture of that, which didn't show if you have your arms straight down but definitely do if you move your arms around. I didn't mind it as it provided some ventilation, but I imagine this is not for everyone.

The neck was pretty itchy and the slits in the sleeve are super weird. They serve no purpose and they stop you from pushing or rolling up the sleeves at all. It was something different to wear once but I would never buy this.

Very cute sweater. It fits nice and is comfy. However, there are slits in the sleeves- not pictured in the models pictures. The slits are from your wrist to upper arm. It gives a breeze in the sweater- not something I was looking for.

I love the sleeves on this sweater, added a bit of sass! I wore this sweater with some black leggings, black peep toe booties, red matte lip, and white Kendra Scott earrings and this was totally cute!
true to size
Really beautiful color. It was a little thick for just regular indoor wear, and I thought the slits in the sleeves wouldn't bother me, but they were pretty weird.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute pattern. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Super super warm and comfortable (maybe too warm). The sleeves were a little long for me, but expected given the size and fit.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a hipster
links_reviews_text: Cute and cool, good thing I read the other reviews about the slit in the sleeves so I knew to expect it. That didn't bother me. I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: It was cute/Sporty did not like the under arm slits
links_reviews_text: True to size

Warm, fashionable, glad I rented. The pattern is cute. The arm slits are neat little vents. Got compliments both at work and dinner party on ski trip. A little itchy at the neck but nothing unbearable. Would recommend.

I wore this for an 80's costume party with some crimpy hair and it was perfect. As others mentioned before the slits on the arms are really weird. It is a really thick sweater so maybe it is to cool you down?

links_reviews_title: funky and bright for winter day.
links_reviews_text: a little synthetic looking
Wore this for a weekend at the mountains. Had a fun 90's ski sweater feel to it. I liked the open sleeves because it was a pretty warm sweater.
My only complaint is I didn't realize that it was a cut out. Otherwise I love
Oversized fit. Beautiful colors.
love it

links_reviews_title: Wore this sweater a few times and each time received multiple compliments. Purposely oversized.
links_reviews_text: Super warm sweater, wasn't bothered by the open sleeves. Oversized, wore a small and it hit just right with thigh high boots and a legging. Would rent again.
Sweater runs very large but that is kind of the point. Also, photo doesn't show this but there are slits on the inside of the sleeves which is kind of odd but I ended up liking that part a lot.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, weird slit on the sleeves
links_reviews_text: The sweater is super edgy and cute but WHO DECIDED TO ADD SLITS TO THE SLEEVE?! It looks so bizarre and off-putting. Did someone get angry and decide to hack the sleeves up? Not functional at all. Would not wear again.
As the other reviews mention, there were unexpected slits up the inside of the sleeves. It made me dislike this otherwise comfy, warm and cute sweater.
Such a cute fun sweater, which I was going to wear on Thanksgiving with my family, however, it has weird and unnecessary arm slits. This went unworn and directly back to RTR.

Pros: very cute pattern, intentionally oversized, nice bright colors Con: there are weird slits at the back of the arms for literally no reason. They're silly, and I didn't wear the sweater because of them. They are not shown in the model picture or mentioned anywhere in the description, but be forewarned, they're there.
Fun sweater to wear. Comfortable and got several compliments. Very warm, even w the open sleeves.

Thought it was a fun patterned sweater to throw on with leggings and teach sixth grade. I was not prepared for the strange slits that ran underneath the arms of the sweater, from the wrist to my upper arms. It at least provided ventilation, but strange design feature.

So disappointing - this cute sweater has weird slits in each sleeve that aren't mentioned anywhere in the description and also aren't pictured in the images of the model in the sweater. Basically a slit runs from the cuff of each sleeve up to the shoulder, so if you bend your arms your elbow/arm come out. Beware!
It was a little but larger thank I expected. The beads were pretty thick. It looked good overall though and wore it with a casual look and a dressier look. Would definitely rent again!

The necklace was so much larger than expected! It reminds me of fancy Mardi Gras beads. Without a picture on a model...you cannot tell how oversized it is. Think glass marbles with T logos the size of half dollars. I'm going to try it...which is the beauty of RTR.
Love these overalls. They're retro, sexy, and fit like a glove. Size up +1. I'm usually a 2, 4 was perfect!
So incredibly comfortable, has enough stretch in the denim that it is form fitting and flattering yet not constricting! I need to buy this, one of my favorite RTR rentals!

The denim material is super stretchy and flattering. Didn't quite zip up over my boobs but looked totally fine half zipped. Had to wear 4" heels so pants didn't drag. But I want to own this - have rented multiple times.
SUPER CUTE! definitely very snug in the chest but fabric was stretchy so I made it work and although it was a bit uncomfortable it didn't look bad.
This thing fit me like a glove I was so in love the moment I put it on! Was a little long on me but nothing a pair of platform booties couldnt solve.
Loved wearing these ! Fit perfect

Such a flattering jumpsuit, I got compliments all night! I'm normally a 4, but decided to size up one size just for some wiggle room and it fit perfectly. Very comfortable denim, sucks you in, it made me look like I had a butt when I normally don't! ;P

This was a perfect outfit to wear for my birthday! I received so many compliments and felt amazing in it. It is stretchy and, although, any jumpsuit is a bit tricky, it was easy to get in and out of. Love love love this piece!
I knew this would be a little long since I usually wear a petite, but I made it work and I felt great in this!

links_reviews_title: True to size, stretchy thick denim sucks you in, recommend
Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: Alice McCall always gets it right. These overalls not only fit perfectly, they cinched in my waist and lengthened my legs. They fit true to size - I'm usually a size 4 and got these in a US 4.
Soft material, stretchy. Rented a 6 but for a skin tight fit should have picked 4.
Great piece fire all sizes and shapes. I'm on the shorter side but still paid it with flats for a summer night on the town. Lots of compliments!
Such a fun retro look for a night out!

Where it with a top underneath and it's all business. Wear it without a top & it's sexy while still being modest. I love it so much I'm buying the size 6 which ended up fitting me much better than the 10.

I wore these overalls to a fundraiser at a museum. They are fun and stylish. I got several complements throughout the night. I wore them without a shirt underneath and felt quite comfortable and covered. I paired them with sandals, a belt, and a minimal wrap choker. Would recommend to anyone wanting denim, but something that stands out from the crowd!
I have a long torso, but these worked beautifully and I ended up wearing them 3 times! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and flattering  the material almost sucks you in. Wore this to a work anniversary party and got so many compliments! Would definitely rent again.

I recently rented these for a European vacation and loved them! Theyre really comfortable and fit perfectly with a little stretch/give. The only negative is that theyre very long for my 52 frame so I had to pair them with 5 chunky platform sandals. Will definitely look for an opportunity to rent them again!
I LOVE these overalls. Very fitted by stretchy. Super sexy, easy to wear and compliment magnets. Such a fun mix up.

I recently rented these for a European vacation and loved them! Theyre really comfortable and fit perfectly with a little stretch/give. The only negative is that theyre very long for my 5 2 frame so I had to pair them with 5 chunky platform sandals. Will definitely look for an opportunity to rent them again!

links_reviews_title: FINALLY had a Chance to wear
links_reviews_text: LOVEEEEE! Perfect for casual tasting menu dinner - love everything

I loved this style but had a hard time finding the right shoe to pair with it. The wide cut wasn't ideal for a day spend jumping around a bounce house but I still had fun and felt cute. Would rent again

I wore this for my boyfriends graduation. It was the perfect balance of effortless, laid-back, but still classy. I am 511, So it was a little short but overall fit like a glove. I got compliments all day long and Im going to purchase this jumpsuit to have in my closet. If youre on the fence about it, the answer is get it.

I'm normally a 10 in dresses but a 6-8 in pants, so it's my own fault I ordered the 10 in this and had to send it back for exchange. RTR shipped me the 6 as a replacement and it worked much better! There is a ton of stretch in this. You can move in it, relax, go to parties - anything. I got compliments everywhere!

I wore these twice. First with a white short sleeved turtleneck on chilly day with boots. A week later it warmed up and I wore it with no shirt under and sandals. It was a hit both times, lots of compliments. I liked the fit, true to size. Since they are wide leg you need to be mindful of the shoes you wear, some shoes look awkward.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering and true to size
links_reviews_text: Got 10000 compliments on this jumpsuit!
I loved this romper it was perfect for a summer day, the stretch is flexible. It is supposed to be cropped but for those of us who are short it's the perfect length. I loved it

I was worried about the fit of these before I tried this on, but it was surprisingly comfortable and wearable! The denim has some stretch to it, making it a little more forgiving, and they weren't too long on me. I was able to wear sneakers without the hems dragging on the ground. They were also super flattering in the tush area :)

links_reviews_title: Super cute, fun and for great compliments. Very tight in the bust.

links_reviews_text: Flattering and fun. I'm 5'2 and it was a perfect length.

I knew I was taking a chance on this one, but I like to try unique pieces. My biggest challenge was trying to find a shirt that looked good with it. I decided to go with a short sleeve top that was covered by the chest panel so the sleeves were visible but not the chest area. I loved the fit--it made my waist and butt look great! It's form-fitting in the middle. It has a snug fit that you can dress up or down. As with all overalls, the bathroom is a pain. I'm 5'4 and the length was fine with heels. I'm not sure if I would rent it again because it's more of a one-and-done piece, but I enjoyed it for the night out.

These are so so cute and I think they would look great on so many body types. I am apple shaped and very busty and these fit awesome. I got a size 10 and they fit but I would size down. They are fitted, thick, stretchy denim. I will buy these but in a smaller size. I feel like these can be worn every day or out. Try these!
Comfortable jean overalls which is form fitting around the waist. I like the zipper and button details and the flare leg.

links_reviews_title: Nice jumpsuit. Wish it were longer in length
links_reviews_text: Too short and returned. Otherwise, very nice stretchy jean material.

I wanted to make this work so badly but it just didn't work for may long torso. It fit like a glove (and was really comfy!) but the legs were too short and the crotch felt terrible because of how tall I am. Additionally, my boobs were totally smashed and the shape was unflattering no matter how padded my bra was.

Love this jumpsuit! i have thicker thighs and a booty and a small waist and it fit me great. Straps are adjustable so i feel like that helps in getting a good fit as well. Looks great with a high necklined shirt or turtleneck underneath.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely amazing and great fit. I'm 5'4 and 125 lbs and the 4R was awesome.
links_reviews_text: Can be dressed up or down
These overalls are really cute and perfect for a casual chic look.

I love this jumpsuit so much I am keeping it for another month. Amongst my favorite rentals. It's sooo versatile, sexy, comfortable, and endless compliments every time I wear it. Looks wonderful on my hourglass curvy body, but I think would look great on other body types as well.
This top is wonderful. It fit like a glove and I paired it with leather joggers and combat style boots. Perfect for work to night!
This was so versatile! Loved everything about it. Fit was flattering for work, a night out or everyday.
I loved wearing this top. Roomy, but not bulky. And really great thin silky material.
Surpassed my expectations. Fits beautifully and even with broad shoulders I think it's pretty flattering! Wore to work and will wear again before I send back

links_reviews_title: Very cute, Loved it with jeans. Fun blouse.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, color, true to size.

links_reviews_title: So cute for work. Got many compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top with the most perfect details. Wore to work but could be worn anywhere! So flattering for having a bigger chest. I usually have trouble with blouses but not this one!

Fits like a dream with cute details around collar and waist. Did a French tuck with black skinny jeans (forgot to take a pic) and it was a great outfit for a work lunch. Sent the shirt back after one wear because it's a little more conservative than I usually wear but it's a beautiful garment.

I really liked this shirt, but I should have ordered a size 0. The 2 was a bit oversized on me (petite, 32B). I wore it to work with black pants and booties. The sleeves were a bit long on me, so again -- I'd size down or get your normal size on this if you're taller.
Too thin for winter and sheer but was a pretty piece. The collar is kind of tight also. The detail at the neck is not a criss cross but two separate pieces.
Loved this blouse - the details on top are elegant & pretty!
fun and flirty
nice fabric, loved the patterns and detailing. I liked it better tucked in to navy high waisted pants than with black.
Wore untucked with jeans.

I ordered my normal dress size and it was too roomy in the chest and shoulders. Shirt was okay  I wore once and wasn't in love but I'll attribute that mainly to the size I chose. The ruffle at the end of the sleeves was cute.
This puffer is the ULTIMATE in warmth. Even in 25 degrees in Mammoth, this jacket kept me warm and toasty 100%. Absolutely will rent for future cold weather trips. Big recommend.
The hood elevates this luxe puffer from great to amazing.
No complaints.
I knew this was a puffer coat but it is hugely puffy and just made me look round, like the Michelin Man. I'm thin, 5'10" and 155 pounds, for reference.
Great quality sweater. A tad bit itchy with a jacket on but otherwise perfect. The color was beautiful and something different than what I usually wear!

links_reviews_title: So comfy and just the right green!
links_reviews_text: It's a boxy fit but super comfy! The green color is the perfect shade of lime without being highlighter neon! Super fun to wear!
Comfy and fun! Loved the color.
TTS, unique color, nice fit, not as soft as I would have liked!

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for St. Patrick's day!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable
I liked wearing this and wore it twice. I liked the crop length and neck. The color was okay, not my favorite but something different.
This sweater is beautiful! A subtle and unique color and perfect fit.
Such a fun sweater -- I don't usually wear this color and got a ton of compliments. It's a bit cropped and very think, which gives it a nice body structure. Only downside is that's it's a bit itchy!
Cropped and boxy yet still cozy this fit TTS and was a great piece with jeans and sneakers but could easily work with boots or a skirt. Loved it and would def rent again... or even buy!

This sweater was super comfy, a little bit oversized which I love, and not at all scratchy. It was a little bit cropped but it worked perfectly with high waisted bottoms. I loved wearing it!!! I paired it with the Goen J leather culottes and also with black yoga pants

This sweater is so cute! It is a beautiful bright green shade and is perfect for work, casual, or everyday wear. I'm a teacher so I have more freedom of dress to work. It hit at the perfect spot above my hips, and looked so cute tucked in. It did have lots of polling though, but not noticeable to others. It is very warm though so if you get hot easily I would not recxomend this!
This sweater was a little short on me but works well with high waist jeans. A little bit itchy but not terrible. It elevates your casual winter wear a bit. Overall a pretty good rental.
Fits true to size. Cropped and super comfy.

Loved this sweater, was very close to keeping! The color is a great winter pastel. The material was super cozy and not itchy. The sweater was more cropped than it looks in picture, but I was still able to tuck into high waisted jeans. Love!
Surprisingly warm, beautiful fresh spring color, i pined neck- so its more office appropriate, but for outdoor u can keep it up, its boxy style- fold one corner & u in Style!
Thick sweater; good for layering on cold days. Boxy fit, but not unflattering.

I rented this with unlimited for a trip to Lake Tahoe. Pros: favorite color! Excellent fit and length pairs well with a variety of bottoms, No cons Styled as shown for hikes and day activities. Swapped boots for silver glitter flats when I wanted to dress it up I loved it so much I put a ring on it!
#cozysweater

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear this to work.
links_reviews_text: Runs very small, looked cropped on me. Also a little itchy.
True to size, like the color

The green is gorgeous, the crop is cute, but not too short, it is equal parts chic and easy to wear. I wore with high waisted jeans, lulus, shorts, all of it. The entire reason I did rent the runway was to try new things and stop buying clothes. If the later rule were not true I would be purchasing this. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice style. Color may not fit everyone
links_reviews_text: This color made my skin look darker. My skin tone is the normal asian skin tone
Great sweater! Perfect fit and so cute and comfy. It's definitely a cropped fit but can easily be half tucked.
Comfy but a bit shorter than I expected
Wore this with a floral black skirt. I loved the bright color in the winter time!
This sweater is super cozy and the color makes it really different.
Great colorlike a lime-white weave. It is boxy, but it looks good French tucked into high waisted pants. I liked the high neck.
Loved the color. Fun for everyday use!

links_reviews_title: This is a very warm sweater. I packed it for a trip to Europe in November and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering and the color was more of a light lime green than how it looks in the photo. Loved the color!

links_reviews_title: It looked amazing on and was super cute
links_reviews_text: For amazing. Is a bit shorter than I thought, but still worked with high waisted jeans
I love this sweater! It is soft and comfortable and a classic turtleneck shape, but the color makes it fun and modern. This looks great with jeans of any fade and can be dresses up or down. So cute!
Turtleneck was a bit high

I loved these pants because I'm scared some things wont fit my waist right but I honestly LOVEEE THEM! I would have bought them, but im a little broke at the moment :( Otherwise, I used these for parties, dinners, going out, and they always make me more confident in myself and body!

My favorite part about these jeans was the cut. It's very conscious of a woman's body and curves. Also I have shorter legs (29" inseam) so I loved the shorter cut on this flare. If you have a longer inseam, these will run rather short. I loved it because it meant I could wear them with sneakers. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because I got a size 40R and I probably should have gotten a 42R. The wait was a little tight and I might have enjoyed more comfort in a larger size.
Perfect fit and so flattering. I definitely wore it a lot the month I rented for lots of different occasions. I have big thighs so I'm always nervous about that but these fit like a glove.
Love these pants, so flattering and true high waist. Would probably size up but look good right too. Work well on larger hips/smaller waist. Have rented 3x now.
ups the cool factor over regular jeans. super tight in the waist so size up. great cropped flare length.

links_reviews_title: Must rent! Absolutely obsessed- I may purchase
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove even though I have a booty! Super retro and I feel like I could wear them out on the town or to work. They aren't super long either so could wear with low boots or heels. Perfect fall pants!

I rented these to wear to a football game. It was too hot to wear them but I did wear them to work. I'm about 5'3.5" and I had to wear a shoe with some kind of heel/wedge or they were too long. Planning to rent again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Cute pants but not the high waisted type that hides stuff

links_reviews_text: These were a bit snug in the waist but the color, fabric, and fit were otherwise 100

links_reviews_title: So cute if you get the right size
links_reviews_text: I LOVE these pants. Highly considering buying them. But you have to go at least 1-2 sizes up because they are small! But so flattering, the color is great, all in all a total win.

This was the first time I rented a pair of jeans from Rent the Runway and I was glad I took a risk in renting these See by Chloe jeans. Thankful to the community at Rent the Runway contributors that mentioned the pants ran small as is typical with the See by Chloe brand. I followed advice and sized up where I am usually a 10 / 42 - rented the 44. I styled these pants very bohemian feel and you could wear a blouse out or tuck it in because the jean is quite high waisted and does create a nice waistline if you were to tuck in a shirt or blouse.

Okay LOVE these! Some said the fit is TTS, I found them somewhat true to size. The waist is definitely tighter fitting and the length is cropped a bit, but I think they are meant to look that way. I loved them with sandals or flats, they would definitely look a little awkward with boots or heels because of the crop. Fab high waisted look and that burnt orange color is perfect!
These run a bit on the small side and on the short side, but super cute! The color is unique and the front pockets are awesome.

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on these pants. Lovely color, just enough stretch, and super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants but had a few issues with them... I found the front of the crotch to be a bit loose (as you can see in the picture), but they fit my hips and butt perfectly. I would definitely recommend them for anyone with more of an hourglass figure, as the waist was great on me, but definitely runs small compared to the rest of the cut. Also about 2 inches shorter on me than I would have liked, so I could only wear flats with themjust something to watch out for if you're over 5'8" :)
These might be my favorite pants ever. So flattering and the color is amazing!

links_reviews_title: I got loads of compliments on these fun pants
links_reviews_text: These pants are super tight!! They also run very short.. it would be nice if they offered a longer in seem. Overall, they were fun to wear and I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved the look just would have gone a size up
links_reviews_text: Super cute, they're shorter than expected and were too tight around my waist that it gathered awkwardly.
Runs very small
I loved the idea of these but they were so small I couldn't get them on and the length was awkward. Not long and lengthening

links_reviews_title: So cute but much tighter than other See By Chloe pants
links_reviews_text: I loved the style and color of these pants, but they were a bit too small for me, though I've ordered See By Chloe pants in other sizes. Definitely would recommend ordering a size up! I'll be renting them again once that size becomes available.
Usually a size 27/28 and ordered a size 40 based off the recommendations. I couldn't get these past mid thigh unfortunately :( was really looking forward to wearing these
I was worried about fit but they fit me like a dream (I'm usually a 2ish/25ish in pants)!

These pants are one of my favorite items that I have ever rented from RTR. First of all, they are definitely small. I went a size up and it was still tight. The material is thick, though, and had a tiny bit of stretch. Not the kind of stretch one expects from stretchy jeans, just enough that after the second wear, they fit great and after the third wear they were very comfortable but still supportive. They are jeans, but my work environment is business casual for women and I've been able to get away with wearing these to work since they don't technically look like jeans. I kept them so long the first time I had them I just sent them back to be cleaned. Now I'm thinking of renting them again.
Sadly I couldn't even get these ones on because they were too small. I honestly should've sized up a couple sizes for them to even fit my thighs. Usually I wear size 30 or 10 for pants.

links_reviews_title: Size up, notice the short length, but great style of properly rented!
links_reviews_text: These jeans run tight, so size up but there may be a slightly noticeable saggy front area. I now notice in the picture, but these flare jeans are not floor length neither cropped length. It was an awkward hit right above the ankle for a flare, but may be other's length preference. Overall really enjoyed the color and look, just should have noticed all the details before renting!
No stretch, held shape, high waisted
The size recommended was too big but super cute pants overall
Little tight on the butt.
I am always a 4 somerimes even a 2. This came in size 36. And it would not even go up past my thighs
cropped, so they looked good with chunky Filas
The pants were 2 sizes too small

links_reviews_title: So cute, and fun pocket detail, did have to go up 3 sizes
links_reviews_text: First time renting pants, which I knew would be taking a chance. First I ordered 2 sizes bigger like other comments suggested, but ended up have to return it for yet another size up. Hurt ego aside, they were really cute and faltering. Love the pocket detail so much I went with either a crop top or tucked in so it was on full display!

These pants are so great! Just the right amount of stretch and flare. They hit me about ankle bone (5'6"). Great for a casual summer look and will be great in fall/winter too. Color is fab as well. They do run snug. I am hourglass and a pretty regular 28/29 depending on how high waisted (these are high waisted) and definitely needed to size up (which I did and was glad!) recommend renting!
I wore these twice and received compliments galore. Great color, stylish patch pockets, and a fun flared hem.

Loved everything about these! The high waist, the length, the flare, the color! Perfect for my old hippy soul. Paired with a navy blue racer back, tucked in, some funky jewelry, a thick brown belt with a beige embroidered pattern, and loose wavy hair.

links_reviews_title: Wore these out with friends and they were great.
links_reviews_text: Love!! These jeans fit perfectly and I got so many compliments.
Wish I could wear but sooo tiny with no give
Fits small around waist
too small

links_reviews_title: Cute purse and Practical if you don't carry much
links_reviews_text: Love this purse! Wore it for a Christmas outdoor event in DC. Doesn't hold much, but was good for a light purse that carries what you need. My iphone 10 with a bulky case fit along with keys, feminine products, and chapstick. Could have fit a small wallet as well. Couldn't fit a water bottle though which would have been helpful.
Loved everything but the handle! Would have preferred it without it and just have the chain and cross body strap option! The handle was stiff and annoying!
Con- strap fell off literally because the hardware came undone while walking and flew across the room. Pretty embarrassing.
I got this bag for a Christmas trip to NYC. It was the perfect size it held my gloves, hat, sunglasses and a small wallet. I'm very pleased!
This bag is super cute and holds a lot for it's size. It's bigger than I thought it was going to be, but I like it. It's not too big to bring out.

I listened to other reviewers, and sized up TWO sizes! I'm normally a size 8 and I got a size 12. Sizing up to a 10 would not have been big enough, so I have to go with the recommendation of size up two sizes! I'm so glad I did. The buttons were great, I loved the color, it matched with so many things in my closet and I got so many compliments!
This skirt is super cute. The slit went higher than expected. I wore to work. Lots of compliments. Stylish and fun.

links_reviews_title: Large buttons and a split make for a fun skirt day!
links_reviews_text: The split is almost too high. Had I been an inch or two taller it may have been an issue. But I'm not, so it wasn't. However when sitting the split is a bit difficult to close and cover. Initially I got a 36 and while it fit it was too snug for comfort so I opted for a slightly bigger size. This size fit just right and is super comfortable. Love the color against the white. Compliments galore!!

Love the color and style of the skirt. However, similar to all the other reviews the one down side is that the skirt shows every wobble and line you have in your tummy. Even my thermal waistband kept showing through. BUT, super cute!

links_reviews_title: I loved this outfit both from RTR!
links_reviews_text: Skirt was so cute, slit was a little high for work but I think the turtleneck made it work! Skirt ran a bit small (I went up a size and it fit nice) and sweater was true to size.
I can't believe how many compliments I got. I'm short (5'2"), but the length was still flattering and the color is a gorgeous grey.
The lighting is difficult it bunches up and pulls the skirt

Fit well but the 44 was just slightly big so I could I wear a 42 in this if needed. Slit was slightly higher than desired for work conference (I tried it on with tights but when I wore it for real without tights it was maybe mid thigh) but it was fine. Fun style wore w a black mock neck turtleneck and looked chic.

This well fitting skirt is perfect for the office and work travel. I can dress it up with a fancier top or simple top and jewelry or down with a simple black cashmere or silk tee. Looks great with heels and am looking to also style with booties and ballet flats.
Fits snug, but not terribly flattering if you have any kind of belly.
Very nice skirt but runs small
Cute skirt! I loved the buttons on it. I just wasn't blown away by it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt! Comfortable yet structured. Only thing missing are pockets!
links_reviews_text: There's a slit that runs up to mid thigh depending on height.

links_reviews_title: perfect basic skirt, but with an interesting twist
links_reviews_text: fun!

I'm glad I rented a 40 based on the reviews. It was perfect for me, but I'm usually a 6. I could have even gone one size bigger as I couldn't zip the last bit past the waistline. Loved this skirt and at this size it wasn't too tight and the slit was appropriate.

Such a cute skirt but I could barely get it zipped and it just showed every bulge once it was zipped! I'm normally a size 4-6 and I ordered a size 8 (38)... I should have gone another size up. Wasn't even comfortable wearing it so I sent it back unworn.
Ran a bit small sadly
This was such a great skirt, but it does run a little small so size up!

links_reviews_title: The zipper didn't go all the way up. Almost though so did wear it
links_reviews_text: Small, nice silhouette, but so fitted the zipper was pinchy.
Very fitted - had to size up one and still was snug, but looked amazing
Didn't get to wear, needed next size up:(
The color is really drab. I did not feel like this was appropriate for work with the high slit in the front.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality and interesting style, but the waist was too small
links_reviews_text: Got was too tight
Perfect for work. Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfect for someone who's a little less conservative
links_reviews_text: I love the look of the skirt with a slit is way too high for a 40+-year-old professional

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt! I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this skirts. The buttons totally make it. I'm 5'10 and 155 lbs and the 42 fit perfect. It is an amazing skirt. Perfect for work.
Liked the style.
It runs true to size but it was too tight in the hips for me.
I ordered my usual size and I couldn't even begin to zip it up! You will need to order up 2 sizes.
Love it, very flattering
The material is too thin and color too light for winter time in the NE. I wasn't wowed by the skirt.
Slit is a bit high for work, but otherwise liked this skirt!
Loved the way the skirt looked and it was unique but easy enough to pair with a variety of tops. It does seem to run small and was difficult to get it to lay/fit correctly on my hips.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt. Little high, but worth it.
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize the slit went to the thigh. It was a little high for my office but I would definitely wear it at other events.
Fit very well although fabric shows any bumps underneath. Wore with a black turtleneck and boots and received a ton of compliments. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a women's conference with boots - Rocked it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit (I'm small waist and wider hips, and cut was perfect). Like the styling big buttons and nice slit. Great length (not too short).
Super cute but was a bit tight
I wish I could have worn it but it was too small. I'm going to try a size up. (I already sized up when I got it- do size up twice!)

links_reviews_title: Over all a good skirt and super cute. Runs small, I could barely squeeze into it and I'm a size 36.
links_reviews_text: Over all a good skirt and super cute. Runs small, I could barely squeeze into it and I'm a size 36.
Great fit - classic style and very well made with thicker fabric that's stretchy but not so much so that it's uncomfortable or unflattering.
I agree that they do run small. They stretch a little with time. Nice basic crop. Waist fit great but thigh area was just a little too tight.

I was sent the wrong jeans. These are slim tapered, not cropped and a very light wash. If you look at the jeans in the items description and other reviews, you can clearly tell these are not the Pinch Waist jeans. Hopefully RTR figures this out and sends me the right jeans bc these wrong ones are hideous

I'm a denim fanatic and was so happy with the way these fit. I only wear true denim (100% cotton) so I knew my size, but if you're used to denim with stretch you might want to size up. These are the perfect highwaisted jeans and I love the slight boot cut on them. True blue denim making it easy to pair back to everything. Plan on keeping these for a while!

I love the style of them, but the fit wasnt quite right. I sized up after reading other reviews, which was the right call. However, after sizing up they were still a little tight in the thighs and super loose in the waist. They also stretched out throughout the day
Fit a little small. So comfy and they go with everything! The best part is they do not lose their fit throughout the day!
perfect jean - thick durable denim, high waist, perfect length for ankle boots or high tops.

Def size up because there is no stretch! I'm normally a 26/27 and the 28 fit PERFECTLY! Seriously considering buying these jeans because they're awesome. I am pretty short, so I just cuffed the bottom. Totally keep Long for an extended period of time

These jeans are hot. I generally wear a 30 in 100% cotton Levi's 501s and I think the 30 is the right size in these. They are a sexy denim corset that suck everything in and make my waist and butt look tiny, but I can't really sit in them. If you haven't worn non-stretch denim before, I'd size up at least one size in these. I often wear a 28 in Madewell super stretch denim and would consider myself a true 29-30.
I'm usually a 29 but sized up to 30 as these are small in the hips. Love the look

I personally love this jeans brand - the waist on these is high so I do recommend sizing up if you want more room. I rented my usual size of 27 - I secretly unbuttoned mine middle of the day. Overall the rest of the fit was snug and did not stretch out by the end of the day. I think I'm in between a 27 and 28 and the 28 wouldve been slightly more comfortable but maybe not as form fitting in the leg .

I took a chance with size 8, despite the reviews that these jeans run small. Always trust the reviews :))) i got them through my thighs and got stuck in the hips. Oh well. I will try a much larger size next time. The fabric is awesome. Beautiful blue denim and old-school feel of no-stretch denim.

I really enjoyed these jeans but as other reviews have noted they run very small. I'm typically a 30 and rented a 32, they fit well and didn't stretch out too much. I have fuller hips/butt so if you have a straighter shape I'd say sizing up 1 size would be best. Overall they're a nice mom jean that is fitted enough in the hips/stomach to avoid the front pooch that mom jeans sometimes create. They're a little longer than what was looking for so wore them a few times and then returned for another pair of cropped Agolde jeans that I'm currently loving.
These jeans did not fit me, but I'm not sure if I'd want them to. They definitely have that "mom jean" look, which wasn't what I was hoping for.
Great wash. Durable, would look great if they actually fit. A little too long for a shorty like me.

I rented up 2.5 sizes (I'm in between a 29 and 30-rented the 32) and they were still a little snug. Zero stretch more like a vintage fit. Good quality denim and I liked the color. I wore them once out at night and they're just like STIFF. But look was pretty cute. If you have hips like at all-either rent sizes way up or pass. Made for a narrow body type though because they are cute!
runs small, small, small. Usually 32's fit like a glove with a little room, but these suckers, I couldn't even button.

links_reviews_title: Super not into these jeans I'm a solid 25 and they did . not . even get over my hips.
links_reviews_text: small
Love the fit and cut. However, the wash is darker blue hue in person.

Glad I sized up based on reviews, as the 28 fits perfectly ( I am normally a 26 or 27 in jeans). They also do not have any stretch whatsoever and are a very thick denim. I wouldn't try and wear these in the summer or in warmer weather. Love the high waist, which is even high enough for me (meaning above my belly button) since I have a long torso. Considering keeping.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and flattering - get your normal size
links_reviews_text: I read that people said to size up one or two sizes as the jeans runs small. I would say they run normal, but they don't have give/stretch. I usually wear a 27 and sometimes can be a 26. I wore a 28 and really could have/should have worn a 27. But the 28 was still very comfortable, and just an extra relaxed look then. Flattering, fun, thick jean.

I first heard about this cut from reading about it on The Man Repeller, so I knew I wanted to give them a try, based on their endorsement. I'm glad I did! For not having any stretch, these are the most comfortable jeans I have ever put on my body. They do run small/narrow. My typical modern jean size is 27 (madewell, gap, etc). I decided to size up to a 29 and that was the perfect choicenot too tight and not too loose, just the perfect 'vintage fit'. Very well made with thick, soft denim. I will most likely purchase. Definitely a great find!
Ordered my typical size in all other brands and they were very small, not just a little bit - i'd advise ordering a size up!
Justttttt long enough to work on a tall frame but wish they were an inch longer. Love how high waisted they are
Doesn't fit!
These are fantastic, I may have to buy them. Love these mom jeans!

links_reviews_title: Really cute jeans but they run small
links_reviews_text: Very small size 27
Super tight! Couldn't even get them over my hips.
Tight around thighs
Runs about 2-3 sizes too small. I'm a 12/14 ordered the 32 and wouldn't even go past my thighs. If you wear DL1961, try ordering in your normal size in those. (They run 2-3 sizes smaller too)
Runs very small! Couldn't get over my hips. If your booty is bigger, go up!
Could not even get these past my lower thighs. No give whatsoever. It was comical.
Runs small.

links_reviews_title: I didn't love the fit on my frame.
links_reviews_text: They just didn't look right on my frame. I'm 5'4" and they were just too much denim for my frame. Very nice denim though and high quality.

I'd tried these on in a store in my regular size, and they didn't even come close to fitting. I tried going up two sizes, and it still wasn't gonna happen. I have what my mother calls "birthing hips"-and I think these are cut for a slender build. They were really great quality, and I like the cut of the leg, so I wish I could make them work.
Waaaayyyyy too small I'm typically a 29 30 in Jeans but I have hips and these jeans don't!!
They seem cute but they run small! Apple shapes be warned.

Non stretch super high waisted denim with a tiny waist - they aren't kidding, calling these pinch waist jeans. I'm smaller in the hips/butt and a bit thicker in the middle relatively speaking, and could barely get these closed. Legs fit just fine though, a slim straight cut. Usually am a 28, might rent again in a 30 or even 31 to have some breathing room... but honestly these are pretty plain so these are gonna go low on the list.
Very stiff and tiny waist. Mom jeans with an unwearable waist. Didn't even try.

I wanted to love these! But the fit is a little big for a petite frame. Close and look really cute on other reviewers but didn't quite work for me. I'm 5'6" and 117lbs for reference - go down to a 25 if similar!

links_reviews_title: Runs very large and loose in the leg.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear them because they were way too big. They also run short, more like floods.
Fits well for busty women.
Xxl was slightly large but allowed me to cinch waist and wear shirts underneath. Cute fall jacket/shirt.
I wore this for a photo shoot in Prague and loved it so much I'm keeping it for an everyday fall jacket. I'm complimented non stop every time i wear it
Wore with black pants, and a tank for a casual look. I appreciated the jacket.
Very stiff and awkward jacket. I did not wear

links_reviews_title: Super attractive coat. Love the green on denim. Belt adds nice detail.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Perfect length. Awesome with black leggings and boots. Will rent again.

I appreciate it is supposed to be oversized but it is a bit too large. I'm 5'0 and 160 lbs so I ordered the XL - I could have probably gotten away with the Medium. Still cute, I may order again in Medium later.
Absolutely loved the colors and high waist. Good material and fit really well. Happy to see more Athleisure clothing options and this rental was a win! Very flattering and versatile.
Great fit, great quality and fun to wear
I love the high waist and colors of these leggings. The material is nice and thick and the color blocking really shows off your curves.

links_reviews_title: In love so I bought them!!
links_reviews_text: Love the big waist band and the high waist. They are lightweight also. I didn't find them to be controlling in the tummy but I love them anyway. Super sporty and funky!
Perfect fit. Locked everything in w a very high waist. Great colors. Could keep if I could afford it but I love these!
Love these wish I could buy. They accentuate curves in a good way. The band at the top is extra high rise and kind of think which helps hold you in and is super comfy. Will likely rent again.
Really loved the fit and it made for a great patriotic bike ride around the city. Got lots of compliments

Wore these to the gym to brighten up my usual style of black leggings. They are squat proof and I love the high waist. Very flattering and true to size. Only complaint is that I felt the logo tag on the back when doing sit-ups and other exercises where something (floor, workout benches, etc..) would have direct contact with my lower back.

links_reviews_title: great for weekend, home, and working out
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4 but just had a baby few months ago so still have a pooch so def. needed an XL and it fit's great. Not sure if it's intentionally high waisted but looks good and makes my thighs look skinnier due to the design.
I'm a dance teacher and these pants were great for all day comfort and coverage for teaching
Absolutely love these. So so so comfortable and so flattering!
These fit like a glove and keep everything tight and smooth. I received so many compliments and plan to rent more from this brand!
This dress fit as expected but was too low cut for work (or even everyday in my opinion) and I didn't like how it looked with a black tank underneath. I didn't end up wearing it.
This dress exceeded my expectations! It does cut low, so for work purposes I wore a black cami under it.

I rented this for work. Really cute print, a bit short for work so I decided to wear tights. Also a bit low cut for work, loose in the bust area so I decided on a black cami underneath. Would be cute without tights and without a cami, just not at work.

links_reviews_title: Nice but nothing out of the ordinary
links_reviews_text: Nice dress with unique print. Nothing special. Fits right around arms if you move around, and thin material

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love this, but didn't.
links_reviews_text: The print and style of this dress are so cute and I think it could work on a lot of people, but it just didn't do it for me. I'm tall with fairly wide shoulders.. I don't usually have much issue with dressing, this dress was a little tight in my shoulders while being a little loose in the waist. It was pretty short for work, but that's to be expected with my height. As many others have commented the neck line is pretty weird. I don't mind things that are loose on the top, but this really hung open and had zero structure. Mine also had a weird crease that I just couldn't get to lay right. I wore this one with nothing underneath and felt too exposed when I moved around. The second time I wore it with a black tank top and that was better. It wasn't a total flop, but I definitely wouldn't rent again.
Loved this dress super breezy and great for work- my only negative was the bust is a little low cut for work
Little right in shoulder

links_reviews_title: This dress was cute and still work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: It was an easy fit. I'm small-chested, so some tape would've been helpful at the top, it was a little gapey for me. It was otherwise a great quick way to look put together without trying. Paired it with a cardigan, black tights, and knee-high boots.

I got lots of compliments on how cute this dress is. Very flattering. I had to wear a cami underneath to wear to work. I would def rent this again. Some reviewers complained about the front panels. Was not an issue at all - I assume they tried on the wrong size.

Wore this to work with tights and booties, it is a great dress to dress up or down! The color of the dress made the print not appear too loud which I liked. The chest falls open a little so watch out for that.

links_reviews_title: Just the rt style for fall
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!
Great to dress up or dress down. Top does gape open, so I needed a cami. But I love the look and vibe of this dress
Loved the dress except the top was too big and would stay closed

links_reviews_title: Pretty cute dress, color/design is pretty trendy and not my fave
links_reviews_text: Pretty cute dress, color/design is pretty trendy and not my fave. Fit fine, I liked the style of dress with the cinched waist and layering.

links_reviews_title: Classic cut with a fun print
links_reviews_text: Hard to overstate how much I liked this dress. The breezy material and warm earthy color scheme was the perfect combination for a warm fall weekend. I loved the subtle leopard print. I could easily imagine pairing it with a nice blazer for work. As other reviewers noted, the top can gap a bit -- I pinned it closed to make sure it wasn't an issue. I also sized down one size and it fit well throughout despite my smaller bust.

The print on this dress gives me so many fall feels! It is such a beautiful color too, almost reminds me of a pumpkin spice inspired hue. I love this style for everyday wear from the office to a night out. It runs a bit large in the bust and waist areas so I recommend sizing down. Pair it with black heeled boots and tortoiseshell earrings!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! I have wider hips but this dress made me feel thin and beautiful. I ended up just buying it! The print is fun without being too crazy. Would highly recommend!

This dress is comfy and cute but runs pretty big. I'm flat on top and had to tape it in many places to avoid a wardrobe malfunction. Otherwise it's a fun everyday dress that I got a few compliments on.
Wanted to love this but unfortunately returned without wearing. The fabric is high quality and the print is fine - I didn't like the additional flap of fabric over the skirt of the dress.
I LOVED this dress! Light and perfect for vacation. However, you may want to pin the top depending on your bust. The top part of the dress is a little larger.
Nice fit, a little low cut but can be fixed with a bra/tank top.

links_reviews_title: Pretty if you don't mind your bra showing
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress but I struggled to keep the top from flopping open and showing the girls... I'm small chested, maybe someone w a fuller bust would have a better fit
Easy work dress. Wore with tights and booties. The top can gape open, so I'd plan on wearing a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: Basic dress for work - nothing that's all that special.
links_reviews_text: Overall, a nice, appropriate dress for work that fits quite well. Nothing too special about this one - pretty basic.

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect, and for being pretty short, it hit just at my knees, which was great for work
links_reviews_text: The pattern was unique; however, the V-neck comes pretty low, so I had to wear a cami under the dress.
Was overall too big, and was way too open in the front. I have a large chest, and would never wear that out. I loved the print and fabric though... too bad

links_reviews_title: Great print, nice dress, gapes a little
links_reviews_text: Overall this was a fun dress. I wore it for a birthday dinner and night out. Nice fall colors and pretty print. It's flattering but not incredible. As some other reviewers mentioned it does open a little too much and can show your bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work and it has a different color so its not the same boring work clothes color. Great!
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely and its comfortable for work
Dress itself is very pretty. However it runs little smaller. When you sit and move your arms around, your girlfriends might pop out of the dress. Be very careful.
if you don't have a bust, the crossed neckline is really loose- I wore a bralette underneath, however, was unable to wear to work as I anticipated.
Cute dress. Overall it fit good but if you're not as gifted up top, it fits a little loose
This is a great dress and I got quite a few compliments! It is low cut if you're short
Much more showy in the front than I realized but overall very flattering

The top of it didn't quite fit for someone my shape. It was too loose in the bust, but I couldn't have sizes down or it wouldn't have fit. Size 2 normally fits in this stylist. I think it isn't for someone with smaller bust proportions. Also too low cut without a cami. I wouldn't rent again due to the fit, but the color was interesting.

Wore this dress on a spring day with white shoes (which is different than how everyone else has worn it). From the reviews, I went a size down which was the right choice. The 2 was a little snug around my ribs but I think a 4 would have been too big.
Neckline is extremely open, my full bra was exposed and the pleats on the back made this dress look ill-fitting and awkward. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Not wearable as is but with adjusting it's cute
links_reviews_text: So many reviewers complained about the gaping neckline and it's no joke. I have a short torso so it was not wearable until I used a rubber band around the top of the zipper. That helped shorten the top and it fit great after that. It was cute but I doubt I would rent again.
The top was a little gapey but otherwise fit perfect! Was comfortable and work appropriate after I put a tank top underneath.
Worked with a safety pin otherwise it's a show for everyone lol cute but not my style color wise very dark but still wore
Great, casual and comfortable pants! These pants can be dressed up or down for the event.
Comfy and thin material. The ankle strap is a bit tight, it almost didn't button on me - I always size up in this brand. 5'6, 121 lbs. Looked great all day and night and on trend!
Pants were comfortable but they didn't fit quite the way I'd hoped--I was looking for a more tapered fit at the ankle

links_reviews_title: This pants are comfortable and stylish!
links_reviews_text: I wore them at work and to travel in and they held their shape and were flattering. I did have to wear a belt as they were a little large. Could have been tighter on my ankles too. They were like cool gypsy cargo pants, I highly recommend them!

I actually ended up with a size 8 after returning a size 10 because I was swimming in them. I really like these pants. They fit at the waist and were very comfortable. Because they were short, every time I sat down the cuffs of the pants would ride up and get stuck on my calves. If they were just a bit longer they would not of done that. I can't be adjusting the legs of my pants every time I stand up. :(

These pants are just the coolest. I love how sophisticated they look while not being stuffy work pants. The cargo pockets are a great touch, and really give the pants some character. Also, they are ridiculously comfortable. Wore them with another RTR piece (structured white top) to the first day of work in a new office and felt like exactly the kind of professional woman I aspire to be. Seriously considering buying these.
There is just nothing wrong with these pants! The fit is on point, the length is just right, and they're a style that would mix well with absolutely anything. I'd rent again!

Really loved the color, light fabric, and quality construction of these pants. I found the fit odd. The waist was really large and I had to keep pulling it up, even with a belt. However, the ankle buttons were quite tight. The pants were very comfortable through the day and I liked the overall look of the blouses trousers. May rent again in a smaller size. Would not think these would work great for taller women.

I am 5'10 and a true size 4. These end at my calf and are so tight there that they're unwearable (cuz they're supposed to hit at an ankle, not calf!) They're also quite thin fabric and don't feel high-quality

i love these. So soft, loose, and light! Perfect pants for a summer evening. I thought a 4 would be way too small; actually, they're big in the waist! Everything else is perfect. And the waist is probably just my body - pants are always large on my waist and too tight everywhere else. Not these, tho - for a girl with lots of booty like me, these pants were super comfortable in the hips, crotch, and booty - not tight at all and fit just the way the fit looks on the model.
Fit nice and high around the waist- and then a great comfy fit through the butt and thighs - looked great for work
I love these pants. Perfect for work or play. Flattering with just the right details.

I ended up returning this without wearing it to work. The legs fit my height but the waist felt a little large. Overall it felt a little sloppy for work. Also the blue painted buttons showed a lot of wear with the contrasting white scratches.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love these and want to purchase asap!
links_reviews_text: These pants are so perfect, I actually didnt want to send them back and when Im a bit more flush, I will purchase. I could have sized down and still been comfortable, but everything about these is great, they are so elegant and comfortable, but also super easy to wear for every day... perfect for dressing up or down. Dont get disgusted, but I wore them so many times, took them on an emergency trip and wore them almost the whole time and got compliments, even though i was super casual! They are great for west coast temps and would be great all summer long. I wore them a few different ways, but always felt great and received compliments, even sitting in the hospital.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy. Too casual for the office.
links_reviews_text: Really comfortable. I felt like I was wearing pjs. Too casual for a formal office atmosphere.
They were great high waisted pants that you can easily dress up or dress down.
Buttons are chipped so I didn't wear. Loved the fit and the style though, but I didn't have a jacket that would work with it.

links_reviews_title: Nice and comfy maybe a bit too high waisted??
links_reviews_text: They were lightweight, comfortable and didn't crease. They were easy to wear and relatively flattering however I would say the negative with these pants is that they sit very high on the waist so be prepared to tuck your top in.

At least two sizes too large. Rented the white textured crops with the slits on the front in size 16 and they stretched over time, but these pants in size 16 were mega huge from the get go. Kinda weird that big of a discrepancy in the same brand. Sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Soft and comfortable these pants were a great choice.
links_reviews_text: Needed a belt to keep them up will try a size down next time
These pants got me compliments, but I found it tough to keep the cinched ends up on my calf. Choose a smaller size if 2 are offered.

links_reviews_title: Fabric is so soft and light
links_reviews_text: perfect fit and really accentuate curves

links_reviews_title: Love so much, I might actually buy them!
links_reviews_text: These are so comfy, cute, and versatile. You can dress up with a blouse and heels for work, or a cropped tee and sandals for everyday. They're even great for travel. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stylish, but runs big!
links_reviews_text: Rented these beauties to wear for casual Friday at the office. They are so soft and comfortable and feel like wearing pajamas, but still look polished and put together with heels and a ivory blouse (I styled it similarly to the model photo!). The buttons/tabs at the ankles are adjustable so you can make them as loose or as tight as you'd like. The only downside was that the pants were very large on me! Instead of fitting high waisted, I wore them low on my hips. It still looked ok, but wasn't the exact style I was going for. They were still loose even then. I'd probably go down 2 sizes if I were to rent again!
Fit perfectly in the waist but slightly snug in the thighs and bum just to the point that I would hate to sit in them all day. Cute style and afraid a size larger my be too big in the waist.
I wore this to work with a Khaki shirt tied at the waist Safari fab. Huge huge waist - belted it

links_reviews_title: Perfect for warm summer wear.casual and professional at the same time.
links_reviews_text: It fitted well!
I think I could have gone down another size, as it's really huge. This is not for tall gals- on me it was short. But navy blue cargo pants go with everything.
Totally in love with these, easy to wear and comfortable for work. Wish I could buy!

Loved these pants, considered buying them. Ordered the 4 first and had to swap for the 2, which fit perfectly. Material is light but not unforgiving. Comfortable to sit, stand and walk in. Didn't really wrinkle too badly, but I also work at a standing desk, so others may have a different experience. Wore with a nice tee tucked in and a nude wedge heel.

links_reviews_title: These pants are just as comfortable and well fitted as shown in the photo.
links_reviews_text: The material is soft, breathable and perfect for summer. The fit is true to size and the unusual details at the ankle and waist make them a statement piece.
Wore to work. So comfortable but stylish. I liked how you can adjust buttons to be tighter or looser at ankle depending on look you want.
