Rented this for work but also wore it to graduation. High waisted and flattering. Wasn't sure about them when I first put them on but ended up loving them by the end of the day, lots of compliments
The fit was super baggy. Size down if you have a smaller waist

links_reviews_title: Runs large but looks professional. Great for a warm work day
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9 with wide hips and these definitely don't hit me at the ankle the way they do on the model. She has them buttoned up tightly which is cute and I wore them up closer to my calf like that. They are so comfortable but look very professional They can be dressed up or down depending how you button the bottom part. I would definitely buy these!
I'm usually a 2 but sized down to a zero and was still big
The waist of these wouldn't even button. I also wasn't a fan of the material in person
A little big for a 10

I'm usually a 4/6 and almost always a medium in pants like this because of my bigger butt. However, these pants were very loose on me. I would have purchased had I rented the small. Super comfortable but still professional looking. I could have paired with my black vans or the mule in the photos. It was nice they can be dressed up or down. Absolutely loved!

I love the fit of these pants but what I love most is how that I'm able to dress them up or down! Only complaint is that the fit near the crotch area is a little awkward. Felt as if I needed to pull them down but they are high waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: Loved the aesthetic look. Don't think its means for anyone with a booty or curves.
links_reviews_text: Fit well enough but wasn't as comfortable because it didn't move or stretch with me. Didn't fit well around my waist - when I bet down the whole back pulls down. Was fun to wear one day but wouldn't purchase.
Very big in the waist, could have worked but think I needed a small.
These pants are awesome, but they are long for any short-legged people. I want to buy them though so I can hem them about 3 inches to a crop length. Right now they go past my ankles.
Cute but doesn't fit right for those with slim waists but thicker legs.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for everyday casual wear.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable
This app sucks

Super tight calves, yet baggy crotch. These were too small in some places and too big in others. Couldn't wear due to the calf issue. Could have hid the crotch with a tunic, but the calves were a no-go.
The butt made me look like I had a saggy diaper on, the calfs were super tight too. Waist was baggy, knees were so tight along with the calf area! The pants are cute just not made for humans.
Loved the fit. a little tight in the calves.
I wore this dress for a Disney outing. Its colors and flowers are bright and fun.
This A line fit is so flattering on a curvy girl. This print is an instant mood lifter too. I really really considered keeping this dress because it fit me so well.

links_reviews_title: needed a little help but otherwise very pretty
links_reviews_text: great pattern / color but a little shapeless and loose in the waist, PERFECT once belted
Rented this for wine tasting in Napa and loved it! Beautiful print and light material, sleeves look tight in pictures but they were comfortable. Would rent again
Very cute fit and flare. The material is very light, so it would be best in late spring or summer. It was still nice and cheery for a winter day!

The femininity of this dress is out of my comfort zone, but that's why I decided to rent it! It was perfect with black tights and booties and would also transition well to spring/summer with sandal or strappy heel. I thought the fit with the slightly poufed sleeves, and A line skirt was very flattering, and the length felt very appropriate for my height.
Loves the lightweight lose fit that hangs to flatter your curves or hide the extra curves lol. It is perfect for when you don't want to show to much or have kids clawing at your chest

links_reviews_title: Love this fun floral dress, esp the poofy shoulders
links_reviews_text: This was a great work option - a little more fun and playful than usual. Great fit, striking colors. Kate Spade consistently delivers.
I loved this dress. The pattern and colors are so bright but the simple cut and easy fit are a nice contrast. Light fabric.

This dress is amazing and the fit is beautiful! I feel it would fit any body type great since its fitted on top and flares out at the waist. I received compliments on this dress all day at work and would rent again!
I loved the way this Kate Spade dress fit. It was a light weight fabric and the print was fun. It was very flattering on me
Comfortable and flattering. Perfect summer dress.
I loved the colors and pattern of this dress. It went perfect with a colorful belt. I would rent again.

I actually wore this one a few times and it really got a lot of compliments. The colors are amazing and worked very well for an overstated makeup look at a music festival and also for a more basic makeup look at a graduation. It's flattering, even if you have some body imperfections. I would recommend ordering a size up, as I did for this one. This is my favorite rental so far!
Love this dress, perfect for work!
Felt like a million bucks in this flowery flattering number.

links_reviews_title: Fun and bright dress for work!
links_reviews_text: Potentially too bright / bold for my semi conservative financial services employer but a fun dress for work / dinner out after. Good length if you are tall.

Beautiful bright colors in this dress and lightweight fabric makes it the perfect dress for work in summer, spring & fall. The fit was perfect with cute details on the sleeves and neckline. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Bright, fun and easy dress from day to night!
links_reviews_text: Bright, fun and easy to wear, this dress will definitely get you compliments! The material is thinner than I expected, but I actually liked it better- flowy, flattering and comfortable. Perfect for the office and onto dinner at night. This style might not work for bigger-chested ladies, as there isn't a ton of room in that area, but it wasn't a problem for me. My first RTR experience did not disappoint!

links_reviews_title: A little GaGa in a good way
links_reviews_text: What an awesome dress. I wasn't sure about the shoulder, they felt a little Lady Gaga circa Telephone at first, but I grew to really like them. Lots of compliments and nice fit, not too short or too outrageous a print for work. I'm normally a 6 or sometimes a 4 in late Spade and this 4 fit fine.

I rented this for work and received several compliments. Its bright, but easy to wear. I have a larger bust (36DD) and the bust was roomy, although I sized up from my normal 8 so it wasnt so tight for work.
This is even cuter and brighter in person! Fits true to size with fun puff sleeves and a really bright pattern. I've gotten so many compliments and don't want to give it back. So flattering.

links_reviews_title: The fit and feel are both perfect for spring / summer.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. I wore this out with some girlfriends, and then on another day to work. It's light and airy, and perfect for a spring / summer event.
Perfect colorful Kate Spade for an April tea. Unlined and flowy at hem. Fit true to size. I was fine with high'sh neckline.
So fun for spring! Great fit and perfect length

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but not the most flattering.
links_reviews_text: I ordered/wore this dress to a bridal shower and was excited to try it! It wasn't my favorite piece I've gotten from RTR and I wouldn't wear it again. It ran large; size down. Or if in between, go down a size. Fabric is thin - I should've trusted that from other reviewers! I loved the sleeves, and the pattern was what i was expecting. I would have swapped this dress out for something else, but waited until the last minute to order. It's cute, but you can skip it.
I love Kate spade. I think it runs very true to size. I love puffy sleeves, so that worked for me.
Such a great work dress! The length and high neck line make it perfect for a more conservative work environment. It's a light fabric perfect for warmer spring days.

links_reviews_title: Ruching at neck, empire waist seam, great length
links_reviews_text: The print on this dress may seem busy but it's great for spring. Pairs easily with black flats or pumps. Length is great for work, hits me just above the knee. Ruching on neck helps to accentuate the chest area (which I like). Sleeves are a great length too, as I have a scar on my upper left arm I don't like to broadcast too often. The ruching at the shoulders gives it that extra flair for the office. Fabric density is lovely, lightweight crepe de chine polyester so it doesn't wrinkle easily. Love the empire waist seam that makes the 2 a perfect fit.
I loved the bright pink and yellow if this dress. The most comfortable rental I have ever rented!! A major work win!

I LOVE Kate spade! This dress is no different, it seems like a cute, simple, spring dress, but when you put it on, every head in the room turns, I felt like twiggy! My husband couldn't stop complimenting me in it. The sleeves had a cute little poof, and it's tailored to fit so nicely.

Probably a little aggressive to wear this in the winter but I put on tights and pretended it was spring. Dress is such bright neon colors (can't tell in this bathroom pic). There's no slip so it's a little staticy. Also there's a funny little twist detail by the neck that I have mixed feelings about but you can't really see it. Dress is fitted at natural waist and then a true A-line making it very forgiving and easy to wear.
Rented for Easter....worn in my living room for church and a dress up zoom meeting with friends. ;) gorgeous dress, Kate Spade is always so flattering and lovely.
This dress is super cute. Loved it. It hits right above the knee so it's totally good for work. I will say that I kinda have broad shoulders so it did fit a little tight in the shoulders.
Comfortable, cute, and flattering! Might just keep it :)
A little frumpy looking but loved the colors

Fits really well. Fabric is lighter than expected so I wore it with black tights since it's still cold in Seattle. The neckline is a bit higher than I usually go, but the colors really brought out my skin tone and dark hair.
This dress fit really well & was a great transitional dress from work to Happy Hour. Paired it with black tights, boots & a coat.
Great sleeves. The top made me look like I had a chest (which I don't), so it was wonderful for me. Might make someone else look to busty. Excellent style!

Wore this to work as well as a Friendsgiving with a blazer and booties. Felt vintage flair wearing it - maybe because of the looseness and long hem, which I normally do not do. I was very comfortable in it and it felt nice. The fabric is good quality, soft and smooth. Loved the color and pattern most of all. Size down for sure!
The color is amazing. The material is light and just seems to float. It has belt loops but did not come with a belt. Luckily I had something that worked. A little loose.
It was one of my favorite rentals! It was a beautiful color and material! Lots of compliments!

I rented this dress to wear after a surgery where I would have to wear a lot of dressings underneath. Based on all of the other reviews, I knew it would run large, so I even went ahead and ordered a size up so I knew for sure it would fit! The fabric is beautiful and light and breezy. But it is a pretty shapeless dress, even with the belt. But if that is what you are looking for (like I was) the. This dress nails it!
Large and sort of frumpy. Liked it a bit better with my own belt.

links_reviews_title: Gorge color and material. Super unique fem style.
links_reviews_text: Amaze.
The dress fit true to size. I wore it to work. I loved the flowy-ness of it. I def recommend!

Loved the silk material. I was able to wear it to work as well. Very airy and soft. Loved the blue and the pattern and the style. I am only 5ft and I could see how it might be too long for some petite ladies
This is such a luxe material and the print is even prettier in person. Runs large so size down. Great flow and movement.

It has a bit of a weird frumpy fit. But the beautiful color and the luxurious silk fabric make up for the down side of the fit. A really nice dress for hour glass figures that would remove the element of frump.

Fabric is divine- beautiful color and smooth silk. I'm 5'4" and without heels on at home the dress seemed not quite right - as the seams on the lower part of the skirt are unique, so it fits/drapes unlike anything I've ever worn before and seemed almost too long. Glad I wore it, very comfortable- loose throughout, belt makes it flattering if you have a narrow waist (and I have a long torso.) Wore to a daytime charity gala and to work after. Some static cling, but overall a winner in you want something different and feminine. I'd rent again!

links_reviews_title: Runs Big, Super Silky and Luxe
links_reviews_text: It's so comfy but it is huge. I could easily size two sizes down. It's silky and nice but needs a slip and arm holes are enormous so had to wear shirt underneath. No pockets. Love the silk but would not rent again.

So sad because this dress is gorgeous! It was just too large and frumpy on me. It made me look like I'd gained 10+ pounds so I def was not a fan. I might try in a smaller size! Sad to return without wearing.
Love the colors and fit. This is NOT burned-out velvet, but rather a printed silk. Separate belt and cute drop-waist. Would rent again!
I wore this to a Christian assembly. I did wear a cami under it so it was a very modest dress. I felt very comfortable in it.
It is huge. Size down for sure. The color and fabric is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: So cute, so much static cling!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 14, but the 16 was all that was available and it totally worked. Loved the dress but the static cling was very annoying.

I love this dress so much. The color is the most vibrant blue and the cut is so flattering with the little matching belt! The length is perfect for spring when the weather keeps going back and forth. It's about 50 degrees today but with a denim jacket it'll be perfect!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, great color, good for everyday.
links_reviews_text: Flattering color on everyone. Relaxed fit, runs a tad bit large. Nice to wear, would rent again
WOW! This is a 10/10 dress! I adored everything about this dress. The brilliant color and shine, flattering figure, and modest length. Beautiful! Would rent again!
The dress is classy and well made. The color and print on the silk is stunning. The cut of the stress below the waist is not the most flattering, but it's worth trying a different look!

I enjoyed wearing this. The color is the best thing about it. Absolutely stunning. It is lightweight and natural fiber (silk) so it breathes well yet it is still opaque - I didn't need a slip underneath. The cut is very generous and forgiving and the belt flattered my hourglass shape. The dress is well worn, kind of like a hand me down, but that's only perceivable up close and since I'm working from home: no one could or would ever know. I wouldn't buy it; it's a bit too memorable, but I did enjoy wearing it and might rent again if I keep working from home exclusively.

links_reviews_title: Cut hit at all wrong spots
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color & pattern but could not have been less flattering, not great choice if you've got some booty.

links_reviews_title: Pretty pattern, nice fabric, fit was much larger than expected for this brand.

links_reviews_text: I was really disappointed when I tried this on and it was way too big on my. The print and style looked awesome.

links_reviews_title: I rented this thinking I could maybe wear it to a wedding but it's little too casual.
links_reviews_text: I rented it for a wedding but it's little too casual. I actually think it's more of a fall dress that would look cool with a chunky belt, some heals and maybe even a cool jacket over it. Will probably try to rent it again, just not good for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, classy. I would wear it again.
links_reviews_text: It needed pressing. The dress was fantastic. I enjoyed it a lot. Felt like Mary Poppins.

links_reviews_title: Liked but fit my large hips funny where it buttons
links_reviews_text: Cool dress but be weary of how it will fit widest part of your hips because the buttons will gab. Really should zip w.

How did I not get a photo!?! Loved this, and would have worn it more than once, but I didn't keep it clean. :( This is incredibly figure flattering for a true pear with a smaller upper body. I can need a 10 in a straighter cut dress to fit my booty, I am almost always an 8, and usually disagree with recommendations to size down, but this was perfect for me in the next smaller size. I will rent this again and wish it was more affordable to buy!!

links_reviews_title: Splash of color with An 80's vine
links_reviews_text: It fit great, and was somewhat flattering. The fabric is very nice. The belt is s it thin, but still looked nice.

Without the belt, this dress looks awful. With the belt, it looks great! The fabric is so lightweight and flowy. Good for hot temps. I think this runs a little big. I'm a 6 or 8 and the 6 had plenty of room.
Really pretty dress but was way too big.

links_reviews_title: Dress was rather long and fit very loose. Ran way too big.
links_reviews_text: Dress was rather long and fit very loose. Ran way too big.
Lovely length; wear with or without the belt.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, gorgeous color. Great fit and length for someone tall (5'9") and long-waisted.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks like a beautiful turquoise sack until you add the belt. And then it floats and swishes in a perfect way. Fits like a dream. Conservative but lovely for work. The arms holes are a bit big so I added a silk tank underneath. I love this dress and look forward to renting it again.
the drop waist + belt makes for a weird fit - the dress needed one or the other, but both create for an awkward middle section. loved the print and color but this unfortunately looked awful on me.

links_reviews_title: This dress swallowed me while at 55. It runs large and the drop waist did not flatter.
links_reviews_text: Think you have to be really tall

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear because it was way too big.
links_reviews_text: This dress was like a giant MuMu, it looked awful and was way too big. I ordered a 10 and it fit like a 16.

On the positive side - the fabric was a beautiful pattern, color and texture. It twirled beautifully (yes, I twirled in the privacy of my room!) and reminded me of a 1940s dress. On the down side this dress does not work well for pear shaped bodies. The top was pretty big and I could have gone down several sizes. On the bottom, the part above the ruffle is very fitted and hit my rear/hips at a strange spot that was not flattering.
This dress is huge. I ordered a size 2 and it was like a blanket. I couldn't wear it.
I wore this dress for days in a row, I loved it that much! Perfect for work, chic and comfortable. I have a straight figure (no hips) and short waist so the styling was everything I love.

Beautiful orange color and great mid-weight fabric. Fun little ruffle detail in the front. Torso is exceptionally long, though -- I had to belt it to make it work on me! Probably best for someone taller.

Gorgeous color and perfect for a post-wedding brunch. The fabric resists ironing and wrinkles were tough to get put. The dress also shows every bump and bulge, even though it is not firm fitting. Nothing to fear if you wear the appropriate shape wear. Would rent again.

The toasted pumpkin color of this dress screams fall. It was just slightly metallic and the drop waist is flattering for non curves people. I styled the dress with Swedish Hasbeen clogs and a denim jacket.
The material is not soft and arrived wrinkled. You need a long torso to wear this. I ordered a 2 and it was large on me. I am 5'5 and 120. Color is nice but fit was off for my body type
Easy / breezy great for work. Fits large but I think the loose look works well. And pockets!!! Great fall color.
I enjoyed this made in the USA dress with pockets. I paired it with a scarf. It arrived new with tags and a little wrinkled. The wrinkles easily pressed out with low iron.

The proportions work better on someone tall. As other reviewers have, said the straps are long and the waist is very low. If you are pear or hourglass shaped you may want to size up because the pockets will sit at your hip.
I wanted to love this but it didn't do that much for me. Roomy in the waist.

Really different cut and great color and nice fabric but heavy. Didn't really do anything for me but draped well to hide problem areas. Oberall looked fine and was fun to wear. Because of the weight it hung down under the arms and exposed my bra and stretched during the day.
Really rich color, nice texture. Didn't work for me though because the low cut effect made my legs look ridiculously short

links_reviews_title: Need to be SUPER tall. My arms can't reach the pockets!!
links_reviews_text: When I first put this on, I hated it. I decided this is made for a very tall, fit woman with no lumps at all! I'm 5'3". Then I added a light tan, thin shawl-collar wrap cardigan and it TOTALLY transformed the dress! It broke up the orange, hid the lumps and the super low waist. I wore it with flat sandals as a maxi-dress! The designer should make this for petites. Perfect for a tall, perfectly figured women.

links_reviews_title: This eco friendly fabric deserves a round of applause. It is sustainable, lightweight, breathable,
links_reviews_text: The color on this dress is perfect for Fall. The fabric is soft, and smooth. The dress hangs loosely over the midsection, not in a gaping manner, but just flows straight. It is flattering. Smaller busted ladies may want to size down.

links_reviews_title: Definitely size down one, consider a backup in case the drop waist hits you in the wrong spot
links_reviews_text: Drop waists are always tough. I'm pretty tall, and the waist line just didn't hit me in the right place. I wish it had been two inches higher or lower. It wasn't easy to wear without fidgeting, so I decided to return without wearing. Agree that you should size down one size if you're interested in trying this dress.

links_reviews_title: Flapper-style transition dress A nice transition into fall dress - still hot, but September.
links_reviews_text: A nice transition into fall dress - still hot, but September. The material was really comfortable, and the low waist had flapper-vibes. Got lots of compliments on this look.
Beautiful color and material. It runs a bit big but still wore my regular size.

New with tags! Very 1920's cut. Extremely comfortable, gorgeous color and flattering. The color is the same as my amber jewelry, and perfect for Fall. Will need a somewhat dressy heel, as this is a very elegant piece. Wearing to a work event in Vegas- sexy but not too low cut or va-va-voom. Pockets! There's a slit in the front but the extra fabric makes the slit discreet. Really really elegant- wow!
Keeping three stars for the color and cool drapey vibe, but ran way too big to be wearable. Will return and rent again one size down!
Bags out a bit, I felt like this too made me look bigger. Never a bonus.

This top is going to give you all the compliments. So much detail on this Love shack fancy top. You can actually wear it reversed so the buttons go down the front or back. Timeless beautiful top you can't go wrong with.

I wore this while in San Fran on vacation. It was a super cute boho chic look. Even my boyfriend commented on how cute it was. I wore it with the buttons on the back because I could wear a normal bra and not feel too self conscious that way. It kills me to send this one back but hopefully will get it again next spring.
Wore this for vacation and LOVED! Fit was loose and flowy with regular size medium. Length a little short but it worked.
The detailing was gorgeous! Would rent again

Everything about this top is so cheerful and fun. I love the details, the butterfly on the sleeve, the buttons, the ruffles; everything about this top is so special! I received several comments the day I wore this and it made me feel confident even though I was wearing just a blouse and jeans. I definitely wish I owned this top.
Loved the embroidery on this top and the sleeves were gorgeous! I wore it both front ways and back ways. I almost bought this one!

links_reviews_title: Adore this shirt so much. you need a cropped cami or a bralette but its beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Lays well, pretty sleeves and no iron needed.
Fits a bit loose, very comfortable and cute for vacation!

links_reviews_title: Loved the stitch details, trapeze fit was just ok

links_reviews_text: This sweater was very warm and cozy. It's a good basic sweater. Plus It has a fun little flounce to it that I loved!
This sweater has a nice swing to it but the actual design isn't too exciting. It is warm and cozy though, probably good for cooler weather.

This is a gorgeous wool sweater with nice long sleeves. It is on the shorter side but worn with a long tank and skinny black pants it looked absolutely adorable! I wore it several times before returning!
It fit super weird, the neck was too wide but didn't lay flat and it was crop and the sleeves were too long
I received lots of complements on this sweater! It's comfortable, well made, and nice texture. Thinking of buying!
Really great fit, wore during the day and at night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cute date night
links_reviews_text: Loved this great for a quick put together look for a last minute date night. it is a little itchy and cropped so make sure you wear with high waisted jeans.
Just what I expected. It was perfect

This was a cute little sweater for work. I really liked the metallic thread details. For me the overall length was a bit short and I could only wear it with high waisted pants so it was difficult to make it work within my current wardrobe.
Super cute and oversized but cropped. Looked great with highwaisted jeans. Loved it
Really weird fit, big insime areas and really small in others.

links_reviews_title: The sweater wasn't as cute in person as it is online.
links_reviews_text: A little too cropped for my taste and appeared a little tattered/worn.
the silver thread is actually less noticeable in person, but it was still eye catching and very flattering. I got so many compliments!
Tight around the neck But cute shape over all

links_reviews_title: Looked good with a short swingy skirt, but was a bit bulky
links_reviews_text: Didn't love the trapeze shape of this sweater, but otherwise it was cute

I liked this a lot! It was an easy way to update a black sweater and jeans look without trying to hard. I got several compliments on it. It did get a touch itchy throughout the day so I docked a star for that
Simple black sweater with fun details! So many compliments
This was such a cute sweater for any occasion! Literally so adorable!! I wore it about 3 times!

links_reviews_title: I was warm, cozy, and cute while outside at holiday events.
links_reviews_text: I love this! I almost want to buy it, but I don't live in a cold climate. I rented it for while I was home visiting my parents and it kept me warm without being itchy or uncomfortable. The shape of it is perfect for me - it's cropped, but not too much (for me, I'm short but have a large bust). I can wear it without anything beneath, but I also found it to be cute paired with a black and white striped tee. It lays nicely and flares out slightly which I found to be really flattering...not something I typically say about sweaters. I liked the neckline as well. The designs on top of it are cute and trendy...they kind of look like fabric paint over the sweater from afar but they're actually a shimmery yarn.
Much more cropped than I expected but such a cute sweater.

links_reviews_title: This was sweater fit nicely and looked just like the picture
links_reviews_text: This sweater does have an itchy feel.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and dinner. The crop will get you though, so watch your stomach!
links_reviews_text: Wear with high waisted pants!

This sweater was a bit different than I was expecting. I thought that the silvery designs were embroidery, but they are actually tacked on (paint?) and way more glittery in person. The fit is a bit of a swing silhouette - it has an A-line to it which is nice for layering. The knit is also quite thick and warm.
Fits well and is warm. Attracts a lot of fuzz and fur, though!
Cropped fit and fun embroidering
This is so cute! It is a tiny bit scratchy. True to size. Probably will buy this.
too big

I enjoyed wearing this sweater and I got a few compliments on it. The head opening is a small and doesn't have a lot of stretch, but I was able to manage. It's also not very soft and I found that it was itchy if I didn't wear a shirt under it.

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy for the fall/winter months
links_reviews_text: This sweater was perfect for casual days at work as well as relaxing weekend days. Received many compliments. I received a newer one, so the neck wasn't stretched out yet and it was hard to put on at first. But after the first time, went in perfectly. Highly recommend!
Worn for a lunch date. Gorgeous fit and very flattering. Considering buying! Would live in this if I could! Sz S fit great (I'm usually a S/M).
I wore this with leggings for a casual fall weekend. The material is very soft, almost like a sweatshirt. I liked the tie
I loved this sweater and would buy it if it came down in price. It was super soft, very comfortable and the design made it flattering. No cons at all!
Cozy soft casual top that is good for working from home or the weekend. The tie in front makes it more interesting.
Warm, cozy and cute. Paired with dark Blue jeans on weekend getaway. Nothing too special but fit well
The one I got was pretty worn, but it was so cute and so soft. Would Rent this again
Wore several times out to eat and for family gatherings. Fit great and was easy to style.
Flattering and versatile top. Only issue is that the fabric is more sheer than I would like
So soft and comfy! Flattering cut, not too loose or too tight. Liked it so much I'm buying it.
It was so cozy and fun. It was a perfect length

links_reviews_title: You won't want to send this back!
links_reviews_text: Soooo soft and flattering. Perfect for fall! It's more lightweight so probably not ideal for really cold weather. Easy to dress up or down. Wish I could keep but too expensive! Still, rent this. You'll love it!
Not a stand out top, but great piece to wear

links_reviews_title: Glad I stayed with a large, very soft and cozy
links_reviews_text: I go between a m/l and am glad I went with a large. This is not super fitted but has a slimmer fit so a medium would have been a little tight I imagine. Anyways, easy to pair with black or reg jeans to work or weekend! I will wear this a few times and then send back. The condition still looks really good and not overworn yet.
This top fit perfectly. Perfect sleeve length, perfect length in the torso, and the side knot is super flattering and a fun touch to a basic, cozy grey sweater

links_reviews_title: Nice casual top - extra detail was flattering and interesting
links_reviews_text: No complaints

This sweater was comfortable and soft. I wore it once with skinny jeans to a concert and once with grey chinos for a casual day at the office. It fit true to size (maybe a little big toward the bottom) and was not too short or boxy on a longer torso.
This sweater was cute for a day at work. It's pretty soft and the tie in the middle makes it super flattering. I wasn't WOW-ed or anything, it was just fine.
The drape in the front perfectly camouflaged areas I didn't want to emphasize while the overall fit really flattered my figure!
What a dreamy sweater! It was so soft and comfortable. It's runs a bit small, at least it did for me in the bust area. Overall, I was a fan!
Thinking about keeping this one. I got a lot of compliments, it's versatile and extremely comfortable. You can wear it to work, for errands, out for drinks, really it's a catch all
Very flattering, beautiful soft fabric. Wore it with jeans and flats, felt very upscale mommy.

links_reviews_title: This is the softest shirt I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: Super flattering shirt. The tie is not constricting at all. The material is the softest - like cashmere. Thinking about buying this one to own - I wanted to wear it to bed!

Terrible pic, but only one I have in this top. Loved this. Very soft. Burgundy with periwinkle print. I'm 5'3 135 36B/C -- the medium gave very little breathing room, and the buttons gaped if I took a deep breath lol. Recommend sizing up, and/or a cami underneath. Loved the top.
Wore to a work function and it was a great fabric and looked great.

This is not a shirt I would have picked out for myself mainly due to the color but, I gotta tell ya-- I felt like a billion bucks in the rain today with this top. It fits well, the buttons don't come apart, the fabric is light and airy. I might wear this one more time before returning. Cute shirt!
Super comfy and flattering. Fun with jeans or slacks.
I love this brand because of the lovely silk fabrics they use. This top was exactly as beautiful as expected. Great fit too.

links_reviews_title: Shirt did not run short for me.
links_reviews_text: I sized up to S because I was worried the shirt would be short. It was definitely not short. I would order regular size.

links_reviews_title: Great for work! Professional, comfortable, easy to style.
links_reviews_text: Loved this top for work! Paired very easily with black slacks, and looks very put together and professional. Some design components also make it feel nicely feminine.
easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Switching it up from everyday work-wear
links_reviews_text: Great top for work -- wore this a few times and received compliments. The print made my work outfit a little more interesting but still professional enough to wear to meetings, etc.

I originally rented this for work, but have also worn it to a casual dinner party, drinks with friends, and as everyday wear. The color is gorgeous, the material is breathable, and the fit is TTS... even the sleeves hit at the perfect length on me. I am considering buying it, but if not I will definitely rent again!
Rented this for everyday wear. Wore it to work. Good fit overall.

links_reviews_title: Lovely berry/periwinkle print on a typical Joie blouse
links_reviews_text: This blouse fit in the typical loose but lovely Joie style. I loved the colors and print of this blouse - it looks even better in person if you like berry/periwinkle combo. If you love Joie as I do, then you'll love this blouse. Works well for work or every day with jeans.
Lovely piece of clothing. Better for warmer days. The buttons, however, could be more reliable
great top
Very conservative top. Nothing special

links_reviews_title: Worked well with navy pants for simple work outfit
links_reviews_text: Would look good with pants or a skirt. Nice color and collar.

I was wearing a crossbody bag while walking around on vacation and the buttons over the bust where the purse strap was hitting kept coming open. Aside from that, it was nice, but didn't garner any compliments like many of my other rentals.

Great shirt to wear from work to a dinner out. Colors are vibrant. Got tons of compliments. I wear between a small and medium, the medium was a hot loose but didn't matter. Tucked in or out, it looked great. Will rent again!
Made me felt so out together and chic at work. The fabric is so soft and light (good for a cool morning and warmer afternoon). Only downside is the buttons gapped on my chest. Loved this blouse!

I love the print of this piece, and adore the colors! The neckline is super cute, and this would be great for the office with jeans or a pencil skirt! Unfortunately, the XL was too tight across the bust. Usually these tops run tight in the arms, but the fit was great everywhere but the bust! Wishing this came in a larger size!
Grabbed this one for work. Nice flowy top. The sleeves bell slightly which is fun. I appreciate that it buttons to the neck. Love that style. The pattern was cute too.
Too small
Love this top.
Love everything about this top! Great color, material and fit
Beautiful top for work. Great for conservative office. XL fit perfect, I normally rent a size 14
Great top beautiful design thinner than I thought it would be did have to use fashion tape .. it was a little gapey
Can be dressed up for down!
Size large was more like a size 6-8/M - could not button it up.

links_reviews_title: wore several times for work or casual weekend.
links_reviews_text: love it!!

links_reviews_title: Super cute shirt for work with black pants
links_reviews_text: Great fit, true to size.
The button hole was ripped on this shirt so I was not able to wear it. It also runs very small, more cropped than I anticipated. The medium fit more like a small.
Great top for work or everyday. Would rent again.
There was a big gap in the buttons and you could see inside the shirt. Not great if you have a large chest!

links_reviews_title: Cute. Can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Cute top, but not for busty women. The buttons gapped so much it was unwearable. Seems to run smaller than other Joei tops.
This blouse was so silky and it draped perfectly. I received so many compliments on it!

Love the color and the print. It's definitely a little small, I have a large chest but usually don't have issues with a large but I had to put a pin in it to keep it from gaping. Wasn't a huge issue and was easy to fix. Nice top but I wasn't in love with how it looked un-bottoned at the top or buttoned up all the way. Probably won't rent again.
Nice top, a bit shorter than I like. Pattern looks like bees. Did not change my life, but good shirt for work.

Finally a blouse that was not see through! The fit is true to size and hangs nicely, although a little shorter than other blouses by Joie. It didn't wrinkle at all after two wears. I'd rent this again.

links_reviews_title: This top is a great pattern, fits well and makes for a nice dressed up work day.
links_reviews_text: Works for larger chests. Good fabric. almost bought it but still think it's a bit pricey.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous top. Great color. Good quality.
links_reviews_text: This top is fun and can go with almost anything. I got a ton of compliments on it. I loved it!
Loved this sophisticated jacket and so did others. Glitzy, but professional. Nice break from pinstripes.
Love the color and texture. Picture doesn't do it justice Wore this jacket when I moderated a women's panel and received so many compliments. Stood out on stage & spiced up my black wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: Perfect patterned blazer for the meeting! I got compliments all day!
links_reviews_text: - True to size (I'm usually a 6 and the 42 fit perfectly in the shoulders and arms with some give around the chest/stomach) - The length did pass the waistline so it would be perfect to cover any imperfections. - Shimmer color was perfect for a neutral pant and top. - The jacket was comfortable but not heavy or lightweight like linen. - I would easily rent this jacket again. It was perfect for a work meeting.

links_reviews_title: Great party or night out jacket
links_reviews_text: I rented this over the holidays and wore it three times. It has a beautiful silver sheen and the cool blue, black and silver tones worked well with my olive skin. Due to it's less structured style, I paired it with skinny jeans and fitted tops, including a black sequined tank and a blue scooped neck T.
Perfect Jacket for work. Fit well. Many compliments.
I was nervous this was going to be a lot, but it was perfect for a Formal Event and with jeans. Everyone made a comment that they loved it. Super lux, you feel fancy!

links_reviews_title: What a stunning jacket! Love this!
links_reviews_text: I paired this with a royal blue camisole and it was great for work. The sheen of the silver was beautiful. I am on a mission to look fabulous at work every day-Thanks, RTR!

Love how comfortable this boyfriend blazer was. I prefer to cuff my blazer sleeves and this one had a lovely silver lining to showcase. Definitely a statement piece, but so elegant and classy for work. Definitely recommend the column of black underneath for styling. I felt like a boss lady all day!

links_reviews_title: Fun blazer to mix things up
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Great way to mix up my work wardrobe. The fabric was fairly thick and luxe looking with a bit of shine but not too much for the office. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: If you are under 5'4", this may be a tad bit long
links_reviews_text: Pros: well-made and tailored. Great colors and style. Cons: it was a bit bulky in the hip area which could accentuate women with larger hips. Keep in mind that the jacket measures 25 inches from the shoulder. This could appear disproportionately long on some petite frames. Note: I am 5'4" tall, 32C bust, 29 inch waist and 37 inch hips.
This jacket fits true to size. The detail is very intricate and looks expensive. It can look a bit too glitzy as it's pretty shiny. I'm giving it five stars but it's probably closer to 4.5.

links_reviews_title: Love! Style without trying too hard!
links_reviews_text: Great fit! I wore it for a night out with white mock neck and black shorts, to work with button down shirt and black high waisted jeans, and to the nail salon with sweatpants and a tee! Highly recommend!
Wore to work with an RTR dress and loved it! Received so many compliments!

I really liked wearing this blazer on a Saturday night. It can be dressed up or down. The material is perfect as a stand-alone jacket on a cool spring night. It's very well constructed and fit perfectly. For me, since I'm long-waisted, I would have liked it to be just a tad bit shorter.
The photos don't do this piece justice. It is gorgeous. Rent it and you won't regret it. Works to dress up jeans or atop a little black dress.
Fit like a glove. The fabric and construction are unbelievably lux! Complements follow you when wearing this designer jacket.

Let me start by saying, I LOVE this blazer. The material is so high quality that I felt like freaking Lady Gaga when I wore it. I received so many compliments! My only compliant with this blazer is the sleeve length. I have extremely long gorilla arms so I never really expect a blazer to hit at the appropriate point on my wrist. However, this blazer barely hit past my forearm. To be able to wear the blazer without looking silly, I rolled the sleeves up. I wish the inner liner was a fun print so that the sleeves rolled up would be more fashionable but... not everything can be perfect!!

links_reviews_title: Cool material! The light catches it and has a silvery glow about it!
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty good, I kept it buttoned to give it more shape.

Fab blazer that fits well, structured, and makes a statement. Wearing this week a few different ways on biz travel and will wear agin next week for a conference where I'm speaking in New Orleans.. easy to transition for professional day to dinner and different enough that I feel like I'm mixing up my traditional style and still confident in front of customers

Gorgeous Pattern and fun. People loved this jacket. The blouse and bag are RTR too. My only criticism is that the material is stiff and the jacket is heavy. It's the type of material that can invite perspiration if one is prone to sweating.

I love the fabric of this jacket. I got so many compliments at work. It is a little longer than most jackets I wear (I'm pretty petite), but it looked great with a simple black sweater and slim black pants.

Sized up two sizes based on other reviews as I have a 34 DD/32E bust with a small high waist. Jacket is darted at waist and fit as though I had had it tailored perfectly to my body! Loved length of jacket that came down to mid- butt. If I had a smaller bust (maybe c cup or smaller) I would only have needed to size up one size. Material is gorgeous. Perfect for a night out to dinner. Easily can be dressed up or could be worn casual with jeans, white top and flats.
Fit well. Came in at waste a bit so not too boxy. Sleeves good length. Dressed up my usual black pants for a special occasion. I am a 5'7" 170 pds, usual size 12.
I got lots of compliments on this jacket. The fabric is beautiful and it is great quality. It was a little big and long, but still looked nice.
It fits well. I like the colors. It paired better than I thought with black pants. Not exactly my style though.

This blazer is a bit more shiny in person than in the pictures but still wearable to work. I loved the color and and balanced it with a black dress and tights. it is a great rental. The fit is snug without any give.
I wore this a few time. Love the royal blue against the grey.
Loved this jacket! It fit well in the arms and shoulders but I could not button up qhich was fine. Its thick and warm so after dancing dor a bit had to take it off.
I rented a small but it was a little big on me but still looked great!

links_reviews_title: I did not have an opportunity to wear this as I now work form home due to the virus
links_reviews_text: nice but very formal

I didn't like this as much in person as I thought I would, it looked a little bit like upholstery. But I received a lot of compliments and it was fun to wear for a day. The 36 probably would've been a better size for me, but it wasn't available. The 38 was fine, just more of a relaxed boyfriend look, and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The unique print made this jacket stand out! It had a worn in feel that fit like a glove.

links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and fit really well. I love this item because I was able to wear it casually with jeans and also to work.
Fit well and looked great; very polished.
Fit was a little tight across the back & had some pulling on the embroidery. Worn twice at work and received more compliments from clients then any other blazer.
Loved it

The blazer fit like a glove. the material is gorgeous and so well made. The back felt a bit tight when I put my arms out front, but that was fine because the blazer had a great overall fit. Looked best with jeans, had a hard time styling with work pants. I am petite and the sleeve of the 36 fell to the perfect spot on my wrist.

I wore this blazer to work and out around town. It was warm and comfortable. It snowed one of the days I wore it and I was comfortable with a jacket over. It has a very tailored fit and garnered many compliments.

Normally a 2 or small 4 for tops and blazers- this fit perfectly. Wore it with a cobalt blue shirt under and it really brought out the color in the jacket. It felt a little drab with all black for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect oversize blazer to pair with an all black outfit
links_reviews_text: size down!

This dress is a beautiful color and fits true to size. The style is boxy and a little loose. I would say this may favor apple or straight shapes? As a pear, I prefer dresses that accentuate the waist...so this was not as flattering for me.
A solid work top. Sleeves were long, but rolled up looked fine. It was a little low but manageable. I do like it tucked in with high waisted pants more than just hanging on its own. I'd rent again!

links_reviews_title: Incredible article of clothing-- considering buying!
links_reviews_text: I adore this shirt. I'm normally a medium but rented a large and think it helped create a nice silhouette. The pattern is on trend but muted enough to avoid being tacky, and the electric blue stitching is a really fun touch. I can see myself wearing this to tons of different events: so much so I'm considering buying it!
Front is a little funky and I wasn't that into this shirt when I first put it on. If you just leave as is and don't try to over engineer it, it ends up falling nicely

Great date or night out top, the blue stitching detail is nice and makes it unique. Fairly loose in the front, kept slipping down and showing my bra so I found myself adjusting it a lot throughout the night.
Fit was true to size if you have a larger bust! Probably could size down if you don't! Was very cute (and comfy!) for a night out.

I wore this top for a wig review on my YouTube channel. This top fits very true to size although it is cut a bit low I just used a small piece of fashion tape and it was perfect! I love the color and feel of the fabric!

This is hands down the best piece I've received since using R2R unlimited. I wore this for my boyfriends axe throwing birthday party and received compliments from random people all night. I will definitely be keeping this for a while if not buying it!
The drape and feel of this top are awesome. Did wear a leo underneath because of the loose fit. The neon blue stitching detail is very cool, keeps it modern. Would totally keep.
Love the top and the quality. The fit is a little funky in the center portion but if you just let it hang normally it looks alright!

Kind of rented on a whim because I couldn't find anything else I wanted in my size at the moment and ending up loving it! Beautiful drape and well thought out details! I normally do a small in tops because I have a larger bust but I went XS since R&B tends to run large. Xs fit perfect, could have done small for a a looser/cooler/drapier fit. Definitely wearing again.

links_reviews_title: Great for a large bust! Still slimming everywhere else
links_reviews_text: Love this! The fit is a bit large like most rag and bone, I went with large probably should have ordered a medium. Very flattering, great detail and quality. I did end up pinning it at the bust for a work meeting but it was discrete and still looked sexy but conservative enough for work. Rent this! Will rent again for sure

I did not realize the stitching would be blue (look closely at factory photo, you'll see it) but I like it. Also did not realize there would be a small ruffle detail on the belly. I am DD and there is room to spare. I really like it while standing in front of the mirror, but as the day goes on it moves and I'm constantly readjusting and tugging it down.

links_reviews_title: Incredible top! So unique and versatile
links_reviews_text: Fit so well.

Sorry I didn't get a good photo wearing the blouse. Great for a night out to dinner; low cut enough to show some skin but not too much. Fun animal print with the unexpected blue stitching. Top draped well in the front. Would rent again. Wore with dark denim and booties.
Maybe could've done xxs but still fit great. Wore it twice, with high rise jeans for a dinner party and with leggings to work.

I forgot to take a photo before sending it back but it was a great blouse! Very unique in the design, pattern and blue stitching and I received many compliments from my coworkers! I would definitely rent it again!
I liked the print on this top,however when I went to wear it it didn't look good on me. You see the way it gathers in the front it's not flattering at all.
Fun top, but if wearing, be cautious that it drapes low and depending on how you wear tops, you made need a camisole or underneath shirt for safety. Otherwise, great shirt.

This was dressier than I expected it to be. Thought I'd be able to roll up the sleeves and wear it with jean or black shorts, but the material and draping are more suited for office wear. They sleeves also button at the wrist and don't seem to be meant to unbutton. The draping was sophisticated but not stuffy thanks to the v-neck. Great work top.

I LOVE this top; I love the blue stitching, the print, and the front folds. It is a bit loose so I recommend going down a size. The front can be a bit revealing so I did have to adjust my top every now and then.

I'm 5'3" and 105lbs, 32A. This doesn't look good on petite women. It's boxy and awkward length, and the sleeves are too long. The pattern is not cute in person. Wanted to love but felt like I was borrowing from a teachers closet.
Great fit and easy to pair with Jeans and Dark Pants.
This shirt is so unique and cute, I love the blue stitching and the cheetah combo. It does have a lower cut, so I couldn't wear it to work, but it's perfect for a night out or events outside of work.
In the pictures, this shirt looks stiffer than it is. It's a light, flowy material and looks really pretty on. It also has some blue stitching that adds a subtle pop of color. Really beautiful shirt.
Shirt is green with green print and blue thread. Asymmetrical fit and low cut didn't work for me. Fits TTS.
Perfect for work. Loved the print and the fabric. Light weight, fit was perfect.
Paired with white slim fit slacks and red pointy pumps. Very chic. Fits true to size and perfect for large busted women.

I put this on a couple of days ago to wear to work and boy does this gape. I have a medium, my usual size, and there is not way on earth that I could wear this either without a safety pin or cami. I couldn't find a safety pin so I just pulled it off. It would be cute, but the cut is odd. I was just going to return it, but think I'll wear it with a cami this week.
Loose fit, needs a cami or a pin as the front opens very easily. Very elegant!

links_reviews_title: It was a great shirt. I received many compliments on it. It paired great with the leather cape.
links_reviews_text: Very loose around the mid section. The pleating in the front protruded making it appear that I had a belly. But overall style and print with the contrast stitching was gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Can't get enough of this shirt!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this shirt, love the pattern and the style. Have received so many compliments wearing it. My only complaint is that it is a bit low cut and tends to shift to be too revealing but I added some fashion tape and that easily fixed it.
I wanted this to work so badly but the fit was off. This isn't the shirt for anyone with a large bust. It kinda puffs out away from the body instead of laying flat in the front.

links_reviews_title: Fun top with just enough of a sexy low cut to make it great for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Solid cut, fun pattern and easy to style with skinny jeans.
I didn't care for the royal blue stitching on it... the top is okay but I didn't like it enough to wear it this month. Fits a larger bust.
Nice and unusual but needs tape to stay in place

I received a lot of compliments on this shirt. The pattern and color is nice. Fit is different but pretty flattering. I liked the blue stitching a lot but it is very subtle and not sure if anyone else noticed it.

links_reviews_title: I loved it. Wore it to the art museum for a Christian Dior Exhibit.
links_reviews_text: It fit beautifully. Flowing fabric and nice cut. I would wear it again.
Top is big, Lower cut than I thought. Had to wear camisole underneath. Still cute pattern.
large in chest
The reviews warned about small fit, revealing front, but I was curious. Fabric and print were lovely. If you are slim, maybe you can pull off wearing this piece.
Loved this dress! Paired with grey tights and booties for January. Fit perfectly.
I'm in love!!!!
I felt so good in this dress! Loved the color and the fit. Would definitely rent again in the summertime.

Perhaps it's the color combined with somewhat thick fabric, but this felt like a bridesmaid dress. Fit is okay, does show undergarment lines even though the dress wasn't tight, so I wore a slip. Also a little voluminous in the bust area. Don't think I will wear it more than once.
Currently 5 months pregnant. It had perfect stretch. You can wear a bra with it and the material was very sturdy. The sleeves were way cute too.
Thick material, well made. Wore to work and then out after.

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments on this dress! One size up would've been perfect, but overall great!
links_reviews_text: I received SO many compliments on this dress! Very versatile and comfortable. I loved the fabrice. One size up would've been perfect, but overall great!

I felt like a gogo girl in this dress - I don't usually wear above the knee dresses. I got a ton of compliments on the color and the dress in general. More than one woman my age (late 40s) told me I looked "bombshell." I'll take it!
Amazing color, high quality, flattering fabric, and a cute tulip hem made this a must rent!
The sleeves on this dress were great and super flattering. It's a well shaped dress but the fabric has a little stretch to make it comfortable. So flattering!

links_reviews_title: Nice color, not too short for work
links_reviews_text: I needed spanks for it

Fabric was a beautiful medium weight and lovely color. Wore to my daughter's baptism, 3 months postpartum. Both sizes fit but went with the larger size as it was more flattering in the stomach and hips. The top was a little loose but not baggy and the elastic around the sleeve helped keep them from falling all day. Overall a beautiful dress!
The fit was true to size and the fabric was giving yet not too tight for work. Great color and perfect for a spring day. I will rent this one again!
Too big up top. Too tight in the middle. You could see the seams of my tights. Good color. Cute sleeves but I felt uncomfortable. His in my office most of the day.
A tad short in the torso for me (I'm 5'10) but not unwearable! Overall great color and the puffy sleeves are cool without being overwhelming.

This dress is beautiful and vibrant. Great for spring. The fabric is thick, but unforgiving. Shows every bit of jiggle in the tummy and either a toned stomach, pantyhose, or Spanx are a must. I sized up from my normal 6 to an 8, and I probably still should have gone up another size or two. Got tons of compliments, though!
Lots of compliments on this beautiful color! Great for a spring event or luncheon
Cute and flattering. The material is thick which was perfect for the cold weather. The soft lavender color stands out because of its unique shade. I loved this dress

The fabric was nice and thick. Color was beautiful and vibrant for the church occasion. Style of the sleeves were a nice touch. However, my lacy underwear's texture was visible and there is no tummy control.

Pros: amazing color, great fabric, really pretty skirt - though wrinkled, they fell out on their own after being hung, i got lots of compliments. Length is work appropriate (I'm 5'8, business formal environment). Fun sleeves! Cons: not my style, runs a bit large. I'm traditionally a 2, but the waist was loose on me. Would be good for shorter waisted people (see pic on me, it hits high). Sleeves weren't for me so I added a black blazer and loved the look.

Spite wore this dress to work and it was just okay. The dress, color, and shape are very cute overall but it has a very unforgiving fabric/fit across the stomach and hip area. Even though the dress fit fine and even had some room you could still see the seam of my tights through the fabric and it accentuated my midriff in an undesirable way.
Great dress but it definitely runs small if youre curvy in the hip area. Size up 1 size!

Beautiful color but the sleeves are hideous and the sizing runs two sizes small. I wear Shoshana dresses regularly and am always good by sizing up one size and this dress was too clingy to be flattering.

This was a well-made dress, but does nothing for you if you have a petite frame. With the longer length and bubble arms, it can easily look like the dress is wearing you instead of the other way around.
Love the color, very spring though
Looked great and was very comfortable! Perfect for work.
I will try this dress again in a larger size- beautiful color.

I got this dress to wear to work but unfortunately it was too short because I have a long torso so I wore it to dinner instead. It was a thicker material though so I thought it was a beautiful summer color but probably better when it's a little cooler
beautiful color, thicker fabric than i anticipated for summer wear.
Compliments all day long. The color really pops so get ready to stand out. Definitely will rent again!
I rented this for a fancy dinner-- loved it! The sleeves are a little much but it was fine for one night-- the color is beautiful and it's a very conservative dress. loved!
Super cute dress with the puff sleeves. The material is a thicker material. Length is also perfect for work.

I am obsessed with Shoshanna dresses and how they fit me, but this one was a little off. It was tighter on me than most of her dresses, so definitely needed spanx. And the waist just didn't hit me right (5'6" and a little short waisted) whereas all of her other dresses seem to fit me perfectly. The color is beautiful though! So even though I don't think it was super flattering on me, I did get lots of compliments.
Wasn't able to wear, as it runs small. It fit, but you can see my bra and panty lines, which is not appropriate for work. I'll try again, as the color is beautiful!
Loved the color, the fit was true to size. If you have a pooch stomach it will likely show without spanks. Received lots of compliments when I wore to work
Just perfect

links_reviews_title: Too tight to be appropriate for a work event
links_reviews_text: I rented hoping to wear for a work event and the bottom half was just too tight to be appropriate. Even my no-show undergarments were visible. The top half fit well. I am 5'10", 145lb and straight and narrow build.
Fits beautifully. Thick fabric. Lovely for spring.
It was too frumpy and I did not wear it.

When first trying on this shirt I was a big fan of the cut and style. I wore it for a drink before dinner and ended up changing before we went to dinner for a few reason. First it is very low cut. I am very flat chested so it didn't bother me when I first put it on but I couldn't stop fidgeting with it. The other reason was that the top wraps so there is a button inside and then you wrap the other side over. After wearing for a little while the inside wrap was too tight and uncomfortable for me

Runs a bit small; only issue was it is extremely low cut and needs either a tank under it or a pink to keep it closed so that your entire chest doesnt hang out. But overall very cute and I enjoyed wearing it

The shirt fit well! It's a fun cropped blouse that is good for daytime or evening wear. It was a bit shorter and low-cut than I usually wear, but it wasn't too revealing or inappropriate. It was a bit too low cut to wear with my regular bra, so I wore it with a deep-v bralette. The shirt needs a few safety pins to stay together but is cute and very flattering. If you are tall or have a longer torso, be aware the shirt requires high waisted jeans or showing off your lower stomach!
This is such a sexy top! I wore it along going out with friends and to work with a cami under it and received a TON of compliments. Don't want to send it back!
I love this. It's such a light, gauzy material. It runs VERY small so I went up 2 sizes. I also had to pin the neckline to keep it work-appropriate. I want to keep it!!

links_reviews_title: Very cute and wearable, sized up to a 6 so it wouldnt be too cropped for work.
links_reviews_text: Easy fit, high quality material. Light, but lays well. the neckline is a bit deep. I used a bit of garment tape to keep it closed at work. But I also have a small chest, so not much of a risk. I sized up to the 6 so it fit a little more flowy for work, and slightly less cropped. I love this style of shirt that nips in at the waist, very flattering.
Size up 2 x if your chest is larger. Even if you don't have a large chest, make sure you have a safety pin to keep the top closed

links_reviews_title: Too low cut for my small torso. Needed a safety pin to cover my bra.
links_reviews_text: Cute but too low cut.

Love this top! Rented for work and found it to ver super versatile. I sized up so that it wouldn't be form fitting and am glad that I did - looks great a little looser. I had to pin the front so that it didn't reveal too much but not a big deal!

I loveeed this top! I see a lot of other reviews say its small, but I found it to be very true to size. This top was perfect for any occasion or for everyday wear. I literally loved everything about the fit, the fit and the pattern. I did have to safety pin the top so that it wasnt so open, but i believe there is suppose to be a button there.

I wore this to my friends bday party with high waisted jeans, it's flattering and sexy but also very classy with the cap sleeves and floral pattern. I got a lot of compliments all night and felt great!
It's a little short so looks best with high waisted jeans.
Much lower cut than expected!

links_reviews_title: I unfortunately did not wear it because it was too large.
links_reviews_text: Was too large, but a size smaller would have been perfect. Really sexy V in the front.
super short, and I don't have a long torso. also very low cut - not good for busty women

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little low cut for work
links_reviews_text: Liked it but had to wear another shirt udnerneath because my boobs kept popping out!
fits perfect and flattering

links_reviews_title: Cute top, received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Runs small so I'm glad I got a larger size. V is a bit deeper than expected so I had to pin the chest area for the office.

links_reviews_title: Brand runs small so I knew what size to get
links_reviews_text: The brand runs small. I'm normally a XS 0/2 and I ordered a size 4 in this. It fit perfectly but is low cut and I had to use a pin to attach it at the top so I could wear it to work without my bra hanging out! Cute and flattering overall though
I wore this top once and felt like I was fussing with it the whole time - don't mine low cut but ran slightly large so size down

I loved this black and white floral top with a peplum bottom. I thought the sizing was true to size but running on the smaller side. The armpit area felt a little tight for me. The Vneck is a little deep, so if you're bustier, you may want to size up.

Loved this top. Wore it a few times over the weekend. I got a size 4 which fit, but it was snug around the ribs/waist. It's also low cut and kinda cropped so I couldn't wear it to work, which was my original intention.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but is more low cut than photos show...
links_reviews_text: This top is cute and springy, looks great with jeans. However, I wore it to work (we're casual at my office) and it was too low cut...my cleavage and bra kept popping out every time I sat down. I had to tape it, but all day it kept popping open. If I wore this on a weekend or a night out, I wouldn't have minded as much. Might want to wear a tank underneath or safety pin it.
The v-neck is deeper than it looks on the model!

links_reviews_title: I wear a 4/6 in tops and this was a 6. The buttons on the wrap fit but the v neck was way too wide
links_reviews_text: Didn't have enough coverage across chest

links_reviews_title: super cute, but very low cut
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear this without fashion tape....it's really cute but I kept having to fix the front so I wasn't flashing anyone. Ended up not wearing it

links_reviews_title: Really nice top but didn't work in the end
links_reviews_text: Quality of the top is great and overall I really loved it the style and pattern. I would say it runs a touch small where the wrap part buttons at the waist. Unfortunately, I couldn't wear it because it was way too low-cut for work and I was looking for a nice blouse I could wear at the office. Would be cute for a fun night out or if you like wearing camis underneath your tops!
Perfect, soft great colors. Too expensive for me to buy:( you won't be disappointed. Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Comfy cute sweater for everyday wear. Love the colors
links_reviews_text: Soft and comfortable. I like the way it fit and felt. Not too heavy either.
But still comfy and warm. Fine for Friday at work.
Such a soft well fitting sweater, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Too small, more like a cropped sweater with strange fit
Had to send back because it still had scent of body and perfume of previous wearer!
links_reviews_text: Warm and pretty, easy to wear with jeans. Maybe perfume should not be allowed to be sprayed directly on the clothing?

links_reviews_title: Fun casual sweater, but a little short
links_reviews_text: I really liked the colors in this sweater. It was warm and comfortable. It was a little on the short side and tended to ride up throughout the day. It was also a little baggier than I expected- I sized down and it was still pretty roomy.
Nothing special, not particularly flattering
True to size. The weave is fairly loose so you will need to wear a undershirt

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on this sweater.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful yarn, nice pattern and fit.
Love the colors especially for fall. Would definitely rent again.
Beautiful color, hit perfect length and was comfortable. Loved it.
A classic cozy sweater. Super soft.

Thinner material than expected, but very comfy. Twist in front adds just enough detail to give it shape. More of a dusty pink color. Perfect to throw on for the weekend and could be dressed up or down easily

I wore this two days in a row I loved it so much - I dressed it up for a business meeting and down for a party. Nice and stretchy, it was great for my current size at 26 weeks. I'm 5'8" and 155lbs. My pre-pregnancy size was typically a small or size 4. Lots of compliments

SM fit great on me. Wore this to a wine weekend event and felt very classy, yet still casual. I'm almost 5'5 and was perhaps a bit longer than I expected but still liked where it hit below the knee. It's form fitting but not overly tight. Knot is a cute detail that gives some interest! Would recommend!
Love that I can wear this dress in the winter with a jacket and booties but transition it so easily to the spring/summer! The length is perfect for tall girls! Super comfy. Bought this!!

links_reviews_title: Looks way better on than on the hanger. Hits below the knee. Thin-ish fabric.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks terrible on the hanger but pretty great on your body! I'm a size 6 and the M hugged my curves. I liked the length for work- I guess it's a midi because it hits below the knee. I wore with light brown booties. Not my favorite dress, but comfortable for a Texas December day- High 73 / Low 56. You could probably wear on an even warmer day because the fabric is pretty thin.
The fabric is very soft and comfortable! But then the rib fabric makes it body forming, and the fabric tie under the bust highlights the waist. Wore to a concert in fall -- A must rent!

This dress is actually pretty cute and is an interesting length. I'm 5'6" and you can see that it's actually pretty long on me. It's hard to tell whether it's totally plain or just quickly enough to be interesting. Definitely need line free undies to wear with it.
Cute dress, comfy and casual. Felt very relaxed in it!
I rented this both before I was pregnant and when I was 7 months pregnant. I sized up to a large for pregnancy. Was super cute and comfy. Would rent again for everyday use.

links_reviews_title: I sized up and it didn't fit
links_reviews_text: This is true to size and stretchy so there is no reason to size up. I'm typically a 4 sometimes a 6 depending on the cut so I got a medium. It was way too big. It was also a little smelly so I'm not sure if it was throughly cleaned....returned without wearing.
Very comfortable.... the neckline was a bit snug but overall liked the dress. Can be worn with sneakers or sandals. Fit at midi length

links_reviews_title: Does not fit well for pregnant women
links_reviews_text: I can see this dress looking good on a non-pregnant woman but with a bump it emphasizes all the wrong places.

links_reviews_title: This might be the most flattering dress Ive ever worn. I dont know if I can return it.
links_reviews_text: Flattering, comfortable, easy to dress up or down, beautiful color.

Stretchy, light fabric made this really comfortable to wear all day. However, it was hard to pick a bra that worked with the plain, high crew-neck top half of the dress (sports bra seemed to work ok), and the way the neckline was cut made it hard to style on top.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, no give, but would rent again
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a friend's brunch party and it fit in well. The fabric wasn't stretchy so try to find the best fit, and don't order small. I ordered up as it runs small (I trending with large/10 sizes.) The length was right below my knees and I'm tall. I liked the length but could be long on a shorter person, pending the look you're going for. I loved the detail on the front that showed a wrap, but wasn't really a wrap.
Runs small. Really right around the neck. Would have been better off with the medium but then would have probably been too long.

links_reviews_title: Live the color and the dots! So comfy!
links_reviews_text: Super cute, loose fitting so you can eat and drink as much as you want. I felt very put together in a grown up way in this dress

links_reviews_title: Wore for cousin's baptism! Perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Super comfy and cute! Runs a little big, but still looked great!
I love this dress so much I want to buy it! Sooooo cute. Fits in all the right places and super comfy! Runs large. I normally wear a small and had plenty of room in the XS.

I wore this dress to a work event and it did not disappoint. Flattering, appropriate, long enough - serving up major vintage 70s/80s vibes. Got compliments all night! I do agree the top part is a bit large, but all you have to do is wrap it really tight and it's not a problem. Great rental!

My preferred size was not available and I ended up with a size, maybe even two, up. The style was forgiving and imagine a range between medium- xlarge would all work. I was worried it would be frumpy, but found it to read casual cute instead.

This dress was perfect for a wine tasting event we attended in Sonoma. It's a wrap style, so it's nice to be able to cinch as tight or loose as you want. It's a little low cut especially for someone with a larger chest but I didn't mind and I feel like this picture doesn't so it justice - the color is awesome and I felt really comfortable all day. I loved the sleeves as well. Totally recommend!

Loved wearing this dress for a casual work environment. The fit runs a little oversized but the waist cinching still flatters. Very high quality material and not too hot in the Texas heat. I probably could have done a small but the medium didn't look too big.

Loved renting this! Just Female is one of my favorite brands, and I am thrilled RTR carries it. This dress is a winner. It's a little longer on me (I'm 5'7) but I wore flats with it just fine. Love the fabric, very soft. The cleavage area could get a little revealing but my boobs are fairly small so it wasn't an issue. Waist has some stretch to it thankfully as well. Would definitely rent again!
I really loved this dress. Super flattering and comfortable. I could throw this on, go to work or lunch and look like I really put together with little to no effort. Would definitely rent again.

This dress is super comfy, well made, and so cute. The fit was perfect, even with my large chest. The wraparound waist is flattering while the shape of the dress is comfy and flowy. I wish I could wear this out somewhere. But I felt great wearing it around the house.
The top on this is very blousy. I liked it quite a bit, but I only liked it with heels. In flats it felt too slouchy / sloppy. With wedges it was perfect. Love the polka dots. Fabric felt nice

I wore this with a jacket because of how baggy it was in the chest and waist areas. I couldn't figure out how to tie it to make it look like the pictures. I think it would have fit better if i would have sized down

links_reviews_title: wore for thanksgiving, feminine and flattering fit, very comfortable. runs large.
links_reviews_text: cute polka dots, flattering fit, forgiving fit, can dress up or down...would buy if I could!
Wore to a baby shower and got compliments. Love the fit and look.

I'm in between a M and a L and I think I could've sized down to the M (it was a little roomy up top), but I paired it with a long sweater and it looked fine. A great dress to wear with tights and boots.
Cute dress, got lots of compliments but it was a little big. Had to wear a plain tank underneath.
Comfy dress and perfect for beach or water activities. Run large and fit big on the tops. Need to wear a cami underneath.

I LOVED this dress. I got a ton of compliments and it felt great. I have a larger chest, but it was still a little big. I am 5'4 and it hit almost to the floor. I think if I rent again, I will size down. I definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and was great for dancing. Would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: The only con is that I was a little confused on how to tie it until I realized that the tie was supposed to run through the dress. Everything else was great!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color - appropriate for work to an evening out!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable - would suggest a tank top or pretty bralette underneath if bustier.

Perfect for an afternoon tea. Dress runs big. I could have worn the extra small. I'm wear a 6 and I was swimming in it. The fabric is much thicker than I expected, which would be great for a fall afternoon. But in Southern California heat wave of 95, I was sweating. Dress didn't show any cleavage. Which was great when you are having tea with your mother and her friends. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: It's gorgeous, has pockets and us comfortable
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments! I would buy but it is too expensive. Great piece to wear between work and Mom-ing before and after work.
Didn't wear it
Didn't wear this because it was too big, but loved color and design - will rent again in a smaller size.
Definitely runs a bit short (I'm 5'7), but with some sheer tights, it looked super sleek and professional for a panel event I went to! I personally thought it was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly, great material, looks very classy!
links_reviews_text: This is a very flattering dress, the material is really well made and thick enough to hold its shape. I'm a bit shorter so this sits right above my knees, which makes it a perfect work dress. This can easily be worn to a fancy dinner with a pair of heels. The only downside is the neck hole isn't very big, so after a day of wearing this your neck feels a bit constrained.

The dress is pretty, but really didn't work for my body type. I have a slender neck, but the dress was uncomfortably tight around my neck. It would also probably fit a straight/narrow body type best, as I have hips and a butt and it was far too clingy around that area to be appropriate (or flattering) for any type of work or formal event. The longs were also WAY too long for my 5' 4" frame. For reference, I'm 165 lbs and a true hourglass figure. Sent it back unworn.

Loved the dress, fit well.. except it was so short. I am 5'8" and I rented this for a social work dinner.
