I ended up really liking them with a French tucked drapey blouse for work (to cover up any underwear lines, but fabric is very thick), and they can be "dressed down" with a crop top and platforms . I'm between a 2 and 4, and wore the 2, which was perfect since they're so structured. My waist is very small compared to my booty, so they worked for my body type, which doesn't happen very often.
They are TTS but the crotch area seems long. Definitely relaxed a bit more throughout the day.

it runs large (I'm usually a 0 have to pull it up a bit throughout the day..) but I love the style! It's supposed to be cropped but it's regular length on me, heavier material than expected, really nice weigh to it. Since it's boxy I wouldn't wear it with loose tops and make sure to tuck (or half tuck) your top. Might seriously get this in stores!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pants but hard to style
links_reviews_text: These slacks were really beautiful, but the styling of them made them really hard to wear. The fabric is thick - probably not something you'd want in the summer. I normally wear an 8, but I needed for an event and they were only available in a 10 which fit me fine, so I would say they probably run a bit small. I loved the pockets, the length and the slit at the bottom, but the issue was that they were boxy, so you really needed to tuck in a shirt, but they were SO high waisted (right below my ribs) that it would not have looked right to tuck anything in. The high waist made it impossible to even do a side tuck. I did wear them, but I don't feel like they were very flattering.

The length, color, material and slits were all great. I really wanted to wear these, but the crotch and tummy area were just too loose unless I rolled over the waistband. Wanted to wear with a cropped sweater so wouldn't be able to hide the bunched material.

These pants are such high quality. Not see through and hit at the perfect spot for petites. I'm sure they would make a super cute crop too if you are a little taller. Would definitely rent again/consider buying.
Fit wasn't the best but they look dressy casual and the weight of the fabric makes pairing them with a simple black t-shirt a dress up look.

RTR generated a larger recommendation for the size and I should have stuck to ordering my usual size in these pants. The quality is lovely, they hang well and I loved the high waist and forgiving material. I will rent again and hopefully they will fit well.

I really liked these. They are a super thick fabric so they are really flattering for white pants. The fit was a little off for me but didn't stop me from wearing them. I'm usually a 10 waist but tend to have to size up to a 12 to get my thighs to fit. Here I had plenty of room and could have sized down to the 10. The lower stomach area seemed really big but the waist was TTS.

links_reviews_title: Wore with matching vest loved it
links_reviews_text: This was a great pant. It was a little tight around the stomach/butt, but I got a size down from normal. With the vest over it, it worked fine. I loved the look. the fabric is very heavy, so keeps a drape and just looks very high end. Husband loved the way I looked.

links_reviews_title: These pants looked great although the pair I received was a little worn out.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfortable to move in, slightly heavy fabric for summer.

links_reviews_title: Great pants if you are tall! Size down!
links_reviews_text: I am between a 4 and a 6 and should have listened to the majority of the reviewers who said to size down. I was afraid, though, because these pants are white. Turns out, they run large and the fabric is thick and structured and I did not find that they were see-through at all. I easily could have worn the 4 and they would have looked SO much better. I wore the 6, but had to cover the top because they were so loose they almost looked clownish. Still got compliments on the overall look, though. Loved the slits at the hem. Very cool length and details.
I went a size down and they were still pretty large. Unfortunately the fit is unflattering in the hips/mid section. Might be okay if worn with long top because the color is nice and a thick material

links_reviews_title: Loved but much too big!! Size down!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved these pants but they were much too big on me and I couldn't wear them. I will definitely try them again in a smaller size.
too tight around waist
Looked great on app. Color was off white, not pretty. Material was very heavy and fit was cumbersome. Not a win at all , ended up not wearing

links_reviews_title: Too big not true to size
links_reviews_text: Too big not true to size

links_reviews_title: These were so lux. I loved the weight of the fabric!
links_reviews_text: They were a bit too roomy and I felt like because of that they were not super flattering.
Well made pants, but I'm usually a size 2 in dress pants and these were falling off my waist. Not sure a size 0 would have even worked

links_reviews_title: I chose not to wear these...
links_reviews_text: These ran a bit large and were ever so slightly sheer. Beautiful cut!
Great pants but runs way too small!
Cute design but way too big. Not a true zero and definitely not for my fellow petite ladies!
Loved this sweater. It was not itchy at all and went well with a RTR corduroy skirt. Would highly recommend, even possibly buy.
Cute sweater with a feminine touch that is different than any other sweater I have ever worn. Really cozy, not itchy at all. Great for work or everyday.
Loved this fresh and funky sweater. The detail was so pretty. The length was more a midriff sweater, so it was a little short on my torso. But it was a fun wear for the day
Slightly boxy fit. FYI, ruffles are navy in the light (not black). Cotton material so not too hot which is good.
I wore this down to the shore in February and it was really warm and cozy and super cute

links_reviews_title: Unique sweater, perfect for chilly spring day!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this sweater! It's soft and only a bit scratchy around the neck. If you have a long torso/large boobs I'd size up, it seems very short. I wore with high waisted jeans and that worked out perfectly. The detailing is really cute and I got so many compliments! I would definitely wear again!

I liked this sweater. It's not itchy at all and not too heavy, with delicate details that make it stand out. The fit was a little unflattering - it's very short and wide. I probably would have bought it if it had a few extra inches.
The details are so cute, and I'd overlooked them in the photos. It may be a bit delicate for everyday wear, but I love it. May buy this one...

Loved this sweater, beautiful details! Not itchy at all and appreciated the looser turtleneck. I could have gotten away just wearing a nude bra underneath but wore a camisole bc when I lifted my arms up it exposed my belly and back.
Super cute decoration down the front. The material is soft and comfortable and kept me warm in really cold weather. It's a little short so I wore a tank top underneath. Would definitely wear again!
True to size. Very cozy and warm. Looks high end/regal.
Boring - shapeless- I think this had been washed and dried at somebody's home. It was stretched out and really shapeless. I only wore it once. Definitely not worth the money to rent.
Great every day addition. Won't need to rent again - this one is a keeper.
Can wear with anything. Perfect for a fall day.
Because I have a larger chest it hung a little boxy, but I liked the way that looked with skinny jeans. The embellishments are navy, not black as I thought, but I liked that as well!
Easy to wear. Not too small. Not too big. Not too heavy.
Like sweater- but collar is very wide/ too big not a true turtle neck
I loved how this was a pretty casual sweater with cute details down the front! I felt like I could both dress it up and down depending on the occasion.
It was okayyy. Nothing super fancy or special. It hit a little short for me just at the waist and I like my sweaters a little longer. Cute for vaca but won't rent again.
cute for everyday nice as it is kind short so pretty flattering
Comfortable, has nice openwork. Good for work with a skirt.

The top has ruffles which are navy not black, figured it when I was in the sun wearing it with black trousers and shoes. The fit is slightly boxy as commented before however, the style was different. It was simple but elegant.

links_reviews_title: It's a cute sweater, nothing amazing but cute.
links_reviews_text: Casual, comfy, nice with jeans and long black boots.
it was a little short for me, but the arms were the perfect length - weird fit for a high waisted gal.
Did not love this sweater and didn't wear it. True to size, but short in length. Not that cute.
Soft, lightweight sweater with cute details, but it was short and boxy, and not super flattering.
Runs a little large I wear 14/16 and this felt loose. I would go down a size.
The cut is higher, right around the waist and the fit is a little boxy. It felt like a fit from the 60's. It grew on me throughout the day, but I don't think I'd rent it again.
The fit is loose. Sweater a little short. I wore it with high waisted jeans
This sweater fit loose, but it wasn't oversized by any means. I wore it tucked into my pants and it wasn't too bulky. I loved the subtle details in the arms as well as the front.

links_reviews_title: A turtleneck you can breathe in
links_reviews_text: Really loved this piece. I felt like it was a tad wide, but not wide enough to mark it as running big.
Cute sweater, a little short, worked great over a black dress with boots.
Really cute with a mini skirt tights and booties. The tassels are navy but I wore it with black and it looked fine!
This fit perfectly (I got a large so it would be a bit oversized). It was so comfortable and I got so many compliments!
The detailing is navy, not black. The body of the sweater is wide (not form fitting) and the sleeves ran short.
This sweater was way too short for my taller frame. It was also boxy and unflattering. Sadly returned without wearing.
This sweater is soft, light and pretty! I loved wearing it.
It fit fine through the top but is weirdly short not cropped just short and I even have a short waist so you would be best if you are very petite for this one

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: I signed up for RTR to avoid shipping but I loved this dress so much I bought it. Everyone at work convinced me I needed to own it. I'm usually a M and it fit true to size. Super comfortable and loved the print.

Holy moly This dress is short! I'm 5'9" and while I do know my legs are a touch longer than my torso, this number was 4 inches from my crotch. The material itself is extremely soft and very comfortable, but like others have said, the zipper does not lay flat on your back and it creates lots of bumps in the silhouette running from your neck to the bottom of the dress.
Great work dress that could be styled for any season. The fit was true to size but is relatively short which is nice for someone who is short!
Nice stretchy material. A little tight on my bust, but not unflattering. I'll probably where spanks with because It is form fitting. Hangs well and is cute and appropriate for an office setting.
Maybe should have gotten the small. I thought it was a black dress so wasn't sure what color tights to wear!!! Went with a dark gray! Would consider buying!!!
It's definitely short so paired with tights and flat boots for work. Comfortable material. Only complaint is that the zipper is rippled.
I love this dress so much. Fits perfectly--TTS--and not too short for my conservative office. The windowpane detail is so cute.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Casual Office Holiday Party!
links_reviews_text: It's comfortable, warm (northeast winter), and has an elegant silhouette. I have a curvy backside and it minimized while still showing my figure. The material has some stretch to it as well. To dress it up I just threw on a sparkly necklace and over the knee high heeled boots. In love with this dress.

I was so excited to get this dress. When I put it on, I found that the fabric around the zipper gathered and made it look like I had bumps doing down my back. It's also very short (not something I expected to write since I'm 5'3")! Super disappointing!!!

This dress is incredibly cute which you can dress up or down. I paired with tall black leather boots and a belt. It's a little longer than it seems in photos but overall quite quality dress. A pretty thick material
Fun, easy, and comfortable. About to buy this dress and keep it!
Really great work dress. Comfortable and looks good under a blazer or on its own. Would definitely rent again.

I had doubts about this dress, but ultimately quite liked it. It was soft and had a conservative cut, and was comfy for work. I didn't realize until after it had shipped that it had the square patterns on it, making it more than a black dress. The waist and skirt hang low, which I don't normally like, but on this it works!
Flattering and great wrinkle proof material.

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric, fit true to size.
links_reviews_text: Actually a plaid, thought it was black but I liked the latter . I did not personally like the neckline, it was like a mock turtleneck but lower.

Fabric is comfortable and soft on this shift. Looks great for Fall with tights, boots and a long necklace. (See photo). Would have like to try a small just to see, but I like that the waist was tailored, and not straight. Approval from co-workers, and Willis the Weather Dog! Looked good for on camera work as meteorologist (essentially full length).

This dress is such nice material. Very comfortable and forgiving. I really liked it a lot for work. I did not wear it because I thought it made me look top heavy. It didn't fall in the right place for me with a short torso. Definitely made for someone taller.
Great basic Theory dress that was both cute and comfortable. Material is soft but thick. Overall fit is true to size but the cut is forgiving. I'll probably rent this one again!
True to size, comfortable fit, stretchy fabric
Rented this to wear with stockings to work but this was way to short..size up! Otherwise cute dress though.
I couldn't wear this. Rented for work and it didn't even cover my butt. The size was fine in the body, material was nice and I liked the print, but this was a shirt not a dress.
A good work staple but beware, it is short!

links_reviews_title: The fit was perfect ,color and looked elegant.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect ,color and looked elegant. thinking of buying this dress was so in love.
This dress is SO cute but a little short. I paired with opaque tights for work, but wore it for a weekend event without.

Lots of compliments on this. I wore it for work and it was definitely on the short side. Wouldn't recommend for a conservative office but it's not terrible if you work in a slightly more casual setting. Super comfy too.
Too short for my more conservative office

I really liked this dress, but it's shorter than I was expecting. I'm 5'5" and it was mid-thigh on me, so if you're any taller than that I'd definitely beware. Having said that, the dress was still work appropriate with some low block-heeled shoes and a cardigan. Also cute, flattering and comfortable.
Too bad, it's a cute dress and fits well but is too short for a professional office.
Made chest look flat because of the top. Wasn't cute.

links_reviews_title: Way too short for work settings
links_reviews_text: Dress was way too short

I may not have read the fine print, but this dress is a stretch ponte. I typically wear a 6/petite and the medium was a bit loose...but that made it more professional. A nice every day basic. Wore with nude suede pointed-toe flats and pearl earrings.

links_reviews_title: Way too short for work, very whatever for day to day wear
links_reviews_text: Got this for work and it was way too short. I'm 5'4 and it hit a little above mid thigh. Otherwise, it's fine for day to day wear but nothing special or great. I would pass
Short dress, but I am short so it fit! Would be very short for tall women.
Slimming dress I loved wearing it to work
I rented this dress to wear to work (dress code is business casual) and it was way too short. The skirt hits in the middle of my thigh and I am not a tall person. I ended up not wearing this at all.
Great work dress. Only complaint was hen had cone loose in a spot that would have been noticeable, so I had to sew it together to wear! After that it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Dress is really flattering and fits well. It was a little bit short for my taste for work.
links_reviews_text: Dress is really flattering and fits well. It was a little bit short for my taste for work, but I am tall (5'8). Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Soft fabric.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but too short for my work.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very cute, but it was too short for my office. Could be worn with tights and been accepted.
I want to buy this! It fit perfect! I had to iron the seams bc there is a slight ruffle and it was a little deflated but no big deal to me! I want to buy this piece!

Stunning lace in a beautiful blush color. This was absolutely perfect with jeans for a fun top to wear on vacation. The small fit perfectly at 13 weeks pregnant--the style was perfect to conceal the beginnings of a little bump. I would definitely rent this again!
The small fit perfect. TTS. It is worn a bit- so I took off one star. Still in good shape and cute!!
Loved this Kate spade lace shirt it is a bit boxy but I love the color it's perfect for work and you can dress it up or dress it down! I've rented the black one also!
Love this top. Gorgeous.
Great lace detail and not itchy! The nude color is very flattering and the shirt photographed well. It was a little roomy; I probably could have sized down for a tighter look in the arms.
I got so many compliments on this top. Wore it three different times! I normally wear a LARGE, but chose a MEDIUM, and it fit great. Still was very billowy, but flattering.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a small but with other reviewers input I went down a size and glad I did. It's funny because I almost didn't wear it because it felt very frumpy on and big/bulky. I'm so glad I ended up wearing it because I received so many compliments on how pretty and feminine it was. It's also a dull pink but it did look great on and is fed recommend it.

Gorgeous blush lace top that's fitted at the top and flowy around the waist. The lace is a little over worn and I had to steam it to get the neck to stand up like it's supposed to, but it still flopped over. Still worth renting though!

Body fit but still flattering, nice trendy blush color. Has definitely been worn a bit so it starts smelling faster than other things I've rented. I like the sheer chest part (sheer under the lace) and the ruffles help glam up the shape to make it a bit more feminine. It's also a flattering sleeve and the sleeve is where it's most tight which helps with the fit. May rent again if there's nothing else more interesting.

I wore the size large. It has a boxy fit and can be a bit loose but I don't think it actually runs large. I'm a double D and it was a little snug in the chest. But I think an XL would've been too big everywhere else. I got so many compliments on this shirt. I wore it a few times during my unlimited rental. The blush coloring was flattering even though with my fair skin and light hair can sometimes wash me out.
Really cute lace top for going out for the holidays. Wearing it to a ladies lunch but can think of 1000 other times when it will come in handy. Great cut, amazing color. Love this top!
This top was so romantic and pretty! I paired it with dark skinny jeans and nude slingback kitten heels for the perfect "casual Friday at work followed by happy hour"outfit.
cute shirt, got lots of compliments, comfortable, not too tight and has a tiny bit of stretch to the fabric

links_reviews_title: High quality lace with NO ITCH! Very flattering
links_reviews_text: Very flattering top. The top is lined so you don't have to wear a tank under, and a strapless bra isn't necessary as long as you wear a nude bra underneath you are golden! Super cute with skinny dark jeans or even white jeans to dress it up!
Wore this for date night and it was the perfect flirty and feminine top. Way more comfortable than I thought. Loved every minute wearing it
This top is comfortable and pretty which is my favorite combination. As some reviewers have mentioned the bodice is not fitted/boxy so be aware.

links_reviews_title: Versatile and pretty but not unforgettable!
links_reviews_text: I originally rented this top for work, but ended up wearing it once to work and once for a nice dinner out. I love the material and details, but there was some things off about the overall fit. I generally have a shorter torso and longer legs... with that said, the bottom of the top hit right around the hip area making your hips look larger than they are. Also the under lining (while necessary) is large and not form fitting making your stomach area also appear large. For work I tucked the lining in while leaving the lace layer out which greatly helped it in appearing not flattering. Since the top is so flowy I would suggest sizing down.

I read the other reviews and luckily knew to size down before ordering this. I like my shirts a little loose, and even sizing down to a small, there was still quite a bit of room. It was a nice shirt to wear to work, and I'd probably rent it again for that purpose. Wasn't exciting enough to wear out for a date night, or a night out with friends, but something different for work. Personally, I probably couldn't wear this in the winter when I was slightly paler because it would completely wash me out.
Runs big so get a size down. I wore a regular nude bar under and wasn't noticeable. Wore to work with black skinny crop pants and oxfords.
I love this top. It's very feminine and just pretty. If you are between sizes I would size down.
Listened to the reviews and ordered a size smaller than what I am. Got so many compliments. It's perfect for a casual day.
Loved this - very unique and a fun mix between dressed up and dressed down. Wore once to work and once on the weekend.
Loved this top for everyday wear! It does run slightly large and could probably size down
This top was beautiful. I wore it to a ton of holiday parties. Felt like i could have gotten even more use out of it. Will prob rent again.

The L wasnt available and I was super nervous the M wouldnt fit because I have broad shoulders and muscular arms. It ended up fitting great! Loved the see through lace on the top. I have a very long torso which makes me cautious to rent tops because i dont know how long they are. This shirt hit my jeans perfectly. My first RTR experience where the item was in good shape!
Fit and quality were great. Perfect amount of dressy with jeans for a night out. Love the blusg color. Highly recomend.

links_reviews_title: Good for work party outside at the beach
links_reviews_text: Nice top. Comfortable.

I am 4 weeks postpartum and this was very flattering and compfortable. It is winter and i oaired it with velvet black leggings. I chose a soze larger than i was prepregnancy but i think my normal size would have worked. I like the loose look - so, if you are going for that look i would size up because of the length.

I LOVE this top!!! I had been wanting to rent this for the lonneat time and every time I went to, my size wasnt unavailable. Now I totally understand why! This top was perfect for my mother/daughter saturday afternoon date with jeans. And also paired with black sinny slacks for work during the week. This top is beautiful and comfortable!
Loved this top. Wore it out for dinner and to a country music concert with a pair of grey-washed jeans and cowboy boots. It can be dressed up or down. The quality is beautiful

links_reviews_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE - Getting the black one next!
links_reviews_text: Wore multiple times! Great for everyday, party, work...anything!
All things lace. Gorgeous color and well-made high quality attention to detail top. Made me look a little wider than i wanted. Other than that, i was very happy with this little Kate Spade gem.

Not the best picture - but I loved this. Wore it with angle jeans and heels to an outdoor ladies brunch with a clutch bag. It's got a lot of flow, but it doesn't feel too heavy. The model photos make it look a little more peachy in color, but I think it looks more nude or taupe colored.

This. Top. Is. Everything. I didnt want to take it off and actually rented it a second time for Thanksgiving. I recently had a baby and my body is still a work in progress. This hides everything but still makes you feel beautiful!
I was absolutely in love with this top. I wore it a couple of times. Perfect for a night out with jeans or at work with some black dress pants.

The top is super pretty, feminine, well-made, but IT'S HUGE! I could've easily worn the M but the large was fine to wear, I just felt it wasn't terribly flattering in photos. I wore it on Thanksgiving with liquid leggings & knee high black boots. It was like the perfect length to cover my bum in liquid legs (I'm also 5ft). Rent this! It was fun & supes easy to make dressy or casual.

Loved top and got a lot of compliments. It is very flowy and loose. Wish it was more fitted through waist so profile was more flattering from side but still beautiful and very comfortable. I don't think I would size down though because it may be too tight in shoulders and chest if you did.

Loved this. Fit like typical Kate Spade - a little larger than your usual XS, but still pretty true to size. I liked the length - I thought it may be shorter and boxy, but it ended up being slightly longer than I expected, which was a nice surprise. Would def rent again.

I so wish I could've kept this beautiful top! The lace detail is so pretty and the ruffle sleeves are just enough to make this blouse special. The color is more opec than I expect but still great for fall. Wore it to work with black pixie pants and black pumps. I usually wear a S and this XS was loose on me so I suggest going down a size. Do keep in mind that this is more of a tunic than a blouse. Gorgeous though!
Soft with great color blocks and love the little detail of the cut wrist cuff. Fit well and was warm. Would definitely rent again.
It was a nice sweater. Very warm but isn't bulky. The pants are Tibi from RTR as well.

This is one of my favorite sweaters of all time. The fit is on the larger/comfier side, but the colors and material are just beautiful. I love the design. And the sleeves are nice and long. Love. Love. Love.
I usually wear a medium (and sometimes a large in outerwear) and this was too tight so I didn't get to wear it. I really like the design though so I'm gonna try to get a larger size.
this is one of my favorite sweaters that i've rented from RTR! flattering, and great colors for any skintone. The sleeves are a bit long which may bother some people, but i prefer it. Nice and cozy!

Really enjoyed this sweater. I like the simplicity but that it's not boring. Very soft and comfortable. I sized up to accommodate a decent sized 23 week bump and it worked out well. Looked equally good with jeans for a dinner out as it did with work pants. I don't think I can get away with sizing up once my bump gets bigger, but I'd rent it again post baby.
Long sleeves, comfy
Great sweater. Comfortable, nice for a spring or fall day. Would have bought it but still out of price range even with discount. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Just okay- not cozy, only interesting thing is the sleeves
links_reviews_text: The texture is not very soft, and the only thing that made me considering keeping this to wear is the cut out wrist features, but I am going to return it without wearing it. Color blocks are very muted so it's just really boring.
Fit so nice, looked really expensive. Got lots of compliments.

Love the fit and the style of this sweater! It's super fun, soft, and comfortable. I got this for just weekend wear since I work as a personal trainer and wear workout gear for most of the week. This block style added to the appeal to get it and the sleeves were a cool change with the slits that are there! Great fit, especially since I have a long torso and arms, couldn't have asked for a better sweater to rent!!
Only con - a tad itchy. I could have worn a light tank underneath
Soft and warm and super cute. Really high quality - loved it!
It was very tight around my bust and I didn't wear a bra. The fabric will show sweat or liquid stains. However it was very breathable and super flattering on!
Super comfortable and the adjustable straps help make the fit up top. Wore multiple times and always received compliments. Highly recommend!
Snug in chest like other reviewers mentioned, but overall, fairly true to size. Flattering, cute, and breezy for hot summer nights!

Well made, very flattering on curves, beautiful yellow color, major boob action though - size up it runs tight on top. I wore this once on a date with my hubs and it did not disappoint. The only downside is that the straps will either dig in, or fall down if you loosen them. Also - you're not wearing this to a family dinner unless you have a smaller chest.

links_reviews_title: This color looks great with a summer glow
links_reviews_text: Little snug around the busy, I didn't wear a bra with this based on how it was cut. Very flattering length!

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress but not made for me
links_reviews_text: Got this new with tags. It was very well made and I loved the yellow linen. It was tight in the chest (I'm a 34 D) but I wore it anyway. It was fine for a one time wear but I did not feel it was flattering on me.

Wore a size 4. True to size up top (34A) with really not a whole lot of extra room despite the stretchy back part. Empire waist and forgiving in the midsection, perfect for hiding a postpartum belly. I love the happy summer color. Has adjustable straps. If it had pockets, it would be perfect.

I hated rating this dress only 3 stars because if someone was renting for nonmaternity, it might fit great. The color and fabric were amazing! Sadly I was renting as a "maternity friendly" and it didn't fit correctly for my maternity shape. My bust is a lot bigger now and I should have sized up 2 sizes (I wasn't even able to zip up). If buying for maternity, be weary and size up. Otherwise great dress.
I really wished this dress fit my chest but no luck. I was expecting it to fit well since the reviews seemed to swing on the large fit but I couldn't zip at all.

links_reviews_title: Love the style but runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, a great yellow that's not too intense. I found it tight through the hips though so I'm planning to size up.

Lots of fabric on bottom so legs are warm but it's cold on top because there is very little coverage on top. Revealing but fun and cute. Can't wear a bra with it. I liked wearing the dress for just a day.
Wore several times. Got lots of compliments. Stand out color. Very comfortable.

Pretty straight forward casual sundress...the detail in the top is cute and simple. Love the mustard yellow color. I wished I had gone a size up to a 6 is the only thing I can think of. Zipper on the side.
I'm 34D, the chest in the 4 was super tight. It made for some intense cleavage, but still loved it.
Perfect weekend dress. Love the yellow color. Not too bright or too mustardy. Super comfortable and so cute! Wore it out for brunch!
The bodice was so tight I couldn't wear it.

The style of this dress is super cute. I loved the ruching in the bust and delicate spaghetti straps. The straps dug into my shoulders a bit after a few hours, but they are adjustable so this could probably be prevented. I was surprised that the color is a true mustard yellow- not bright yellow as it appears in the display photos. I'm not much of a mustard fan so will probably not rent again- but if you like that shade, this is a winner!
Cute buttons. Flowy. Short enough to be sexy but still dainty and professional.

Loved this dress! Wore to a baby shower and got tons of compliments and then turned around and wore it to work. It was an appropriate length and comfortable to sit in all day. I have a long torso so dresses are often too short on me but this was perfect. It's cinched I'm at the waist too so it was flattering.
The buttons go all the way up the high collar but you can leave them undone- I wore it both ways. Fun print and the flirty skirt softens the severity of the high neck. Easy fit.

Love the pattern but top part overwhelmed with so much fabric. Didn't like the button front - made gaps when sitting. It is short which makes it suitable for casual/weekends only (couldn't wear to work).
I thought this was more a-line, but it's definitely fitted. Gorgeous pattern!

links_reviews_title: Flattering hourglass fit, Victorian skater dress
links_reviews_text: Other reviews were right - the waist sits low. Attention getting. Flattering, though would tailor slightly if I owned it. Would rent again. Lightweight. Would be easy to pack on a vacation.

links_reviews_title: I felt So! Cute! in this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was so light and sweet. I wish the shoulders weren't so poofy but I'd still rent again
Super cute. Was able to wear to a baby shower and work. Fits very well!

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Compliments all day. So flattering. So comfortable
links_reviews_text: I don't wear dresses... I now want to live in this dress. It's everything!
Ran TTS.

I liked the dress, but it was slightly too conservative for me. I felt like I was back in early 1900ds. Wore it to a wine tour ans still got complements. Fabric is brighter in person which I liked. It is light and pleasant to touch. It fit just fine. Not too short. Maybe should have worn it with big earrings, belt, fun shoes to bring it back to 2019? This is a dress for another girl.

I wanted to like this since it was button up and the flowers are cute, but it just didn't do my shape any favors. The skirt sleeves were gigantic and the shoulder puff looked dated. It was too short for work without tights and wasn't flexible in any way. Wouldn't recommend.

Loved this dress for work and client entertaining... wore it with black tights and booties! There was a loose button on the dress, so I had to use some fashion tape to hold the gap closed. But otherwise I would rent this over and over again
Easy to wear and easy to style. Comfortable! Warning, it's a little on the short side.
From the fabric to the design is very pretty and it let you dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! Beautiful fabric and beautiful; fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so much cuter in person! You can't see the details in the photos, but the fabric is beautiful and it fits like a dream (but runs large! size down!). I love this dress and I'll probably wear it again before I send it back.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but but didn't feel this dress fit my age range or the event. All else was fine.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. Perfect for all occasions. I got it for work but will wear it regularly
links_reviews_text: Good fit. Comfortable silky material. I have a narrow waist so I could've sized down to really highlight it but overall fantastic

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a work women's breakfast!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for everyday use! Fit was great in that it was not tight but still showed some leg. I wore this to a work event in London and it only required minimal steaming straight out of my suitcase as the pattern disguises a lot of wrinkles. Would rent again for sure, or buy!
Super comfortable dress for work - loved the added flare
Prairie dress. Short (appropriate) which is complementary to the coverage up top. Would get a size larger then normal.
Loved this dress but the buttons kept coming undone like the holes were too big for the button. If i rented it again I'd wear a tank or something underneath
If fits true to size and I got a lot of compliments on it! Really loved the dress!

The bottom portion and length was great! The midsection fit but was a little tight, if I would have ordered my usual 6 it wouldn't have worked. The top section ran a little big and created puffy shoulders which gave it a nod to the 80's. I wore twice and enjoyed but won't be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Cute summer dress to wear everyday
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress to wear just about anywhere. Lightweight material/fabric as well as really pretty pattern. I am tall and found it to be a little on the short side, but nothing terrible. I've seen some people in other reviews mention the neckline -- I thought leaving the top few buttons open looked fine and made for an adorable summer t-shirt type dress.
Loved the floral pattern. The dress was really flattering, and loose enough that I didn't need to wear spandex or any other type of shape-wear. Very cool/light fabric, would be great on a warm day.

links_reviews_title: Perfect balance of coverage up top but short skirt. Good transition piece from work to drinks.
links_reviews_text: A bit large on top if you have smaller chest
Fun and easy to wear
Great for work, comfy
not flattering on me
Loved this dress for a spring day. Have rented it 2x...hits right to the knee.
Button near the waist kept popping open

links_reviews_title: Flattering and perfect for everything from work event or cocktail party

links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Felt so good in it. The pattern was adorable, looked great with a jean jacket! Fit and fabric were beautiful.
Fit perfectly! Girly and professional!
I wore this to work, fits very true to size. I got a ton of compliments. Some reviews noted it was too short, but it was fine for me. I'm 5'6".

links_reviews_title: Youthful floral dress, unfortunate pleats over shoulder.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, definitely short. The only aspect of this dress I did not like was the very full, prairie-style shoulder and sleeve. I felt it made me look big across the chest. Otherwise, very flattering over waist and hips. Pretty silk print.
So cute - sleeves are a little loose. Fits small in the rib cage.
The fit was so flattering. Obsessed with this dress
A bit large in the waist area, but overall good fit.

The sides have to be tied putting the dress on and taking it off. It was also slightly long, At 5'6" I should have used a slight wedge. But regardless of that, it was just a light and effortless dress. So cute! I'm definitely considering buying it!
Loved this dress and it had ties on both sides to loosen. Great colors and perfect for vacation
Comfortable and casual for everyday.
Love this tie dye maxi! It has an adjustable waist to cinch and was super cute and lightweight for the heat! I have rented it a couple times because I enjoy it for vacation alot! Ran TTS!

Easy & summery , it does wrinkles fast, but it was high humidity & it was un wrinkles too( not sure if it would be the same on non humid day) Straps is adjustable, very soft fabric, nice color with my 5'5" i was wearing with flats, it was almost to ground

links_reviews_title: Runs very large and long, at 5'3" I couldn't pull this off even with heels
Was not impressed with the fit, seemed very loose in the top area
This dress was really comfortable. It was flattering and my husband loved the little cutouts.
links_reviews_text: Really cute, comfortable and flattering. I would buy this if I was not in the process of actively losing weight. This dress would look great on anyone.
LOVED it!!
Great for a beach vacation!

This was an adorable, slip-it-on-and-go, kind of a dress. It was a little too long on my to wear with flats so I did a little corner-knot on the side (that actually made it look like it was made that way) so that I could wear it. I could also see this being worn over a bathing suit for a day at the beach.

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much - I rented it again and purchased!
links_reviews_text: Fell in love with this dress and wondered what the size down would feel like. Rented it again in a medium and appreciate the more fitted top on me than with the large. Can't wait to wear again and again! Would run long if you're shorter than 5'6 and weren't wearing any sort of heel.
I'm 5'2 - this dress was too long on me. I was able to wear it out but had to constantly pick it up off the ground as I was walking.
never wore this because it was too long

GREAT fit! Long legs, had to wear heels with them. Very comfortable, had some stretch to them. There is a slight pattern on them that I couldn't see on the website. White splotches? Not very noticeable until you get them. That's my only complaint though. Otherwise, awesome jeans!

links_reviews_title: Too long on me for a flare to look trendy
links_reviews_text: These do indeed have distress markings on them that look like handprints made with bleach. They are very light and I neither loved nor hated them. Firstly, they are extremely comfortable - quite stretchy but nice and thick, with a great high waist. In terms of fit though, they run pretty small. I ordered the 27 hoping they would be super relaxed and roomy for my holiday vacation and when I put them on they were perfect and tight - they fit like a 25 imo. I didnt love the length combined with the very slight flare - what is a cute kick flare on the model was sort of a frumpy, full-length, barely-bootcut on me. Bottom line: I might try these a size down to see if they end up a little shorter, sometime that I have occasion for a sleek tight jean.
Love these jeans

links_reviews_title: I liked the style and fit
links_reviews_text: I liked the style and fit but the jeans were unwearable because they were covered front and back with patches of lighter discoloration. Looked like detergent patches from laundering, but nonetheless, it wasn't part of the fabric and didn't look good.

Got these on a lark with my unlimited membership for a casual shower but after trying these on, wore them at least 3 times. The high waist, amount of stretch and length (not cropped, even with heels - yay!) made these a super comfortable addition everyone should have in their closets. I'd prefer it didn't have the huge white label but wore with sweaters, so this wasn't a problem. In addition, while prepared for the marbled material, I would probably have purchased if they were solid black (which I think would've looked more dressy). Regardless, loved the fit (TTS & very flattering!!), quality and length. Never realized it could be so difficult to find a pair of black jeans that are high-waisted, stretchy and long! Rent these; you'll love 'em!

links_reviews_title: Good fit, but not black jeans exactly.
links_reviews_text: These jeans had a lot of stretch and fit quite well, but the wash is a little different. They aren't normal black jeans as I originally thought. They are 'black tie dye' wash. Honestly the tie dye looked like spots to me and like they were accidentally messed up at the dry cleaner. I plan to stick with straight black in the future.
Fit in the legs, too tight in the waist.
These jeans have spots all over them. From the photo, I thought they were plain black. Otherwise, great fit just not what I was looking for.

These have an almost speckled grey pattern on them which isn't evident in the listing and I personally didn't care for. Fit was OK- I would have preferred more taper at the hem, but the quality of them denim is great.

The jeans have a grey on black pattern which I didn't notice when I ordered but I liked, it made them a bit more interesting than another pair of solid black jeans. The hem on these allow them to look nice with heels as well as sneakers.
Super cute, stretchy jeans with subtle details for a cool city girl look. I wore these with black booties and i loved it, however these jeans are a bit short.
Love the pockets and the soft fur. Hits right at mid thigh.
Didn't get the opportunity to wear it but it was so cute!
I rented a large thinking it would be a little bit, but it absolutely swallowed me and was not flattering so I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Very soft but sheds a bit
links_reviews_text: I wore this over a long sleeved black mock turtleneck and it looked great. Received several comments. It's very warm and soft, however, the fibers do shed.
Great for special event

It was nice nothing special. I felt a little cave man like but I feel like most fur vests do that. Wanted to try one out since I'm not usually a fur person. Quality was pretty nice, as pictured fit. A little roomy but not oversize.
I received so many compliments on this cute, fall fur vest. Will rent again

Love this top! I wish it came in more colors. Based off previous reviewers, I wore a black tank underneath and was very happy with the look. I styled it with the Equipment Arwen Cheetah Trousers in 8R and black flats. I will size up in the pants if I rent them again.
This shirt does run a little small. Perfect fit for small waist and bigger bust and hips. Got a lot of attention with the color and the shape. Heavier fabric. Wouldn't suggest for summer.

links_reviews_title: Simple classic, comfortable - dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, I often have problems with wraps and they end up showing too much cleavage, I did not have that problem with this top!

links_reviews_title: Girl Scout green! Perfect for an event honoring women...
links_reviews_text: I paired with a black pencil skirt and heels. Perfect form flattering combo. Top has ample room. I'd suggest sizing to a smaller size since it's a wrap type shirt. I would also recommend wearing a cami underneath. Perfect for my event.
Very flattering. Would rent it again!

Grabbed this top last min from the RTR store in NYC. I was pleasantly surprised. I usually wear a small but the XS still fit and was very flattering. Great fall color and can be worn casually or at an event like I did.

I can usually wear XS without issue but this was too small. The band at the bottom of the sleeves felt like it was cutting off my circulation. And it barely fit over the bust (although I have a large bust for my size).
Loved the small pouf of shoulders. I usually wear a 8 or 10 and have a small chest. If you have a large chest I would recommend sizing up.

I really liked this blouse! Super flattering and really beautiful color. Unfortunately it was just a little too low cut to wear to work, which is what I had rented it for. I wanted to wear it so bad, and tried it a few ways, but in the end wasn't able to wear. I would probably rent again for a girls dinner or date night!
Great material and color! Nice for work and everyday wear. Only problem was the elastic ends of the sleeves were really tight, even though my arms are skinny!
nice fit
Rented a XS because they didn't have small. Usually it's not a huge difference for me, but the sleeves were uncomfortably tight where they ended. Other than that, great color and style

I'm using RTR for the awkward postpartum period when maternity clothes don't fit anymore (and I'm sick of wearing them) but I don't fit into my pre-pregnancy clothes either. This wrap top would be good for nursing or pumping which is another plus. It is low cut so I wore it over a nursing tank, but that didn't bother me, because that is every outfit for me these days. I'm 5'3'' and 168lbs right now.
Nice top, runs a bit small, good quality.

links_reviews_title: The color is beautiful, great for work or everyday!
links_reviews_text: The elastic on the sleeves were VERY tight - left marks by the end of a short day. The color and silhouette were beautiful though - I'm not sure I'd rent again but I'm glad I did once.

This was an easy top to wear. Wore it with some slim pants. The elastic arm holes are a bit small, so you might want to go up in size. Also, its cut low, so I wore a lace camisole underneath to cover the cleavage!
Maybe it's because I have broad shoulders, but the sleeves were so poofy that this shirt was unwearable

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Great top, nice thick fabric, well tailored.

I loved this top and wanted it to work so bad but it just didn't! It both fit and didn't fit me well: the top didn't close/wrap across my chest. I don't have a big chest either -- it just needs a button toward the top to stay secure. I could have styled with something under it but I didn't like that look. Beautiful color though!
Such a cute and flattering top but the elastic bands at the end of the sleeve are so tight on elbow and forearm, I felt like it was cutting blood circulation
Love the rich teal color of this top. The wrap details did wonders for my waistline. Can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: would not buy or rent again. my boobs were popping out every two seconds
links_reviews_text: con- boobs popping out. I only wear a C
Lots of compliments on this when I went to a work activity that was part outdoors. Kept me warm and had a fun look. Stood out in a sea of black coats.

links_reviews_title: Great long coat for a tall person (5'9)
links_reviews_text: Was a little large but worked fine and was very warm. I loved this coat and could've lived in it!
I wore this coat every. day. It's so warm and cozy and luxurious. Definitely held up in Chicago winter. Really thought about buying this coat because I love it so much.

Loved the look and feel of the coat. Wore in 40 degree weather and was totally fine. The size 8 I got shows fairly significant wear, almost the entire thing was pilling. Didn't stop me from wearing it though!

links_reviews_title: Cute and soft but runs large
links_reviews_text: Really cute and soft but runs very large. My coworker said I look like a child playing in my father's closet. I wanted to make it work because of how soft it is. Also, the pockets are fake! No pockets on a jacket is a deal breaker for me.
I tried this jacket n which was warm and great colors however I was swimming in the medium. I would be willing to try a small next time
Lots of compliments! Runs a little large. Didn't buy it only because like it seems like it wouldn't wear well. Seemed knew when it arrived and started pulling up under the arms after only 2 wearings.

I loved this coat. I rented it for Thanksgiving in Boston and it kept me warm in 30-40 weather. The Medium wasn't available so I rented the large which was definitely way too big, but I just made sure to layer underneath and leave it unbuttoned mostly, which made it look a little less comically large. I'd rent again in a smaller size and get more wear out of it.

I like the way that the coat is pieced together and the colors and gauge of the plaid. However, the medium was enormous in all dimensions. It was super long on me but I'm only 5'4". I did feel very cozy in this but also a little silly. Maybe I just rented it too early in the season but it seemed like overkill.

I ordered this coat for work, but it was much too long and I'm 5"4", it felt as if I was wearing a gown. It was also larger than I expected, so I had to return it. I did love the print however the blue is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: This is an oversized coat. Gorgeous color, great style & length. I rented a M and could not wear.
links_reviews_text: Ordered a M. Way too big.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat and it is so warm!
links_reviews_text: This coat is so soft and comfortable but VERY oversized. I ordered a medium and it kind of swallowed my entire body. That being said I like how long it was, how warm it was and that you can fit a chunky sweater underneath. Would recommend and may have to buy! Would just suggest sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Not too warm, and is extremely long.
links_reviews_text: I had a particular outfit in mind with this coat and it went well together but it wasn't warm enough so I had to return. Also it hits at the ankles for petite figures so if you're not used to long coats you may have trouble. Deep pockets and good for layering on weekends or everyday
Cute but ultimately returned as I felt it was a little bulky

I loved it so much I bought it! Photos don't even capture how beautiful this jacket is - it's so much more elegant in person. I lost count of how many compliments I got on it the first weekend I wore it. The wool is so soft and the inside is lined with silk - only thing to keep in mind is if you have a pet, this really catches every bit of hair so keep a lint roller on hand. I recommend sizing up if you plan to wear chunky sweaters underneath. While the wool makes this pretty warm, it is a bit thin - I wore this in 30F temperatures and was warm if I layered a thick sweater underneath and wore a hat and scarf. Length is great even for petite girls - I'm 5'1" and this hit me around ankle length.
Very soft and makes you look way more polished.
Bright colors, fun while also being professional, chic and polished
The fit was superb! Definitely bought this one for my closet ! Mine now lol ...

I'm currently in between a size 18 and 16. It looked too small when I tried to close it but looked good open. The jacket was lined yet still had stretch. I received a ton of compliments on my look for the day. I actually mirrored the styling from another reviewer (good call on the brown belt!) Love this coat and may try the pants too.
I wore this for a business meeting where everyone else out had a plain boring suit on. You will definitely stand out in the crowd on this amazing business suit. Trina Turk never disappoints
Don't hesitate to wear with matching pants. It is not too much and you will be stopped everywhere you go with compliments.

Not the best photo to see the full jacket, but thought it was relevant to show how it ran slightly too large and buckled at the front a bit. I was purposeful in my size choosing as I didn't want it to fitted - I prefer blazers to be slightly oversized. It sat nicely when standing, When my arms were down. But buckled at the front when holding things/at the meeting room tables etc

Omg you guys!!! I loved this. I want this forever. This was SUUUUCH a cute suit. Fabric was a super light flannel feeling plaid. Cute cut ran a bit large- I'm between an 8 and 10 and the 8s fit great (still had plenty of room). Everything about this jacket rocked. Styled as shown with a Manseur Gabriel red pleated bucket bag to boot!
Runs a little large, if you're a 2, go for 0. Otherwise, this suit is the best way to own the day, whether you're the actual boss or you're a "boss." Either way: nailing it.
Loved this jacket for work. I got a 10 but next time would size down to an 8. I found it to be a bit big in the shoulders.

Super fun suit! I saw other review styled this to be dressy, feminine and loud, but was happy to see I was also able to style it for my casual more boyish style as well. Very flexible suit, wore it as an everyday look.
I got compliments all day. It was surprisingly comfy! Something different for sure but I loved it. The 16 JUST fit. I usually size up on RTR but I'm glad I took the risk on this.
Nice quality.
A zillion compliments. Cozy comfy fitted blazer. iPhone fits in the pocket. Looks sharp and sassy. Even with large chest does close in front but I like it better open.
This blazer not only fits well, the fabric is super soft and comfortable. Great to dress up for work or down for a casual weekend.

A) I've wanted to wear a power suit like this forever and thank god I did because I truly felt like a million bucks. B) Both pants and blazer fit like a glove. C) Tons of compliments and recommendations that I should own and not rent. D) 10/10 would rent again for another event!
Wore it for Christmas Eve dinner. Everyone loved it!
Super cute. Hubby loved. Got compliments. I am usually a 4/6 in tops and selected the 6. It swallowed me. Definitely go down if questioning your size

Nice, quality jacket that fit well (enough room for 34D!) Wore it once to a meeting and again with jeans for travel. Felt a little conservative for me because of the colors and print, so I might not rent again but it was very nice quality.

I ended up loving this blazer so much I bought it! Really comfortable fit (with just a hint of stretch) that worked at the office on "jean Friday" and at the bar for a casual night out. There is no wool in this jacket, so it is the perfect fall choice for anyone who looks for non-itchy options! Got tons of compliments all day (and even a couple a few days later.)

links_reviews_title: Love it with the matching pants
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a girls night dinner out and a meeting. So fun with the matching pants! More casual with a tee and fun jewelry.

I rented both this jacket and the matching pants in hopes of rocking the suit. I loved both pieces. Unfortunately both together was just too loud, so I wore each piece individually with a solid. The jacket I paired with a simple navy dress. Super professional while still having a pop of trendy color and fun. Both the jacket and the pants ran large.
Great fabric and fit. Handy pockets. Room. Solid shoulder style. Super fun plaid. LOVED
Loved this jacket. It's so comfortable, and fits beautifully. It's also super soft. My only complaint is that the button fell off the jacket while I was wearing it.
This plaid blazer is gorgeous. It looks really good with anything navy or denim. Perfect for work or casual!
So comfy, stretches a bit, so much fun to wear!
This suit was so cute ! Complements all day long ! Fit was great and color spectacular!
Fit was great. Slightly boyish, oversized but good fit in the shoulders.
I love the pattern of this for fall. It's soooo chic and feels well made. Really beautiful! It's easily one of the best blazers I've ever rented from RTR.
I'm normally a 4 or 6 in blazers went for the 6 because I couldn't tell what the bust would be like. It is slightly big but looks great on me. Think it's that pop that I needed.
Very comfortable.
Run true to size. I will definitely rent again a size 14 instead of the 16

links_reviews_title: Cute, but the picture is cuter.
links_reviews_text: This jacket would be great for someone tall and slender...not the best choice for my curvy and short self. The jacket is esp narrow at the shoulders and waist. The fabric is lovely, and the construction solid. Personally, I hated the silver button at the waist, a deal-breaker for me.

Jacket sits well, great color scheme. I wore it to work with a red t-shirt, blue jeans and nude pumps. I thought it was going to be heavy, but surprisingly the material it light and doesn't make you feel tight and hot.

I also reviewed the pants and feel the same way about the top. I'm normally between a 10 and 12, but the 10 wasn't available. The blazer is high quality and I felt great the second it was on. Even for a standard size 12, it felt a little oversized, which I liked. I wore it with the matching pants to a Christmas party. Closed 2019 holiday season with one of my favorite outfits of the year!

links_reviews_title: LOVE. I wore this four times when I rented it, then ended up buying it. Awesome statement piece.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Very sleek. Pairs well with jeans and a casual tee or slacks for a more dressed up look.
Excellent choice for fall holiday season. I got tons of compliments and three people asked me where I bought it . Really nice fit- true to size

I'm a 12 but rented the 14 recommended by RTR and it's way too large to wear. Beautiful cut, fabric, details etc, but I'll have to return it and hope a smaller size becomes available. May even be able to go down to a 10 depending on how I plan to wear it.
Soft material. Gold buttons. Plaid is blue and red (not black). Fits perfectly!
Actually ran big would be more thoughtful on my sizing next time and lean toward a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Could not wait to take it off
links_reviews_text: Glad I sized up because the waist was so tight...I've put on a few pounds but I'm still about a 26-27 waist and the small was too small. And the skirt part was kind of too much material. I just ended up looking very bulky. Pretty pattern though.

I rented this dress for a girls' weekend and it did not disappoint! The colors were fun and the fit was flattering even being short-waisted. I am 5'1" and this dress was short on me, but I would rent again!

Considered buying this, I loved it so much! The top is shear so you have to wear a tank underneath. And it is short, especially on the sides so small shorts underneath really came in handy. I got so many compliments on this piece, I would wear it again for sure

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a fun pre wedding dinner in Cabo! Was super cute and fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit short but it was very fun and cute! It looked exactly like it did on the website and I got so many compliments on it.
This was even prettier in person. Great flowy bottom. Sexy but still lovely.
This chiffon shirt dress super cute but the top is super sheer so I wore a nude undergarment.
So many compliments. Perfect vacation dress -- Runs a bit short
Very cute ... please note its very short.. a bit longer in the back then the front
I got a lot of compliments on this dress. It was so fun to wear. I am 5'1 and it is short but I would absolutely wear it again
Love love love it
Such a fun dress. Fit is flattering. Material is lightweight. It's definitely short so a boy short would be my suggestion for undergarments ;)

links_reviews_title: Short, but cute. Top is transparent
links_reviews_text: Pros: short and cinches at the waist Cons: I'm 5'5 and it was almost TOO short. The top was transparent so bad TK wear a bandeau underneath
Short in length

Loved this little number! I'm short and it was a "mini dress" on me but actually a tad longer in the back, which made it fall at a perfect length. Pretty sheer/thin material but with such a bold bright pattern didn't seem to be at all see through. Elastic cinching at the waist and elbows was fairly tight but not too uncomfortable. Would absolutely rent again!
Shear top but double fabric, this dress is short!

This fit perfectly, but I'm 5'0! I absolutely loved wearing this and got so many compliments. It's definitely on the shorter but worked. Would definitely recommend renting for anyone that is petite. The top is see through but I just wore a nude bra and it was fine.

links_reviews_title: I wore this on a ghost tour in Savannah. It was perfect for a casual night out. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a little short waisted if you are tall. I kept pulling the waist band down. It is see through so wear a pretty undergarment. It is very flattering on.

Yes it's on the shorter side and fits small overall, I'm a solid medium/large and definitely felt a larger size would have overall made the dress just a tad more comfortable. That being said I loved wearing it felt so pretty in it. Great summer night out dress. Top is sheer but not vulgar. Wear a nice nude bra and I see no problem.

The top is sheer but the pockets on the chest help to provide extra coverage. I'm short and thought this was very short, but didn't mind because the top part was loose (and I was on vacation!). Will probably rent again- loved this fun, colorful dress.
Elastic and waist abs arms made the dress uncomfortable. Plus it was see through. Ugh

I really loved this look. Wore it to a tap room. I loved how the ruffles were placed throughout the piece. Made my bum look good too. The side go up so wear it with shorts under or over jeans for cooler temps
I wore this dress to my sisters city hall wedding. While the top is slightly sheer, it was fine with a nude bra. The colors are gorgeous and the length is perfect for petite girls!

links_reviews_title: Wore it out on a date twice I loved it so much.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect. Short but longer in back, which is always nice. The color is amazing.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take it off
links_reviews_text: Perfect for everyday, for a party, can be dressed up or down for a beach. Sheer and light for hot weather and so bright for a rainy day!! It's nice because it's flattering, but doesn't fit snugly, so less of a chance for it to not fit! It is a bit short

links_reviews_title: Misa is made for short people.
links_reviews_text: I do not suggest renting any Misa clothing if you are over 5'7". I've purchased and rented a few of their dresses (long and short) and I've determined they are unwearable for tall people. So cute and love the cuts but not made for taller individuals. Also, this dress is very see-through but not super noticible on my light skin tone when worn. Returned.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear it because it was sooo short. Cute dress though.
links_reviews_text: Very short. I'm 5'7 and a small was waaay too short for me to wear for the day party I was going to.

I couldn't even wear this dress. I tried it on an home and the length was just way way way too short. The waist sat at my natural waist, but I am tall (long torso and long legs) and it barely covered my booty. I sent this right back to RTR. Sad, because the pattern is cute. Adorable summery dress otherwise.
I am 5'8 usually wear a size L, ordered this one in size xl and it was very very small, short and somehow big in areas that are supposed to be form fitting
This is one of my favorite RTR dresses. I rented it twice once in a M and once in a L. Both sizes fit. If you have a larger chest sizing up will make it so the dress is a bit longer in the front.
Very cute but definitely see though so needs a skin toned slip underneath

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a warm night in Mexico! Comfortable and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: TRUE to size!
I have shirts that are longer than this. I'm not scared to ware short dresses but this was another level lol. Otherwise beautiful colors and nice fabric. You just need to be 5" or less for this one
Fits great and flattering. Love it.
Great fit! Sharp & casual.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! The colors of this dress are just gorgeous, very flattering, shows a lot of legs, but for
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are comfortable, waistline a bit tight, skirt part is flirty - Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful playful dress. I would purchase it if it was a little less priced though...
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect!

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but also super short!
links_reviews_text: I'm only 5"5' and it was too short for me to wear. Made for very short women :(

links_reviews_title: Felt really cute and youthful in this dress.
links_reviews_text: It's short so I wore a pair of shorts hidden under it since it was really breezy outside. The material is lightweight and airy. It was very comfortable in 90-degree weather in the Caribbean. The dress is semi-sheer... not sheer where someone can see all of your goodies. Just wear nude or blue underwear and you'll be fine.
Way too short . Fit me fine everywhere else. I am 5ft 2 in and it barley covered my lady bits.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments everywhere I went!
links_reviews_text: GORGEOUS BAG PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION!

links_reviews_title: literally used it every day and it can fit so much!
Perfect size- large enough to fit wallet, keys, and phone!
links_reviews_text: Great for everyday.
Very trendy, but not the most practical... it was pretty easy for stuff to fall out. Great color and print!

I wore this bag with a red and white polka dotted shirt, so it was the perfect accessory. However, had it not been for matching perfectly, I probably would not have rented it. It is a smaller bag and while it does enclose your items, it doesn't fit as much as I would normally like nor does it have any inside zippers/pockets. Good for a one-time use but not every day.

Great to try one of these staud bags and to carry around an on trend piece to brunch. Functional enough (fits my daily needs) but obviously more for looks than real functionality given it is a top handle. Really enjoyed renting it!

Puff sleeve is perfect (not too much material not too little) color scheme is so cute goes great with black, grey, and some navy pants & skirts. Material is thin enough to tuck in as well! I had to keep :)

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this as it was too baggy, but the colors were really nice.
links_reviews_text: Colors are great. The fit was too loose. If you order a size down, you will be all set.

links_reviews_title: I didn't particularly like the fabric and the puff sleeves.
links_reviews_text: fit was true to size

links_reviews_title: Versatile top with a cool pattern
links_reviews_text: Great top that's easy to wear with a skirt or slacks to work or shorts or jeans on the weekend. I rented it for a month and ended up purchasing it.
Liked the pattern and fit but sleeves were a little puffier than I would have preferred.

links_reviews_title: Pretty print with black or blue bottom. great for work.
links_reviews_text: The blouse runs generous. I resolved it by wearing a thin black belt at my natural waist. Paired with a navy blue midi pencil skirt and black pumps.

links_reviews_title: Fun print and pop of color.
links_reviews_text: The fabric could have been a little softer for me to buy, but it worked out well as a rental. The print was fun and the sleeves were just the right amount of puff.

links_reviews_title: This was cute but a little too large in the overall fit
links_reviews_text: I thought this was just too large in the overall fit. I think a XXS would have worked. It's super cute!
The quality is great and is very comfortable. The pattern makes it fun but work appropriate!
The fit was really off, fabric stretched oddly across the chest causing the neckline to look crooked. Wasn't as roomy as I would have expected from a "shift" top.

links_reviews_title: Great jeans, tight thighs + loose waist
links_reviews_text: Great quality denim, and wore these a lot. Some things to be aware of... on ME, the waist band was loose- at least 3 inches by the last wear (yes, they stretched out with wear) and the thighs remained skin tight. This made for a slightly uncomfortable fit as I had the feeling they were both falling down and strangling my legs simultaneously. Overall though I loved the look of the capris and the casual denim style. I wore these a good amount on vacation and would rent again.

Have worn them for work, weekends, and everything in between. Very flattering without being too tight. Perfect rise (I love high rise) and perfect ankle length (I'm 5'6). The wash is just right as well, not too light or dark. Not giving these back just yet.

links_reviews_title: Awesome jeans. I wore these a ton and almost purchased.
Good fit! I like the length and color. Stretched out easily.
links_reviews_text: Stretch pretty easily.
Jeans were made for me. Love the style and fit. I may purchase them.
I normally wear a 28 but RTR suggested a 29 and it was perfect. Flattering on the bum and perfect length.
Nothing wrong but nothing great - had trouble finding the right thing to go with them so I returned
I wear 32 in all jeans. These run way too small.
Good fit. Started out tight but stretched to a comfy fit (as they should). Nice color and cut

links_reviews_title: This was a boring pair of crop denim jeans.
links_reviews_text: I tried these on but decided not to wear because they were just plain cropped denim jeans (which I knew when I chose them). They were heavier than I expected so I didn't bring them on vacation. Cute and fit well.

links_reviews_title: Nicely worn in a rural setting for a night of bowling and pizza.
links_reviews_text: fit is easy and comfortable, styling like construction worker pants therefore very casual. They are nice quality. I am an older women, 5'3" and about 160 lbs. with small thighs. The length of the pants are just fine for my height.
Classic and comfortable. Nice shape.
I've kept them out for a couple months now because I love them so much. Maybe time to just buy a pair??

links_reviews_title: Fit like I've owned them forever.
links_reviews_text: A bit high waisted, a bit cropped, overall perfect for summer. I wore them to work and on weekends around the house. My new favorite jeans.
Loved these jeans so much I considered purchasing! Have a little bit of stretch to them. Perfect ankle length if you're 5'4-5'5.

links_reviews_title: A great fit all around! These helped me feel normal again post-baby :-)
links_reviews_text: Very true to size, love the pant length and the rise length as well. Very flattering everyday jeans.

links_reviews_title: super low cut, couldn't wear it in public
links_reviews_text: i'd size up but 32/us 14 was the largest

Looked cute in pics. Since it was slim fit AND crop, I thought I'd be safe as a petite. Not so. Baggy and ill-fitting. Could work for petites if you're going for the mom jeans thing & rolled to crop height.
Couldn't wear these, definitely run small. Nice jean if you do size up.
It's really long! Long enough to wear with leggings and still feel really warm. Wore it to work casually :)

Loved this sweater! I wore this to a Galentine's party at my friends home and it paired perfectly with leggings for a cozy but put together look for the event! The knit details are super cute, I loved wearing it and I got lots of compliments at the party!

The sweater isn't as baggy as oversized as it appears. It is fairly snug in addition to being long. It's decently thick as well. I found it comfortable to wear around the house. I wouldn't wear it to work.

This sweater is super cute, casual and comfortable! I'm 5'3" and it was long enough to cover my entire butt while wearing leggings. Big and oversized, but doesn't look like you are drowning in it. Perfect for cold days!
Cozy and comfy. Nothing special, but it looks and feels cute on a rainy/cold day.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, cute, thick and warm sweater.
links_reviews_text: Knit is really nice and thick - great for cold days. Length is very long - If you have a long torso, this is your jam - if you have a short torso this would be a dress on you. Sizing is a little big but I like my sweaters a little cozy.
I accidentally ordered this a size up, but I think that's what made it so comfortable. I was on the verge of buying this one. Loved it!

Definitely larger than size but feels like it's supposed to be that way. I don't usually wear pink like this much but I got many many compliments about the color. I really like it. I plan to rent again (or maybe buy)! I want to see how the light grey one looks
Great layer in the colder months. Thick and warm but never itchy. I wore it for a few days while visiting my in laws over Christmas.

links_reviews_title: Long enough to wear as a dress! (But too short of a dress for work)
links_reviews_text: Sorry for the terribly obnoxious photo, hahahaha... anyway, I am usually always a size M, and when I'm not an M, I'm an L. I wore this size M sweater with just tights - not even leggings, tights - and it covered my behind enough for me to go to a bar and play darts/pong/drinking games all night without showing anything. So yeah, quite oversized! The cut of the neckline is a little strange, not quite a scoop neck. the sweater is a cute pink color which was a nice feminine balance to the bagginess. Pills rather easily and got lint stuck on it relatively easy too. I would rent this again but would not buy it.
Runs large, but that's probably intentional. It's cute with leggings, and I got compliments while wearing it.

links_reviews_title: My first runway rental is a success!
links_reviews_text: Great color and super soft sweater. Absolutely perfect to keep warm this winter. And I love the mix of knitting patterns. Wore this to work and didn't think anyone would notice anything different as it's only a sweater but received tons of compliments! Does run a little large so I'm glad I got a small. Length is a little bit awkward as it's too short for a sweater dress but too big for a regular sweater. But overall, was a great find!
Super cute and cozy but something about the neckline feels off, like not tailored properly. Still cute for day to day wear though!

RTR recommended a medium, it's huge (and I'm 7 months pregnant) so definitely size down. Also, in the pictures it looks pink however it's more of a salmon. It's gorgeous, soft and super cute! Weather is heating up around here so I don't know how long I'll hold onto it but I'll definitely wear it at least a few times before sending it back
Good color. Sleeves were quite long so I cuffed them. Wore this at 20 weeks pregnant (126 lbs. pre preg 115 lbs)
It's really pretty but super itchy. It's also a little long.
Super cozy sweater. Was great with leggings or skinny jeans. I got the small, but felt like it was cut big enough that I would have been fine with the XS
The color of this sweater is very pretty and it was long enough on me to wear over leggings. But I found that it ran really large, and had a boxy shape. I had to roll the sleeves up.
It was fine for work, long enough to wear with leggings. It was a little itchy so I had to wear a shirt underneath.
This is a great tunic sweater-oversized but not too big. I loved the color and weight. Perfect for the cold CHICAGO winter.
I could not get my arms through the sleeves. The sweater would've fit otherwise but if the bottom flares so if you have any butt, it's going to look like a big ruffle.

links_reviews_title: Very warm and cute piece for pregnancy.
links_reviews_text: Order your regular size. The small fit great (even over my 28-week bump) while the XS was too tight in the arms and hips.

I loved the color and fabric. I like my sweaters to run a little on the oversized size, and this was more fitted. The sweater came down to below the zipper on my jeans which I loved. Sturdy fabric great for outdoor wear

I was surprised how heavy this sweater was. It was very warm, but I do not live in a cold climate. By the afternoon, I was sweating and had to take it off. Overall, I really like the sweater and would rent it again, later in the winter.
Loved the color and fit
Nothing special, but good to switch into my rotation for a month
It was big even for it being oversized

links_reviews_title: Basic cable knit sweater for winter
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered the next size up. The small felt a little snug. It definitely is cute, just not as cozy as I had wanted it to be.

I liked the feel of this sweater a lot. It's very soft and cozy. But I was a bit surprised by the length, as it hung just past the butt. Since the fabric is so heavy you can't really hike it up without bunching the whole thing.
True tunic sweater- loose fit but not boxy. Thicker knit that's good for early spring. Pretty in pink, not too bright, just right.
I wore on a weekend with leggings and also to work with ankle dres pants and flats. It's not super flattering but very thick warm material.

I wanted it to be oversized and I went too far. Should have gotten the XL. The fabric is too heavy for it to drape like I want out of an oversized sweater. The neckline on the large sizes is also a really strange shape - too high to be a comfortable crew neck but too narrow to be a boat neck.
