This was good for a trip up north with skinny jeans but a little heavier than I normally wear. Fit was good.
Bulky fit.
Fit was definitely large--I sized down and probably could have done so again. But it was so cozy and soft and such a pleasant color, I still loved it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this at work with jeans and booties.
links_reviews_text: I wore this at 30 weeks pregnant and it fit great! It is long enough to cover the bump and maternity jeans. I wore a long sleeve t-shirt underneath so it wasn't itchy.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, but wrong color for me
links_reviews_text: Fit well, but color did not look great on me!
Everyone told me to buy it !!

This sweater is thick and perfect for winter. I wore with leggings and jeans - it covers your booty comfortably and has slight slits on the sides to keep it from being to tight on the hips. Would rent again.
Very cute with jeans- you can size down. I normally wear a small and got away with an XS.

links_reviews_title: Loved these earrings!! I wore them so much.
links_reviews_text: Not heavy, fun and beautiful!
Love these earrings. I've worn them once so far (rented through unlimited) and have already gotten multiple complements. I like that they are work appropriate and also nice for an evening out.

These earrings were a last minute grab at the Georgetown store. They topped off my holiday look perfectly. I will say they are a bit heavier than I usually like my earrings, but other than that great.
Fun. Makes an average outfit special. Artsy quality. Like wearing a mobile. Definitely recommend.
looked good with everything. Nice change from my everyday gold hoops

links_reviews_title: Chic and comfortable jacket that will actually keep you warm!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket. I rented it for everyday use and that's exactly what I did! It was the perfect jacket for winter that I could wear to class, work, or even out. I am going to have a hard time returning this one!
This coat was so soft and comfortable! It goes with so much and fits true to size! Will definitely rent this again.

Great classic plaid coat. Goes best with neutral colors but also wore with hot pink sweater and loved. Have been wearing this daily for the past two weeks in 20-30 degree weather, and it's surprisingly warm.

links_reviews_title: Shoulders are a little bit larger, but fine
links_reviews_text: I think white skin color would look good on this coat. Yellow skin color would look a little bit old on this coat like wearing moms old coat.(because the coat is orange grey, very vintage tone) It's still a good coat with very nice shape. I got a lot of compliments! The only thing to mention is that this coat is not a wool coat. I would love to rent a better material coat.
I wore this coat on my trip to Paris. It was perfect. It kept me warm (40-50 degrees) and was chic.
Love the slightly boyfriend fit of the jacket. The shoulders are a bit wider. Got a lot of compliments !
This jacket is cute warm and versatile. Highly recommend
Large and boxy, very long and definitely for tall women.

links_reviews_title: Good for work and mild weather
links_reviews_text: Lack of pockets was a bit frustrating. Elegant fit. Needed to wear another coat under for really cold days.
Arms are to tight , build for tall people

links_reviews_title: Great for Petites!! This is such a beautiful coat and was so warm! I loved wearing it.
links_reviews_text: This was a great jacket and was so warm! I loved wearing it everyday.
I might buy this cost i love it so much. Very classy and warm for san francisco winters

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this! I got so many compliments. Super trendy right now.
links_reviews_text: A little boxy on the shoulders, but to be expected.
I'm 5'8 and the sleeves were a perfect length. Super cute and comfy.

I usually wear a size 2 in most brands and found the body of this coat in XS to be very wide and boxy. The shoulder and arms fit just right but had to dock a star for the super wide body which is not very flattering.

I really wanted to love this coat (great print/colors), but the fit was not very flattering. It was kinda narrow in the shoulders, but large everywhere else. I would have liked it more if it narrowed slightly at the waist. If you're into the oversized look then this is the coat for you.

I rented for A Chicago weekend. It was 30 degree weather and it kept me warm. Loved it. It fit really nice you cant dress it up or down really comfortable. The only thing would be the zipper it was sometimes difficult to zip it up with your gloves on.
Fits well and very cozy. Worn to an outdoor event and received lots of compliments and I love the color.

This light gray peacoat is more of a staple. I wore it with a thin turtleneck with/without a cardigan and was really warm with it in 50-60 degree weather. I like that it's smaller on the waist so it's not too boxy. Deep pockets and great quality!
This coat is beautiful. Fits perfectly.' I want to own it now that I've worn it.
Jcrew sizes run smaller because I'm usually a 6 in coats but this still fit great with room for sweaters. I ended up buying it because I wore it so much and it was also warm!

This is a great heavy coat for winter. I love that I can leave it zipped down a bit so the collar folds over or zip it all the way up for a super cold day and have my neck warm. Perfect for a cold winter day.

links_reviews_title: Amazing quality! Great coat from J. Crew.
links_reviews_text: I've rented this in gray and red - and absolutely love this jacket. I have worn both a 4 & 6. Each work, but the 4 fits me better. This coat is great for work and the consistently cool weather in SF.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful and warm coat. The fabric and lining feel luxurious.
links_reviews_text: I found this coat to be quite large in the busy and mid section area. It was a good size for my lower half.
This coat is made well. I sized up and it was too big. Didn't end up wearing the coat, felt a little too "office-y" for me.
I like the extra pocket and how classy it looks. It is so nice on, I sized up so it fits a little big but I like that since I wear sweaters and extra layers in the winter so it's perfect.

I loved this jacket so much, I ended up getting it as a Christmas gift. It's very versatile for a more formal event, work, or wear casual and also very warm. I get compliments on it every time I wear it. I will say the sizing is off. I'm usually a 6/8, I got the 4 just because that was what was available and it ended up fitting great. I even have plenty of room to zip up with a bulky sweater on. Definitely suggest renting it.
Amazing quality. Looks really cute. Definitely a closet staple. Ended up buying!
A great essential! Very professional looking, transitions well to casual events.
Cozy, good quality, I want to own it.
Loved this coat so much that I bought it:)

This is one of those basic coats that just make you feel like a total #bossbabe . I rented this for our engagement pictures and have word every day since . I'm obsessed! I love how structured it is and the quality is superb! Definitely will keep in the closet for a few more weeks before returning! I love it!
Looks great with everything- work, casual, dress. Lots of compliments! Just the right warmth for early Fall with just one layer beneath.
Great for a trip to Copenhagen! Lots of compliments. FYI there is a pocket directly above the big one... I thought I was misplacing my things until I realized that!
Polished look.
Too big. Didn't keep
love it so warm and cute for work sooo flattering
Fits great and it's perfect foggy San Francisco morning! Easy to wear things under it and not feel bulky. I love it!

Fit is structured but not tight. I have larger upper arms and tend to find J Crew coats too narrow but the fit was great and super comfortable. Consider sizing down if you want a tighter fit but definitely don't need it and you'll still look professional
Not a lot to say on this one. Fits like typical J Crew (slightly big but fine). Nice and warm, great early spring or fall jacket.
Perfect jacket for those days between winter and spring
I loved the grey color and overall look when the coat was not zipped. There is no tapering at the waist, so it looked a bit big and boxy on me.
Super warm and cute but ran large

links_reviews_title: Every time I wear it I get compliments. The second I put it on!
links_reviews_text: The 8 felt large. I am between a 6 and an 8 and I wish I had gotten a 6. And As a petite person, the sleeves were long. But otherwise, warm and gorgeous.
This coat is amazing! I loved the fit and style. Super cute for a nice winter coat!
I sized up for room in bust but coat was just to bulky. It also does not have any working exterior pockets

links_reviews_title: I felt fab in this coat.
links_reviews_text: I rented this coat mostly because I had seen it, coveted it, and wanted to know how it would fit me and work for my lifestyle. I was happy on all front. The collar was high but didn't run my face. The Italian wool was soft to the touch, draped well, and I should have kept it. Maybe if it's on clearance one day.... Loss of one star because they kept the pockets stitched up. I needed those pockets!
Great fit, great quality and in great shape! Love it more in person and my most worn and fav rental to date!

links_reviews_title: We were inside and outside for our event, and this coat was perfect. Dressy and warm.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. I probably could have gotten one size smaller. It was a beautiful coat. It kept me warm, but was also dressy enough that it worked well at the wedding.
It's the perfect coat - appropriate for work, looks cool and casual and is wonderfully warm. Considering buying.
I ordered a size six. A size two came but fit perfect. Not sure but beautiful coat.

links_reviews_title: Sized up b/c regular size was snug on hips.
links_reviews_text: However when I sized up to get a good fit on my hips it felt way too big up top and I just felt sloppy instead of fancy. I did wear it a few times, it was a nice color
Very cute work with high waisted jeans. It is fairly cropped but that is the look I was going for.
Very comfortable
Really like these jeans, but they're already cropped on me (5'8") without rolling them up.

links_reviews_title: I tried to like these but the truth is they are too #momjeans for me.
links_reviews_text: Ladies, I tried. I really tried to embrace this style. But they were just not flattering on my figure. Or maybe for someone my age (30s). Good fit at the waist, but baggy everywhere else. I could see how they'd be tight in the thighs but I have bird legs so it wasn't bad. Overall I felt like a "mom jeans from the 90s" meme and returned them the next day. On the positive, they are well made and the medium color denim would match with SO much.
They came folded up at cuff so wore that way, but maybe not supposed to? Nice classic straight leg style

links_reviews_title: Love! Comfortable, good quality, got compliments
links_reviews_text: They are a tad baggy but so comfortable for every day. I love that people in the know loved them before knowing the designer.
No stretch. I have a very short torso, so I actually had to wear this with the top button in-buttoned, because they were killing my lungs
I love everything about these jeans. They're the perfect wash and length. They run a bit big I'm usually a 27 but will do a 26 next time I rent.

links_reviews_title: Runs smaller than others by this brand
links_reviews_text: I got my usual size in jeans, and a size that's worked for me before in Citizens for Humanity, but these had to be sent back because they were too small.
Wanted to try different brands and fits. I liked these. Thick denim, no give in the waist

links_reviews_title: Too tight across the tummy, but everything else worked
links_reviews_text: No very exciting and no stretch.

These jeans don't have a lot (read: any) stretch, but despite that I love them and actually decided to buy and keep! The higher rise style was very flattering for me, and the color goes with everything. The lack of stretch means they're not super comfy, but I love them anyway and they make the booty look great.
Great fit, fabric and finish. Adore!

links_reviews_title: Long time fan of Citizens of Humanity Jeans
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize there was no stretch but even so, the jeans just weren't flattering on my shape. I was disappointed because I've been a fan for years but styles change and I guess "mom jeans" are in now. Didn't look good on me.

I'm so glad I sized up for these. The denim is thick without any stretch, so the 26 was perfect around the butt and thighs. I wore a belt since the waist was a little loose. These are high-waisted with a button fly-- perfect with a crop top. I think they looked better cuffed up, too.
I didn't wear b/c the waist was slightly tight and I was going to be sitting for date. High waist. Bum looks great, just not my right fit.
I couldn't even get these jeans buttoned! The denim fabric is very heavy. I returned them immediately.
Nice everyday jeans, a little tight through the hips and thighs

links_reviews_title: Cute style of jean but there were no stretch or give to the material.
links_reviews_text: Order one size larger than expected.

links_reviews_title: Flattens the backside, but still flattering.
links_reviews_text: The jeans arrived with the upper portion soaking wet. All other items were dry. Strange.
Definitely not a great fit if you have fuller hips, thighs and a butt.

links_reviews_title: Just a weekend day...wanted to try a different brand of jeans.
links_reviews_text: Not too exciting. They were baggy and too high waisted for my body type.

Loved these jeans but the legs stretched out as the day went on. I like a snug fit, especially in a high waist but the legs would stretch out and then they just looked frumpy. May try a smaller size in COH next time.
Nice fit.

Didn't wear these jeans. I'm trying out a few pairs of jeans, looking for that special pair. This was my first jean rental and for a size 31, they are really small. If you have any thickness in thigh area, these won't work. I saw that reviewers mentioned that but I tried anyway. I couldn't get them over my thighs. The material felt like classic heavy 501 fabric and I guess I would need to find a pair with some stretch involved.

links_reviews_title: These were the wrong size. I regularly run 26-27 but was sent 25's.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't able to wear them, they were too small but I sure wish I could have.
The jeans were the perfect weight and I loved the color. It is very long though and i prefer my jeans to hit above the ankle so i had to roll it up twice and the waist was very big
I tried these on and really liked them, but the hips were snug and one of the thighs was tighter then the other and then they were very loose on the bottom of the legs so I wasn't able to wear them.

links_reviews_title: Slim hips. Not for girls with thick thighs
links_reviews_text: Typical slim hipped fit, not ideal for curvier girls

links_reviews_title: couldn't wear them as they didn't close at all.
links_reviews_text: too tight and no give

I wear 31/32 in jeans. Size 31 usually fits fine, but I like to have a little more room for movement so I go with 32. This 32 is snug, but the cut is fine. The material is good. The buttons are easy. It does sit high on the waist, and I don't usually buy high waist jeans. Thought I'd give these ones a try. But it's a no for me.
did not fit in the thighs at all.
These have no stretch or give. For a seemingly easy cut, they are narrow through the thighs and hips. I couldn't even pull them up. Returning without wearing.
The upper thigh was tight and cut off the circulation to my legs. The length was good, but the jeans were beaten up at the bottoms of the legs.
A little short for me but the fit is great. If you have a butt they may not be for you, I just squeezed into them and hen they loosened up they were fine.
The high waist fit great ! They were so comfy, but if you are wanting a stretch these are not your jeans. I usually wear a reg in length and these barely were long enough on my legs.

links_reviews_title: Right high waist with no give
links_reviews_text: Liked these jeans but fit tightly and was hard to sit in them
too small

links_reviews_title: Love the fit of these jeans
links_reviews_text: a little stiff / short (I'm 5'11), but would definitely rent again

I tried. I buttoned that fly up to my waist with flashbacks of high school, and talked myself into being on trend. I went downstairs and husband averted his eyes and whispered "mom jeans". I turned around, went back upstairs, and changed with visions of Tina Fey haunting me.
I think these would have been cute but there was no stretch so they didn't fit! I will try a bigger size and give them another shot.
I am a true 27, but 28 usually fits best. I could not get these 28s over my hips to button
This is a perfect dress for office and could even be dressed up for cocktail. Super fun and felt wow in it. Got lots of compliments.
I wore this to work and i got a lot of complements. I really rented it for my daughter's bridal shower though and I think it works for parties as well as everyday style.
Nice pattern and comfortable material. Not most flattering ever but still pretty. Would fit a variety of body types I think bc has stretch and room in chest area.

Loved this dress - stretchy and comfortable length for a long workday, and also very flattering on curves without being too tight. The floral pattern looks mostly red in photos but also has green and hot pink accents - it was even prettier in person!

links_reviews_title: Great pops of color floral to standout at work!
links_reviews_text: Love the floral design and the fabric is super soft and comfortable. I should have sized down to a medium for a better fit, but the jacket helped to camouflage the excess fabric and also break up the floral a bit so it wouldn't be too overpowering.

links_reviews_title: The silhouette of this dress is Stunning!
links_reviews_text: Yes, the pattern is a little loud, but I get so many compliments each time I rent this, because it really makes a woman's curves look amazing! It's so comfortable and silky and I truly can't love this dress more than I do. It deserves an extra star!!!

Loved this colourful stretchy dress! Perfect for work / events / smart brunches etc abd v comfy. Veey fitted but same time I was 5 months pregnant & more like 125 lbs & it concealed / stretched perfectly (so good if you're eating a big meal too :) ). Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Pretty but nothing special - fit is stretchy
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" about 135 pounds right now 34C chest 28 inch waist 36 inch hips, small fit nicely it is stretchy and comfortable but the arms at the wrist are tight. Th material is soft And sheen but doesn't "hold you in". Good length I felt for my age of 38. The dress is pretty but I didn't think it was spectacular. Hubby wanted me to buy it though. Looks better in pictures than in person in my opinion. Not a fave of mine but a nice dress.

This print is so fun! I think this is a great winter floral, and works wonderfully for the office. I wore this to work at a law firm and then directly from there to our office holiday dinner. It's flattering but forgiving, snug on the bottom and roomy on top so it helped balance my pear figure. I don't love the neckline on me personally, but it's a fun dress. And super comfy! Lots of stretch to this one. It is lined, making it even easier to wear. I would recommend this!
Very comfortable, classic, pretty. Just hit all the marks I was looking for to make our family photos perfect!

Wow! Beautiful dress. The fabric will feel amazing against your body and the fit is on point! Form fitting but work appropriate. I wore it all day at an event & it was perfect! Highly recommend and would rent again.
Wore this to work and it was a refreshing change from solid colors. The dolman sleeves are unique, and the fabric hangs beautifully.
This dress is stretchy and the fabric is thin but somehow it doesn't compromise quality or fit. It fits great and there is a lot of room for a bustier person.
Not for me. The bottom is quite tight which contrasts with the loose and wide sleeves of the top.
It is one of the most comfortable dress I have rented so far.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, Comfortable Dress with Spring POP!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work, and was wowed. Material is thin (for warmer weather), stretchy and comfortable. It's fairly TTS, just a tad roomy. Neckline and hem are work-appropriate lengths, and pattern really pops in a good way! Felt fresh and flirty and ready for spring in this dress! I will rent again

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not a show stopper
links_reviews_text: Wore to a baby shower & it was okay. The fit was nice. The look didn't come together like I wanted.
Loved the pattern on this dress! Stretchy material so it fit in the bust. It just about fit on the bottom half of the dress when worn with shape wear

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Prints aren't for me
Extremely comfortable and flattering but runs big
I love this dress. I felt great in it. Perfect for dinner and work.
links_reviews_text: great fit. esp cool fit with the back and arms.

This was a pretty pattern and I liked the slight stretch of the fabric, but- it was just too much look for me/my figure. High neck & full sleeves and length to the knee kind of was a lot. On the right figure with some delicate shoes could be cute.
Soft and cozy material, but the top is way too big even with a large chest.

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern in a fabric you can wear every day.
links_reviews_text: A fun pattern. I should have gone with the medium as the large was quite baggy. Overall - very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Not really my style - bust is purposefully baggy
links_reviews_text: This was just ... fine. Tight from the waist down, baggy on top. Not my usual go-to look, but decided to expand my horizons.
The pattern was just too busy for me. I think I would like this style of dress in a more muted fabric.
The print and batwing sleeves on this dress aged it a bit, but it was still incredibly comfortable and fun!
Very comfortable; bump friendly. Wore it to a conference with eighty attorneys, so it stood out in a sea of grays and blues. Received two compliments.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress and fabric. Wore it to lunch with the girls and it was so comfy like pj's.
links_reviews_text: perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Don't the pattern fool you as it can be worn summer or fall!
links_reviews_text: The fit was wonderful and so was the pattern. Loved the oversized sleeves.
The dress fit okay but a little baggy on the waist. If Id sized down it wouldve been too tight on the stomach and hip.
Definitely a great dress and comfortable.
Lovely print and extremely comfortable fabric. Dolman sleeves weren't particularly flattering, though.
Am a curvy shortwaisted petite girl. And so comfortable - looked good with and without spanx but wore them anyway.
Perfect dress, so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Work-friendly but still managed to feel sexy in this piece.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and forgiving fabric with lots of stretch.
Rented for vacation. Super flattering color and fit. Can be worn with or without a strapless bra. Very loose & long but tucked into shorts it was so cute!

I was able to switch from dressy work pants to high waisted jeans at night wearing this shirt - it looked effortlessly stylish either way. Really loved it! Not too tight so could be worn flows over jeans as well.

This top was great. Wore it to a wedding rehearsal and dinner. Looked really nice and polished without being too dressy. Very comfortable. The arm holes were a little big- if I wasn't careful, you could see my bra. May have been better if I'd sized down.
Just gorgeous... tons of complements. Have a good strapless or alternative. The material while just beautiful hides nothing :) you can see in the pics my outline :0 and I taped the edges down.
Top was great quality, fit well, just like picture
This was a beautiful piece! The collar is long down the back.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top, this fit perfectly, and went very well with jeans for a couple of parties.
links_reviews_text: I found a bow too fussy, and tied the halter neck at the back into a knot instead. Very flattering cut, and the colour was lovely - delicate and sophisticated pink.
I rented a size up due to availability, so it was long on me. Tucked into high waisted pants no one could tell though! Loved and will rent again

This top feels very soft and silky. This means two things - feels good on the skin but you can see the silhouette of your bra. Try to wear a skin-toned bra that fits you well. The top runs large in my opinion especially the armpit hole for a surprise peek-a-boo. You can wear a cardigan or a nice blazer to complement. I like that the top is very versatile. Nice enough for you to dress up, cocktail party, and formal enough to wear at work (if you wear a blazer of course). You could pair it up with a pairt of blank skinny jeans/pants with a blazer for a modern office look.
